Mma! Looli nikʉbabʉʉla nikʉtɨ, lɨnga mutikʉpɨndʉka, nuumwe mwesa mukwisa kʉpyutigwa.”
Po Jesu alɨnkʉbabʉʉla ɨkɨfwanikɨsyo ɨkɨ, alɨnkʉtɨ, “Aalipo ʉmundʉ jʉmo ʉjʉ aabyele ʉnkʉjʉ mu ngʉnda gwake, po alɨnkʉbʉʉka nkʉtʉngʉla ɨseke sya nkʉjʉ, akaasyagilemo nasimo.
Po alɨnkʉmmbʉʉla ʉmbombi gwa ngʉnda alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Keeta! Ɨfyɨnja fitatʉ ɨfi ngwisa nkʉtʉngʉla ɨseke mu nkʉjʉ ʉgʉ, ndikʉsyaga ɨseke nasimo. Po gʉtumule! Fiki gukoonanga itolo ʉmfu?’
“Ʉmbombi jʉla alɨnkʉmmwamula alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Gwe ntwa gwangʉ, gʉleke ɨkyɨnja ɨkɨ, ngʉlɨmɨlɨle nʉ kʉgʉtaagɨlɨla ɨndope.
Lɨnga gukʉpa ɨseke ɨkyɨnja kya kɨlaabo, kanunu! Looli lɨnga gʉtikʉpa ɨseke, po kwisa kʉgʉtumula.’ ”
Po leelo Jesu aamanyisyaga mu sinagogi jɨmo pi isikʉ ɨlya pa Sabati.
Ʉmo aalimo ʉnkiikʉlʉ jʉmo, ʉjʉ aalɨ nɨ mbepo ɨnyali, ɨjɨ jaalɨntwaliile ʉboonywa, ɨfyɨnja kalongo na lwele. Ʉnkiikʉlʉ ʉjo aalɨ nɨ kyengeenyuma, aatoligwaga loosa ʉkwigolosya.
Jesu bo ammbwene ʉnkiikʉlʉ jʉla, alɨnkʉnkoolela, alɨnkʉmmbʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Gwe nkiikʉlʉ ʉgwe, gwabʉliigwe ʉboonywa bwako!”
Alɨnkʉbɨɨkapo amaboko gaake pa nkiikʉlʉ jʉla, nakalɨnga alɨnkwɨma agolwike ɨnyuma, alɨnkʉntuufya Kyala.

Po ʉnkʉlʉmba gwa sinagogi alɨnkʉkalala, kʉnongwa jaa kʉtɨ Jesu ammbʉmbʉlwisye ʉmundʉ pi isikʉ ɨlya pa Sabati. Ʉnkʉlʉmba jʉla alɨnkʉbabʉʉla abandʉ aba baabʉngeene alɨnkʉtɨ, “Kʉlɨ na masikʉ ntandatʉ mu ndʉngʉ, agaa kʉbomba ɨmbombo. Mwisege kʉkʉbʉmbʉlʉsigwa mmasikʉ ago, somma pi isikʉ ɨlya pa Sabati!”
ɄNtwa alɨnkʉmmwamula alɨnkʉtɨ, “Mwe basyobi ʉmwe! Bʉle, kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ atikʉbomba ɨmbombo ɨjaa kʉjaabʉla ndwama ɨngʼombe pamo ɨmbunda jaake, nʉ kʉjɨtwala kʉkʉnwa amɨɨsi, mmasikʉ gaa Sabati?
Bʉle, ʉnkiikʉlʉ ʉjʉ ʉgwa ndʉjungu lwa Abulahamu, ʉjʉ aapinyiigwe na Seetano ɨfyɨnja kalongo na lwele, akabagɨsya ʉkwabʉligwa pi isikʉ ɨlya pa Sabati?”
Jesu bo ajobile ɨsyo, silɨnkʉbakola ɨsoni boosa aba baapɨnganaga nagwe. Looli abangɨ boosa, balɨnkʉhoboka kʉnongwa jaa mbombo ɨsisya ɨsi aabombaga.
Po Jesu alɨnkʉlaalʉʉsya alɨnkʉtɨ, “ɄBʉnyafyale bwa Kyala bʉfwene nɨ fiki? Mbʉfwanikɨsye nɨ fiki?
Bʉfwene na kaseke akaa iseeke ɨlya mutaka, aka ʉmundʉ aabyele mu ngʉnda gwake. Kalɨnkʉmela kalɨnkʉja mpiki, nɨ njʉni silɨnkʉtenga ɨfifufumbwa mu samba syake.”
Jesu alɨnkʉlaalʉʉsya kangɨ alɨnkʉtɨ, “Mbʉfwanikɨsye nɨ fiki, ʉBʉnyafyale bwa Kyala?
Bʉfwene nʉ nkese ʉgʉ ʉnkiikʉlʉ jʉmo aalyongeenie nʉ bʉfu ɨfipɨmo fitatʉ, ʉbʉfu boosa bʉlɨnkʉtupa.”
Jesu aabʉʉkaga kʉ Jelusalemu, alɨnkwenda ntwaja ʉtʉnywamu nʉ tʉnandɨ, aamanyisyaga.
Ʉmundʉ jʉmo alɨnkʉnndaalʉʉsya alɨnkʉtɨ, “Gwe ntwa, bʉle bikʉja banandɨ itolo abandʉ aba bikʉpokigwa?”
Jesu alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ,
“Ʉkwingɨla mBʉnyafyale bwa Kyala kʉlɨ bo ʉkwingɨla pa kɨfigo ɨkɨfinye. Nikʉbabʉʉla nikʉtɨ, bingi bikʉlondaga ʉkwingɨla, looli bikʉtoligwaga! Ʉmwe mwijʉʉle ʉkwingɨla ʉmo.
Bo ʉmwene nyumba iigeeleko ʉlwigi, po ʉmwe mukwɨmaga panja, mukwandaga ʉkʉkungʼunda kʉ kɨfigo mukʉtɨgɨ, ‘Gwe ntwa, twigʉlɨle!’ Looli ʉmwene ikwisa kwamulaga ʉkʉtɨ, ‘Ngabamanya ʉmwe na kʉno mufumile!’
Na nuumwe mukwisa kʉmmwamulaga ʉkʉtɨ, ‘Ʉswe jo ʉswe twalyaga nʉ kʉnwa pamopeene na nungwe! Kangɨ ʉgwe gwatʉmanyisyaga ntwaja twɨtʉ!’
Looli ʉmwene ikwisa kʉjobaga ʉkʉtɨ, ‘Ngabamanya ʉmwe na kʉno mufumile! Sookapo apa, mwesa mwe babomba mbiibi ʉmwe!’
“Po jikwisa kʉja nguuto nʉ kʉsyegetula amiino kʉnongwa jaa ndaamyo, bo mukʉmmbona Abulahamu, Isaka, Jaakobo na bakunguluka boosa mBʉnyafyale bwa Kyala, looli ʉmwe bo mutaagiigwe panja!
Kangɨ abandʉ aabikwisa ʉkʉfuma kʉfibafu fyosa ɨfya kiisʉ. Bikwisa kʉlya mBʉnyafyale bwa Kyala.
“Keeta! Bamo aba bikwibona ʉkʉtɨ aabikʉjaga baa kʉmmalɨɨkɨsyo, bikʉjaga baa kwanda, na aba bikwibona ʉkʉtɨ aabikʉjaga baa kwanda, bikʉjaga baa kʉmmalɨɨkɨsyo.”
Akabalɨlo kalakala aBafalisai bamo balɨnkʉbʉʉka kwa Jesu balɨnkʉmmbʉʉla balɨnkʉtɨ, “Sookapo apa, ʉbʉʉkege kʉbʉngɨ, paapo ʉmalafyale Heloti ikʉlonda ʉkʉkʉgoga.”
Jesu alɨnkʉbaamula alɨnkʉtɨ, “Mubʉʉke mukakabʉʉle akambwe kala ʉkʉtɨ, ‘Keeta! Lɨɨlɨno na kɨlaabo, ngʉsikaga ɨmbepo ɨnyali nʉ kʉbʉmbʉlʉsya ababine, ɨliisikʉ lya bʉtatʉ ngʉmalɨɨsya ɨmbombo jangʉ.
Looli mpaka nendelelege nɨ njɨla jaa kʉbʉʉka kʉ Jelusalemu ʉmwisyʉgʉ, kɨlaabo na palʉbʉnjʉ, mpaka mfike. Paapo sikʉlondigwa kʉkʉtɨ nkunguluka afwɨlege mu Jelusalemu, somma kʉbʉngɨ!’

“Mwe bandʉ baa mu Jelusalemu, mwe bandʉ baa mu Jelusalemu! Mukʉbagoga abakunguluka nʉ kʉbatuunya na mabwe aba Kyala ikʉbatʉma kʉmyɨnu. Kalɨnga ndondile ʉkʉbabʉngaania pamopeene, bo ɨngʉkʉ ɨfyele ɨjɨ jikʉtʉbʉngaania ʉtwanaake nʉ kʉtʉʉbatɨla mmapɨko gaake? Looli ʉmwe mwakaanile!

Keeta, Kyala ikwisa kʉbaleka ʉmwe, nɨ tempeli jɨɨnu jikwisa kʉja kɨsaame! Nikʉbabʉʉla nikʉtɨ, mutikʉʉmbonaga kangɨ mpaka pakabalɨlo aka mukwisa kʉjobaga ʉkʉtɨ, ‘Asajigwege ʉjʉ ikwisɨla mu ngamu jaa Ntwa Kyala.’ ”
Ɨliisikʉ lɨmo ɨlya pa Sabati, Jesu aabʉʉkile kʉkʉlya ɨfindʉ kʉkaaja kaa ndongosi jʉmo ʉgwa Bafalisai. ABafalisai na bandʉ abangɨ, balɨnkʉntegelela ɨsi ikʉbomba.
Nkyeni mwa Jesu, aalipo ʉmundʉ jʉmo, ʉjʉ aalɨ nʉ bʉbine bwa kwisʉla ʉmbɨlɨ.
Po Jesu alɨnkʉbalaalʉʉsya aBafalisai na bamanyisi baa ndagɨlo sya Moose, alɨnkʉtɨ, “Bʉle, ɨndagɨlo sya Moose siitɨkiisye ʉkʉbʉmbʉlʉsya abandʉ pi isikʉ ɨlya pa Sabati, pamo mma?”
Looli abeene balɨnkʉja kɨmyemye. Jesu alɨnkʉmpalamaasya ʉmbine jʉla, alɨnkʉmmbʉmbʉlʉsya, alɨnkʉmmwitɨkɨsya ʉkʉsookapo pala.
Po Jesu alɨnkʉbalaalʉʉsya alɨnkʉtɨ, “Jo jwani pakatɨ pamyɨnu, ʉmwanaake pamo ɨngʼombe jaake lɨnga jɨsolokiile nkiina pi isikʉ ɨlya pa Sabati, atikʉfyʉla nakalɨnga?”
Abandʉ bala balɨnkʉtoligwa ɨsya kwamula.
Jesu bo ababwene abaheesya aba baapaaliigwe, bikwisalɨla ɨfikota ɨfya bɨɨmɨkigwa, alɨnkʉbabʉʉla ɨkɨfwanikɨsyo alɨnkʉtɨ,
“Lɨnga ʉmundʉ akʉpaalile pa lʉsekelo, ʉlɨngatʉʉgalaga pabʉjo ʉbwa bɨɨmɨkigwa, paapo lʉmo apaaliigwe ʉmwɨmɨkigwa ʉkʉkʉkɨnda ʉgwe.
Ʉjʉ abapaalile ikwisa kʉkʉbʉʉla ʉkʉtɨ, ‘Mwepʉkɨle ʉjʉ apa.’ Po kʉsookangapo nɨ soni ʉkʉbʉʉka kʉkʉtʉʉgala pabʉjo ʉbʉfujufu.

“Looli lɨnga ʉpaaliigwe kʉkʉlyamo, ʉtʉʉgalege pabʉjo ʉbʉ bʉkaja bwɨmɨkigwa, ʉkʉtɨ bo iisile ʉjʉ abapaalile, kʉmyako atɨgɨ, ‘Mmanyaani gwangʉ, isaga ʉtʉʉgale kʉbʉjo ʉbwa bɨɨmɨkigwa.’ Po kwɨmɨkigwaga nkyeni mmbandʉ boosa aba batʉʉgeele pamopeene na nungwe.
Paapo kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ ʉjʉ ikwijiinʉla, ikʉsulusigwaga na Kyala, ʉmundʉ gwesa ʉjʉ ikwisulusya, ikwinʉligwaga na Kyala.”

Jesu alɨnkʉmmbʉʉla ʉjʉ aalɨmpaalile kʉkʉlya alɨnkʉtɨ, “Lɨnga kʉtendekesya ɨfindʉ fya pamuusi pamo namajolo, ʉlɨngabakoolelaga abamanyaani baako pamo abaamyɨnu, pamo abakamu baako, pamo abapalamani baako abakabi, ʉkʉtɨ boope bangiisa kʉkʉpaala nungwe ʉkʉkʉhomba ɨsi gwababombiile.
Looli lɨnga kʉtendekesya ɨfindʉ fya lʉsekelo, ʉbapaalege abalondo, aba bikʉkwema, abalemale na bafwa maaso.
Po ʉgwe kʉsajigwa, paapo abo bakaja nɨ fya kʉkʉhomba. Kwisa kʉhombigwa na Kyala bo bikʉsyʉka abagolofu.”
Ʉmundʉ jʉmo ndɨ bala baatʉʉgeele pakʉlya ɨfindʉ, bo apɨliike ɨsyo, alɨnkʉmmbʉʉla Jesu alɨnkʉtɨ, “Asajiigwe ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ ikwisa kʉlya mBʉnyafyale bwa Kyala!”
Jesu alɨnkwamula alɨnkʉtɨ, “Aaliko ʉmundʉ jʉmo ʉjʉ aatendekiisye ɨfindʉ fya lʉsekelo ʉlʉnywamu, alɨnkʉbapaala abandʉ abingi.
Akabalɨlo kaa findʉ bo kafikile, alɨnkʉntʉma ʉmbombeli gwake, kʉkʉbabʉʉla abandʉ aba aabapaalile ʉkʉtɨ, ‘Mwisege, fyosa fitendekesiigwe!’

“Looli boosa aba aabapaalile, kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ alɨnkwanda ʉkʉjoba ɨsi sikʉnsigɨla ʉkʉbʉʉka. Ʉgwa kwanda alɨnkʉjoba alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Nʉʉlile ʉngʉnda, ngʉlondigwa ʉkʉtɨ mbʉʉke ngagʉkeete, ngʉsʉʉma ʉhobokele, ndikwisa.’
Ʉjʉngɨ alɨnkʉjoba alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Nʉʉlile ɨngʼombe kalongo ɨsya kʉlɨmɨla, nsumwike nkʉsigela, ngʉsʉʉma ʉhobokele, ndikwisa.’
Ʉjʉngɨ alɨnkʉjoba alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Naalɨ pakwega ʉnkiikʉlʉ, po ngabagɨla ʉkwisa.’

“Ʉmbombeli jʉla alɨnkʉgomoka, alɨnkʉmpangɨla sisiisi ʉntwa gwake. Po ʉntwa gwa nyumba jɨla alɨnkʉkalala, alɨnkʉmmbʉʉla ʉmbombeli gwake alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Sooka panja mbɨbɨmbɨbɨ, ʉbʉʉke mmisebo na mu njɨla ɨsya nkaaja, ʉkabatwale abalondo, aba bikʉkwema, abafwa maaso na balemale.’
“Piitaasi ʉmbombeli jʉla alɨnkʉgomoka, alɨnkʉmmbʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Ntwa, mbombile ɨsi gʉʉndagiile, leelo ʉbʉjo bʉkaalɨ bʉlipo.’
“Ʉntwa alɨnkʉmmbʉʉla ʉmbombeli alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Sooka panja, ʉbʉʉke mmisebo na mu njɨla ɨsya mmigʉnda, ʉkabafimbɨlɨsye abandʉ ʉkwisa, ʉkʉtɨ ɨnyumba jangʉ jiisʉle abandʉ.
Nikʉbabʉʉla ʉmwe nikʉtɨ, abandʉ bala naabapaalile kʉbwandɨlo, atikonjapo najʉmo ɨfindʉ fyangʉ!’ ”
Jesu aalongeseenie nɨ kɨlʉndɨlo ɨkɨnywamu ɨkya bandʉ. Po alɨnkʉsanuka, alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ,

“Lɨnga ʉmundʉ ikwisa kʉmyangʉ, ikʉlondigwa ʉkʉʉngana ʉne, ʉkʉkɨnda ʉgwise, ʉnna, ʉnkasi, abaanaake, na bakamu abanyambala na bakiikʉlʉ. Kangɨ ikʉlondigwa ʉkʉʉngana ʉne ʉkʉbʉkɨnda ʉbʉʉmi bwake. Lɨnga atoliigwe ʉkʉbomba bo ʉlo, ʉjo akabagɨsya ʉkʉja mfundigwa gwangʉ.
Gwesa ʉjʉ atikʉngonga nʉ kʉtaamigwa, nalɨnga ko kʉfwa pa kɨkohekano, akabagɨsya ʉkʉja mfundigwa gwangʉ.
“Lɨnga jʉmo pakatɨ pamyɨnu, ikʉlonda ʉkʉjenga ɨkɨsonge, ikʉbomba bʉleebʉle? Bʉle, atikʉtʉʉgala taasi ʉkʉmanya ʉntengo, ʉkʉtɨ amanye ʉkʉtɨ ɨkyʉma kyake kɨbagiile ʉkʉmalɨɨsya ʉkʉjenga?
Paapo lɨnga ajengile ʉlwalo, leelo atoliigwe ʉkʉmalɨɨsya ʉkʉjenga ɨkɨsonge, abandʉ boosa aba bikʉkɨbonaga ɨkɨsonge bikʉnsekaga.
Bikʉtɨgɨ, ‘Ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ aalyandile ʉkʉjenga, looli atoliigwe ʉkʉmalɨɨsya!’

“Pamo lɨnga ʉmalafyale ikʉlonda ʉkʉlwa ʉbwite nʉ malafyale ʉjʉngɨ, ikʉbomba bʉleebʉle? Bʉle, atikʉtʉʉgala taasi nʉ kwinogona, lɨnga abagiile ʉkʉlwa nʉ malafyale ʉjʉ alɨ na basikali 20,000, bo ʉmwene alɨ nabo abasikali 10,000 itolo?
Lɨnga aagile akabagɨla ʉkʉlwa nagwe, bo abalʉgʉ balɨ kʉbʉtali, ʉmwene ikʉbatʉma abandʉ baa kwakwaganila nʉ malafyale ʉnnine, kʉkʉnsʉʉma ʉkʉtɨ bapɨlɨkɨsanie ɨsya kʉtwala ʉlʉtengaano.
“Ʉkʉfwana bo sisiisyo, ʉmundʉ gwesa pakatɨ pamyɨnu ʉjʉ atikʉfileka fyosa ɨfi alɨ nafyo, akabagɨsya ʉkʉja mfundigwa gwangʉ.”
“Ʉmuunyu nnunu, looli ʉmuunyu lɨnga gʉsʉʉkile, ʉbagiile bʉleebʉle ʉkʉgomokesyamo ʉbʉnunu?
Gʉkaja na mbombo najɨmo ʉkʉtendekesya ʉmfu ʉkʉja nnunu, abandʉ bikʉgʉtaaga itolo. Ʉjʉ alɨ nɨ mbʉlʉkʉtʉ ɨsya kʉpɨlɨkɨla, jo apɨlɨkege!”
Iisikʉ lɨmo, abasongesya songo na bafujufu bingi, baasegelelaga kwa Jesu ʉkʉtɨ bampɨlɨkɨsye.
Po aBafalisai na bamanyisi baa ndagɨlo sya Moose, balɨnkwijobeesya balɨnkʉtɨ, “Ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ ikʉbambɨlɨla abatʉlanongwa, kangɨ ikʉlya nabo.”
Po Jesu alɨnkʉbabʉʉla ɨkɨfwanikɨsyo ɨkɨ, alɨnkʉtɨ,
“Jo jwani pakatɨ pamyɨnu ʉjʉ alɨ nɨ ngʼoosi ɨmia jɨmo, lɨnga jɨmo jɨsobile, atikʉsileka ɨngʼoosi 99 ndiisʉ, ʉkʉtɨ akajɨlonde ɨjɨ jɨsobile mpaka ajaage?
Bo ajaagile, ikʉjɨbagala nʉ lʉsekelo.
Bo afikile kʉmyake, ikʉbapaala abamanyaani na bapalamani, ikʉtɨ, ‘Namusekelege pamopeene na niine, paapo ɨngʼoosi jangʉ ɨjɨ jaasobile, njaagile!’
“Nikʉbabʉʉla nikʉtɨ, bo lʉlʉʉlo lukʉjaga lʉsekelo kʉmwanya, kʉnongwa jaa ntʉlanongwa jʉmo ʉjʉ apɨndwike, ʉkʉkɨnda ʉlʉsekelo kʉnongwa jaa bandʉ bala 99, aba bakaja batʉlanongwa.”
“Pamo ʉnkiikʉlʉ ʉjʉ alɨ nɨ ndalama kalongo, asobiisye ʉlʉtalama lʉmo,
ikʉbomba bʉleebʉle? Bʉle, atikwasya ɨnyaale nʉ kʉpyagɨla nnyumba, nʉ kʉjɨlonda fiijo mpaka ajaage?
Bo alwagile, ikʉbapaala abamanyaani na bapalamani, ikʉtɨgɨ, ‘Amusekelege pamopeene na niine, paapo ʉlʉtalama lwangʉ ʉlʉ lwasobile, ndwagile!’
“Nikʉbabʉʉla nikʉtɨ, bo lʉlʉʉlo abandʉmi baa Kyala balɨ nʉ lʉsekelo ʉlʉkʉlʉmba fiijo, kʉnongwa jaa ntʉlanongwa jʉmo ʉjʉ apɨndwike.”
Jesu alɨnkwendelela ʉkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Aaliko ʉmundʉ jʉmo, ʉjʉ aalɨ na baana babɨlɨ abalʉmyana.
Ʉnnandɨ alɨnkʉmmbʉʉla ʉgwise alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Taata, ʉʉnjabɨle ɨkyʉma kya kɨlɨngo kyangʉ.’ Po ʉgwisabo alɨnkʉbajabania ɨkyʉma abaanaake bobabɨɨlɨ.
“Bo gakakɨndapo amasikʉ mingi, ʉnnandɨ jʉla alɨnkʉbʉngaania fyosa ɨfi alɨ nafyo, alɨnkwenda ɨnjɨla jaa kʉbʉʉka nkiisʉ ɨkya kʉbʉtali. Ʉko alɨnkwakʉbululusya ɨkyʉma kyake mu mbombo sya bwalangani.
Bo amalile ʉkʉbombela kyosa, ɨnjala ɨngʉlʉmba jɨlɨnkʉgwa nkiisʉ kɨla, alɨnkʉja ndondo.
Po alɨnkʉbʉʉka kʉ mwenekaaja jʉmo ʉgwa nkiisʉ kɨla, alɨnkʉnsʉʉma ɨmbombo. Ʉmundʉ jʉla alɨnkʉntʉma mu ngʉnda gwake, ʉkʉtɨ atiimege ɨngʉlʉbe.
Ʉndʉmyana jʉla aalɨ nɨ njala, mpaka alɨnkʉnyonywa ʉkʉlya amakandi aga syalyaga ɨngʉlʉbe, poope najʉmo akaalɨmpeelepo ɨfindʉ ɨfya kʉlya.
“Bo asyageenie alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Ababomba mbombo baa taata balɨnga, bikʉlya nʉ kʉsyasya, looli ʉne ngʉfwa nɨ njala!
Ʉne ngʉbʉʉka kwa taata, ngwakʉmmbʉʉla ngwakʉtɨ, “Taata, ndʉlile ɨnongwa kwa Kyala na kʉmyako.
Ngabagɨsya ʉkʉja mwanaako, ʉʉmbɨɨke ʉkʉja jʉmo mbabomba mbombo baako.” ’
“Po paapo alɨnkʉsookapo alɨnkʉbʉʉka kʉ gwise. Bo alɨ kɨfuki na pakaaja, ʉgwise alɨnkʉmmbona, alɨnkʉmpelela ɨkɨsa, alɨnkʉbopa, alɨnkʉmmʉʉbatɨla, alɨnkʉmfipa.
Ʉmwanaake jʉla, alɨnkʉmmbʉʉla ʉgwise alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Taata, ndʉlile ɨnongwa kwa Kyala na kʉmyako. Ngabagɨsya ʉkʉja mwanaako.’
“Looli ʉgwise alɨnkʉbabʉʉla ababombeli baake alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Namutwale mbɨbɨmbɨbɨ ʉmwenda ʉnnunu, mumfwɨke. Mumfwɨke na kakʉba ndoobe, nɨ filato mmalʉndɨ.
Namutwale ɨndama ɨjɨ jɨtupile, muboole, tʉlye nʉ kʉsekela.
Paapo ʉmwanangʉ ʉjʉ aafwile, lɨɨlɨno asyʉkile; aasobile, lɨɨlɨno aboniike!’ Po balɨnkwanda ʉkʉsekela.
“Akabalɨlo ako ʉmwanaake ʉnkʉlʉmba aalɨ mu ngʉnda. Alɨnkʉbʉʉka kʉkaaja. Bo alɨ kɨfuki nɨ nyumba, alɨnkʉpɨlɨka akoogo kaa nyɨmbo na bandʉ ʉkʉmoga.
Alɨnkʉnkoolela ʉmbombeli jʉmo, alɨnkʉnndaalʉʉsya alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Filiko ɨfiki?’
Alɨnkʉmmbʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Ʉnnugunago iisile, ʉgʉʉso ankomiile ɨndama ɨndupe, paapo ammwambɨliile ʉmwanaake ʉnkafu itolo.’
Ʉmwanaake ʉnkʉlʉmba jʉla alɨnkʉkalala, alɨnkʉkaana ʉkwingɨla nnyumba. Po ʉgwise alɨnkʉsooka panja alɨnkʉntengʉlɨla.
Looli ʉmwene alɨnkʉmmwamula ʉgwise alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Keeta ɨfyɨnja fingi ngʉbombiile, ngakilaniamo sikʉ ɨndagɨlo syako! Ʉkambamo ʉne sikʉ na kapeene, ʉkʉtɨ mbɨɨkepo ʉlʉsekelo na bamanyaani bangʉ.
Looli bo iisile ʉmwanaako ʉjʉ abululwisye ɨkyʉma kyako na baa malaja, gʉnkomiile ɨndama ɨndupe!’
“Ʉgwise alɨnkʉmmbʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Mwanangʉ, ʉgwe bwila ʉlɨ pamopeene na niine, fyosa ɨfi ndɨ nafyo fyako.
Lɨɨlɨno tʉtile tʉsekele nʉ kʉmoga, paapo ʉnnugunago ʉjʉ aafwile, lɨɨlɨno asyʉkile. Aasobile, lɨɨlɨno aboniike!’ ”
Jesu alɨnkʉbabʉʉla abafundigwa baake alɨnkʉtɨ, “Aaliko ʉmundʉ jʉmo ʉnkabi, ʉjʉ aalɨ nʉ mwɨmɨlɨli gwa kyʉma kyake. Ʉnkabi jʉla balɨnkʉmmbʉʉla ʉkʉtɨ ʉmwɨmɨlɨli ikʉbululusya ɨkyʉma kyake.
Po ʉnkabi alɨnkʉnkoolela ʉmwɨmɨlɨli, alɨnkʉnndaalʉʉsya alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Silɨ bʉleebʉle ɨnongwa ɨsi ngʉpɨlɨka bikʉkʉjoba? Mbalɨla ɨkyʉma kyangʉ ɨkɨ kwɨmɨlɨla! Ʉkabagɨsya ʉkʉja mwɨmɨlɨli kangɨ!’
“Ʉmwɨmɨlɨli jʉla alɨnkwinogona mu ndumbula alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Mbombe bʉleebʉle? Paapo ʉntwa gwangʉ ikʉlonda ʉkʉʉsoosyapo ʉkʉja mwɨmɨlɨli. Ʉkʉlɨma ngaja na maka, ʉkʉsʉʉma sya soni.
Mmeenye ɨsi ngʉja pakʉbomba, ʉkʉtɨ bo ngagiigwe mbwɨmɨlɨli, abandʉ baanyambɨlɨlege nnyumba syabo.’
“Po alɨnkʉbakoolela jʉmoojʉmo aba ʉntwa gwake ikʉbamelela. Alɨnkʉnndaalʉʉsya ʉgwa kwanda alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Kʉmeleligwa filɨnga nʉ ntwa gwangʉ?’
Alɨnkwamula alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Amapiipa agaa mafuta amalongo mabɨlɨ.’ Ʉmwɨmɨlɨli alɨnkʉmmbʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Ega kalata gwako, tʉʉgala mbɨbɨmbɨbɨ, ʉsimbe kalongo.’

Po alɨnkʉnndaalʉʉsya ʉgwa bʉbɨlɨ alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Ʉgwe kʉmeleligwa filɨnga?’ Alɨnkwamula alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Ɨfinyambɨ ɨmia jɨmo ɨfya nganu.’ Ʉmwɨmɨlɨli jʉla alɨnkʉmmbʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Ega kalata gwako, ʉsimbe amalongo lwele.’

“Ʉntwa jʉla alɨnkʉsyagania ɨsi aabombile ʉmwɨmɨlɨli ʉnsyobi jʉla, alɨnkʉntuufya paapo aabombile na mahala. Namanga abandʉ abaa nkabalɨlo aka, bikʉbomba ɨmbombo syabo na mahala ʉkʉbakɨnda aba bikʉmmwitɨka Kyala.
Nikʉbabʉʉla nikʉtɨ, ɨkyʉma kya pakiisʉ apa kikʉmalɨka. Mubombelege ɨkyʉma ɨkyo ʉkʉbatʉʉla abangɨ, po mukʉkabaga abamanyaani. Po Kyala ikwisa kʉbambɨlɨlaga ʉmwe pabʉjo bwa bwila na bwila.
“Ʉmundʉ gwesa ʉnsʉʉbɨligwa ntʉndʉ ʉtʉnandɨ, ikʉja nsʉʉbɨligwa ntʉndʉ ʉtʉnywamu. Ʉmundʉ gwesa ʉjʉ akaja ngolofu ntʉndʉ ʉtʉnandɨ, moope ntʉndʉ ʉtʉnywamu atikʉja ngolofu.
Po lɨnga mukaja basʉʉbɨligwa ʉkwɨmɨlɨla ɨkyʉma kya pakiisʉ, jo jwani ikʉbasʉʉbɨlaga ʉkwɨmɨlɨla ɨkyʉma kya bwila na bwila?
Kangɨ lɨnga mukaja basʉʉbɨligwa pa kyʉma kya mundʉ ʉjʉngɨ, jo jwani ʉgwa kʉbapa ɨkɨ kyo kyɨnu jʉjʉʉmwe?

Akajako ʉmbombeli ʉjʉ abagiile ʉkʉbabombela abatwa babɨlɨ. Bʉno ikʉmmbenga jʉmo nʉ kʉnngana ʉjʉngɨ, pamo ikʉmmwɨmɨkaga jʉmo nʉ kʉmmwila ʉjʉngɨ. Mukabagɨla ʉkʉmmbombela Kyala kʉno mukʉkɨbombela ɨkyʉma!”
Po aBafalisai, aba baalɨ bagana ndalama, bo bapɨliike ɨsyo syosa, balɨnkʉmmyalisya Jesu.
Jesu alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Ʉmwe, mukwinangɨsya ʉkʉja bagolofu nkyeni mmbandʉ, looli Kyala asimeenye ɨndumbula syɨnu. Paapo ɨsi abandʉ bikʉsyɨmɨka, sikʉnkalasya Kyala!”

“Ɨndagɨlo sya Moose na masimbo gaa bakunguluka, fyabalongwisye abandʉ mpaka pakabalɨlo kaa Johani ʉMoosi. Ʉkʉfuma pakabalɨlo ako, ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu ɨjaa Bʉnyafyale bwa Kyala jikʉlʉmbɨlɨligwa, kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ ikwingɨla mBʉnyafyale kʉ maka.
Looli kʉpepe ʉkoomoka ʉmpaalanga nɨ kiisʉ, ʉkʉkɨnda ʉkoomoka akasyʉ kamo akaa ndagɨlo.
“Ʉmundʉ gwesa ʉjʉ anndekile ʉnkasi nʉ kwega ʉnkiikʉlʉ ʉjʉngɨ, ikʉlogwa. Joope na ʉjʉ ikʉmmwega ʉnkiikʉlʉ ʉjʉ alekiigwe nʉ ndʉme, ikʉlogwa.”
“Akabalɨlo kamo aaliko ʉmundʉ jʉmo ʉnkabi, ʉjʉ aafwalaga ɨmyenda ɨgya ntengo, kangɨ aalyaga ɨfindʉ ɨfinunu amasikʉ goosa.
Pa kɨfigo kya nkabi jʉla, bammbɨɨkaga ʉndondo jʉmo ɨngamu jaake Laasalo, aalɨ nɨ filonda ʉmbɨlɨ goosa.
Laasalo alɨnkʉnyonywa ʉkʉlya ʉtʉbululukɨsya twa findʉ ʉtʉ twasatʉkaga ʉkʉfuma pa meesa jaa nkabi jʉla, syope ɨmbwa siisaga kʉkʉmyanda ɨfilonda fyake.
“Akabalɨlo kalɨnkʉfika aka ʉndondo jʉla alɨnkʉfwa, abandʉmi balɨnkʉmmwega, balɨnkwakʉntʉʉgasya kʉmwanya kɨfuki na Abulahamu. Joope ʉnkabi jʉla alɨnkʉfwa, balɨnkʉnsyɨla.
Bo ʉnkabi ikʉtaamigwa kʉ ngolongo,
alɨnkʉkeeta kʉmwanya, alɨnkʉmmbona Abulahamu kʉbʉtali, na Laasalo alɨ kɨfuki nagwe.
Alɨnkʉnkoolela alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Gwe taata Abulahamu, ʉlɨɨmbaakɨsya ʉne, ʉntʉme Laasalo, ajubɨke ʉloobe lwake mmɨɨsi kʉ sulo, ʉkʉtɨ alʉtalalɨsye ʉlʉlɨmi lwangʉ, paapo ngʉtaamigwa fiijo mmooto ʉgʉ.’
“Looli Abulahamu alɨnkʉmmwamula alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Mwanangʉ, ʉkʉmbʉkege ʉkʉtɨ bo ʉlɨ kʉ bʉʉmi gwakabile ɨfinunu, joope Laasalo aakabile ɨfibiibi. Looli apa alɨ pakʉsʉʉbɨsigwa, ʉgwe ʉlɨ pakʉkʉbɨlwa fiijo.
Palɨ syosa ɨsyo, pakatɨ pamyɨtʉ na nuumwe, lʉbɨɨkiigwe ʉlʉpanga ʉlʉnywamu, ʉkʉtɨ aba bikʉlonda ʉkwisa ʉko, ʉkʉfuma kʉno batoligwege, boope aba bikʉfuma ʉko batoligwege ʉkwisa kʉmyɨtʉ.’
“Ʉnkabi jʉla alɨnkʉjoba alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Po taata Abulahamu, ngʉkʉsʉʉma ʉntʉme Laasalo kʉkaaja kaa taata,
paapo ndɨ nabo abaamyɨtʉ bahaano. Akabasoke ʉkʉtɨ boope bangiisa kwisa pabʉjo ʉbʉ ʉbwa ngʉbɨlo.’
Looli Abulahamu alɨnkʉmmwamula alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Balɨ nabo baakalata abaa Moose na baa bakunguluka. Basiitɨkege ɨsi sisimbiigwe nabo.’
“Ʉnkabi jʉla alɨnkʉjoba alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Mma, taata Abulahamu! Looli lɨnga abʉʉkile kʉmyabo ʉmundʉ ʉkʉfuma mbafwe, bikwakʉpɨndʉka.’
Abulahamu alɨnkʉmmbʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Lɨnga batikʉsipɨlɨka ɨsi sisimbiigwe na Moose na bakunguluka, po sitikʉbakolaga nalɨnga ʉmundʉ asyʉkile ʉkʉfuma mbafwe.’ ”
Jesu alɨnkʉbabʉʉla abafundigwa baake alɨnkʉtɨ, “Nalooli sikwisa ɨsi sikʉbasobesya abandʉ! Looli ahɨɨli ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ ikʉsitwala!
Ngalɨ kʉnunu ʉkʉpinyigwa ʉlwala mmakosi gaake nʉ kʉsopigwa mu nyanja, ʉkʉkɨndapo ʉkʉnsobesya jʉmo mmbandʉ abafujufu aba!
Muje maaso! Lɨnga ʉnnino akʉtʉliile ɨnongwa, ʉnsokege. Kangɨ lɨnga ikʉkʉsʉʉma ʉlʉhobokelo, ʉnhobokelege.
Nalɨnga akʉtʉliile ɨnongwa kahaano na kabɨlɨ kwi isikʉ lɨmo, ikwisa kʉmyako, ikʉtɨ, ‘Nsobile,’ ʉnhobokelege!”
Abatʉmigwa balɨnkʉmmbʉʉla ʉNtwa balɨnkʉtɨ, “Ʉtongelepo ʉlwitɨko!”
ɄNtwa alɨnkʉbaamula alɨnkʉtɨ, “Lɨnga mulɨ nʉ lwitɨko ʉlʉniini bo ʉlwa kaseke akaa mutaka, mwabagiile ʉkʉgʉbʉʉla ʉnkʉjʉ ʉgʉ ʉkʉtɨ, ‘Nyukuka, ʉkiibyale mu nyanja,’ gwabagiile ʉkʉbiitɨka.”
“Jo jwani mmyɨnu ʉjʉ alɨ nʉ mbombi gwake, ʉjʉ ikʉlɨma pamo ikʉtiima ɨngʼoosi, ikʉmmbʉʉla bo akotwike mu mbombo ʉkʉtɨ, ‘Isaga mbɨbɨmbɨbɨ, ʉtʉʉgale, ʉlyemo ɨfindʉ’?
Bʉle, atikʉmmbʉʉla ʉkʉtɨ, ‘Ndendekekesya ɨfindʉ, ʉbombege ɨsi ngʉlonda, bo ndɨ pakʉlya nʉ kʉnwa. Bo mmalile, po na nungwe kʉlyamo nʉ kʉnwa’?
Bʉle, ikʉnngwɨla ʉlʉpi ʉmbombi jʉla, paapo abombile ɨsi alagɨliigwe?
Nuumwe bo mumalile ʉkʉbomba syosa ɨsi Kyala abalagiile, mutɨgɨ, ‘Ʉswe tʉlɨ babombeli abasita kʉbagɨsya, tʉbombile itolo ɨsi twalondigwaga ʉkʉsibomba.’ ”
Jesu bo alɨ mu njɨla ʉkʉbʉʉka kʉ Jelusalemu, alɨnkwenda mu mpaka gwa Samalija na Galilai.
Bo ikwingɨla nkaaja kamo, alɨnkwaganila na bandʉ kalongo, aba baalɨ nɨ mbʉngo jaa bʉkoma. Balɨnkwɨma pabʉtali,
balɨnkʉkoolela fiijo balɨnkʉtɨ, “Gwe Jesu gwe Malafyale, ʉlɨɨtʉpaakɨsya!”
Bo ababwene alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Amubʉʉke mukiinangɨsye kʉ bapuuti.” Bo balɨ mu njɨla bikwenda, balɨnkwelʉka.
Jʉmo ndɨ balabala, bo iibwene ʉkʉtɨ abʉmbʉlwike, aagomwike ikʉlaata ʉkʉntuufya Kyala.
Bo afikile alɨnkʉfugama nʉ kwinama paasi nkyeni mwa Jesu, ʉkʉgwa ʉlʉpi kʉmyake. Ʉmundʉ ʉjo aalɨ Nsamalija.
Jesu alɨnkʉlaalʉʉsya alɨnkʉtɨ, “Bʉle, bakeelʉsigwa boosa kalongo? Bala bahaano na bana balɨ kʉʉgʉ?
Bʉle, najʉmo ʉjʉ agomwike kʉkʉntuufya Kyala, looli mwene ʉnjanga ʉjʉ?”
Po paapo Jesu alɨnkʉmmbʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Sumuka, bʉʉkaga, ʉbʉmbʉlwike ʉbʉbine kʉnongwa jaa lwitɨko lwako!”
Ɨliisikʉ lɨmo, aBafalisai baalɨnndaalʉʉsiisye Jesu baatile, “ɄBʉnyafyale bwa Kyala bukwisa ndɨli?” Jesu alɨnkʉbaamula alɨnkʉtɨ, “ɄBʉnyafyale bwa Kyala bʉtikwisa nɨ fimanyilo ɨfi fikʉboneka na maaso.
Kangɨ abandʉ batikwisa kʉjobaga ʉkʉtɨ, ‘Keeta! Bʉliko kʉno!’ pamo, ‘Bʉlɨ kʉla!’ Paapo ʉBʉnyafyale bwa Kyala bʉlimo mmyɨnu.”
Po Jesu alɨnkʉbabʉʉla abafundigwa baake alɨnkʉtɨ, “Gikwisa amasikʉ aga mukwisa kʉnyonywaga iisikʉ lya kwisa kwangʉ ʉne ne Nnyamundʉ, leelo mutikwisa kʉlɨbona.
Kangɨ abandʉ bikwisa kʉbabʉʉlaga ʉkʉtɨ, ‘Keeta aliko kʉla!’ pamo, ‘Keeta aliko kʉno!’ Mulɨngiisa kʉsookangapo apa mulipo, pamo ʉkʉbakonga.
Namanga pi isikʉ ɨlɨ ngwisa kwisa ne Nnyamundʉ, ngwisa bo ʉlwa kɨmweku ɨkya njasi, ɨkɨ kikʉmulɨka mu mpaalanga, ʉkʉfuma ʉlʉbafu lʉmo kikwakʉfika ʉlʉbafu ʉlʉngɨ.
Bo sikaalɨ ʉkʉboneka ɨsyo, Nnyamundʉ sikʉʉnyaaga ɨngʉbɨlo ɨnyingi nʉ kʉkaanigwa na bandʉ baa nkabalɨlo aka.
“Bo ʉlwa mmasikʉ agaa Nwaka, bo sikwisa kʉjɨɨlaga akabalɨlo akaa kʉgomoka Nnyamundʉ.
Abandʉ baalyaga nʉ kʉnwa, beegaga nʉ kwegigwa, mpaka iisikʉ ɨlɨ Nwaka aalingiile mu ngalaba. Ɨfula jaa mweleesyo jɨlɨnkʉtima, jɨlɨnkʉbapyuta boosa.
“Kangɨ syalɨ bo lʉlʉʉlo mmasikʉ gaa Looti. Abandʉ baalyaga nʉ kʉnwa, bʉʉlaga nʉ kʉʉlɨsya, baabyalaga nʉ kʉjenga.
Looli ɨliisikʉ ɨlɨ Looti aasookilemo mu Sotoma, ʉmooto na mabwe aga gikwaka, fyalagalaga ʉkʉfuma kʉmwanya, ngatɨ fula, filɨnkʉbapyuta boosa.
Bʉbʉʉbo bo sikwisa kʉjɨɨlaga, bo ngʉsetʉligwa pabwelu ne Nnyamundʉ.
“Iisikʉ ɨlyo, ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ alɨ pamwanya pa nyumba, alɨngasulukaga kʉkwega ʉtʉndʉ twake ʉtʉ tʉlɨ nnyumba, looli abopege. Kangɨ ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ alɨ mu ngʉnda, alɨngagomokelangako kʉkaaja.
Munkʉmbʉkege ʉnkasi gwa Looti!
Ʉmundʉ gwesa ʉjʉ ikʉlonda ʉkʉbʉponesya ʉbʉʉmi bwake, ikʉbʉpeesyaga ʉbʉʉmi bwa bwila na bwila. Looli ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ atikʉbʉpaasya ʉbʉʉmi bwake pakiisʉ apa, ʉjo jo ikʉbʉkabaga ʉbʉʉmi bwa bwila na bwila.
“Nikʉbabʉʉla nikʉtɨ, pakɨlo ɨkyo abandʉ babɨlɨ lɨnga balambaleele pa kɨtala kɨmo, jʉmo ikwisa kwegigwa, ʉjʉngɨ ikwisa kʉlekigwa.
Abakiikʉlʉ babɨlɨ bikwisa kʉsyaga pamopeene, jʉmo ikwisa kwegigwa, ʉjʉngɨ ikwisa kʉlekigwa. [
Abanyambala babɨlɨ bikwisa kʉbombaga ɨmbombo mu ngʉnda, jʉmo ikwisa kwegigwa, ʉjʉngɨ ikwisa kʉlekigwa.]”
Abafundigwa balɨnkʉnndaalʉʉsya balɨnkʉtɨ, “Gwe Ntwa, ɨsyo sikwisa kʉbombigwa kʉʉgʉ?” Alɨnkʉbaamula alɨnkʉtɨ, “Apa gʉlipo ʉmfimba, po apa ɨminombo gikʉbʉngaana.”
Po paapo Jesu alɨnkʉbabʉʉla abafundigwa baake ɨkɨfwanikɨsyo, ʉkʉbamanyisya ʉkʉtɨ, bikʉlondigwa bansʉʉmege Kyala bwila kɨsita kʉleka.
Alɨnkʉjoba alɨnkʉtɨ, “Aaliko ʉndongi nkaaja kamo akanywamu, ʉjʉ akantiilaga Kyala, kangɨ akampaasyaga ʉmundʉ.
Nkaaja ako aaliko ʉnkiikʉlʉ jʉmo ʉmfwɨle, ʉjʉ aabʉʉkaga kʉ ndongi kaa kingi, alɨnkʉjoba alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Ngʉkʉsʉʉma ʉʉndongele kanunu ɨnongwa jangʉ nʉ ndʉgʉ gwangʉ.’
“Akabalɨlo kaa kingi ʉndongi aakaanaga, looli kʉbʉʉbo alɨnkwinogona mu ndumbula jaake alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Ndikʉntiila Kyala pamo ʉkʉmpaasya ʉmundʉ.
Looli paapo ʉnkiikʉlʉ ʉmfwɨle ʉjʉ ikʉʉsingʉla fiijo, ngʉnndongela kanunu ɨnongwa jaake, ʉkʉtɨ alɨngangatasyaga ʉkʉʉngilɨla bwila!’ ”
ɄNtwa alɨnkʉjoba alɨnkʉtɨ, “Musyaganie ɨsi ikʉjoba ʉndongi ʉnniongafu jʉla!
Bʉle, Kyala atikʉbabombela kanunu abasʉngʉligwa baake, aba bikʉnndɨlɨla pamuusi na pakɨlo? Bʉle, ikʉkaabɨla ʉkʉbatʉʉla?
Nikʉbabʉʉla nikʉtɨ, Kyala ikʉbapa mbɨbɨmbɨbɨ ɨfi bikʉnsʉʉma. Looli bo ngwisa ne Nnyamundʉ, bʉle, ngwisa kʉbaaga abandʉ aba bikʉʉnyiitɨka?”
Po Jesu alɨnkʉbabʉʉla ɨkɨfwanikɨsyo, abandʉ bala bikwibona ʉkʉja bagolofu, bikʉbiila abandʉ abangɨ.
Alɨnkʉtɨ, “Iisikʉ lɨmo abandʉ babɨlɨ baabʉʉkile kʉkwipuuta ndʉpaso lwa tempeli, jʉmo aalɨ Mfalisai, ʉjʉngɨ aalɨ nsongesya songo.

ɄMfalisai jʉla alɨnkwɨma, alɨnkwipuuta mu ndumbula jaake alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Gwe Kyala, ngʉgwa ʉlʉpi, paapo ʉne ngaja bo abandʉ abangɨ, aba bikʉkaba ɨkyʉma kʉ bʉsyobi, abaniongafu, abalogwe, pamo bo ʉlwa nsongesya songo ʉjʉ!
Ʉne ngʉfipɨɨka ɨfindʉ nʉ kwipuuta, kabɨlɨ kʉ ndʉngʉ, kangɨ fyosa ɨfi ngʉkaba ngʉkʉsookesya ɨfya pi ilongo.’

Looli ʉnsongesya songo jʉla, alɨnkwɨma pabʉtali, akaagelilepo ʉkwinʉla amaaso gaake kʉmwanya, looli alɨnkwikoma koma kʉ kɨpambaga ʉkʉnangɨsya ʉbʉsulumanie, alɨnkʉjoba alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Gwe Kyala, ʉlɨɨmbaakɨsya ʉne, ne ntʉlanongwa!’ ”

Jesu alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Nikʉbabʉʉla, ʉnsongesya songo ʉjʉ aagomwike kʉkaaja, aabaliigwe ʉkʉja ngolofu, somma ʉMfalisai. Namanga kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ ʉjʉ ikwijiinʉla, ikʉsulusigwaga na Kyala, ʉmundʉ gwesa ʉjʉ ikwisulusya ikwinʉligwaga na Kyala.”
Abandʉ bantwalɨlaga Jesu na baana abaniini, ʉkʉtɨ abapalamaasye. Abafundigwa baake bo basibwene ɨsyo, balɨnkʉbakemela.
Looli Jesu alɨnkʉbakoolela abaana bala, alɨnkʉtɨ, “Namubaleke abaana abaniini biisege kʉmyangʉ, mulɨngabasigɨlaga, paapo ʉBʉnyafyale bwa Kyala bwa bandʉ aba balɨ bo abaana aba.
Nalooli nikʉbabʉʉla, ʉmundʉ gwesa ʉjʉ atikʉnsʉʉbɨla Kyala bo ʉmwana ʉnniini muno ikʉbasʉʉbɨla abapaapi, atikwingɨla sikʉ mBʉnyafyale bwa Kyala.”
Ʉndongosi jʉmo alɨnkʉnndaalʉʉsya Jesu alɨnkʉtɨ, “Gwe Mmanyisi Nnunu, mbombe ɨfiki ʉkʉtɨ ngabe ʉbʉʉmi bwa bwila na bwila?”
Jesu alɨnkʉmmwamula alɨnkʉtɨ, “Fiki kʉʉnjoba ʉkʉtɨ ndɨ nnunu? Akajako ʉnnunu, looli aliko jʉmojwene, jo Kyala!
Ʉsimeenye ɨndagɨlo, ‘Ʉlɨngalogwaga, ʉlɨngagogaga, ʉlɨngahɨɨjaga, ʉlɨngajaga nkeeti gwa bʉtʉngʉlʉ, ʉmmwɨmɨkege ʉgʉʉso nʉ nyoko.’ ”
Ʉmwene alɨnkʉtɨ, “Ɨndagɨlo syosa ɨsyo nsikolile ʉkʉfuma mbʉkeke bwangʉ.”

Jesu bo apɨliike ɨsyo, alɨnkʉmmbʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Gwagiilwe kamokeene. Ʉlɨsya ʉtʉndʉ toosa ʉtʉ ʉlɨ nato, ɨndalama ɨsyo ʉbajabɨle abalondo. Lɨnga ʉbombile bo ʉlo, bo gwibɨɨkiile ɨkyʉma kʉmwanya. Po gwise gʉngongege.”
Ʉndongosi jʉla bo apɨliike ɨsyo, alɨnkʉsulumania fiijo, paapo aalɨ nɨ kyʉma kingi fiijo.
Jesu bo ammbwene ʉkʉtɨ asulumeenie, alɨnkʉjoba alɨnkʉtɨ, “Bo bʉpala bʉki abakabi ʉkwingɨla mBʉnyafyale bwa Kyala!
Ɨngamila ʉkwingɨla mbwasi bwa sindaano kʉpepe, ʉkʉkɨnda ʉnkabi ʉkwingɨla mBʉnyafyale bwa Kyala!”
Abandʉ aba baasipɨliike ɨsyo, balɨnkʉjoba balɨnkʉtɨ, “Po jo jwani ʉjʉ abagiile ʉkʉpokigwa?”
Jesu alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Ɨsi bikʉtoligwa abandʉ, abagiile Kyala.”
Peeteli alɨnkʉjoba alɨnkʉtɨ, “Keeta, ʉswe tʉfilekile fyosa, tʉkʉkongile ʉgwe!”
Jesu alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Nalooli nikʉbabʉʉla, ʉmundʉ gwesa ʉjʉ ajɨlekile ɨnyumba, pamo ʉnkasi, pamo abakamu, pamo abapaapi, pamo abaanaake, kʉnongwa jaa Bʉnyafyale bwa Kyala,
ikwisa kwambɨlɨla kʉ bwingi ʉkʉkɨndapo, nkabalɨlo aka. Kangɨ nkabalɨlo aka kikwisa, ikwisa kʉkaba ʉbʉʉmi bwa bwila na bwila.”

Jesu alɨnkʉbeega abafundigwa bala kalongo na babɨlɨ, alɨnkʉja nabo pambalɨ, alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Keeta! Tukʉfyʉka ʉkʉbʉʉka mu Jelusalemu, syosa ɨsi baasimbile abakunguluka, ɨsya kʉʉnjoba ne Nnyamundʉ, sikʉbombigwa.
Ngwakʉbɨɨkigwa mmaboko agaa Balooma. Bikwakʉʉnyangalɨlaga, bikwakʉndʉkaga nʉ kʉʉswela amata.
Bikwakʉngoma nɨ fingoti, po bikwakʉʉngoga. Pi isikʉ lya bʉtatʉ, angʉsyʉka.”
Looli abafundigwa baake bakaasyageenie ɨsi aajobaga. Ɨnongwa ɨsi aajobaga bakaameenye ʉkʉtɨ sikʉtɨ fiki, paapo syafisiigwe kʉmyabo.
Bo Jesu asegeliile nkaaja akaa mu Jeeliko, ʉmundʉ jʉmo ʉmfwa maaso, aatʉʉgeele kʉmbalɨ kʉ njɨla, aasʉʉmaga ɨfya bʉsʉsɨlwa.
Bo apɨliike ɨkɨlʉndɨlo kya bandʉ bikʉkɨnda, alɨnkʉlaalʉʉsya alɨnkʉtɨ, “Filiko ɨfiki?”
Balɨnkʉmmbʉʉla balɨnkʉtɨ, “Jesu ʉgwa mu Nasaleti ikʉkɨnda.”
Po alɨnkʉkoolela alɨnkʉtɨ, “Gwe Jesu, gwe Mwana gwa malafyale Ndaabɨti,
ʉlɨɨmbaakɨsya!”
Abandʉ aba baatalilepo nkyeni mwa Jesu, balɨnkʉnkemela ʉkʉtɨ amyeke. Looli ʉmwene alɨnkʉkɨndɨlɨla fiijo, alɨnkʉlaata ʉkʉkoolela alɨnkʉtɨ, “Gwe Mwana gwa malafyale Ndaabɨti, ʉlɨɨmbaakɨsya!”
Jesu alɨnkwɨma, alɨnkʉbalagɨla ʉkʉtɨ bantwale kʉmyake. Bo asegeliile alɨnkʉnndaalʉʉsya alɨnkʉtɨ,
“Kʉlonda ngʉbombele ɨfiki?” Ʉmfwa maaso jʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Gwe Ntwa, ngʉlonda ʉkʉtɨ ngeetege.”
Jesu alɨnkʉmmbʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Keetaga! Ʉbʉmbʉlwike ʉbʉbine kʉnongwa jaa lwitɨko lwako.”
Nakalɨnga alɨnkʉkeeta, alɨnkʉnkonga Jesu kʉno ikʉntuufya Kyala. Abandʉ boosa bo basibwene ɨsyo, boope balɨnkʉntuufya Kyala.
Jesu alɨnkwingɨla mu Jeeliko, aakɨɨsaniaga nkaaja kala.
Aalimo ʉmundʉ jʉmo ɨngamu jaake Sakai, ʉjʉ aalɨ nkʉlʉmba gwa basongesya songo, kangɨ aalɨ nkabi.
Ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ aalondaga ʉkʉmmbona Jesu muno ajɨɨliile, looli alɨnkʉtoligwa ʉkʉmmbona, kʉnongwa jaa kɨlʉndɨlo kya bandʉ, paapo ʉmwene aalɨ mpimba.
Po alɨnkʉbopa ʉkʉtalapo nkyeni, alɨnkʉkwela mu nkʉjʉ ʉkʉtɨ ammbone, paapo Jesu aajaga pakʉkɨnda mu njɨla jɨla.
Jesu bo afikile pa nkʉjʉ gʉla, alɨnkʉkeeta kʉmwanya, alɨnkʉmmbʉʉla Sakai alɨnkʉtɨ, “Sakai, suluka nakalɨnga! Paapo lɨɨlɨno ngwakʉlɨnda nnyumba mmyako.”
Sakai alɨnkʉsuluka nakalɨnga nʉ kʉmmwambɨlɨla Jesu nʉ lʉsekelo.
Abandʉ boosa aba baalɨmmbwene Jesu bo ikwingɨla mu nyumba jaa Sakai, balɨnkwibuneesya, balɨnkʉtɨ, “Abʉʉkile kʉkʉja nheesya gwa ntʉlanongwa!”

Looli Sakai alɨnkwɨma, alɨnkʉmmbʉʉla ʉNtwa alɨnkʉtɨ, “Keeta Ntwa! Ɨkyʉma kyangʉ ngʉjaba pakatɨ, kɨmo ngʉbapapo abalondo. Kangɨ ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ lɨnga naalɨnsyobile fimo, ngʉnngomokesya ɨfi naalɨnsyobile kana.”
Po Jesu alɨnkʉmmbʉʉla Sakai alɨnkʉtɨ, “Lɨɨlɨno ʉbʉpoki bwisile nnyumba ɨjɨ, paapo joope ʉjʉ mwana gwa Abulahamu.
Paapo Nnyamundʉ iisile kʉkʉbalonda nʉ kʉbapoka aba basobile.”

Bo bikʉgapɨlɨkɨsya amasyʉ gaake, Jesu alɨnkwendelela ʉkʉbabʉʉla ɨkɨfwanikɨsyo, paapo aalɨ kɨfuki ʉkʉfika kʉ Jelusalemu, kangɨ abandʉ bala biinogonaga ʉkʉtɨ ʉBʉnyafyale bwa Kyala bukʉja pakʉboneka nakalɨnga.

Po Jesu alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Aaliko ʉmundʉ jʉmo ʉgwa nkɨkolo ɨkyɨmɨkigwa, ʉjʉ aalondaga ʉkwenda ɨnjɨla ʉkʉbʉʉka nkiisʉ ɨkya kʉbʉtali nʉ kʉgomoka, ʉkʉtɨ akapeeligwe ʉbʉnyafyale ʉbwa kʉlongosya ɨkiisʉ kyake.
“Bo akaalɨ ʉkʉbʉʉka, aabakooliile ababombeli baake kalongo, alɨnkʉmpapo kʉkʉtɨ mbombeli ɨndalama ɨnyingi,
alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Musibombele ɨndalama ɨsi, ʉkʉtɨ syongelengepo, mpaka bo ngʉgomoka.’
Looli abandʉ baa nkiisʉ kyake baalɨmmbengile, balɨnkʉtʉma abandʉ abaa kwa kʉjoba ʉkʉtɨ, ‘Tʉtikʉlonda ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ ʉkʉja ndagɨli gwɨtʉ!’
Poope ʉmundʉ jʉla aakabile ʉbʉnyafyale, alɨnkʉgomoka kʉkaaja. Bo afikile alɨnkʉbakoolela ababombeli aba aabapeele ɨndalama, aalondaga ʉkʉtɨ amanye ɨfi akabiileko kʉkʉtɨ mbombeli.
“Alɨnkwisa ʉgwa kwanda, alɨnkʉjoba alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Ntwa, ɨndalama syako, ngabiileko ɨfijabo kalongo.’
Ʉntwa gwake alɨnkʉmmbʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Ʉbombile kanunu, gwe mbombeli nnunu! Paapo ʉlɨ ngolofu mu mbombo ɨnandɨ fiijo, ngʉkʉpapo ʉkʉlongosya ʉtwaja kalongo.’
Alɨnkwisa ʉmbombeli ʉgwa bʉbɨlɨ alɨnkʉjoba alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Ntwa, ɨndalama syako, ngabiileko ɨndalama ɨsingi ɨfijabo fihaano.’
Ʉntwa gwake alɨnkʉmmbʉʉla joope ʉjʉ, alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Ʉgwe, ngʉkʉpapo ʉkʉlongosya ʉtwaja tʉhaano.’
“Alɨnkwisa ʉjʉngɨ alɨnkʉjoba alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Ntwa, ɨsi syo ndalama syako, naapinyile nkɨtambala, ʉkʉtɨ silɨngasoba.
Naabombile bo ʉlo paapo nakʉtiilaga, namanga ʉgwe ʉlɨ mundʉ ʉnkalɨ. Kwega ɨfi ʉkaabɨɨkile nʉ kʉtondola ɨfi ʉkaabyele.’
“Ʉntwa jʉla alɨnkʉmmbʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Gwe mbombeli ʉmbiibi ʉgwe! Ngʉkʉlongela mu mmasyʉ gaako aga ʉjobile. Gwameenye ʉkʉtɨ ʉne ndɨ nkalɨ. Ngwega ɨfi ngaabɨɨkile nʉ kʉtondola ɨfi ngaabyele.
Po fiki ʉkaabɨɨkile ɨndalama syangʉ kʉlɨ aba bikʉsibombela ʉkʉtɨ ngabɨleko? Ʉne bo niisile ngalɨ neegile na ɨsi ngabiileko.’
“Po alɨnkʉbalagɨla aba baalyɨmile kɨfuki, alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Namupoke ɨndalama, mukampepo jʉla ʉjʉ akabile ndalama ɨfijabo kalongo.’
Balɨnkwamula balɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Ntwa, keeta alɨ nasyo ɨndalama ɨfijabo kalongo!’
“Joope alɨnkʉbaamula alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Nikʉbabʉʉla nikʉtɨ, ʉjʉ ikʉbombela kanunu aka alɨ nako, ikongeleligwa ʉkʉpeeligwa. Ʉjʉ atikʉbombela kanunu, koope aka alɨ nako ikʉpokigwa.
Po mubatwale abalʉgʉ bangʉ, aba batikʉlonda ʉkʉtɨ njege malafyale gwabo, mubatwale apa, mubagoge, bo ngʉkeeta!’ ”
Jesu bo amalile ʉkʉjoba ɨsyo alɨnkʉtalapo nkyeni, alɨnkwanda ɨnjɨla jaa kʉfyʉka ʉkʉbʉʉka kʉ Jelusalemu.
Bo asegeliile mu Betifage na mu Betanija, ʉtwaja ʉtʉ tʉlɨ kɨfuki nʉ bʉjo ʉbʉ bikʉtɨ Kyamba kya Misyʉngʉtɨ, alɨnkʉbatʉma abafundigwa baake babɨlɨ,
alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Namubʉʉkege nkaaja aka kalɨ nkyeni mmyɨnu. Bo mwingiile mula, mukwakʉjaaga ɨmwana jaa mbunda jɨkʉngiigwe, ɨjɨ ʉmundʉ akiitogamo sikʉ. Mukajaabʉle, mukajɨtwale apa.
Lɨnga ʉmundʉ ikʉbalaalʉʉsya ikʉtɨ, ‘Fiki mukʉjaabʉla?’ mukammbʉʉlege mukatɨgɨ, ‘ɄNtwa afumbilwe najo.’ ”
Po bala baatʉmiigwe balɨnkʉbʉʉka, balɨnkwaga sijɨɨliile bo muno aababʉʉlile.
Bo balɨ pakʉjaabʉla ɨmwana jaa mbunda, abeene najo balɨnkʉbalaalʉʉsya balɨnkʉtɨ, “Fiki mukʉjaabʉla ɨmwana jaa mbunda?”
Balɨnkʉbaamula balɨnkʉtɨ, “ɄNtwa afumbilwe najo.”
Balɨnkʉntwalɨla Jesu, balɨnkʉtenga ɨmyenda gyabo pamwanya paa mwana jaa mbunda, Jesu alɨnkwitoga.
Jesu bo ikwenda, abandʉ baalɨsyaga ɨmyenda gyabo mu nsebo, ʉkʉnangɨsya ʉlwɨmɨko kʉmyake.

Bo alɨ kɨfuki nʉ nsebo ʉgʉ gukʉsuluka ʉkʉfuma kʉ Kyamba kya Misyʉngʉtɨ, ɨkɨbugutɨla kyosa ɨkya bafundigwa baake, kɨlɨnkwanda ʉkʉsekela nʉ kʉlaata ʉkʉntuufya Kyala, kʉnongwa jaa mbombo sya fiika fyosa ɨfi baafibwene,
balɨnkʉtɨ,
“Asajigwege ʉMalafyale ʉjʉ ikwisɨla mu ngamu jaa Ntwa Kyala!
Ʉlʉtengaano kʉmwanya nʉ bʉsisya kwa Kyala gwa kʉmwanya fiijo!”
ABafalisai bamo, aba baalimo nkɨlʉndɨlo, balɨnkʉmmbʉʉla balɨnkʉtɨ, “Mmanyisi, ʉbakemele abafundigwa baako, bamyeke!”
Alɨnkʉbaamula alɨnkʉtɨ, “Nikʉbabʉʉla nikʉtɨ, lɨnga bamyekile aba, amabwe gikʉlaataga!”
Jesu bo alɨ kɨfuki, alɨnkʉkabona akaaja kaa Jelusalemu, alɨnkʉkalɨlɨla,
alɨnkʉtɨ, “Ngalɨ silɨ kanunu kʉmyako ʉmwisyʉgʉ, lɨnga gwasimeenye ɨsi sikʉtwala ʉlʉtengaano! Looli akabalɨlo aka ʉtikʉsibona.
Paapo amasikʉ gikwisa, aga abalʉgʉ baako bikwisa kʉjenga iilinga ɨlya mabwe ʉkʉkʉsyʉngʉʉtɨla, bikwisa kʉkʉfinyatɨla mfibafu fyosa.
Bikwisa kʉkʉpondania paasi ʉgwe na baanaako, mwi ilinga lyako ɨlya mabwe. Batikwisa kʉkʉlekela iibwe ɨlɨ lɨlɨ pamwanya pi ibwe iinine,
kʉnongwa jaa kʉtɨ ʉkaakaageenie akabalɨlo aka Kyala aaliisile kʉkʉkʉpoka!”
Jesu alɨnkwingɨla ndʉpaso lwa tempeli, alɨnkwanda ʉkʉbakagɨla panja aba bʉʉlɨsyaga ʉtʉndʉ.
Alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Sisimbiigwe mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo ʉkʉtɨ, ‘Ɨnyumba jangʉ jikʉjaga nyumba jaa kwipuutɨlamo.’
Looli ʉmwe, mujɨbɨɨkile ʉkʉja, ‘Mbako jaa minyambuta.’ ”
Jesu aamanyisyaga kʉkʉtɨ isikʉ ndʉpaso lwa tempeli. Abapuuti abalongosi, abamanyisi baa ndagɨlo sya Moose na balongosi baa Bajuuta, balɨnkʉlonda ɨnjɨla ɨjaa kʉnngogela,
looli bakaajaagile najɨmo, paapo abandʉ boosa baapɨlɨkɨsyaga kanunu ɨsi aajobaga.
Iisikʉ lɨmo, Jesu aabamanyisyaga nʉ kʉbalʉmbɨlɨla abandʉ ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu ndʉpaso lwa tempeli. Abapuuti abalongosi, abamanyisi baa ndagɨlo sya Moose na balongosi baa Bajuuta, balɨnkʉbʉʉka kʉmyake,
balɨnkʉnndaalʉʉsya balɨnkʉtɨ, “Tʉbʉʉle, ʉkabile kʉʉgʉ amaka agaa kʉbomba ɨsi? Jo jwani ʉjʉ akʉpeele amaka aga?”
Alɨnkʉbaamula alɨnkʉtɨ, “Na niine ngʉbalaalʉʉsya iisyʉ lɨmo. Muumbʉʉle,
bʉle, amaka agaa Johani agaa kʉboosya abandʉ gaafumile kwa Kyala, pamo kʉ bandʉ?”
Po balɨnkʉjobesania balɨnkʉtɨ, “Lɨnga tukʉtɨ amaka gaake gaafumile kwa Kyala, ʉmwene ikʉtɨgɨ, ‘Keeta mukaalɨmmwitiike?’
Looli lɨnga tukʉtɨ amaka gaake gaafumile kʉ bandʉ, ɨkɨlʉndɨlo ɨkɨ ɨkya bandʉ bikʉtʉtuunya na mabwe, paapo biitiike ʉkʉtɨ Johani aalɨ nkunguluka.”
Po balɨnkʉmmwamula Jesu balɨnkʉtɨ, “Tʉkamanya kʉno gaafumile.”
Jesu alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Po leelo niine, ndikʉbabʉʉla ʉmwe ʉkʉtɨ jwani ambeele amaka agaa kʉbomba ɨsi.”

Po Jesu alɨnkwanda ʉkʉbabʉʉla abandʉ ɨkɨfwanikɨsyo ɨkɨ, alɨnkʉtɨ, “Aaliko ʉmundʉ jʉmo ʉjʉ aabyele amaafiilʉ mu ngʉnda gwake. Alɨnkʉbabɨɨkamo abalɨmi abaa kʉkeetelela ɨmipiki gya maafiilʉ gɨla, ʉkʉtɨ ɨseke bo sibɨfwifwe, biise bajabane. Po alɨnkwenda ɨnjɨla akabalɨlo akatali.
Akabalɨlo kaa kʉtʉngʉla ɨseke bo kafikile, alɨnkʉntʉma jʉmo mbabombeli baake kʉ balɨmi bala ʉkʉtɨ bampeko ɨkɨjabo kyake. Looli abalɨmi bala balɨnkʉnkoma, balɨnkʉnkaga kɨsita kʉmpapo nafimo.
“Po ʉmwene ngʉnda jʉla alɨnkʉntʉma kangɨ ʉmbombeli ʉjʉngɨ. Abalɨmi bala joope balɨnkʉnkoma, balɨnkʉmmbombela ɨngosya soni, balɨnkʉnkaga kɨsita kʉmpapo nafimo.
Alɨnkʉntʉma kangɨ ʉgwa bʉtatʉ, joope balɨnkʉmfulasya, balɨnkʉnkaga.
“Po ʉmwene ngʉnda alɨnkwinogona alɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Mbombe ɨfiki? Ngʉntʉma ʉmwanangʉ ʉnkʉndwe. Pamo ʉjʉ jo bikwakʉmmwɨmɨkaga.’
Looli abalɨmi bala bo bammbwene, balɨnkʉjobesania balɨnkʉtɨ, ‘Ʉjʉ jo mwene kɨlɨngo. Isaga tʉnngoge, ʉkʉtɨ ɨkɨlɨngo kɨjege kyɨtʉ.’
Balɨnkʉnsoosyamo mu ngʉnda, balɨnkʉnngoga.”
Po Jesu alɨnkʉbalaalʉʉsya alɨnkʉtɨ, “Ʉmwene ngʉnda jʉla ikwisa kʉbabombela sya fiki abalɨmi bala?
Ikwisa kʉbagoga abalɨmi bala, nʉ ngʉnda gʉla ikʉbapapo abangɨ!” Abandʉ bo bapɨliike ɨsyo, balɨnkʉjoba balɨnkʉtɨ, “Bʉno silɨngiisa kʉboneka ɨsyo sikʉ!”
Looli Jesu alɨnkʉbakeeta, alɨnkʉbalaalʉʉsya alɨnkʉtɨ, “Fiki sisimbiigwe mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo ʉkʉtɨ,
‘Ɨliibwe ɨlɨ abajenga nyumba baalɨkaanile,
lyo lɨjile ibwe ikʉlʉmba pa lwalo, pa nguto’?
“Kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ ʉjʉ ikʉgwa pamwanya pi ibwe ɨlyo, ikʉkonyoka konyoka, na gwesa jʉla likʉnngwɨla, likʉntakania.”
Abamanyisi baa ndagɨlo sya Moose na bapuuti abalongosi, balɨnkʉlonda ʉkʉnkola akabalɨlo kalakala, paapo baasyageenie ʉkʉtɨ, ɨkɨfwanikɨsyo ɨkɨ aabajobaga abeene. Looli balɨnkʉbatiila abandʉ.

Po paapo abalongosi baa Bajuuta balɨnkʉntegelela Jesu. Balɨnkʉbatʉma abandʉ baa kʉntendeela, aba baaliibɨɨkile ngatɨ bagolofu, ʉkʉtɨ bankole mbʉjobi bwake, po bantwale kʉ ndongosi gwa kiisʉ ʉkʉtɨ banndonge.

Po abandʉ bala baalɨntegeliile, balɨnkʉnndaalʉʉsya Jesu balɨnkʉtɨ, “Gwe Mmanyisi, tʉmeenye ʉkʉtɨ kʉjoba nʉ kʉmanyisya ɨsya nalooli. Tʉmeenye ʉkʉtɨ ʉtikʉpaasya ɨsi bikwinogona abandʉ, ʉgwe kʉmanyisya ɨsya Kyala kʉ bwanalooli.
Bʉle, ɨndagɨlo sya Moose sikʉtwitɨkɨsya ʉkʉsonga ɨsongo kʉ malafyale gwa Balooma, pamo mma?”
Looli Jesu alɨnkʉbʉmanya ʉbʉkomu bwabo, alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ,
“Namuunangɨsye ʉlʉtalama lʉmo ʉlwa ndenali. Ɨkɨfwani ɨkɨ kyani, nɨ ngamu ɨjɨ jaani?” Balɨnkʉmmwamula balɨnkʉtɨ, “Fya malafyale gwa Balooma.”
Po Jesu alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Po ɨfya malafyale gwa Balooma mumpege ʉmalafyale gwa Balooma, nɨ fya Kyala mumpege Kyala.”
Abandʉ bala balɨnkʉswiga fiijo ʉkwamula kwa Jesu, balɨnkʉmyeka. Balɨnkʉtoligwa ɨnongwa ɨjaa kʉnkolela, kʉnongwa jaa masyʉ aga ajobile nkyeni mmbandʉ.
ABasatukai
bamo balɨnkʉbʉʉka kwa Jesu. Abeene baamanyisyaga ʉkʉtɨ abandʉ bakabagɨla ʉkʉsyʉka ʉkʉfuma mbafwe. Po balɨnkʉnndaalʉʉsya balɨnkʉtɨ,
“Gwe Mmanyisi, Moose aatʉsimbiile mu ndagɨlo ʉkʉtɨ, ‘Lɨnga ʉmundʉ ikʉfwa kɨsita kʉpaapa ʉmwana najʉmo, ʉgwamyabo ammwingɨlengepo ɨkɨlɨngo ʉnkiikʉlʉ ʉmfwɨle jʉla, ʉkʉtɨ ampaapɨle abaana ʉjʉ afwile.’
Po baaliko abanyamundʉ bahaano na babɨlɨ. Ʉgwa kwanda alɨnkwega ʉnkiikʉlʉ, alɨnkʉfwa kɨsita kʉpaapa ʉmwana najʉmo.
Ʉgwa bʉbɨlɨ [alɨnkʉmmwingɨlapo ɨkɨlɨngo ʉmfwɨle jʉla, joope alɨnkʉfwa kɨsita kʉpaapa nagwe,]
nʉ gwa bʉtatʉ, joope alɨnkʉmmwingɨlapo. Bo lʉlʉʉlo boosa bahaano na babɨlɨ balɨnkʉmmwingɨlapo, balɨnkʉfwa kɨsita kʉpaapa nagwe.
Kʉmmalɨɨkɨsyo, ʉnkiikʉlʉ jʉla joope alɨnkʉfwa.
Abandʉ boosa bo basyʉkile, ʉnkiikʉlʉ jʉla ikwisa kʉjaga nkasi gwani? Paapo aalyegiigwemo na banyambala boosa bahaano na babɨlɨ.”
Jesu alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Abandʉ baa nkabalɨlo aka bikwega nʉ kwegigwa.
Looli aba Kyala ababwene ʉkʉtɨ babagiisye ʉkʉja nkiisʉ ɨkɨpya, nʉ kʉsyʉka ʉkʉfuma mbafwe, batikwisa kwega pamo ʉkwegigwa.
Bakabagɨla ʉkwisa kʉfwa kangɨ, paapo bikwisa kʉjaga bo ʉlwa bandʉmi. Abandʉ abo baana baa Kyala, paapo basyʉsiigwe ʉkʉfuma mbafwe.

“Joope Moose aatile, abafwe bikwisa kʉsyʉka. Aajobile ɨsyo mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo, pala aasimbile ɨsya kɨsyanjʉ ɨkɨ kyakaga ʉmooto. Aalɨnnjobile ʉNtwa Kyala, ʉkʉtɨ jo, ‘Kyala gwa Abulahamu, Kyala gwa Isaka na Kyala gwa Jaakobo.’
Po Kyala akaja jo Kyala gwa bafwe, looli gwa bʉʉmi,
paapo kʉmyake boosa bʉʉmi.”
Po abamanyisi baa ndagɨlo sya Moose bamo, balɨnkʉjoba balɨnkʉtɨ, “Gwe Mmanyisi, ʉjobile kanunu!”
Ʉkwandɨla apo, akaagelilepo ʉmundʉ najʉmo ʉkʉnndaalʉʉsya kangɨ Jesu.
Po Jesu alɨnkʉbalaalʉʉsya alɨnkʉtɨ, “Fiki abandʉ bikʉtɨ Meesija Mwana gwa malafyale Ndaabɨti?
Ʉmwene Ndaabɨti ikʉjoba mwa kalata gwa Ɨsabʉli ikʉtɨ,
‘ɄNtwa Kyala aalɨmmbʉʉlile ʉNtwa gwangʉ,
“Itʉʉgasye kʉkɨbafu kyangʉ ɨkiilɨɨlo,
ʉbʉjo ʉbwa lwɨmɨko fiijo,
ʉkʉfika apa nikʉbabɨɨkaga abalʉgʉ baako
paasi pa malʉndɨ gaako.” ’
“Ndaabɨti ikʉnkoolela Meesija ʉkʉtɨ Ntwa. Po Meesija ikʉjaga mwanaake bʉleebʉle?”
Abandʉ boosa bo bikʉmpɨlɨkɨsya, Jesu alɨnkʉbabʉʉla abafundigwa baake alɨnkʉtɨ,

“Mujege maaso na bamanyisi baa ndagɨlo sya Moose. Biiganile ʉkwenda bo bafwele ɨmyenda ɨmitali, ʉkʉtɨ abandʉ babaponiege kʉ lwɨmɨko mu sokoni. Bikwisalɨla ʉkʉtʉʉgasya pa fikota ɨfya bɨɨmɨkigwa mu ngomaano, pabʉjo ʉbwa bɨɨmɨkigwa pa lʉsekelo.
Bikʉkabɨla mbʉsyobi ɨfyʉma kʉ bakiikʉlʉ abafwɨle, kangɨ bikwipuuta ɨnyiipuuto ɨndali, ɨsya kʉlabaasya. Pi isikʉ lya bʉlongi, bikwisa kwambɨlɨlaga ʉlʉfundo ʉlʉnywamu kwa Kyala!”
Jesu bo alɨ ndʉpaso lwa tempeli, alɨnkʉbabona abakabi bikʉsopa amakemo gaabo nkya kʉsopamo amakemo.
Alɨnkʉmmbona joope ʉmfwɨle jʉmo ʉndondo, ikʉsopa mula ʉtʉsenti tʉbɨlɨ.
Po Jesu alɨnkʉjoba alɨnkʉtɨ, “Nalooli nikʉbabʉʉla, ʉnkiikʉlʉ ʉjʉ ʉmfwɨle ʉndondo, asoosiisye fiijo ʉkʉbakɨnda boosa.
Paapo abo boosa basopile ɨfi beegile mfyʉma fyabo ɨfi fijeelile, looli ʉmfwɨle ʉjʉ mbʉlondo bwake asoosiisye fyosa ɨfi aalɨ nafyo, ɨfi aafisʉʉbɨlaga mbʉʉmi bwake!”
Abafundigwa bamo abaa Jesu baajobaga ɨsya tempeli, muno jaanokesiigwe na mabwe amanunu, nʉ tʉndʉ ʉtʉnunu ʉtʉ abandʉ baalɨnsookiisye Kyala. Looli Jesu alɨnkʉjoba alɨnkʉtɨ,
“Ɨfi mukʉfikeeta, gikwisa amasikʉ aga lɨtikwisa kʉjako iibwe ɨlɨ lɨlɨ pamwanya pi ibwe iinine. Goosa gikwisa koomoligwa!”
Abandʉ bala balɨnkʉnndaalʉʉsya balɨnkʉtɨ, “Gwe Mmanyisi, ɨsyo sikwisa ndɨli? Kangɨ kɨmanyilo nki kikwisa kʉtʉnangɨsya ʉkʉtɨ ɨsi silɨ kɨfuki ʉkʉboneka?”

Alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Mujege maaso, ʉkʉtɨ mulɨngiisa kʉsyobigwa! Abandʉ bingi bikwisa kʉbombelaga ɨngamu jangʉ, bikwisa kʉtɨgɨ, ‘Ʉne ne Meesija!’ Kangɨ bikʉtɨgɨ, ‘Akabalɨlo kasegeliile!’ Looli ʉmwe mulɨngiisa kʉbakongaga!
Bo mukʉpɨlɨka ɨsya bwite na kabini, mulɨngiisa kʉtiilaga. Paapo ɨsyo mpaka sikwisa kʉtala ʉkʉboneka, looli ʉbʉmalɨɨkɨsyo bo bʉkaalɨ.”
Jesu alɨnkwendelela ʉkʉjoba alɨnkʉtɨ, “Ɨkiisʉ kɨmo kikwisa kʉlwaga nɨ kiisʉ ɨkɨngɨ, nʉ bʉnyafyale bʉmo bukwisa kʉlwaga nʉ bʉnyafyale ʉbʉngɨ.
Kʉkʉtɨ bʉjo tukwisa kʉjako ʉtʉsenyenda ʉtʉnywamu, ɨnjala nɨ mbʉngo ɨjɨ jikwambʉkɨla abandʉ. Fikwisa kʉjako ɨfya kʉtiilɨsya, nɨ fimanyilo ɨfikʉlʉmba ʉkʉfuma kʉmwanya.

“Looli bo syosa ɨsyo sikaalɨ ʉkʉboneka, bikwisa kʉbakolaga ʉmwe nʉ kʉbafunda nɨ ngʉbɨlo, bikwisa kʉbatwalaga mbalongosi baa mu sinagogi, nʉ kʉbapinya mu nnyololo. Kangɨ bikwisa kʉbatwalaga nkyeni mbanyafyale na mbalongosi baa kiisʉ ʉkʉtɨ mulongigwege, paapo mulɨ bafundigwa bangʉ.
Looli kʉmyɨnu ako ko kabalɨlo kaa kʉʉfumusya.
Mulɨngapaasyaga, ʉkʉtɨ mukwakwamula bʉleebʉle, bo bikʉbalaalʉʉsya pabʉlongi.
Paapo ʉne angʉbapapo amasyʉ na mahala, aga akajako najʉmo ʉndʉgʉ gwɨnu, ʉjʉ abagiile ʉkʉgatola pamo ʉkʉgapɨnga.
“Kangɨ bikwisa kʉboohelaga ʉmwe, abapaapi bɨɨnu, abaamyɨnu, abakamu bɨɨnu na bamanyaani bɨɨnu. Bamo pakatɨ pamyɨnu mukwisa kʉgogigwaga.
Abandʉ boosa bikwisa kʉbabengaga, paapo mulɨ bafundigwa bangʉ.
Looli lʉtikwisa kʉsobapo nʉ lʉnywili nalʉmo ʉlwa mitʉ gyɨnu!
Kʉnongwa jaa kwikasya kwɨnu, mukwisa kʉkaba ʉbʉʉmi.”
“Bo mwagile akaaja kaa Jelusalemu kasyʉngʉʉtɨliigwe nɨ filʉndɨlo fya basikali, po mwise mumanyege ʉkʉtɨ kikʉja pakʉpyutigwa.
Po abandʉ aba balɨ mu Jutai babopelege mfyamba, aba balɨ nkatɨ nkaaja basookengemo nʉ kʉbopa, na aba balɨ mmigʉnda balɨngagomokelangamo nkaaja.
Paapo amasikʉ ago gikwisa kʉja gaa ngʉbɨlo, ʉkʉtɨ syosa ɨsi sisimbiigwe mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo siboneke.
Ahɨɨli abaa fifuba na aba bikongesya abaana nkabalɨlo ako! Paapo bukwisa kʉjako ʉbʉtolwe ʉbwingi nkiisʉ, nɨ ngalalɨsi sya Kyala kʉ bandʉ abaa nkiisʉ ɨkɨ.
Abandʉ bamo bikwisa kʉgogigwa nɨ nyʉʉbo, abangɨ bikwisa kʉkoligwa, nʉ kwa kʉpinyigwa mfiisʉ fyosa. Abandʉ aba bakaja Bajuuta, bikwisa kʉkakanya akaaja kaa Jelusalemu mpaka akabalɨlo kaabo kamalɨke.”
“Kangɨ fikwisa kʉbonekaga ɨfimanyilo mwi isʉba, mmwesi na mu ndondwa. Abandʉ abaa nkiisʉ, bikwisa kʉja nʉ bʉtolwe nʉ booga, kʉnongwa jaa koobela nʉ kʉsambʉka kwa nyanja.
Abandʉ amaka gikwisa kʉbamalɨkɨla, kʉnongwa jaa lʉtende, bo bikʉguulɨla ɨfi fikwisa pakiisʉ, paapo ʉtʉndʉ toosa ʉtʉnywamu ʉtʉ tʉlɨ kʉmwanya, tukwisa kʉjʉngaanika.
“Po bikwisa kʉʉmbona ne Nnyamundʉ bo ngwisa mmabɨngo na maka amingi nʉ bʉsisya bwa Kyala.
Ɨsyo bo syandile ʉkʉboneka, mwise mwikasyege, paapo ʉkʉpokigwa kwɨnu kʉlɨ kɨfuki!”
Jesu alɨnkʉbabʉʉla abafundigwa baake ɨkɨfwanikɨsyo, alɨnkʉtɨ, “Namukeete ʉmpiki gwa nkʉjʉ nɨ mipiki ɨgɨngɨ gyosa.
Amaani bo gikʉtʉlʉla, mukʉmanya ʉkʉtɨ ʉmpɨngo gʉsegeliile.
Bʉbʉʉbo na nuumwe bo mukʉsibona ɨsyo syosa, aamumanyege ʉkʉtɨ ʉBʉnyafyale bwa Kyala bʉsegeliile.
Nalooli nikʉbabʉʉla, abandʉ abaa nkabalɨlo aka, batikwisa kʉmalɨka ʉkʉfwa, bo syosa ɨsyo sikabombigwa.
Ʉmpaalanga nɨ kiisʉ fikwisa koomoka, looli amasyʉ gangʉ gatikoomokamo sikʉ.”
“Mujege maaso, ʉkʉtɨ ɨndumbula syɨnu silɨngakoligwa na kajɨɨlo akabiibi akaa bʉgaala bwalwa, nʉ kʉkoligwa nɨ mbombo ɨsya pakiisʉ. Iisikʉ lɨla lɨlɨngiisa kʉbaaga bo mwijɨbile.
Paapo iisikʉ ɨlyo nakalɨnga likwisa kʉbaaga abandʉ boosa abaa pakiisʉ.
Po mujege maaso akabalɨlo koosa, munsʉʉmege Kyala, ʉkʉtɨ muje na maka agaa kwendela kanunu ndɨ syosa ɨsi sikʉbonekaga, nʉ kwɨma nkyeni mu Nnyamundʉ.”
Kʉkʉtɨ isikʉ Jesu aamanyisyaga ndʉpaso lwa tempeli. Pakɨlo aabʉʉkaga kʉkʉgona kʉ Kyamba kya Misyʉngʉtɨ.
Abandʉ boosa baalaabɨlaga nʉlʉbʉnjʉ ʉkʉbʉʉka ndʉpaso lwa tempeli, ʉkʉtɨ bampɨlɨkɨsye.
Ɨkyaka ɨkya fisyesye ɨfisita nkese,
ɨkɨ bikʉtɨ kyaka kya Pasa,
kyasegeliile.
Abapuuti abalongosi na bamanyisi baa ndagɨlo sya Moose baalondaga ɨnjɨla ɨjaa kʉnngogela Jesu. Baabombaga ɨsyo kʉbʉtiitʉ, paapo baabatiilaga abandʉ.
Seetano alɨnkʉmmwingɨla Juuta Isikalyoti, aalɨ jʉmo mbafundigwa baa Jesu kalongo na babɨlɨ.
Po Juuta alɨnkʉbʉʉka kʉ bapuuti abalongosi na bakʉlʉmba baa basikali aba baalɨndɨlɨlaga ɨtempeli, alɨnkwitɨkana nabo muno abagiile ʉkʉnndɨɨla Jesu.
Balɨnkʉhoboka, balɨnkwitɨkana nagwe ʉkʉnhomba ɨndalama.
Po Juuta alɨnkwitɨka, alɨnkʉlonda ɨnjɨla ɨjaa kʉnndɨɨla Jesu, bo ɨkɨlʉndɨlo kya bandʉ kɨkajapo.
Iisikʉ lya fisyesye ɨfisita nkese lɨlɨnkʉfika. Iisikʉ ɨlyo lyo isikʉ ɨlɨ baaboolaga akangʼoosi kaa kʉlya pa kyaka kya Pasa.
Po Jesu alɨnkʉbatʉma baa Peeteli na Johani, alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Mubʉʉke mukatʉtendekekesye ɨfindʉ fya Pasa, ʉkʉtɨ tʉlyemo.”
Balɨnkʉnndaalʉʉsya balɨnkʉtɨ, “Kʉlonda tʉkatendekekesye kʉʉgʉ?”
Alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Bo mwingiile nkaaja akaa Jelusalemu, mukwakwaganila nʉ nnyambala jʉmo, apɨmbile ɨndeko jaa mɨɨsi. Mukankongege mpaka nnyumba ɨjɨ ikwakwingɨla.
Mukammbʉʉle ʉmwene nyumba ʉkʉtɨ ʉMmanyisi ikʉkʉlaalʉʉsya ikʉtɨ, ‘Ɨkyumba kya baheesya kɨlɨ kʉʉgʉ? Ngʉlonda ʉkʉlɨɨlamo ɨkyaka kya Pasa pamopeene na bafundigwa bangʉ.’
Ʉmwene nyumba ikwakʉbanangɨsya ɨkyumba ɨkɨnywamu ɨkya kʉ golofwa, kɨtendekesiigwe kanunu pa bʉtʉʉgalo, mukatendekesyege ɨfindʉ fya Pasa ʉmo.”
Balɨnkʉbʉʉka, balɨnkwakʉsyaga syosa bo muumo Jesu aababʉʉliile. Po balɨnkʉtendekesya ɨfindʉ fya Pasa.
Namajolo akabalɨlo kaa kʉlya bo kafikile, Jesu alɨnkʉtʉʉgala pakʉlya ɨfindʉ pamopeene na batʉmigwa baake kalongo na babɨlɨ.
Alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Nnyonyilwe fiijo ʉkʉlya ɨPasa ɨjɨ pamopeene na nuumwe, bo taasi ngaalɨ ʉkʉtaamigwa.
Nikʉbabʉʉla nikʉtɨ, ndikwisa kwandɨsyamo sikʉ ʉkʉlya ɨfindʉ fya Pasa, mpaka apa ngwisa kʉlya ɨPasa ɨjaa nalooli mBʉnyafyale bwa Kyala.”
Po alɨnkwega ɨkɨkombe ɨkya finga, alɨnkʉgwa ʉlʉpi kwa Kyala, alɨnkʉjoba alɨnkʉtɨ, “Namwege ɨkɨkombe ɨkɨ ɨkya finga, kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ anwe!
Paapo nikʉbabʉʉla nikʉtɨ, ndikwisa kʉnwamo kangɨ ɨfinga mpaka bwise ʉBʉnyafyale bwa Kyala.”
Alɨnkwega ɨkɨsyesye, alɨnkʉgwa ʉlʉpi kwa Kyala, alɨnkʉkɨmenya, alɨnkʉbapapo, alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Ʉgʉ go mbɨlɨ gwangʉ, ʉgʉ gʉningiigwe kʉnongwa jɨɨnu. Mubombege bo ʉlʉ ʉkʉngʉmbʉka ʉne.”
Kangɨ bo baliile ɨfindʉ, Jesu alɨnkwega ɨkɨkombe ɨkya finga, alɨnkʉtɨ, “Ɨkɨkombe ɨkɨ ɨkya finga lo lwitɨkano ʉlʉpya mwi ilopa lyangʉ, ɨlɨ likooneka ʉkʉbapoka ʉmwe.
“Looli ʉjʉ ikʉja pakʉʉndɨɨla, ikʉlya pamopeene na niine apa pa meesa.
Paapo ʉne Nnyamundʉ angʉfwa bo muno Kyala aasibaatɨkiile, looli ahɨɨli ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ ikʉʉndɨɨla!”
Balɨnkwanda ʉkʉlaalʉʉsania ʉkʉtɨ jo jwani ikʉja pakʉbomba ɨsyo.
Po abatʉmigwa balɨnkwanda ʉkʉkaanikana, ʉkʉtɨ jo jwani nkʉlʉmba nkɨbugutɨla kyabo.
Jesu alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Abanyafyale baa pakiisʉ apa biiganile ʉkʉbalagɨla abandʉ kʉ bʉkalɨ, bikʉjobigwa ʉkʉtɨ batʉʉli baa bandʉ.
“Looli kʉmyɨnu ʉmwe silɨngajaga bo ʉlo. Ʉjʉ jo nkʉlʉmba nkɨbugutɨla kyɨnu, jo ajege bo ʉnnandɨ. Kangɨ ʉjʉ ikʉlongosya, ikʉlondigwa ababombelege abangɨ.
Po jwani nkʉlʉmba kʉ nnine? Ʉjʉ atʉʉgeele pakʉlya ɨfindʉ pamo ʉjʉ ikʉntwalɨla ɨfindʉ? Bʉle, akaja jo ʉjʉ atʉʉgeele pakʉlya? Looli ʉne nkɨbugutɨla kyɨnu ndɨ bo ʉmbombeli.
“Ʉmwe jo ʉmwe musyele na niine, bo ndɨ mbʉtolwe ʉbwa ngelo.
Ʉne ngʉbapapo ʉmwe ʉBʉnyafyale bo ʉlʉ Taata aalɨmbeele ʉne,
ʉkʉtɨ mwise mulye nʉ kʉnwa mBʉnyafyale bwangʉ, kangɨ mwise mutʉʉgale pa fikota fya bʉtwa, ʉkʉtɨ mufilonge ɨfikolo kalongo na fibɨlɨ ɨfya Isilaɨli.”
Jesu alɨnkʉjoba alɨnkʉtɨ, “Simoni, Simoni! Seetano asʉʉmile kwa Kyala, ʉkʉbagela ʉmwe mwesa, bo ʉlwa ndɨmi ʉjʉ ikʉlʉlʉʉsya.
Looli ngwipuutiile, ʉkʉtɨ ʉlwitɨko lwako lʉlɨnganaganika. Bo gʉʉngomokiile, gwise ʉbakasyege abafundigwa biinaako.”
Po Simoni alɨnkʉmmwamula alɨnkʉtɨ, “Gwe Ntwa, ʉne niitendekiisye ʉkʉpinyigwa, poope nʉ kʉfwa pamopeene na nungwe!”
Jesu alɨnkʉtɨ, “Nikʉkʉbʉʉla Simoni Peeteli ʉkʉtɨ, bo ɨngongobe jɨkaalɨ ʉkʉkoolela ʉmwisyʉgʉ, ʉgwe kʉngaana katatʉ ʉkʉtɨ ʉkaamanya.”
Po Jesu alɨnkʉbalaalʉʉsya alɨnkʉtɨ, “Bo mbatʉmile kɨsita ndalama, pamo ɨkɨnyambɨ, pamo ɨfilato, bʉle, mwalyagiilwe fimo?” Balɨnkʉtɨ, “Mma, tʉkaalyagiilwe nafimo.”
Jesu alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Ʉlʉ, ʉjʉ alɨ na kanyambɨ akaa ndalama akolelege, na joope ʉjʉ alɨ nɨ kɨnyambɨ akolelege. Ʉjʉ akaja nʉ lʉʉbo, ʉʉlɨsyege ikoti lyake, akʉʉle.
Paapo nikʉbabʉʉla, sisimbiigwe mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo ʉkʉtɨ, ‘Aabaliigwe pamopeene na batʉlanongwa.’
Nalooli syosa ɨsi sisimbiigwe kʉnongwa jangʉ, mpaka sibombigwe.”
Abafundigwa baake balɨnkʉtɨ, “Gwe Ntwa, keeta, apa silipo ɨnyʉʉbo ibɨlɨ.” Alɨnkʉbaamula alɨnkʉtɨ, “Tʉsileke ɨsyo.”
Po Jesu alɨnkʉsookamo mu Jelusalemu, alɨnkʉbʉʉka kʉ Kyamba kya Misyʉngʉtɨ, bo muno lwajɨɨliile ʉlwiho lwake, abafundigwa baake balɨnkʉnkonga.
Bo afikile pabʉjo bʉla, alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Mwipuutege, ʉkʉtɨ mulɨngiisa kʉtoligwa nɨ ngelo.”
Alɨnkʉsookapo apa baalipo, alɨnkʉbʉʉka pabʉtalipo, apa likʉgomokela iibwe lɨnga ʉmundʉ atuunyile. Alɨnkʉfugama, alɨnkwipuuta,
alɨnkʉtɨ, “Gwe Taata! Lɨnga bwigane bwako, ʉʉsookesyepo ɨngʉbɨlo ɨsi.
Leelo bʉlɨngabombigwa ʉbwigane bwangʉ, looli ʉbwako!” [
Po ʉgwandʉmi ʉkʉfuma kʉmwanya alɨnkʉmmwisɨla, alɨnkʉmpa amaka.
Aalɨ mu ngʉbɨlo ɨnywamu ɨsya mu ndumbula, po alɨnkʉkɨndɨlɨla fiijo ʉkwipuuta, amafuku gaake galɨnkʉja bo ʉlwa matondobya gaa ilopa, galɨnkʉtoonya paasi.]
Bo iipuutile, alɨnkwɨma, alɨnkʉbʉʉka kʉ bafundigwa baake, alɨnkʉbaaga bagonile ʉtʉlo, kʉnongwa jaa bʉsulumanie.
Alɨnkʉbalaalʉʉsya alɨnkʉtɨ, “Fiki mukʉgona ʉtʉlo? Namusumuke! Mwipuutege, ʉkʉtɨ mulɨngiisa kʉtoligwa nɨ ngelo.”
Bo akaalɨ ikʉjoba, nakalɨnga kɨlɨnkwisa ɨkɨlʉndɨlo kya bandʉ, kɨlongosiigwe na Juuta, ʉgwa ndɨ bala kalongo na babɨlɨ. Alɨnkʉsegelela kwa Jesu, alɨnkʉmfipa.
Jesu alɨnkʉnndaalʉʉsya alɨnkʉtɨ, “Juuta! Kʉʉndɨɨla ne Nnyamundʉ kʉ njɨla jaa kʉʉfipa?”
Abafundigwa baa Jesu bo basibwene ɨsyo, balɨnkʉjoba balɨnkʉtɨ, “Gwe Ntwa! Bʉle, tʉbasenge nɨ nyʉʉbo?”
Po ʉmwinaabo jʉmo alɨnkʉnsenga nʉ lʉʉbo ʉntʉmwa gwa mpuuti ʉnkʉlʉmba, ɨmbʉlʉkʉtʉ jaa kʉ kiilɨɨlo.
Jesu alɨnkʉjoba alɨnkʉtɨ, “Namuleke ʉkʉbomba ɨsyo!” Alɨnkʉpalamaasya ɨmbʉlʉkʉtʉ jaa ntʉmwa jʉla, alɨnkʉmmbʉmbʉlʉsya.

Jesu alɨnkʉbabʉʉla abapuuti abalongosi, abakʉlʉmba baa basikali abaa mu tempeli, pamopeene na balongosi baa Bajuuta, aba baaliisile kʉkʉnkola, alɨnkʉtɨ, “Bʉle, mwisile mukolile ɨnyʉʉbo nɨ nduuha ngatɨ mukʉlɨkola inyambuta?
Bwila naatʉʉgalaga nkyeni mmyɨnu ndʉpaso lwa tempeli, mukaalɨngolilemo sikʉ! Looli aka kabalɨlo kɨɨnu, kabalɨlo kaa bʉlagɨli bwa ngiisi.”
Po abandʉ bala balɨnkʉnkola Jesu, balɨnkʉntwala kʉkaaja kaa mpuuti ʉnkʉlʉmba.
Peeteli alɨnkʉnkonga pabʉtalipo.
Abandʉ balɨnkʉkosya ʉmooto pakatɨ pa lʉpaso, balɨnkʉtʉʉgala pamopeene, joope Peeteli alɨnkʉtʉʉgala pamopeene nabo.
Ʉmbombi jʉmo ʉndɨndwana, alɨnkʉmmbona Peeteli atʉʉgeele apa ʉmooto gwakaga, aalɨnkeetile kanunu, alɨnkʉjoba alɨnkʉtɨ, “Joope ʉjʉ, aalɨ pamopeene na Jesu.”
Looli Peeteli alɨnkʉkaana alɨnkʉtɨ, “Gwe nkiikʉlʉ ʉgwe! Ʉne ngammanya!”
Bo bangeelepo panandɨ, ʉmundʉ ʉjʉngɨ alɨnkʉmmbona Peeteli, alɨnkʉjoba alɨnkʉtɨ, “Na nungwe ʉlɨ mwinaabo bala.” Peeteli alɨnkʉmmwamula alɨnkʉtɨ, “Gwe mundʉ ʉgwe, ʉngaasaaka ʉne!”
Bo jɨkɨndile ɨsala jɨmo bʉno, ʉmundʉ ʉjʉngɨ alɨnkʉsisimɨkɨsya, alɨnkʉjoba alɨnkʉtɨ, “Nalooli ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ aalɨ pamopeene na Jesu! Paapo joope ʉjʉ Ngalilai!”
Looli Peeteli alɨnkwamula alɨnkʉtɨ, “Gwe mundʉ ʉgwe, ɨsi kʉsijoba ngasimanya!”
Nakalɨnga bo alɨ pakʉjoba ɨsyo, ɨngongobe jɨlɨnkʉkoolela.
ɄNtwa Jesu alɨnkʉsanuka, alɨnkʉnkeeta Peeteli. Po Peeteli alɨnkʉgakʉmbʉka amasyʉ aga ʉNtwa aalɨmmbʉʉlile ʉkʉtɨ, “Lɨɨlɨno ɨngongobe bo jɨkaalɨ ʉkʉkoolela, kʉngaana katatʉ.”
Po alɨnkʉsooka panja, alɨnkʉlɨla fiijo.
Abasikali aba banndɨndɨlɨlaga Jesu, balɨnkʉmmʉʉgɨɨlɨla nʉ kʉnkoma.
Balɨnkʉmpinya nɨ kɨtambala kʉmaaso, balɨnkʉnndaalʉʉsya balɨnkʉtɨ, “Kunguluka! Jo jwani akʉkomile?”
Balɨnkʉntʉka amaheelu agangɨ amingi.
Bo bʉkiile, balɨnkʉkomaana abaa lʉkomaano lwa Sanihendilini,
ʉlʉ bikʉjamo abalongosi baa Bajuuta, abapuuti abalongosi, na bamanyisi baa ndagɨlo sya Moose. Po abasikali balɨnkʉntwala Jesu nkyeni mmyabo.
Po balɨnkʉnndaalʉʉsya balɨnkʉtɨ, “Tʉbʉʉle, ʉgwe gwe Meesija?” Jesu alɨnkʉbaamula alɨnkʉtɨ, “Nalɨnga mbabʉʉlile, mutikʉʉnyiitɨka.
Kangɨ lɨnga ngʉbalaalʉʉsya, mutikʉʉnyaamula.
Looli ʉkwandɨla lɨɨlɨno, ʉne ne Nnyamundʉ ngʉtʉʉgalaga kʉmwanya, pabʉjo ʉbwɨmɨkigwa, kʉkɨbafu ɨkiilɨɨlo ɨkya Kyala ʉMwene maka.”
Balɨnkʉjoba boosa balɨnkʉtɨ, “Kokʉtɨ ʉgwe ʉlɨ Mwana gwa Kyala?” Jesu alɨnkʉbaamula alɨnkʉtɨ, “Mujobile ɨsya nalooli.”
Po balɨnkʉjoba balɨnkʉtɨ, “Tukʉbʉlonda ʉbʉkeeti bwa fiki? Keeta, tʉpɨliike jʉjʉʉswe amasyʉ ʉkʉfuma nkanwa mmyake!”
Po abalongosi abakʉlʉmba bala abaa Bajuuta, balɨnkwɨma, balɨnkʉntwala Jesu kwa Pilati, ʉndongosi gwa kiisʉ ɨkya Jutai.

Balɨnkwanda ʉkʉnsitaaka balɨnkʉtɨ, “Ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ tʉmmbwene ikʉbasofya abandʉ baa nkiisʉ kyɨtʉ. Ikʉkaanisya abandʉ ʉkʉsonga ɨsongo kʉ malafyale gwa Balooma, kangɨ ikwijoba ʉkʉtɨ ʉmwene jo Meesija, ʉMalafyale.”
Po Pilati alɨnkʉnndaalʉʉsya Jesu alɨnkʉtɨ, “Bʉle, ʉgwe ʉlɨ Malafyale gwa Bajuuta?” Jesu alɨnkʉmmwamula alɨnkʉtɨ, “Bo lɨlɨɨlyo ʉjobile.”
Pilati alɨnkʉbabʉʉla abapuuti abalongosi nɨ kɨlʉndɨlo ɨkya bandʉ, alɨnkʉtɨ, “Ngajaagamo ɨnongwa najɨmo mmundʉ ʉjʉ.”
Looli abeene balɨnkʉsisimɨkɨsya ʉkʉjoba balɨnkʉtɨ, “Ikʉbasonga abandʉ ʉkʉbʉsambʉkɨla ʉbʉnyafyale nɨ manyisyo syake, moosa mu Jutai. Aalyandiile kʉ Galilai mpaka afikile kʉno.”
Pilati bo apɨliike ɨsyo, alɨnkʉlaalʉʉsya alɨnkʉtɨ, “Bʉle, ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ gwa mu Galilai?”
Bo asyageenie ʉkʉtɨ Ngalilai, ikʉfuma mbʉnyafyale bwa Heloti, alɨnkʉntʉma kwa Heloti, ʉjʉ joope akabalɨlo ako aalimo mu Jelusalemu.
Heloti bo ammbwene Jesu, aahobwike fiijo, paapo amasikʉ mingi aalondaga ʉkʉmmbona. Aapɨliike ɨnongwa syake, aasʉʉbɨlaga ʉkʉmmbona Jesu ikʉbomba ɨkiika kɨmo.
Po Heloti alɨnkʉnndaalʉʉsya Jesu amasyʉ mingi, looli ʉmwene akaalɨmmwamwile iisyʉ nalɨmo.
Abapuuti abalongosi na bamanyisi baa ndagɨlo sya Moose baalipo, balɨnkʉjoba amasyʉ gaa kʉnsitaaka kʉ maka fiijo.
Po Heloti na basikali baake, balɨnkʉmmwangalɨla nʉ kʉmmoobela. Balɨnkʉmfwɨka ɨmyenda ɨgya bʉnyafyale, balɨnkʉntwala kangɨ kwa Pilati.
Ɨliisikʉ ɨlyo, Heloti na Pilati balɨnkʉja bamanyaani, paapo kʉnyuma baalɨ kɨlʉgʉ.
Po Pilati alɨnkʉbabʉngaania abapuuti abalongosi, abalongosi baa bandʉ na bandʉ abangɨ.

Alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ muntwele kʉmyangʉ, mukʉnsitaaka ʉkʉtɨ ikʉbasonga abandʉ ʉkʉbʉsambʉkɨla ʉbʉlongosi bwa kiisʉ. Nʉnndaalʉʉsiisye nkyeni mmyɨnu, looli ngajaaga ɨnongwa najɨmo ɨjɨ atʉlile, ndɨ syosa ɨsi munsitaakile.
Joope Heloti akajaaga ɨnongwa najɨmo kʉmyake, fyobeene anngomwisye kʉmyɨtʉ. Akabomba nasimo ɨsya kʉmpelela ʉkʉlongigwa ʉkʉgogigwa.
Po leelo, ikʉkomigwa ɨfingoti, po ngʉmmwabʉlaga.” [
Lwalɨ lwiho ʉkʉmmwabʉla ʉmpinyigwa jʉmo pa kyaka kya Pasa.]
Looli abandʉ boosa balɨnkʉjwega palɨkɨmokyene balɨnkʉtɨ, “Nngoge ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ! Ʉtwabʉlɨle Balaba!”
Balaba aapinyiigwe mu nnyololo, paapo aapelile ʉkʉsambʉka abandʉ nkaaja ʉkʉpɨnga ʉbʉlongosi bwa kiisʉ, na kʉnongwa jaa bʉgogi.
Pilati aalondaga ʉkʉmmwabʉla Jesu, alɨnkʉjoba na bandʉ kangɨ.
Looli abeene balɨnkongelapo ʉkʉjwega balɨnkʉtɨ, “Nkomelele pa kɨkohekano! Nkomelele pa kɨkohekano!”

Pilati alɨnkʉjoba nabo kangɨ ʉlwa bʉtatʉ alɨnkʉtɨ, “Fiki? Abombile mbiibi nki? Ʉne ngajaaga ɨnongwa najɨmo kʉmyake, ɨjaa kʉmpelela ʉkʉtɨ alongigwe ʉkʉgogigwa! Kʉnongwa ɨjo ngʉlagɨla akomigwe ɨfingoti, po ngʉmmwabʉlaga.”
Looli abandʉ balɨnkʉkɨndapo ʉkʉjwega kʉ maka fiijo, balɨnkʉʉmɨɨlɨla ʉkʉsʉʉma ʉkʉtɨ Jesu akomeleligwe pa kɨkohekano. Ʉnjwego gwabo gʉlɨnkʉpela ʉkʉtɨ biitɨkɨsigwe.
Po Pilati alɨnkʉtumula ʉkʉtɨ sibombigwe ɨsi baasʉʉmaga.
Alɨnkʉmmwabʉla Balaba ʉjʉ aapinyiigwe kʉnongwa jaa kʉbasonga abandʉ ʉkʉbʉsambʉkɨla ʉbʉlongosi bwa kiisʉ, na kʉnongwa jaa bʉgogi, alɨnkʉbapapo Jesu abasikali, ʉkʉtɨ bammbombele ɨsi baalondaga abandʉ.

Abasikali bo bikʉntwala Jesu kʉkʉnngoga, balɨnkwaganila nʉ mundʉ jʉmo ɨngamu jaake Simoni ʉgwa mu Kilene, aafumile mmigʉnda, iisaga nkaaja. Balɨnkʉnkola, balɨnkʉntwɨka ɨkɨkohekano ʉkʉtɨ ampɨmbɨle Jesu. Po alɨnkʉpɨmba, alɨnkʉnkonga Jesu.
Ɨkɨlʉndɨlo ɨkɨnywamu kya bandʉ kɨlɨnkʉnkonga Jesu. Nkɨlʉndɨlo ɨkyo, baalimo abakiikʉlʉ aba banndɨlɨlaga nʉ kʉnkuutɨla.
Jesu alɨnkʉbasanukɨla, alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Mwe bakiikʉlʉ baa mu Jelusalemu! Mulɨngaandɨlɨlaga ʉne, looli mwilɨlɨlege mwibeene na baanɨɨnu!
Paapo gikwisa amasikʉ aga abandʉ bikʉtɨgɨ, ‘Basajiigwe abakiikʉlʉ abagʉmba, aba bakapaapamo nʉ kongesyamo abaana!’
Po,
‘Abandʉ bikwisa kʉfibʉʉlaga ɨfyamba ʉkʉtɨ,
“Namutʉgwɨlege!”
Kangɨ nʉ twamba ʉkʉtɨ,
“Namutʉsyɨlege!” ’
“Abandʉ bikʉʉmbombela ʉne bo ʉlʉ, ne ngaja ntʉlanongwa. Po sikwisa kʉjaga bʉleebʉle kʉ batʉlanongwa?”
Balɨnkʉbatwala boope abanyambuta babɨlɨ, ʉkʉtɨ bagogiigwe pamopeene na Jesu.
Po balɨnkʉfika pabʉjo ʉbʉ ɨngamu jaake bikʉtɨ Lʉpaja lwa Ntʉ, balɨnkʉbakomelela pa fikohekano, Jesu na banyambuta babɨlɨ bala, jʉmo kʉkɨbafu ɨkiilɨɨlo, nʉ jʉngɨ kʉkɨbafu ɨkiimama.
Po Jesu alɨnkʉtɨ, “Gwe Taata, ʉbahobokele, paapo bakasimanya ɨsi balɨ pakʉsibomba.” Balɨnkʉjabana ɨmyenda gyake kʉ njɨla jaa bʉlagʉsi.
Abandʉ baalyɨmile kɨfuki baakeetaga. Abalongosi baa Bajuuta bammwangalɨlaga Jesu, baatɨgɨ, “Aabapokaga abangɨ, oko na iipoke ʉmwene, lɨnga jo Meesija gwa Kyala, ʉnsʉngʉligwa gwake!”
Abasikali boope balɨnkʉmmwangalɨla, balɨnkʉsegelela kʉmyake, balɨnkʉmpa ɨfinga ɨngalɨ,
kangɨ balɨnkʉtɨ, “Lɨnga ʉgwe ʉlɨ Malafyale gwa Bajuuta, na gwipoke gwimwene!”
Pamwanya pa kɨkohekano baasimbile baatile,
Ʉjʉ jo Malafyale gwa Bajuuta
Jʉmo mbanyambuta aba baakomeleliigwe pa kɨkohekano kɨfuki na Jesu, alɨnkʉntʉka Jesu alɨnkʉtɨ, “Ʉgwe ʉkaja gwe Meesija? Gwipoke gwimwene kangɨ ʉtʉpoke na nuuswe!”
Looli ʉnnyambuta ʉjʉngɨ alɨnkʉnkemela ʉnnine alɨnkʉtɨ, “Ʉgwe ʉtikʉntiila Kyala, na apa nungwe ʉlongiigwe ʉkʉfwa bo ʉmwene?
Ʉswe kʉtʉbagiile ʉkʉlongigwa kʉnongwa jaa ɨsi tʉbombile, looli ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ akabomba ɨmbiibi najɨmo.”
Po alɨnkʉjoba alɨnkʉtɨ, “Gwe Jesu! Bo kwingɨla mBʉnyafyale bwako gʉngʉmbʉkege!”
Jesu alɨnkʉmmwamula alɨnkʉtɨ, “Nalooli nikʉkʉbʉʉla nikʉtɨ, lɨɨlɨno kwakʉjaga pamopeene na niine kʉmwanya.”
Jaalɨ sala jaa 6:00 bʉno pamuusi, ɨngiisi jɨlɨnkʉgwa nkiisʉ kɨla kyosa, mpaka ɨsala jaa 9:00,
iisʉba lɨlɨnkʉleka ʉkʉbala. Ɨliibaalɨka lya tempeli
lɨlɨnkʉnyaafuka pakatɨ na pakatɨ.
Po paapo Jesu alɨnkʉlaata ʉkʉkuuta alɨnkʉtɨ, “Gwe Taata! Ʉbʉʉmi bwangʉ ngʉbʉbɨɨka mmaboko gaako.” Bo ajobile ɨsyo, alɨnkʉfwa.
Ʉndongosi gwa basikali bo asibwene ɨsi siboniike, alɨnkʉntuufya Kyala, alɨnkʉjoba alɨnkʉtɨ, “Nalooli ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ aalɨ ngolofu!”
Abandʉ boosa aba baabʉngeene pala, pakʉsikeeta ɨsi siboniike, balɨnkʉgomoka kʉmyabo, kʉno bikwikoma koma mfipambaga fyabo, ʉkʉnangɨsya ʉbʉsulumanie.
Looli abandʉ boosa aba baalɨmmeenye, pamopeene na bakiikʉlʉ aba baalongoseenie nagwe ʉkʉfuma mu Galilai, baalyɨmile pabʉtali ʉkʉsikeeta ɨsyo.

Aalipo ʉmundʉ jʉmo ɨngamu jaake Joosefu, ʉgwa mu Alimatai, nkiisʉ ɨkya Jutai. Aalɨ mundʉ nnunu kangɨ ngolofu, aabʉguulɨlaga ʉBʉnyafyale bwa Kyala ʉkwisa. Akaaliitɨkeene na balongosi banine abaa ndʉkomaano lwa Sanihendilini, kʉlɨ ɨsi baalɨmmbombiile Jesu.

Aalipo ʉmundʉ jʉmo ɨngamu jaake Joosefu, ʉgwa mu Alimatai, nkiisʉ ɨkya Jutai. Aalɨ mundʉ nnunu kangɨ ngolofu, aabʉguulɨlaga ʉBʉnyafyale bwa Kyala ʉkwisa. Akaaliitɨkeene na balongosi banine abaa ndʉkomaano lwa Sanihendilini, kʉlɨ ɨsi baalɨmmbombiile Jesu.
Ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ alɨnkʉbʉʉka kwa Pilati, alɨnkʉnsʉʉma ʉkʉtɨ ampepo ʉmfimba gwa Jesu, akasyɨle.
Pilati alɨnkwitɨka, po alɨnkʉgʉsulusya paasi ʉmfimba ʉkʉfuma pa kɨkohekano. Alɨnkʉgʉniembeteelela mmwenda ʉnnunu, alɨnkʉgʉbɨɨka mwi ipʉmba ɨlɨ lyasongoleliigwe kɨlɨngaani ndwalabwe,
ɨlɨ bakaalɨnsyɨlilemo ʉmundʉ najʉmo.
Ɨliisikʉ ɨlyo, lyalɨ isikʉ ɨlya kwitendekesya,
bo ɨSabati jikʉja pakwanda.
Abakiikʉlʉ bala aba baalongoseenie na Jesu ʉkʉfuma mu Galilai, balɨnkʉnkonga Joosefu, balɨnkʉlɨbona iipʉmba, nʉ mfimba gwa Jesu muno gʉlambalɨkiigwe.
Po balɨnkʉgomoka kʉkaaja, balɨnkʉtendekesya ɨmikota na mafuta gaa lʉʉma ʉlʉnunu.
Looli pi isikʉ ɨlya pa Sabati, balɨnkʉtʉʉsya ʉkʉkongana nɨ ndagɨlo sya Moose.
Nʉlʉbʉnjʉ fiijo pi isikʉ ɨlya pa ndʉngʉ,
abakiikʉlʉ bala balɨnkʉbʉʉka kwi ipʉmba, baatwele ɨmikota ɨgɨ baatendekiisye.
Bo bafikile balɨnkwaga iibwe lɨbungulusiigwe ʉkʉfuma pa kɨfigo ɨkya ipʉmba.
Balɨnkwingɨla nkatɨ, balɨnkwaga ʉmfimba gwa Ntwa Jesu gʉkajamo.
Bo bakaalɨ bikʉswiga ɨsyo, nakalɨnga abandʉmi babɨlɨ, aba baafwele ɨmyenda ɨgɨ gikʉlangala, balɨnkwɨma kɨfuki nabo.
Abakiikʉlʉ abo balɨnkʉtiila, balɨnkwinama paasi. Looli abandʉmi bala balɨnkʉbabʉʉla balɨnkʉtɨ, “Fiki mukʉnndonda ʉmʉʉmi mbafwe?
Akajapo apa! Asyʉkile! Namukʉmbʉkege amasyʉ aga aababʉʉlile, bo alɨ na nuumwe mu Galilai,
aatile, ‘Mpaka Nnyamundʉ abɨɨkigwe kʉ batʉlanongwa, akomeleligwe pa kɨkohekano, na pi isikʉ lya bʉtatʉ asyʉke!’ ”
Po abakiikʉlʉ bala balɨnkʉgakʉmbʉka amasyʉ gaa Jesu.
Po balɨnkʉsookapo pi ipʉmba, balɨnkʉbʉʉka apa baalipo abafundigwa baa Jesu bala kalongo na jʉmo, na bafundigwa abangɨ boosa, balɨnkʉbabʉʉla syosa ɨsi baasibwene.
Abakiikʉlʉ aba baababʉʉlile abatʉmigwa baa Jesu ɨnongwa ɨsyo, bo baa Malija ʉgwa kʉ Magatala, Joana, Malija ʉnna gwa Jaakobo, na bakiikʉlʉ abangɨ aba baalɨ pamopeene nabo.
Looli abatʉmigwa bo bapɨliike ɨnongwa ɨsi baabʉʉliigwe na bakiikʉlʉ bala, bakaasiitiike, balɨnkwaga ngatɨ sya mwalo.
Looli Peeteli alɨnkwɨma, alɨnkʉbopa ʉkʉbʉʉka kwi ipʉmba. Alɨnkwinama, alɨnkʉlingʉlɨla mwi ipʉmba, alɨnkʉgʉbona gwene ʉmwenda ʉgʉ baalɨnsyɨliile Jesu. Alɨnkʉsookapo pala, kʉno ikʉswiga ɨsi syaboniike.
Ɨliisikʉ lɨlalɨla, abafundigwa babɨlɨ baa Jesu bendaga mu njɨla ʉkʉbʉʉka nkaaja akaa mu Emau, aka kaalɨ pabʉtali bwa kilomita kalongo na jɨmo ʉkʉfuma kʉ Jelusalemu.
Bo bikwenda mu njɨla, baajobaga ɨnongwa syosa ɨsi syaboniike.
Bo bikʉjoba nʉ kʉlaalʉʉsania, Jesu jʉʉjo alɨnkʉsegelela nʉ kwenda pamopeene nabo.
Looli amaaso gaabo gaakoliigwe, ʉkʉtɨ balɨngammanya.
Jesu alɨnkʉbalaalʉʉsya alɨnkʉtɨ, “Masyʉ maki aga mukʉjobesania bo mukwenda?” Balɨnkwɨma, kʉno baasulumeenie.
Jʉmo ʉjʉ ɨngamu jaake aalɨ jo Kilyopa, alɨnkwamula alɨnkʉtɨ, “Bʉle, ʉgwe gwimwene ʉlɨ nheesya mu Jelusalemu, gwe ʉkamanya ɨsi siboniike ʉmo amasikʉ aga?”
Jesu alɨnkʉbalaalʉʉsya alɨnkʉtɨ, “Ɨsya fiki?” Balɨnkʉmmbʉʉla balɨnkʉtɨ, “Ɨsya Jesu ʉgwa mu Nasaleti. Ʉmwene aalɨ nkunguluka, ɨsi aajobaga nʉ kʉbomba syalɨ na maka nkyeni mwa Kyala na mmbandʉ boosa.
Abapuuti abalongosi na balongosi bɨɨtʉ baalɨntwele kʉ ndongosi gwa Balooma, ʉkʉtɨ alongigwe ʉkʉgogigwa, balɨnkʉnkomelela pa kɨkohekano.
Ʉswe twasʉʉbɨlaga ʉkʉtɨ ʉmwene alɨ jo gwa kʉtwabʉla twe Banyaisilaɨli. Palɨ syosa sisiisi, lɨɨlɨno isikʉ lya bʉtatʉ ʉkʉfuma apa syabonekiile.
“Kangɨ abakiikʉlʉ bamo nkɨbugutɨla kyɨtʉ ɨkya bafundigwa, batʉnyomwisye. Balaabiile nʉlʉbʉnjʉ fiijo ʉkʉbʉʉka kwi ipʉmba,
leelo bakagwaga ʉmfimba gwake. Biisile kʉkʉtʉbʉʉla ʉkʉtɨ babasetʉkiile abandʉmi, bababʉʉlile ʉkʉtɨ Jesu mʉʉmi.
Po bamo nkɨbugutɨla kyɨtʉ babʉʉkile kwi ipʉmba, baagile silɨ bo muno bajobiile abakiikʉlʉ bala, looli ʉmwene bakammbona.”
Jesu alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Mwe bakonyofu ʉmwe! Mulɨ basito ʉkʉsiitɨka syosa ɨsi baajobile abakunguluka!
Bʉle, akaalondigwaga Meesija mpaka akʉbɨlwe bo ʉlo, po ingɨle mbʉsisya bwake?”
Po Jesu alɨnkwanda ʉkʉbalɨngaania ɨsi sisimbiigwe mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo, ɨsi sikʉnnjoba ʉmwene, ʉkwandɨla ɨsi aasimbile Moose na bakunguluka boosa.
Bo balɨ kɨfuki ʉkʉfika nkaaja aka baabʉʉkaga, Jesu alɨnkʉfwana ikʉkɨɨsania.
Looli abeene balɨnkʉpyelesya fiijo balɨnkʉtɨ, “Ʉsyale apa pamopeene na nuuswe. Keeta bwilile, ɨngiisi jɨlɨ kɨfuki.”
Po Jesu alɨnkwingɨla nnyumba, alɨnkʉtʉʉgala nabo.
Bo atʉʉgeele pakʉlya ɨfindʉ pamopeene nabo, alɨnkwega ɨkɨsyesye, alɨnkʉgwa ʉlʉpi kwa Kyala, alɨnkʉkɨmenyania, alɨnkʉbapa.
Po Kyala alɨnkʉbiigʉla, balɨnkʉmmwagania ʉkʉtɨ jo Jesu, po ʉmwene alɨnkʉsoba nkyeni mmyabo.
Balɨnkʉlaalʉʉsania balɨnkʉtɨ, “Bʉle, gʉkaafwanaga mooto gukwaka mu ndumbula syɨtʉ, bo ikʉjoba na nuuswe mu njɨla nʉ kʉtʉlɨngaania amasyʉ agaa Kalata ʉMwikemo?”
Akabalɨlo kalakala balɨnkʉsookapo, balɨnkʉgomokelako kʉ Jelusalemu. Balɨnkʉbaaga abatʉmigwa bala kalongo na jʉmo, na bafundigwa abangɨ aba baalɨ pamopeene nabo, babʉngeene.
Boosa baajobaga baatɨgɨ, “Nalooli ʉNtwa asyʉkile! Ammbonekiile Simoni!”
Po boope abafundigwa babɨlɨ bala, balɨnkʉbapangɨla syosa ɨsi sibabonekiile mu njɨla, na muno bammanyiile Jesu bo ikʉmenyania ɨkɨsyesye.
Bo balɨ pakʉbapangɨla ɨnongwa ɨsyo, ʉmwene Jesu alɨnkwɨma pakatɨ pamyabo, alɨnkʉbaponia alɨnkʉtɨ, “Mugonile, ʉlʉtengaano lʉjege na nuumwe!”
Balɨnkʉnyomoka nʉ kʉtiila, balɨnkwinogona ʉkʉtɨ bikʉmmbona ʉnsyʉka.
Looli Jesu alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Fiki mukʉtiila? Fiki mukwilaamwa mu ndumbula syɨnu?
Amukeete amaboko na malʉndɨ gangʉ, jo ʉne. Namumbalamaasye, mukeete, paapo ʉnsyʉka akaja nʉ mbɨlɨ nɨ fifupa, bo ʉlʉ mukʉʉmbona ʉne ndɨ nafyo.”
Jesu bo ajobile ɨsyo, alɨnkʉbanangɨsya amakoko agaa mmaboko na mmalʉndɨ gaake.
Kʉnongwa jaa lʉsekelo nʉ kʉswiga ɨsi siboniike, baatoliigwe ʉkwitɨka ɨsi. Jesu alɨnkʉbalaalʉʉsya alɨnkʉtɨ, “Mulɨ nɨ findʉ fimo apa?”
Balɨnkʉmpapo ɨkɨbalali ɨkya ɨswɨ ɨnyookye,
alɨnkwambɨlɨla nʉ kʉlya nkyeni mmyabo.

Po alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Ɨsi syo ɨsi naababʉʉlile, bo ngaalɨ ndɨ na nuumwe, ʉkʉtɨ syosa ɨsi sisimbiigwe ʉkʉʉnjoba ʉne, mu ndagɨlo sya Moose, mwa baakalata baa bakunguluka na mwa kalata gwa Ɨsabʉli, mpaka siboneke.”
Po alɨnkwigʉla amahala gaabo, ʉkʉtɨ basyaganiege ɨsi sisimbiigwe mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo.
Alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Ɨsyo syo ɨsi sisimbiigwe, ʉkʉtɨ Meesija ikwisa kʉkʉbɨlwa, pi isikʉ lya bʉtatʉ, ikwisa kʉsyʉka ʉkʉfuma mbafwe.
Kangɨ mu ngamu jaake abandʉ baa mfikolo fyosa, ʉkwandɨla mu Jelusalemu, bikwisa kʉlʉmbɨlɨligwa ʉkʉtɨ basʉʉme ʉlʉhobokelo lwa bʉtʉlanongwa bwabo.
Ʉmwe mulɨ bakeeti baa nongwa ɨsi sibombiigwe.
“Pɨlɨkɨsya! Ngʉntʉma kʉmyɨnu ʉjʉ Taata aafingile ʉkʉtɨ ikʉbatʉmɨla ʉmwe. Looli mutʉʉgale nkaaja aka,
mpaka bo mwambɨliile amaka aga gikʉfuma kwa Kyala.”
Po Jesu alɨnkʉbalongosya ʉkʉsookamo mu Jelusalemu, alɨnkʉfika nabo kʉ Betanija, alɨnkwinʉla amaboko gaake, alɨnkʉbasaja.
Bo ikʉbasaja, alɨnkʉbaleka, alɨnkwegigwa ʉkʉfyʉka kʉmwanya.
Abeene balɨnkʉmmwipuuta, po balɨnkʉsookapo pala, balɨnkʉbʉʉka mu Jelusalemu nʉ lʉsekelo ʉlʉnywamu.
Bwila baajaga ndʉpaso lwa tempeli, nkʉntuufya Kyala.
John: Kʉbwandɨlo bwa syosa aaliko Isyʉ. Isyʉ ʉjo aalɨ pamopeene na Kyala. Kangɨ Isyʉ aalɨ jo Kyala.
Kʉbwandɨlo bwa syosa, Isyʉ ʉjo aaliko kɨlɨngaani pamopeene na Kyala.
Kyala aafipelile fyosa ʉkwendela mmyake. Akaakapelile akandʉ nakamo kɨsita kwendela mmyake.
Ʉmwene jo bwandɨlo bwa bʉʉmi boosa. Po ʉbʉʉmi ʉbo bukʉtwala ʉlʉmuli kʉ bandʉ boosa.
Ʉlʉmuli ʉlo lukʉmulɨka mu ngiisi, looli ɨngiisi jɨtoliigwe ʉkʉlʉtola.
Kyala aalɨntʉmile ʉmundʉ jʉmo ʉjʉ ɨngamu jaake aalɨ jo Johani.
Johani aaliisile ʉkʉja nkeeti gwa kʉfumusya ʉlʉmuli ʉlo, ʉkʉtɨ abandʉ boosa balwitɨke.
Johani akaalɨ lʉmuli ʉlo, looli aaliisile kʉkʉfumusya ɨsya lʉmuli ʉlo.
Ʉlʉmuli ʉlo lwalɨ lʉmuli lwa nalooli, ʉlʉ lukʉbamulɨkɨla boosa. Kangɨ ʉlʉmuli ʉlo lwaliisile pakiisʉ apa.
Isyʉ aalipo pakiisʉ apa. Abandʉ boosa abaa pakiisʉ bakaalɨmmeenye, na paapo aalɨ jo ʉjʉ Kyala aapelile ɨkiisʉ kyosa ʉkwendela mmyake.
Aaliisile kʉ bandʉ baake, leelo abandʉ baake bakaalɨmmwambɨliile.
Looli aba baalɨmmwambɨliile nʉ kʉmmwitɨka, aabapelile ʉkʉja baana baa Kyala.
Abeene bo baana baa Kyala, looli somma kʉnongwa jaa kɨkolo kyabo, kangɨ somma kʉnongwa jaa kʉpaapigwa nʉ nnyambala nʉ nkiikʉlʉ, looli Kyala jo ʉjʉ ikʉbapela ʉkʉja baanaake jʉʉjo.

Isyʉ ʉjo aaliisile alɨnkʉja mundʉ, aaliisile kʉtʉʉgala kʉmyɨtʉ. Ʉswe twabʉbwene ʉbʉsisya bwake, ʉbʉsisya ʉbwa ʉjʉ alɨ jʉmojwene ntɨga, ʉkʉfuma kwa Taata Kyala, kangɨ ʉjʉ alɨ ni ipyana nʉ bwanalooli kʉ bwingi.

Johani alɨnkʉbabʉʉla abandʉ ɨnongwa ɨsya mundʉ ʉjo, alɨnkʉjoba pabwelu alɨnkʉtɨ, “Ʉjʉ jo ʉjʉ naababʉʉlaga naatɨgɨ, ‘Ikwisa ʉmundʉ jʉmo kʉnyuma kʉmyangʉ, ʉjʉ jo nkʉlʉmba ʉkʉngɨnda ʉne, paapo aaliko bo ʉne ngaalɨ ʉkʉpaapigwa.’ ”
Ʉkʉkongana nʉ kʉsita kwagɨlwa kwake, Kyala atʉpeele twesa iipyana, ongiilepo pi ipyana ɨlɨ lyatalilepo.
Kokʉtɨ ijolo Kyala aatʉpeele ɨndagɨlo syake kʉ njɨla jaa Moose, looli akabalɨlo aka atʉpeele iipyana lyake nʉ bwanalooli bwake kʉ njɨla jaa Meesija
Jesu.
Akajako ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ ammbwenemo Kyala. Looli ʉjo, ʉjʉ alɨ jʉmojwene ntɨga, ʉjʉ joope jo Kyala,
kangɨ alɨ pamopeene na Taata Kyala, jo ʉjʉ atʉsetʉliile Kyala.
Iisikʉ lɨmo abalongosi baa Bajuuta baabatʉmile abapuuti
na Banyaleebi
ʉkʉfuma mu Jelusalemu, kʉkʉnndaalʉʉsya Johani, ʉkʉtɨ jo jwani. Ʉmwene aasisimɨkiisye,
aabaamwile kɨsita kʉfinda ʉbwanalooli, aatile, “Ʉne ngaja ne Meesija.”

Balɨnkʉnndaalʉʉsya kangɨ balɨnkʉtɨ, “Po ʉgwe gwe gwani? Bʉle, ʉgwe gwe nkunguluka Elija?” Johani alɨnkʉbaamula alɨnkʉtɨ, “Mma, ngaja ne Elija.” Abeene balɨnkʉnndaalʉʉsya kangɨ balɨnkʉtɨ, “Bʉle, ʉgwe gwe nkunguluka ʉjʉngɨ, ʉjʉ tukʉnnguulɨla ʉkʉfuma kwa Kyala?”
Johani alɨnkʉbaamula alɨnkʉtɨ, “Mma, ngaja jo ʉne.”
Balɨnkʉnndaalʉʉsya kangɨ balɨnkʉtɨ, “Po ʉgwe gwe gwani? Ʉkʉtɨ tʉkababʉʉle aba batʉtʉmile. Ʉgwe kwijoba ʉkʉtɨ gwe gwani?”
Johani alɨnkʉbaamula ʉkʉkongana na masyʉ aga aajobile ʉnkunguluka Jeesaja, ʉkʉtɨ,
“Ʉne ndɨ isyʉ lya mundʉ, likʉkoolela ndʉngalangala likʉtɨ,
‘Mutendekesye ʉnsebo ʉgwa kwendamo ʉNtwa!’ ”
Po abandʉ bala, aba aBafalisai
baabatʉmile kwa Johani,
balɨnkʉnndaalʉʉsya balɨnkʉtɨ, “Lɨnga ʉgwe ʉkaja gwe Meesija, pamo ʉkaja gwe nkunguluka Elija, pamo ʉkaja gwe nkunguluka ʉjʉngɨ ʉgwa Kyala, keeta koosya?”
Johani alɨnkʉbaamula alɨnkʉtɨ, “Ʉne ngʉboosya na mɨɨsi, looli pakatɨ pamyɨnu alipo ʉjʉ ʉmwe mukammanya.
Ʉjo jo ʉjʉ ikwisa kʉnyuma kʉmyangʉ, kangɨ jo ʉjʉ ngabagɨsya nʉ kwabʉla ʉtʉkoba ʉtwa filato fyake.”
Syosa ɨsyo syabombiigwe nkaaja akaa mu Betanija, kʉkɨbafu ɨkya kʉbʉsookelo ɨkya lwɨsi Jolitani, kʉno Johani oosyaga abandʉ.
Kɨlaabo kyake, Johani alɨnkʉmmbona Jesu ikwisa kʉmyake. Alɨnkʉbabʉʉla abandʉ aba baalipo pala alɨnkʉtɨ, “Keeta, ʉjo jo Kangʼoosi kaa Kyala,
ʉjʉ ikʉbʉsoosyamo ʉbʉtʉlanongwa bwa bandʉ boosa!
Ʉjʉ jo ʉjʉ naababʉʉlaga ʉkʉtɨ, ‘Ikwisa ʉmundʉ jʉmo kʉnyuma kʉmyangʉ, ʉjʉ nkʉlʉmba ʉkʉngɨnda ʉne, paapo aaliko bo ʉne ngaalɨ ʉkʉpaapigwa.’
Na niine ngaalɨmmeenye ʉkʉtɨ jo jwani, looli naaliisile kʉkʉboosya abandʉ na mɨɨsi ʉkʉtɨ, nʉnsetʉle kʉ Banyaisilaɨli.”
Po Johani alɨnkʉbabʉʉla ɨsi asibwene, alɨnkʉtɨ, “Nʉmmbwene Mbepo Mwikemo ʉkʉfuma kʉmwanya, bo ikʉsuluka pamwanya pamyake nʉ mbɨlɨ bo ʉgwa ngʉnde, asyele pamopeene nagwe.

Leelo ngaalɨmmeenye ʉkʉtɨ jo jwani, looli Kyala ʉjʉ aalɨndʉmile kʉkoosya aatile, ‘Lɨnga gʉmmbwene ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ Mbepo gwangʉ ikʉsuluka pamwanya pamyake, nʉ kʉsyala nagwe, ʉjo jo ʉjʉ ikʉboosyaga abandʉ na Mbepo Mwikemo.’ ”
Po Johani alɨnkʉtɨ, “Na niine nsibwene, kangɨ ngʉsisimɨkɨsya, ʉkʉtɨ ʉjo Mwana gwa Kyala.”
Kɨlaabo kyake, Johani aalipo pala kangɨ pamopeene na bafundigwa baake babɨlɨ.
Po alɨnkʉmmbona Jesu ikwenda kɨfuki nabo. Alɨnkʉbabʉʉla abafundigwa baake alɨnkʉtɨ, “Keeta, ʉjo jo Kangʼoosi kaa Kyala!”
Abafundigwa baa Johani bo bapɨliike ɨsyo, balɨnkʉnkonga Jesu.

Po Jesu alɨnkʉsanuka, alɨnkʉbabona abafundigwa bala bikʉnkonga. Alɨnkʉbalaalʉʉsya alɨnkʉtɨ, “Bʉle, mukʉlonda ɨfiki?” Abeene balɨnkʉmmwamula balɨnkʉtɨ, “Gwe Labi (ɨngamu ɨjɨ kokʉtɨ Mmanyisi), kalɨ, kʉtʉʉgala kʉʉgʉ?”
Jesu alɨnkʉtɨ, “Isaga, mukwakʉpabona.” Po balɨnkʉnkonga. Ɨsala jaa 10:00 pamuusi, balɨnkʉfika apa aatʉʉgalaga, balɨnkʉlɨnda nagwe iisikʉ lɨla.
Ʉmfundigwa jʉmo mbafundigwa babɨlɨ aba baapɨliike amasyʉ gaa Johani, na aba baalɨnkongile Jesu, ɨngamu jaake aalɨ jo Andeleja, ʉgwamyabo gwa Simoni Peeteli.
Nakalɨnga ʉjo alɨnkʉbʉʉka kʉkʉnndonda Simoni. Bo ammwagile, alɨnkʉmmbʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Tʉmmwagile ʉMpoki, ʉjʉ jo Meesija!” (Ɨngamu ɨjɨ kokʉtɨ Kɨlɨsiti.)

Po Andeleja alɨnkʉntwala Simoni kwa Jesu. Jesu alɨnkʉnkeeta Simoni, alɨnkʉmmbʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Ʉgwe gwe Simoni ʉmwana gwa Johani. Ʉkwandɨla lɨɨlɨno, ɨngamu jaako kʉjaga gwe Kefa” (pamo Peeteli, kokʉtɨ Lwalabwe).
Kɨlaabo kyake, Jesu alɨnkʉtumula ʉkʉbʉʉka nkiisʉ ɨkya Galilai.
Po alɨnkʉmmwaga Filipo, alɨnkʉmmbʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Filipo, isaga ʉngongege.”
Filipo aafumile mu Betisaita, muno Andeleja na Peeteli boope baatʉʉgalaga.

Po Filipo alɨnkʉmmwaga Natanaeli, alɨnkʉmmbʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Tʉmmbwene ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ Moose aasimbile ɨnongwa syake mwa Kalata gwa Ndagɨlo, kangɨ ʉjʉ boope abakunguluka baasimbile ɨnongwa syake. Ɨngamu jaake jo Jesu ʉgwa mu Nasaleti, mwana gwa Joosefu.”
Looli Natanaeli alɨnkʉnndaalʉʉsya Filipo alɨnkʉtɨ, “Kandʉ nki akanunu aka kabagiile ʉkʉfuma nkaaja akanandɨ akaa mu Nasaleti?” Filipo alɨnkʉmmwamula alɨnkʉtɨ, “Isaga gwikeetele.”
Jesu bo ammbwene Natanaeli ikwisa kʉmyake, alɨnkʉtɨ, “Keeta, ʉmundʉ ʉjo Mwisilaɨli gwa nalooli, ʉjʉ akaja nsyobi.”
Natanaeli alɨnkʉnndaalʉʉsya Jesu alɨnkʉtɨ, “Gwe ntwa, gʉʉmeenye bʉleebʉle?” Jesu alɨnkʉmmwamula alɨnkʉtɨ, “Na bo Filipo akaalɨ ʉkwisa kʉkʉkoolela, ʉne bo ngʉbwene ʉtʉʉgeele pa nkʉjʉ.”
Po Natanaeli alɨnkwamula alɨnkʉtɨ, “Gwe Mmanyisi, lɨɨlɨno mmeenye ʉkʉtɨ ʉgwe ʉlɨ Mwana gwa Kyala! Ʉgwe ʉlɨ Malafyale gwa kiisʉ kya Isilaɨli!”
Jesu alɨnkʉnndaalʉʉsya alɨnkʉtɨ, “Bʉle, kwitɨka paapo ngʉbʉʉlile ʉkʉtɨ ngʉbwene bo ʉtʉʉgeele pa nkʉjʉ? Kʉsibona ɨsingi ɨngʉlʉmba ʉkʉsikɨnda ɨsi!
Nalooli nikʉbabʉʉla, mukwisa kʉkʉbona kʉmwanya kʉkwigʉka, nʉ kʉbabona abandʉmi baa Kyala bikʉfyʉka nʉ kʉsuluka pamwanya pamyangʉ ne Nnyamundʉ.”
Bo ajobile ɨsyo, pi isikʉ lya bʉtatʉ, lwalipo ʉlʉsekelo ʉlwa bwegi mu Kana, nkiisʉ ɨkya Galilai. Pa bwegi ʉbo aalipo joope ʉnna gwa Jesu.
Jesu na bafundigwa baake boope baalipo pa bwegi ʉbo, baapaaliigwe.
Akabalɨlo bo kakɨndilepo, abaheesya baanwile ɨfinga
joosa. Po ʉnna gwa Jesu alɨnkʉmmbʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Gwe mwanangʉ, abaheesya bamalile ɨfinga.”
Jesu alɨnkʉmmwamula ʉnna alɨnkʉtɨ, “Jʉʉba, fiki kʉjoba bo ʉlo? Akabalɨlo kaa kʉbomba ɨmbombo jangʉ kakaalɨ ʉkʉfika.”
Po ʉnna alɨnkʉbabʉʉla ababombi alɨnkʉtɨ, “Syosa ɨsi ikʉbabʉʉla ʉmwanangʉ, mubombege.”
Pabʉjo bʉla, syalipo ɨngumbe ntandatʉ ɨsya mabwe. ABajuuta baabɨɨkangamo amɨɨsi agaa kʉbombela ʉlwiho lwabo, ʉlwa kwijeelʉsya. Ɨngumbe jɨmo jiisʉlaga amalebe mahaano pamo ntandatʉ.
Po Jesu alɨnkʉbabʉʉla ababombi bala alɨnkʉtɨ, “Namwisʉsye amɨɨsi mu ngumbe ɨsyo.” Po balɨnkʉnega amɨɨsi nʉ kwisʉsya mu ngumbe sila.
Po Jesu alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Namunege amɨɨsi gamo, mukampepo ʉnkʉlʉmba gwa lʉsekelo.” Po balɨnkʉnega amɨɨsi nʉ kwakʉmpapo ʉnkʉlʉmba jʉla.
Ʉnkʉlʉmba alɨnkʉnwa amɨɨsi gala, aga Jesu aagasanwisye ʉkʉja finga. Ʉmwene akaameenye kʉno jɨfumile, looli ababombi aba baanegile amɨɨsi baameenye kʉno jɨfumile. Po alɨnkʉnkoolela ʉmwega nkiikʉlʉ.

Bo iisile, ʉnkʉlʉmba jʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Ʉmundʉ gwesa kʉbwandɨlo ikʉjaba ɨfinga ɨnunu, looli abandʉ bo banwile nʉ kwikʉta, po ikwisa nɨ finga ɨjɨ jɨkaja nunu. Looli ʉgwe ʉtwele ɨfinga ɨnunu kʉmmalɨɨkɨsyo!”
Jesu aabombile ɨkiika ɨkɨ nkaaja akaa mu Kana mu Galilai. Ɨkiika ɨkyo kyalɨ kya kwanda ʉkʉbomba, ʉkʉnangɨsya ʉbʉsisya bwake kʉ bandʉ. Kʉnongwa ɨjo abafundigwa baake balɨnkʉmmwitɨka.
Ʉlʉsekelo lwa bwegi bo lʉmaliike, Jesu alɨnkʉsuluka mu Kapelinaʉmu pamopeene nʉ nna, abanuguna na bafundigwa baake. Balɨnkʉtʉʉgala ʉko amasikʉ manandɨ.
Akabalɨlo akaa kyaka kya Bajuuta, ɨkɨ bikʉtɨ Pasa, bo kɨlɨ kɨfuki, Jesu alɨnkʉfyʉka ʉkʉbʉʉka mu Jelusalemu.
Po alɨnkwingɨla ndʉpaso lwa tempeli.
Ʉmo alɨnkʉbaaga aba bʉʉlɨsyaga ɨngʼombe, ɨngʼoosi nɨ ngʉnde, na aba bʉʉsaniaga ɨndalama.

Jesu bo asibwene ɨsyo, alɨnkʉpota ʉtʉgoje ʉkʉja kɨngoti, alɨnkʉbakaga boosa aba bʉʉlɨsyaga ndʉpaso lwa tempeli, pamopeene nɨ ngʼombe nɨ ngʼoosi. Alɨnkʉsipetusya ɨmeesa sya bʉʉsania ndalama nʉ koona ɨndalama syabo.
Po Jesu alɨnkʉbabʉʉla aba bʉʉlɨsyaga ɨngʉnde alɨnkʉtɨ, “Namusisoosyepo ɨngʉnde apa. Mulɨngajɨbɨɨkaga ɨnyumba jaa Taata ʉkʉja sokoni.”
Abafundigwa baake bo bapɨliike ɨsyo, balɨnkʉkʉmbʉka amasyʉ aga gasimbiigwe mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo ʉkʉtɨ, “Ʉlʉgano lwangʉ kʉ nyumba jaako, lukwaka nkatɨ mmyangʉ bo ʉlwa mooto.”
Po abalongosi baa Bajuuta bo basibwene ɨsi Jesu abombile, balɨnkʉnndaalʉʉsya balɨnkʉtɨ, “Kʉbomba ɨkɨmanyilo kɨlɨkʉ, ʉkʉnangɨsya ʉkʉtɨ ʉlɨ nʉ bʉlagɨli ʉbwa kʉbomba ɨsi?”
Jesu alɨnkʉbabʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Namoomole ɨtempeli ɨjɨ, ʉne ngʉjɨjenga kʉ masikʉ matatʉ.”
Po abeene balɨnkʉmmwamula balɨnkʉtɨ, “Ɨtempeli ɨjɨ jaajengiigwe kʉ fyɨnja 46. Po ʉgwe ʉbagiile bʉleebʉle ʉkʉjɨjenga kʉ masikʉ matatʉ?”
Looli Jesu akaajobaga ɨsya tempeli, aajobaga ɨsya mbɨlɨ gwake ʉmwene, ʉgʉ gwajaga pakʉbomoligwa.
Po Jesu bo asyʉkile ʉkʉfuma mbʉfwe, abafundigwa baake balɨnkʉkʉmbʉka amasyʉ aga aajobile. Kʉ njɨla ɨjo, balɨnkwitɨka amasyʉ aga gasimbiigwe mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo, na masyʉ aga Jesu aajobile.
Jesu bo alɨ pa kyaka kya Pasa mu Jelusalemu, abandʉ bingi balɨnkwanda ʉkʉmmwitɨka, paapo baafibwene ɨfiika ɨfi aabombaga.
Looli Jesu akaabiitiike, paapo aasyageenie ɨsi silimo mu ndumbula syabo.
Kangɨ akaalondaga ʉmundʉ gwesa jʉla, ʉkʉmmbʉʉla ɨsi abandʉ bikwinogona, paapo aasimeenye syosa ɨsi silimo mu ndumbula sya bandʉ boosa.
Aaliko ʉndongosi jʉmo ʉgwa Bajuuta, ʉgwa nkɨbugutɨla kya Bafalisai, ɨngamu jaake aalɨ jo Nikotemu.

Ɨliisikʉ lɨmo pakɨlo, alɨnkʉbʉʉka kwa Jesu alɨnkʉmmbʉʉla alɨnkʉtɨ, “Gwe Mmanyisi, tʉmeenye ʉkʉtɨ ʉgwe ʉlɨ mmanyisi ʉjʉ atʉmiigwe na Kyala, paapo akajako ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ abagiile ʉkʉbomba ɨfiika ɨfi kʉbomba, lɨnga Kyala akaja pamopeene nagwe.”
Jesu alɨnkʉmmwamula alɨnkʉtɨ, “Nalooli nikʉkʉbʉʉla, akajako ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ abagiile ʉkwingɨla mBʉnyafyale bwa Kyala,
lɨnga akapaapigwa ʉlwa bʉbɨlɨ.”
Nikotemu alɨnkʉnndaalʉʉsya Jesu alɨnkʉtɨ, “Bʉle, ʉnkangale abagiile bʉleebʉle ʉkʉpaapigwa ʉlwa bʉbɨlɨ?
Bʉle, abagiile ʉkwingɨla kangɨ ndwanda lwa nna ʉkʉtɨ apaapigwe?”
Jesu alɨnkʉmmwamula alɨnkʉtɨ, “Nalooli nikʉkʉbʉʉla, akajako ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ abagiile ʉkwingɨla mBʉnyafyale bwa Kyala, lɨnga akapaapigwa kʉ mɨɨsi na kwa Mbepo gwa Kyala.
Abapaapi bikʉbapaapa abaanaabo nʉ mbɨlɨ, looli Mbepo gwa Kyala jo ʉjʉ ikʉbapaapa abandʉ ʉkʉtɨ bajege nʉ bʉʉmi bwa bwila na bwila.
Ʉlɨngaswigaga ɨsi ngʉbʉʉlile ʉkʉtɨ, ‘Fikʉtɨ ʉpaapigwe ʉlwa bʉbɨlɨ.’
Ʉmbelo gukʉkula ʉkʉlabɨla kʉno gwiganile. Ʉbagiile ʉkʉpɨlɨka ʉkʉkula kwake, looli ʉtikʉmanya kʉno gukʉfuma na kʉno gukʉlabɨla. Ɨsi bo silɨ na kʉ mundʉ gwesa ʉjʉ apaapiigwe na Mbepo gwa Kyala.”
Nikotemu alɨnkʉnndaalʉʉsya Jesu alɨnkʉtɨ, “Bʉle, ʉmundʉ abagiile bʉleebʉle ʉkʉpaapigwa na Mbepo gwa Kyala?”
Jesu alɨnkʉmmwamula alɨnkʉtɨ, “Ʉgwe ʉlɨ mmanyisi ʉmwɨmɨkigwa ʉgwa bandʉ abaa nkiisʉ ɨkya Isilaɨli. Bʉle, ʉkasimanya syosa ɨsi?
Nalooli nikʉkʉbʉʉla, ʉswe tʉsimeenye ɨsi tukʉsijoba, kangɨ tʉsibwene ɨsi tukʉsilɨngaania. Looli ʉmwe mutikwitɨka ɨsyo.
Mbabʉʉlile ɨsi sikʉbombigwa pakiisʉ apa, looli ʉmwe mutikwitɨka. Po mubagiile bʉleebʉle ʉkʉʉnyiitɨka, lɨnga ngʉbabʉʉla ɨsi sikʉbombigwa kʉmwanya?
Akajako ʉmundʉ najʉmo ʉjʉ abʉʉkileko kʉmwanya. Looli ne Nnyamundʉ jo ʉne naaliisile ʉkʉfuma kʉmwanya.
“Moose aatendekiisye ɨkɨfwani kya njoka jaa kɨbʉngʉ
nʉ kʉkɨfyʉsya pa kɨpiki, ʉkʉtɨ abapoke aBanyaisilaɨli bo balɨ ndʉngalangala. Bʉbʉʉbo ne Nnyamundʉ ngwisa kʉfyʉsigwa,
ʉkʉtɨ mbape ʉbʉʉmi bwa bwila na bwila abandʉ aba bikʉʉnyiitɨka.”

Kyala abaganile fiijo abandʉ boosa abaa pakiisʉ apa. Jo nongwa ɨjɨ aalɨntʉmile ʉMwanaake jʉmojwene ntɨga, ʉkwisa pakiisʉ apa, ʉkʉtɨ ʉmundʉ gwesa ʉjʉ ikʉmmwitɨka alɨngasobaga, looli akabe ʉbʉʉmi bwa bwila na bwila.
Kyala akaalɨntʉmile ʉMwanaake pakiisʉ kʉkʉbalonga abandʉ, looli kʉkʉbapoka.
Kyala atikʉnndonga ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ ikʉmmwitɨka ʉMwanaake, looli ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ atikʉmmwitɨka alongiigwe, paapo akammwitɨka ʉMwanaake jʉmojwene ntɨga.
