Ʉjʉ ikʉlya ɨnyama alɨngammwilaamwaga ʉjʉ ikʉlya iiseeke ɨlya maani lyene. Joope ʉjʉ ikʉlya iiseeke ɨlya maani lyene alɨnganndongaga ʉjʉ ikʉlya ɨnyama, namanga Kyala abambɨliile boosa bobabɨɨlɨ.

Gwe gwani gwe kwibona ʉkʉtɨ ʉbagiisye ʉkʉnndonga ʉmbombeli gwa mwinaako? Ʉntwa gwake jʉʉjo jo ikʉtumula ʉkʉtɨ ʉmbombeli gwake asobile pamo akasoba. Na pabʉlongi ʉmundʉ ʉjo ikwisa kʉtola, paapo ʉNtwa Jesu ikwisa kʉmpela ʉkʉtola.
Ʉmundʉ jʉmo ikʉlyɨmɨka iisikʉ lɨmo ʉkʉlɨkɨnda iisikʉ ɨlɨngɨ ʉkʉmmwipuuta Kyala, ʉjʉngɨ ikwaga goosa gafwene itolo. Kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ asikongege ɨsi ikwaga nunu mu ndumbula jaake.

Ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ ikʉlyɨmɨka fiijo iisikʉ lɨmo, ikʉbomba bo ʉlo ʉkʉnkyela ʉNtwa Kyala. Joope ʉjʉ ikʉlya ɨnyama, ikʉbomba bo ʉlo ʉkʉnkyela ʉNtwa Kyala, namanga ʉmwene ikʉntuufya Kyala kʉ findʉ fyake. Joope ʉjʉ ikʉlya iiseeke ɨlya maani lyene, ikʉbomba bo ʉlo ʉkʉnkyela ʉNtwa Kyala, joope ikʉntuufya Kyala.
Lɨnga ʉswe tʉlɨ bʉʉmi, pamo lɨnga tukʉfwa, sitikʉja sya kʉkabamo ʉswe twibeene.
Lɨnga tʉlɨ bʉʉmi, ʉNtwa gwɨtʉ Jesu atuufigwege. Lɨnga tukʉfwa, ʉNtwa gwɨtʉ Jesu atuufigwege. Lɨnga ʉswe tʉlɨ bʉʉmi, pamo lɨnga tukʉfwa, tʉlɨ baa Ntwa Jesu.
Kɨlɨsiti aafwile, kangɨ aasyʉkile, ʉkʉtɨ aje Ntwa gwa bandʉ boosa, abafwe na bʉʉmi.
Po fiki bamo pakatɨ pamyɨnu bikʉnndonga ʉgwamyabo ndwitɨko? Kangɨ fiki bikʉmmwilaamwa ʉgwamyabo? Namanga ʉswe twesa tukwisa kwɨma nkyeni mwa Kyala ʉkʉtɨ tʉlongigwe.
Bo muno sisimbiigwe mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo,
“Kyala ikʉtɨ,
‘Nalooli kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ ikwisa kʉfugama nkyeni mmyangʉ,
nʉ kʉjoba kʉ lʉlɨmi lwake ʉkʉtɨ ʉne ne Kyala.’ ”
Po leelo kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ pakatɨ pamyɨtʉ, ikwisa kʉlɨngaania jʉʉjo ɨsyake nkyeni mwa Kyala.
Po leelo tʉleke ʉkʉbalonga abiitɨki biinɨɨtʉ. Looli tʉtumule ʉkʉsita kʉbomba kokoosa akaa kwikinyamo pamo ʉkʉsobesya.

ɄNtwa Jesu aanangiisye ʉne pabwelu, kangɨ mbʉmeenye ʉbwanalooli ʉkʉtɨ, fikajapo ɨfindʉ fimo ɨfi filɨ mwiko. Looli ʉmundʉ lɨnga ikʉfibona ɨfindʉ fimo ʉkʉja mwiko, po ɨfindʉ ɨfyo kʉmyake fikʉjaga mwiko.
Lɨnga ʉgwe kʉntwalɨla ʉbʉsulumanie ʉmwitɨki nnino kʉ findʉ fimo ɨfi kʉlya, nalooli ʉgwe ʉkaja nʉ lʉgano kʉ mwinaako ʉjo. Kɨlɨsiti aalɨmfwɨliile ʉjo. Ʉlɨngammoonangaga kʉnongwa jaa findʉ fyako!
Mupeeliigwe ɨfinunu, mulɨngabombaga ɨsya kʉbapela abangɨ ʉkʉfijoba ʉbʉbiibi.
Namanga ʉBʉnyafyale bwa Kyala kʉkaja ko kʉlya nʉ kʉnwa, looli ko kʉbomba ɨsya bʉgolofu, ʉkʉja nʉ lʉtengaano pakatɨ pamyɨtʉ, nʉ kʉja nʉ lʉsekelo ʉlʉ lukʉfuma kwa Mbepo Mwikemo.
Joope ʉjʉ ikʉmmbombela Kɨlɨsiti bo ʉlo, ikʉnkyela Kyala, kangɨ abandʉ bikʉmmwitɨkɨla.
Akabalɨlo koosa twijʉʉlege ʉkʉbomba ɨsi sikʉtwala ʉlʉtengaano, na ɨsi sikʉtʉʉla ʉkʉjengana ndwitɨko.
Ʉlɨngoonangaga ɨmbombo jaa Kyala kʉnongwa jaa findʉ fyako. Fikajako ɨfindʉ ɨfi filɨ mwiko, looli kabiibi fiijo ʉkʉmmwingɨsya ʉmwinaako mbʉtʉlanongwa kʉnongwa jaa findʉ ɨfi kʉlya.
Paakipo ʉleke ʉkʉbomba ɨsi ʉmwinaako abagiile ʉkwikinyamo, kʉje ko kʉlya ɨnyama, pamo ʉkʉnwa ɨfinga,
pamo syosyosa sila.
Ɨnyiinogono ɨsi ʉlɨ nasyo kʉ findʉ, sijege syako gwimwene nkyeni mwa Kyala. Asajiigwe ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ atikwibona ʉkʉja ntʉlanongwa, bo ikʉsibomba ɨsi ikʉsibona ʉkʉja sya bʉgolofu.

Looli lɨnga kʉfiilaamwa ɨfindʉ fimo, poope kʉlya ɨfindʉ ɨfyo, po ʉlɨ ntʉlanongwa, paapo ʉtikʉbomba ʉkʉkongana nʉ lwitɨko lwako mwa Kɨlɨsiti. Namanga kʉkʉtɨ kandʉ aka kʉbomba, lɨnga katikʉfuma ndwitɨko lwako mwa Kɨlɨsiti, ako bo bʉtʉlanongwa.
Po ʉswe twe tʉkakile ndwitɨko, tukʉlondigwa ʉkʉbatʉʉla aboonywa ndwitɨko. Tʉlɨngabombaga syene ɨsi sikʉtʉkyela jʉjʉʉswe.
Ʉswe twesa tʉbabombelege kanunu abiitɨki biinɨɨtʉ, ʉkʉtɨ bakake ndwitɨko.
Namanga joope na Kɨlɨsiti akiikyelaga mwene, looli aasibombaga ɨsi sisimbiigwe mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo ʉkʉtɨ,
“Amaheelu aga bikʉkʉtʉka ʉgwe Kyala,
gaalɨɨnyaagile ʉne.”
Syosa ɨsi syasimbiigwe ijolo mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo, syasimbiigwe ʉkʉtʉmanyisya ʉswe. Amasimbo ago gikʉtʉpa ʉlʉʉmɨɨlɨlo nʉ kʉtʉkasya, ʉkʉtɨ tʉjege nʉ lʉsʉʉbɨlo.
Kyala ʉjʉ ikʉtʉpa ʉkʉʉmɨɨlɨla nʉ kʉtʉkasya abapele ʉkʉja kandʉ kamokeene, bo mukʉnkonga Kɨlɨsiti Jesu.
Po ʉmwe mwesa muntuufyege Kyala pamopeene nɨ ndumbula jɨmojeene, ʉGwise gwa Ntwa gwɨtʉ Jesu Kɨlɨsiti.
Po leelo namwambɨlɨlanilege bo ʉlʉ Kɨlɨsiti aabambɨliile ʉmwe, ʉkʉtɨ Kyala atuufigwege.
Namanga nikʉbabʉʉla ʉmwe nikʉtɨ, Kɨlɨsiti aaliisile kʉkʉbabombela aBajuuta. Aabanangɨsye ʉkʉtɨ Kyala gwa bwanalooli, nʉ kʉtɨ abombile ɨsi aafingile kʉ biisʉkʉlʉ baabo.
Kangɨ ʉkʉtɨ abandʉ aba bakaja Bajuuta bantuufyege Kyala kʉ lʉpaakɨsyo lwake, bo muno sisimbiigwe mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo ʉkʉtɨ,
“Po angʉkwɨmbɨla ɨnyɨmbo ɨsya kʉkʉtuufya
nkyeni mmbandʉ abaa mfikolo ɨfingi.”
Kangɨ ikʉtɨ,
“Mwe bandʉ mwe baa mfikolo ɨfingi,
namusekelege pamopeene na bandʉ baa Kyala.”
Kangɨ ikʉtɨ,
“Ʉmwe mwe bandʉ baa mfikolo ɨfingi,
namuntuufyege Kyala.
Ʉmwe mwe bandʉ boosa pakiisʉ,
namunngindɨkege Kyala!”
Joope ʉnkunguluka Jeesaja ikʉtɨ,
“Ʉmundʉ jʉmo ʉgwa ndʉjungu ʉlwa Jese ikwisa,
ikwisa kʉlongosyaga ɨfikolo ɨfingi,
abandʉ abaa mfikolo ɨfingi bikwisa kʉnsʉʉbɨlaga.”
Po Kyala ʉjʉ ikʉtʉpa ʉlʉsʉʉbɨlo, abapepo ʉlʉsekelo loosa nʉ lʉtengaano ndwitɨko lwɨnu, ʉkʉtɨ ʉlʉsʉʉbɨlo lwɨnu longelele kʉ maka agaa Mbepo Mwikemo.
Baamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko, ʉne mmeenye fiijo ʉkʉtɨ ʉmwe mulɨ bandʉ banunu, kangɨ mwiswile ʉbʉmanyi bwa Kyala, kangɨ mubagiile ʉkʉmanyisania.
Leelo ɨnongwa ɨsyo ɨsi mbasimbiile, nsibɨɨkile pabwelu kɨsita kʉtiila nkyeni mmyɨnu. Naalondaga ʉkʉbakʉmbʉsya syosa, paapo ɨjɨ jo mbombo ɨjɨ Kyala ambeele ʉkʉjɨbomba ʉkʉkongana ni ipyana lyake.

Ɨmbombo ɨjo ko kʉja mbombeli gwake Kɨlɨsiti Jesu kʉ bandʉ aba bakaja Bajuuta. Ngʉbalʉmbɨlɨla ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu, ʉkʉtɨ nje bo ʉlwa mpuuti ʉjʉ ikʉbaninga ʉmwe kwa Kyala, bo ʉlwa ikemo ɨlya kʉnkyela Kyala, ɨlɨ lyelʉsiigwe na Mbepo Mwikemo.
Po leelo, paapo ndʉngeene na Kɨlɨsiti Jesu, ngwituukɨfya ɨmbombo ɨjɨ ɨjaa kʉmmbombela Kyala.

Ʉne ndikʉjoba akandʉ kokoosa akangɨ, looli syene ɨsi Kɨlɨsiti abombile ʉkwendela kʉmyangʉ, ʉkʉbapela abandʉ aba bakaja Bajuuta ʉkʉtɨ bantiilege Kyala. Aabombile bo ʉlo kʉ njɨla jaa masyʉ gangʉ na kʉ mbombo ɨsi naasibombaga,

ʉkwendela mfiswigo na mfimanyilo fingi, ɨfi naabombile kʉ maka agaa Mbepo gwa Kyala. Po leelo nsyʉngʉʉtiile kʉkʉtɨ bʉjo kʉkʉfumusya ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu ɨjaa Jesu Kɨlɨsiti, ʉkwandɨla mu Jelusalemu mpaka nkiisʉ ɨkya mu Iluliko.
Kʉlɨ syosa ɨsi, ʉlʉbaatɨko lwangʉ ko kʉfumusya ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu kʉno bakajɨmanya ɨngamu jaa Kɨlɨsiti, ʉkʉtɨ ndɨngiisa kʉjenga pa lwalo ʉlwa mundʉ ʉjʉngɨ.
Ɨsi syosa sisimbiigwe mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo ʉkʉtɨ,
“Abandʉ aba bakaabʉʉliigwe ɨnongwa syake,
bikwisa kʉmmbona,
na bandʉ aba bakaapɨliike,
bikwisa kʉmmanya.”
Ɨmbombo ɨjo jo ɨjɨ jaalɨɨsigiile kaa kingi ʉkwisa kʉmyɨnu.
Looli lɨɨlɨno mmalile ɨmbombo jangʉ nkiisʉ ɨkɨ ndimo, kangɨ nsyʉkilwe ɨfyɨnja fingi ʉkwisa kʉkʉbajaatɨla ʉko.

Akabalɨlo aka mbaatiike ʉkʉfika nkiisʉ ɨkya Sipanija. Po leelo ngʉsʉʉbɨla ʉkʉbajaatɨla bo ngwenda ɨnjɨla ɨjaa kʉbʉʉka ʉko. Bo mbʉʉgile ʉkwangala na nuumwe, po ngwisa kʉsookangapo. Ngʉsʉʉbɨla ʉkʉkaba kʉmyɨnu ɨfya kʉndʉʉla ʉkwendelela nɨ njɨla jangʉ.
Looli nsumwike taasi kʉ Jelusalemu, ʉkʉtɨ mbatwalɨle ɨfya kʉbatʉʉla abiitɨki abaa kʉla.
Abiitɨki abaa nkiisʉ ɨkya kʉ Maketonija na kʉ Akaja, baalyagile kanunu ʉkʉsangʉla ʉtʉndʉ twabo ʉtwa kʉbatʉʉla abiitɨki abalondo abaa kʉla kʉ Jelusalemu.

Abiitɨki abo baabombile bo ʉlo nʉ lʉsekelo, kangɨ nalooli bikʉboneka bikʉmeleligwa ʉkʉbatʉʉla abalondo abo. Namanga abandʉ aba bakaja Bajuuta balɨ mbʉlɨɨlanisi pamopeene na Bajuuta mu sajo ɨsya mwa Mbepo Mwikemo. Po leelo bikʉlondigwa boope ʉkʉja mbʉlɨɨlanisi pamopeene na Bajuuta mu sajo ɨsya mu mbɨlɨ.
Bo mmalile ɨmbombo ɨjo, ɨjaa kʉbapa ɨfya bʉtʉʉli abalondo abo, po angʉbajaatɨla ʉmwe nʉ kwendelela ʉkʉbʉʉka mpaka kʉ Sipanija.
Mmeenye ʉkʉtɨ bo ndɨ kʉmyɨnu, Kɨlɨsiti ikwisa kʉbasaja fiijo pakabalɨlo akaa kwangala pamopeene, ʉne na nuumwe.
Baamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko, kʉ maka agaa Ntwa gwɨtʉ Jesu Kɨlɨsiti nʉ lʉgano ʉlʉ lukʉfuma kwa Mbepo Mwikemo, ngʉbapyelesya nɨ ndumbula jangʉ joosa, mwijʉʉlege pamopeene na niine ʉkʉjiipuutɨla ɨmbombo jangʉ.

Muunyiipuutɨlege ʉkʉtɨ, Kyala aandɨndɨlɨlege kʉ bandʉ aba batikʉmmwitɨka Jesu abaa nkiisʉ ɨkya mu Jutai, ʉkʉtɨ balɨngaafulasya. Kangɨ ʉkʉtɨ, abiitɨki abaa mu Jelusalemu bambɨlɨle ɨfya kʉbatʉʉla ɨfi ngʉbatwalɨla.
Bo ɨsyo sibombiigwe, mbagiile ʉkwisa kʉmyɨnu, Kyala lɨnga iiganile. Angʉja nʉ lʉsekelo fiijo nʉ kʉtʉʉsya pamopeene na nuumwe.
Kyala ʉgwa lʉtengaano, ajege na nuumwe mwesa! Ameni.
Ngʉlonda mummwambɨlɨle Foibe ʉmwitɨki mwinɨɨtʉ paapo mundʉ nnunu. Ʉmwene ntʉʉli gwa kɨpanga kya Kyala ɨkya mu Kenkeleja.
Mummwambɨlɨle kanunu mu Ntwa Jesu, bo muno sikʉlondeligwa kʉ bandʉ baa Kyala. Mumpepo ʉbʉtʉʉli boosa ʉbʉ ikʉlonda, paapo ʉmwene joope abatʉʉlile fiijo abandʉ bingi, fiijo ʉne.
Mubaponiege Pilisika nʉ ndʉme Akwila, ababombeli biinangʉ mu mbombo jaa Kɨlɨsiti Jesu.
Abeene bakaabʉpaasiisye ʉbʉʉmi bwabo kʉnongwa jangʉ. Ngʉgwa ʉlʉpi fiijo kʉmyabo, ngaja jo ʉne niimwene itolo, looli na bandʉ abaa mfipanga ɨfya Kyala ɨfya mfiisʉ ɨfingi.
Baamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko, muje maaso na bandʉ aba ɨmanyisyo syabo sikʉbapela abiitɨki ʉkʉtapʉkana, nʉ koonanga ʉlwitɨko lwabo. Mujege patali nabo, namanga ɨmanyisyo syabo sikʉpɨngana na ɨsi mwamanyisiigwe.

Sya bwanalooli, abandʉ abaa lʉko ʉlo batikʉmmbombela ʉNtwa gwɨtʉ Kɨlɨsiti, looli bikʉlonda syene ɨsi basiganile. Bikʉjoba ɨnongwa ɨsya kʉtengʉlɨla, looli ngɨmba bikʉbasyoba abiitɨki aboonywa ndwitɨko.
Boosa bapɨliike ʉkʉtɨ ʉmwe mulɨkolile kanunu iisyʉ ɨlya Kyala. Ɨsyo sikʉʉhobosya fiijo ʉne, leelo ngʉlonda mujege na mahala mu mbombo ɨnunu, kangɨ mulɨngakwabigwaga nʉ bʉtʉlanongwa.
Kyala ʉgwa lʉtengaano ikʉntakania Seetano nʉ kʉntola loosa paasi pa malʉndɨ gɨɨnu. Ɨliipyana lya Ntwa gwɨtʉ Jesu lɨjege na nuumwe.
Ikʉbaponia Timoti ʉmbombeli mwinangʉ. Kangɨ bikʉbaponia baa Lukio, Jaasoni na Sosipateli, aBajuuta biinangʉ.
Na niine Teliti, ne nsimbi gwa kalata ʉjʉ ʉgwa Paʉli, ngʉbaponia mu ngamu ɨjaa Ntwa Jesu.

Ikʉbaponia Gajo ʉjʉ mu nyumba jaake mo muno ngʉtʉʉgala, kangɨ mo muno abiitɨki abaa nkɨpanga kyosa kya Kyala bikwaganila. Kangɨ ikʉbaponia Elasiti ʉmbɨɨka ndalama sya kaaja akaa mu Kolinti. Joope Kwaliti ʉmwitɨki mwinɨɨtʉ, ikʉbaponia. [
Ɨliipyana lya Ntwa gwɨtʉ Jesu Kɨlɨsiti lɨjege na nuumwe mwesa. Ameni.]
Kyala atuufigwege! Ʉjʉ abagiile ʉkʉbakasya ʉkwendela mu Ndʉmi ɨNunu ɨjaa Jesu Kɨlɨsiti, ɨjɨ ngʉlʉmbɨlɨla. Ɨndʉmi ɨjo ijolo jaafisiigwe, looli akabalɨlo aka jɨsetʉliigwe.
Kyala ʉgwa bwila na bwila aalagiile ʉkʉtɨ ɨndʉmi ɨjo jɨsetʉligwe ʉkwendela mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo. Kangɨ ʉkʉtɨ abandʉ abaa mfiisʉ fyosa bajɨmanye ɨndʉmi ɨjo, bammwitɨke nʉ kʉmmwɨmɨka.
Po kʉ njɨla ɨjaa Jesu Kɨlɨsiti, tʉntuufyege mwene Kyala ʉgwa mahala goosa. Ajege nʉ bʉsisya bwila na bwila! Ameni.
I Corinthians: Kalata ʉjʉ afumile kʉmyangʉ ʉne Paʉli, ne Kyala aambɨlɨkiile kʉ bwigane bwake ʉkʉja ntʉmigwa gwa Kɨlɨsiti Jesu. Ʉne na Sositeni, ʉgwamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko,

tukʉbasimbɨla ʉmwe mwe baa nkɨpanga kya Kyala ɨkɨ kɨlɨ mu Kolinti, ʉmwe mwe Kyala abapelile ʉkʉja biikemo nkʉlʉngana na Kɨlɨsiti Jesu, nʉ kʉbabɨlɨkɨla ʉkʉja bandʉ baake. Ʉkʉbombeligwa bo ʉlo, mulɨ pamopeene na bandʉ boosa popoosa apa balipo aba bikʉnsʉʉma ʉNtwa Jesu Kɨlɨsiti, ʉjʉ jo Ntwa gwabo kangɨ gwɨtʉ.
Ɨliipyana nʉ lʉtengaano ʉkʉfuma kwa Taata Kyala na kʉ Ntwa Jesu Kɨlɨsiti, fijege na nuumwe.
Ngʉgwa ʉlʉpi kwa Kyala gwangʉ bwila kʉnongwa jɨɨnu, paapo abapeele ɨliipyana lyake mwa Kɨlɨsiti Jesu,
namanga mmyake mupeeliigwe ʉbʉkabi ʉbwa fikʉngɨlwa ɨfya lʉko lwingi, mmasyʉ gɨɨnu na mmahala gɨɨnu.
Ʉbʉkabi bwɨnu ʉbo, bukʉnangɨsya ʉkʉtɨ ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu jɨla ɨjaa Kɨlɨsiti, ɨjɨ twalʉmbɨliile kʉmyɨnu, jo jaa bwanalooli.
Na ʉlʉ mukaagɨlwa ɨkɨkʉngɨlwa nakɨmo ɨkya Mbepo Mwikemo, bo mukʉguulɨla ʉkʉsetʉligwa ʉkwa Ntwa gwɨtʉ Jesu Kɨlɨsiti.
Ʉmwene ikʉbakasyaga, ʉkʉtɨ mulɨngiisa kʉlongigwa ʉkʉja batʉlanongwa pi isikʉ lɨla ɨlya kʉmmalɨɨkɨsyo, ɨlɨ ikwisa kʉsetʉligwa.
Kyala jo gwa bwanalooli. Ʉkwendela mmyake, mwabɨlɨkɨliigwe ʉkʉja nʉ bʉlɨɨlanisi nʉ Mwanaake Jesu Kɨlɨsiti, ʉNtwa gwɨtʉ.

Baamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko, ngʉbapyelesya fiijo mu ngamu ɨjaa Ntwa gwɨtʉ Jesu Kɨlɨsiti, mujege bandʉ baa kʉpɨlɨkɨsania. Mulɨngatapʉkanaga, looli mujege kandʉ kamokeene kʉlɨ ɨsi mukwinogona, kangɨ mujege nɨ nyango jɨmojeene.
Baamyɨtʉ, abandʉ bamo abaa nnyumba ɨjaa Kilo, baambʉʉlile ʉkʉtɨ bʉliko ʉbʉkɨndane kʉmyɨnu.

Ɨsi ngʉlonda ʉkʉjoba syo ɨsi, kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ ikʉjoba ɨsyake. Jʉmo ikʉtɨ, “Ʉne ngʉnkonga Paʉli.” Ʉjʉngɨ ikʉtɨ, “Ʉne ngʉnkonga Apolo.” Ʉjʉngɨ ikʉtɨ, “Ʉne ngʉnkonga Peeteli.” Ʉjʉngɨ ikʉtɨ, “Ʉne ngʉnkonga Kɨlɨsiti.”
Bʉle, Kɨlɨsiti iijabeenie? Bʉle, aalɨ jo Paʉli ʉjʉ aafwile pa kɨkohekano kʉnongwa jɨɨnu? Bʉle, mwalyosiigwe mu ngamu ɨjaa Paʉli?
Ngʉgwa ʉlʉpi kwa Kyala paapo kʉmyɨnu naaboosiisye beene baa Kilisipo na Gajo, ngaaboosiisyepo abangɨ.
Po ʉlo akajako ʉjʉ abagiile ʉkʉjoba ʉkʉtɨ, oosiigwe kʉ ngamu jangʉ.
(Kangɨ naaboosiisye abaa nnyumba ɨjaa Sitefana, ngamanya ʉkʉtɨ naalɨmmoosiisyemo ʉjʉngɨ.)
Namanga Kɨlɨsiti akaalɨndʉmile kʉkoosya abandʉ, looli kʉkʉlʉmbɨlɨla ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu, kɨsita kʉsʉʉbɨla amahala gangʉ ʉkʉjoba kanunu, ʉkʉtɨ ndɨngapungusya amaka agaa kɨkohekano ɨkya Kɨlɨsiti.
Ɨsya kɨkohekano ɨkya Kɨlɨsiti kʉlɨ aba bikʉsoba bikwaga bʉkonyofu, looli kʉmyɨtʉ ʉswe twe tukʉpokigwa, ɨnongwa ɨsyo maka agaa Kyala.
Bo muno sisimbiigwe mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo ʉkʉtɨ,
“Abandʉ abaa mahala ngoonanga amahala gaabo,
abamangʼanyi ngoomola ʉbʉmangʼanyi bwabo.”

Po ngʉbalaalʉʉsya, balɨ kʉʉgʉ abaa mahala abaa kabalɨlo ako? Balɨ kʉʉgʉ abamanyisi baa ndagɨlo? Balɨ kʉʉgʉ aba bikʉtɨ basyageenie syosa? Kalɨ, Kyala akagapela amahala agaa pakiisʉ apa ʉkʉja bʉkonyofu?

Mmahala gaake, Kyala aabapeele abandʉ abaa pakiisʉ apa ʉkʉtɨ batoligwe ʉkʉmmanya ʉkwendela mmahala gaabo. Looli Kyala iiganile ʉkʉbapoka abandʉ beene aba bikʉmmwitɨka, ʉkwendela mbʉkonyofu ʉbwa ndʉmi ɨjɨ tukʉlʉmbɨlɨla!
ABajuuta bikʉlonda ɨfiika ʉkʉtɨ biitɨke. Aba bakaja Bajuuta bikʉlonda amahala.
Looli ʉswe, tukʉfumusya ɨNdʉmi ɨjaa Kɨlɨsiti ʉjʉ aafwile pa kɨkohekano. Kʉ Bajuuta, ɨnongwa ɨsyo bikwikinyamo, na kʉlɨ aba bakaja Bajuuta nongwa sya bʉkonyofu.
Leelo kʉlɨ aba Kyala ababɨlɨkiile ʉkʉja bandʉ baake, baje Bajuuta pamo balɨngaja Bajuuta, Kɨlɨsiti jo maka gaa Kyala, kangɨ jo mahala agaa Kyala.
Paapo ɨsi abandʉ bikʉsibona ʉkʉja bʉkonyofu bwa Kyala, sikɨndile amahala gaa bandʉ. Ɨsi bikʉsibona ʉkʉja bo boonywa bwa Kyala, maka makʉlʉmba ʉkʉkɨnda amaka gaa bandʉ.

Po baamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko, mukʉmbʉkege muno mwajɨɨliile bo mukʉbɨlɨkɨligwa na Kyala. Bakaalɨ bingi pakatɨ pamyɨnu abaa mahala nkyeni mmbandʉ, kangɨ bakaalɨ bingi pakatɨ pamyɨnu aba baalɨ bɨɨmɨkigwa, pamo ʉkʉpaapigwa nnyumba ɨsya bɨɨmɨkigwa.
Looli Kyala aabasʉngwile abandʉ aba bikʉboneka ʉkʉja bakonyofu nkyeni mmbandʉ, ʉkʉtɨ abasʉʉsye aba bikwibona ʉkʉja na mahala. Kangɨ aabasʉngwile abandʉ abaa paasi, ʉkʉtɨ abasʉʉsye abaa maka.
Kyala aabasʉngwile abafujufu abaa pakiisʉ, aba abandʉ bikʉbiilaamwa, aba bakaja bɨɨmɨkigwa, ʉkʉtɨ anangɨsye ʉkʉtɨ ʉbwɨmɨkigwa ʉbwa pakiisʉ bʉkaja na mbombo najɨmo.
Po akajako ʉmundʉ gwesa ʉgwa kwituufya nkyeni mwa Kyala.
Namanga Kyala jo ʉjʉ abalʉngile ʉmwe na Kɨlɨsiti Jesu. Kyala ampelile Kɨlɨsiti ʉkʉja mahala gɨɨtʉ, kangɨ ʉkwendela mmyake atʉnangiisye ʉbʉgolofu bwa Kyala, atʉpelile ʉkʉja biikemo,
atʉpokile.
Bo muno sisimbiigwe mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo ʉkʉtɨ,
“Ʉmundʉ gwesa ʉjʉ ikwituufya,
iituukɨfyege mu Ntwa.”
Baamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko, bo niisile kʉmyɨnu kʉkʉbafumukɨsya ʉlʉbaatɨko lwa Kyala ʉlwa mbʉtiitʉ, ngaaliisile nʉ bʉnunu ʉbwa masyʉ na mahala gangʉ.
Bo mfikile kʉmyɨnu, naatumwile ʉkʉsita kʉjoba akandʉ akangɨ, looli ʉkʉnnjoba Jesu, ʉkʉtɨ jo Meesija,
fiijo ʉkʉtɨ aafwile pa kɨkohekano.
Po bo ndɨ kʉmyɨnu, naalɨ moonywa, naalɨ nʉ lʉtende, kangɨ naatetemaga fiijo.
Akabalɨlo ako bo ndɨ pakʉbamanyisya, ngaabombiile amasyʉ agaa bʉkomu na mahala agaa pakiisʉ ʉkʉtɨ mwitɨke, looli mwaliitiike paapo mwagabwene amaka agaa Mbepo Mwikemo.
Jo nongwa ɨjɨ ʉlwitɨko lwɨnu lʉkaajengiigwe pamwanya pa mahala agaa bandʉ, looli lwajengiigwe pamwanya pa maka agaa Kyala.
Looli ɨsi tukʉjoba syo sya mahala, kʉ bandʉ aba bakakile ndwitɨko. Amahala ago gakaja gaa pakiisʉ apa, kangɨ gakaja gaa bakʉlʉmba baa pakiisʉ apa, aba akabalɨlo kaabo kikʉmalɨka.
Looli amahala aga, go mahala gaa Kyala, aga gaafisiigwe kʉ bandʉ. Go aga aagabaatiike kɨlɨngaani, bo akaalɨ ʉkʉkɨpela ɨkiisʉ, ʉkʉtɨ ʉswe tʉjege nʉ bʉlɨɨlanisi nagwe mbʉsisya bwake.
Go mahala aga, abakʉlʉmba baa pakiisʉ apa najʉmo ʉjʉ agameenye. Lɨnga baagameenye, ngalɨ bakankomelela pa kɨkohekano ʉNtwa gwɨtʉ ʉgwa bʉsisya.
Looli ɨsi sifwene na ɨsi sisimbiigwe mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo ʉkʉtɨ,
“Ɨsi amaaso gakasibonamo sikʉ,
pamo ɨmbʉlʉkʉtʉ ʉkʉpɨlɨkamo,
ɨsi ʉmundʉ akiinogonamo sikʉ,
ɨsyo syo ɨsi Kyala aabatendekekiisye aba bannganile.”
Looli ʉswe Kyala aatʉsetʉliile amahala ago, ʉkwendela mwa Mbepo gwake. Namanga Mbepo Mwikemo asimeenye syosa, syope nɨ sya mbʉsolofu ɨsi silɨ mwa Kyala.

Namanga akajako ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ abagiile ʉkʉsimanya ɨsi ikwinogona ʉmundʉ ʉjʉngɨ, looli sikʉmanyigwa nʉ mwene. Bo silɨ na ɨsi Kyala ikwinogona, akajako ʉjʉ asimeenye, looli sikʉmanyigwa na Mbepo gwa Kyala mwene.
Po kʉmyɨtʉ ʉswe, tʉkaalyambɨliile ɨmbepo ɨjɨ jɨfumile pakiisʉ apa, looli twambɨliile Mbepo ʉjʉ ikʉfuma kwa Kyala, ʉkʉtɨ tʉsyaganiege ɨsi tʉpeeliigwe na Kyala.
Ɨnongwa ɨsi tukʉjoba, tʉkamanyisigwa na bandʉ abaa mahala, looli tʉmanyisiigwe na Mbepo gwa Kyala. Tukʉlɨngaania ɨnongwa ɨsya Mbepo kʉlɨ aba balɨ nagwe Mbepo.

Looli ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ akaja na Mbepo gwa Kyala, akabagɨla ʉkwambɨlɨla ɨsi sikʉfuma kwa Mbepo. Kʉmyake ʉjo sya bʉkonyofu, kangɨ akabagɨla ʉkʉsyagania, paapo ʉmundʉ abagiile ʉkʉsyagania ɨsyo kʉ bʉtʉʉli ʉbwa Mbepo mwene.
Ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ alɨ na Mbepo Mwikemo, ʉjo abagiile ʉkʉpɨma syosa, looli abandʉ abangɨ bakabagɨla ʉkʉmpɨma ʉmwene.
“Jwani asyageenie ɨnyiinogono sya Ntwa Kyala,
ʉkʉtɨ anndɨngaanie?”
Looli ʉswe twe biitɨki tʉlɨ nɨ nyiinogono ɨsya Kɨlɨsiti.

Baamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko, bo ndɨ kʉmyɨnu ngaajobaga na nuumwe bo muno ngʉjobela na bandʉ aba balɨ na Mbepo Mwikemo. Looli naajobaga na nuumwe bo muno ngʉjobela na bandʉ abaa kajɨɨlo keene akaa pakiisʉ apa, pamo bo ʉlwa baana abafyele mwa Kɨlɨsiti.
Naabapaga lwene ʉlʉkama, fyomma ɨfindʉ, paapo mukaabagiile ʉkʉlya. Na ʉlʉ mukabagɨla.

Namanga mukaalɨ mulɨ na kajɨɨlo akaa pakiisʉ. Pakatɨ pamyɨnu mulɨ na kabini kangɨ mukʉlwa. Bʉle, sitikʉnangɨsya ʉkʉtɨ mukaalɨ mulɨ na kajɨɨlo akaa pakiisʉ? Bʉle, mukaja bo ʉlwa bandʉ abaa pakiisʉ apa?
Po lɨnga ʉmundʉ jʉmo ikʉtɨ, “Ʉne ndɨ gwa Paʉli,” ʉjʉngɨ ikʉtɨ, “Ʉne ndɨ gwa Apolo,” bʉle, ɨsyo sitikʉnangɨsya ʉkʉtɨ mukaalɨ mukʉbomba ɨsya bandʉ abaa pakiisʉ apa?

Leelo Apolo jo jwani? Na niine Paʉli ne ani? Ʉswe tʉlɨ babombeli itolo, twe twabamanyiisye ʉmwe ʉkʉmmwitɨka Jesu Kɨlɨsiti. Ʉswe babɨlɨ, kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ aabombile ɨmbombo jaake, ɨjɨ ʉNtwa Jesu aalɨmpeele ʉkʉjɨbomba.
Ʉne naabyele ɨmbeju, Apolo aalyoneliile amɨɨsi, Kyala jo ʉjʉ aamesiisye nʉ kʉkʉsya.
Po ʉgwa kwɨmɨkigwa jo ʉjʉ ikʉkʉsya, jo Kyala, jomma ʉjʉ ikʉbyala pamo ikoonelela amɨɨsi.
Ʉjʉ ikʉbyala na ʉjʉ ikoonelela, boosa balɨ nɨ nyango jɨmojeene. Kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ Kyala ikwisa kʉmpa ɨfihombigwa, ʉkʉkongana na muno abombiile ɨmbombo jaake.
Namanga ʉswe tʉlɨ babombanisi pa mbombo jaa Kyala. Ʉmwe mulɨ ngʉnda gwa Kyala, kangɨ mulɨ nyumba jaake.

Ʉkwendela nkɨkʉngɨlwa ɨkɨ Kyala aalɨmbeele, naajengile ʉlwalo bo muno ikʉbombela ʉnjenga nyumba ʉnnunu, ʉgwa mahala. Leelo ʉjʉ ikʉjenga pamwanya pa lwalo ʉlo, jʉngɨ. Looli ʉmundʉ gwesa akeetege kanunu bo ikʉjenga pamwanya pa lwalo ʉlo.
Namanga akajako ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ abagiile ʉkʉjenga ʉlwalo ʉlʉngɨ pa lwalo ʉlo, ʉlʉ jo Jesu Kɨlɨsiti jʉʉjo.
Po pamwanya pa lwalo ʉlo, abandʉ bamo bikʉjenga nɨ sahabʉ, pamo ɨfeesa, pamo amabwe agaa ntengo ʉnnywamu. Abangɨ bikʉjenga nɨ mipiki, pamo nɨ liisʉ.

Po ɨmbombo ɨsya bandʉ boosa sikwisa kʉbonekaga muno sijɨɨliile. Pi isikʉ lya bʉlongi ɨmbombo syosa sikwisa kʉja pabwelu, nɨ mbombo syosa ɨsya bandʉ boosa sikwisa kʉgeligwa nʉ mooto ʉgwa bʉlongi, ʉkʉtɨ silɨ bʉleebʉle.
Lɨnga ɨmbombo jaa mundʉ jikwisa kʉpona, ʉmundʉ ʉjo ikwisa kwambɨlɨla ɨfihombigwa.
Looli lɨnga ɨmbombo jaa mundʉ jikwisa kʉpya, po ikwisa kʉsobesya fyosa. Nalooli ikwisa kʉpokigwa, leelo aikʉja bo ʉlwa mundʉ ʉjʉ aponile mmooto.
Bʉle, mukamanya ʉkʉtɨ ʉmwe mulɨ tempeli jaa Kyala? Mukamanya ʉkʉtɨ Mbepo gwa Kyala ikʉtʉʉgala nkatɨ mmyɨnu?
Lɨnga ʉmundʉ ikoonanga ɨtempeli jaa Kyala, Kyala ikwisa kʉmmoonanga ʉmundʉ ʉjo. Namanga ɨtempeli jaa Kyala nyiikemo, ɨnyumba ɨjo jo ʉmwe.
Mulɨngiisyobaga. Ʉmundʉ lɨnga ikwibona ʉkʉtɨ alɨ na mahala pakiisʉ apa, iibɨɨkege ʉkʉja nkonyofu ʉkʉtɨ akabe amahala agaa nalooli.
Namanga amahala gaa pakiisʉ apa, bʉkonyofu itolo nkyeni mwa Kyala. Bo muno sisimbiigwe mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo ʉkʉtɨ, “Kyala ikʉbakolela mbʉkomu bwabo abaa mahala.”
Kangɨ ʉkʉtɨ, “ɄNtwa asimeenye ɨnyiinogono ɨsya baa mahala ʉkʉja sya itolo.”
Po mundʉ gwesa alɨngiituukɨfyaga ʉndongosi gwake. Paapo fyosa fyɨnu,
nje jo ʉne Paʉli, aje jo Apolo, aje jo Peeteli, fije fya pakiisʉ, pamo ʉbʉʉmi, pamo ʉbʉfwe, fije fya kabalɨlo aka, pamo fya kabalɨlo aka kikwisa. Fyosa fyɨnu,
kangɨ ʉmwe mulɨ bandʉ baa Kɨlɨsiti, joope Kɨlɨsiti gwa Kyala.
Abandʉ batʉmanyege ʉkʉtɨ ʉswe tʉlɨ babombeli baa Kɨlɨsiti, tʉpeeliigwe ɨmbombo ɨjaa kwɨmɨlɨla ʉkʉfumusya ɨndʉmi jaa Kyala ɨjaa mbʉtiitʉ.
Po ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ apeeliigwe ʉkwɨmɨlɨla, fikʉtɨ ajege nsʉʉbɨligwa kʉ ntwa gwake.
Looli kʉmyangʉ ʉne, kandʉ kaa itolo lɨnga ngʉlongigwa na nuumwe, pamo nʉ bʉlongosi ʉbwa bandʉ abangɨ. Kangɨ na niine ndikwilonga.
Ndikwibona ʉkʉtɨ nsobile simo, looli ɨlyo lɨtikʉʉmbɨɨka ʉkʉja nsita nongwa. ɄNtwa Jesu jo ʉjʉ ikʉlamula.

Po leelo mulɨngabalongaga abandʉ bo akabalɨlo kakaalɨ ʉkʉfika, looli muguulɨlege mpaka pi isikʉ ɨlɨ ʉNtwa Jesu ikwisa. Ʉmwene jo ʉjʉ ikwisa kʉsibɨɨka pabwelu syosa ɨsi sifisiigwe mu ngiisi, nʉ kʉsinangɨsya ɨsi silɨ mu ndumbula ɨsya bandʉ. Akabalɨlo ako, aba babagiisye boosa bikwisa kwambɨlɨla ɨnduufyo ʉkʉfuma kwa Kyala.

Baamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko, kʉnongwa jɨɨnu njobile ɨnongwa syosa ɨsyo, ɨsyangʉ nɨ sya Apolo, ʉkʉja sya kʉkeetelamo ʉmwe. Po musimanye ɨsi sikʉtɨ, “Mulɨngongelangapo palɨ ɨsi sisimbiigwe mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo.” Lɨnga mukʉsikonga, mutikʉjaga bandʉ aba bikwituukɨfya ʉmmanyisi jʉmo nʉ kʉmmwilaamwa ʉjʉngɨ.
Bʉle, jwani akʉbɨɨkile ʉgwe ʉkʉtɨ ʉbagiisye fiijo ʉkʉnkɨnda ʉnnino? Kandʉ nki aka ʉlɨ nako aka ʉkapeeligwa na Kyala? Looli lɨnga ʉpeeliigwe, fiki kwituukɨfya ngatɨ ʉkaapeeliigwe?
Po mwikwite! Mulɨ bakabi! Mulɨ banyafyale! Mukaatʉlondilepo ʉswe ʉkʉbatʉʉla! Kwalɨ kʉnunu lɨnga mwalɨ banyafyale nalooli, ʉkʉtɨ na nuuswe tʉlongosyege pamopeene na nuumwe!
Looli kʉmyɨtʉ ʉswe twe batʉmigwa,
ngwaga Kyala atʉbɨɨkile ʉkʉtɨ abandʉ batwilaamwege ʉkʉkɨnda boosa. Tʉlɨ bo abandʉ aba balongiigwe kʉkʉgogigwa pabwelu pakiisʉ, nkyeni mbandʉmi na bandʉ.

Abandʉ bikʉtʉbona ʉswe ʉkʉja bakonyofu, apa tukʉbomba ɨmbombo jaa Kɨlɨsiti. Looli ʉmwe mulɨ na mahala mwa Kɨlɨsiti! Ʉswe tʉlɨ boonywa, looli ʉmwe mulɨ na maka! Ʉswe abandʉ bikʉtwilaamwa, looli ʉmwe abandʉ bikʉbɨɨmɨka fiijo!
Na ʉlʉ tʉlɨ nɨ njala nɨ kyʉmɨlwa, ɨmyenda tʉkaja nagyo, tukʉtaamigwa, tʉkaja nʉ bʉjo.
Tukwijʉʉla ʉkʉbomba ɨmbombo na maboko gɨɨtʉ. Apa abandʉ bikʉtʉtʉka, tukʉbasaja, apa bikʉtʉpa ɨngʉbɨlo, tukʉʉmɨɨlɨla,
apa bikʉtʉjoba kabiibi, tukʉbaamula kanunu. Na ʉlʉ, abandʉ abaa pakiisʉ apa bikʉtʉbona bo ʉlwa kɨko, nɨ mitindibofu.
Ndikʉbasimbɨla ɨnongwa ɨsi ʉkʉbasʉʉsya, looli ngʉlonda ʉkʉbasoka bo ʉlwa baanangʉ abakʉndwe.
Namanga mulɨ na baswɨli abingi mwa Kɨlɨsiti, looli mulɨ nʉ gwiseemwe jʉmojwene itolo, paapo ʉne naalɨ gwiseemwe mwa Kɨlɨsiti Jesu bo ngʉbalʉmbɨlɨla ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu.
Po ngʉbapyelesya mukongege bo muno ngʉbombela ʉne.

Jo nongwa ɨjɨ naalɨntʉmile Timoti kʉmyɨnu, ʉmwanangʉ ʉnkʉndwe, ʉjʉ ngʉnsʉʉbɨla mu mbombo ɨjaa Ntwa. Ʉmwene ikʉbakʉmbʉsya muno njɨɨliile mwa Kɨlɨsiti Jesu, na muno ngʉmanyikɨsya abiitɨki boosa mbʉjo boosa.
Po abandʉ bamo pakatɨ pamyɨnu balɨ na matingo, bikwinogona ʉkʉtɨ ndikwisako kʉkʉbajaatɨla.
Looli lɨnga ʉNtwa iiganile, ngwandana ʉkʉfika kʉmyɨnu. Apo po angwisa kwikeetela amaka gaabo abaa matingo, somma amasyʉ gaabo geene.
Paapo ʉBʉnyafyale bwa Kyala gakaja masyʉ geene, looli maka.
Po mukʉlonda mbombe ɨfiki? Bʉle, niise nɨ ngili? Pamo niise ndʉgano na mbooloolo?
Sifumwike ɨnongwa ʉkʉtɨ, kʉmyɨnu bʉliko ʉbʉlogwe. Kʉlɨ nʉ mundʉ ʉjʉ ikwenda nʉ nkasi ʉgwa gwise. Syope nɨ ndagɨlo ɨsya bapanja, aba bakammanya Kyala, sitikwitɨkɨsya ɨsyo!
Keeta ʉmwe mukwituufya! Bʉle, mutikʉlondigwa ʉkʉsulumania fiijo? Bʉle, mutikʉlondigwa ʉkʉnsoosyapo pakatɨ pamyɨnu, ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ ikʉbomba ɨsyo?
Na paapo ʉne ndɨ kʉbʉtali, ɨndumbula jangʉ jɨlɨ pamopeene na nuumwe. Po nsitumuliile ngaani ɨnongwa ɨsya mundʉ ʉjo, ʉjʉ abombile sisiisyo, ngʉfwana ngatɨ ndiko kʉmyɨnu.
Bo mubʉngeene mu ngamu jaa Jesu ʉNtwa gwɨtʉ, ndɨ pamopeene na nuumwe mu ndumbula, nʉ bʉlagɨli ʉbwa Jesu bʉlipo.
Apo ʉmundʉ ʉjo munndekele Seetano, ʉkʉtɨ ataamigwe, ʉbʉndʉ bwake ʉbwa bʉtʉlanongwa bʉsookemo, ʉkʉtɨ joope iise apokigwe pi isikʉ lya kwisa ʉNtwa Jesu.
Ʉkwituufya kwɨnu kʉkaja kʉnunu. Bʉle, mukamanya ʉkʉtɨ, “Ʉnkese ʉnnandɨ itolo gukʉtupɨsya ɨkɨkando kyosa”?
Po mugʉsoosyege ʉnkese ʉgwa kabalɨlo aka kakɨndile, ʉkʉtɨ muje beelu. Mujege bo ɨkɨkando ɨkɨpya ɨkɨ kɨkaja nʉ nkese gogoosa,
paapo mo muno mujɨɨliile. Kɨlɨsiti, ʉjʉ jo Kangʼoosi gwɨtʉ ʉgwa Pasa,
abooliigwe ʉkʉja ikemo.
Po tʉlɨngasekelaga ɨkyaka kya Pasa kʉ nkese gʉla ʉgwa ijolo, ʉgʉ gukʉtupɨsya ʉbʉbiibi ʉbwa bʉtʉlanongwa, looli tʉmogege bo tukʉlya ɨfi fikaja nʉ nkese, kokʉtɨ ɨndumbula ɨnyeelu nʉ bwanalooli.
Mwa kalata ʉjʉ naabasimbiile, naababʉʉlile ʉkʉtɨ muleke ʉkʉja nʉ bʉlɨɨlanisi na balogwe.

Kʉkaja kokʉtɨ muleke loosa ʉkʉja nʉ bʉlɨɨlanisi na balogwe aba bakaja bandʉ baa Kyala, pamo abanyonywa toosa, pamo abanyambuta, pamo aba bikwipuuta kʉ tʉndʉ ʉtʉ akaja jo Kyala, paapo ʉkʉbomba bo ʉlo mwalondigwaga ʉkʉsookapo pakiisʉ apa!

Looli ɨsi ngʉlonda ʉkʉjoba kokʉtɨ muleke ʉkʉja nʉ bʉlɨɨlanisi nʉ mundʉ gwesa ʉjʉ ikwibɨɨka ʉkʉja mwitɨki mwinɨɨnu, looli ngɨmba ndogwe, nnyonywa toosa, gwa lʉheeho, ngaala bwalwa, nnyambuta, pamo ʉjʉ ikwipuuta kʉ tʉndʉ ʉtʉ akaja jo Kyala. Ʉmundʉ bo ʉjo muleke nʉ kʉlya nagwe.

Po leelo, jɨkaja mbombo jangʉ ʉkʉbalonga abandʉ aba bakaja biitɨki, looli Kyala jʉʉjo jo ikwisa kʉbalonga. Looli ʉmwe mukʉlondigwa ʉkʉbalonga abiitɨki, bo ʉlʉ sisimbiigwe mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo ʉkʉtɨ, “Ʉmundʉ ʉmbiibi pakatɨ pamyɨnu munkagege.”

Po leelo, jɨkaja mbombo jangʉ ʉkʉbalonga abandʉ aba bakaja biitɨki, looli Kyala jʉʉjo jo ikwisa kʉbalonga. Looli ʉmwe mukʉlondigwa ʉkʉbalonga abiitɨki, bo ʉlʉ sisimbiigwe mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo ʉkʉtɨ, “Ʉmundʉ ʉmbiibi pakatɨ pamyɨnu munkagege.”
Lɨnga jʉmo pakatɨ pamyɨnu alɨ nɨ nongwa nʉ mwitɨki nnine, alɨngasulwa ʉkʉjɨtwala ɨnongwa jaake kʉkʉlonga kʉlɨ aba bakaja biitɨki. Bʉle, kʉkaja kʉnunu ʉkʉjɨtwala kʉkʉlonga kʉ biitɨki biinaake?
Mukamanya ʉkʉtɨ abiitɨki bo aba bikwisa kʉkɨlonga ɨkiisʉ? Po lɨnga mukwisa kʉkɨlonga ɨkiisʉ, bʉle, mukwinogona ʉkʉtɨ mukabagɨsya ʉkʉlonga ʉtʉnongwa ʉtʉnandɨ ʉtʉ?
Mukamanya ʉkʉtɨ tukwisa kʉbalonga abandʉmi baa Seetano? Po nalooli mubagiile ʉkʉlonga ɨnongwa ɨsya mbʉʉmi bwɨnu!
Kangɨ lɨnga mulɨ nɨ nongwa mbʉʉmi bwɨnu, mungasitwalaga ɨnongwa syɨnu kʉ bandʉ aba bakaja biitɨki, paapo abo batikwɨmɨkigwa nkɨpanga kya Kyala.
Mbalaalʉʉsye simo ɨsya kʉbasʉʉsya. Bʉle, kʉmyɨnu akajako ʉmundʉ najʉmo ʉgwa mahala, ʉjʉ abagiisye ʉkʉlamula ɨnongwa ɨsya biitɨki?
Looli ʉmwe, mulɨ na kajɨɨlo akaa mundʉ ʉkʉnsitaaka ʉmwitɨki nnine! Kangɨ mukʉbomba bo ʉlo nkyeni mmbandʉ aba bakaja biitɨki!
Po ʉkʉsitaakana ʉko kukʉnangɨsya ʉkʉtɨ mutoliigwe loosa! Ngɨmba, po kwalɨ kʉnunu ʉmundʉ ʉkʉbabombela kabiibi nʉ kʉpoka ɨkyʉma kyɨnu!
Looli ʉmwe, mukʉsyoba nʉ kʉpoka ɨkyʉma, mukʉbabombela ɨsyo boope na biitɨki biinɨɨnu!
Mukamanya ʉkʉtɨ abatʉlanongwa batikwisa kwingɨla mBʉnyafyale bwa Kyala?
Mulɨngiisyobaga! Abalogwe, abandʉ aba bikwipuuta kʉ tʉndʉ ʉtʉ akaja jo Kyala, boope abanyambala aba bikʉlogwa na banyambala,
abahɨɨji, abanyonywa toosa, abagaala bwalwa, abaa lʉheeho, abanyambuta, abo boosa batikwisa kwingɨla mBʉnyafyale bwa Kyala.

Akabalɨlo kamo bamo pakatɨ pamyɨnu mwalɨ bo ʉlo. Looli lɨɨlɨno, mu ngamu jaa Ntwa gwɨtʉ Jesu Kɨlɨsiti, na mwa Mbepo ʉgwa Kyala gwɨtʉ, ʉmwe mwelʉsiigwe ʉbʉbiibi bwɨnu, ʉmwe musʉngʉliigwe ʉkʉja bandʉ baake, ʉmwe mubaliigwe ʉbʉgolofu.

Bamo pakatɨ pamyɨnu bikʉtɨ, “Tʉlɨ baabʉke ʉkʉbomba syosa ɨsi tukʉlonda,” leelo ʉne Paʉli ngʉtɨ, sikaja syosa nunu kʉmyɨtʉ. Nalɨnga mukʉtɨ, “Tʉlɨ baabʉke ʉkʉbomba syosa ɨsi tukʉlonda,” looli ʉne ndikʉja ntʉmwa gwa kandʉ kokoosa.

Bamo pakatɨ pamyɨnu bikʉtɨ, “Ɨfindʉ fikʉkɨnda itolo ndwanda, nʉ lwanda lwa findʉ itolo. Kyala ikwisa kʉfipyuta fyofibɨɨlɨ.” Mukʉjoba bo ʉlo, leelo Kyala akaagɨpelile ɨmibɨlɨ gyɨtʉ ʉkʉja gya bʉlogwe, looli aagɨpelile ʉkʉja gya kʉmmbombela ʉNtwa, joope ʉNtwa ikʉgɨpaasya.
Kyala aalɨnsyʉsiisye ʉNtwa Jesu ʉkʉfuma mbʉfwe kʉ maka gaake. Kangɨ bʉbʉʉbo ikwisa kʉgɨsyʉsya ɨmibɨlɨ gyɨtʉ ʉswe.
Mukamanya ʉkʉtɨ ɨmibɨlɨ gyɨnu tʉmbakaasya ʉtwa mbɨlɨ gwa Kɨlɨsiti? Bʉle, ʉbagiile ʉkwega ʉtʉmbakaasya ʉtwa mbɨlɨ gwa Kɨlɨsiti nʉ kʉtʉlʉnga kʉ mbɨlɨ ʉgwa ndogwe? Hɨmma na panandɨ!
Mukamanya ʉkʉtɨ ʉmundʉ gwesa ʉjʉ ikʉlʉngana nʉ ndogwe ikʉja mbɨlɨ gʉmogwene nagwe? Namanga sisimbiigwe mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo ʉkʉtɨ, “Bobabɨɨlɨ bikʉjaga mbɨlɨ gʉmogwene.”
Looli ʉmundʉ gwesa ʉjʉ ikʉlʉngana nʉ Ntwa, ikʉjaga jʉmojwene nagwe mwa Mbepo Mwikemo.
Mubwepʉkege fiijo ʉbʉlogwe. Mukʉtɨ, “Ʉbʉtʉlanongwa boosa ʉbʉ ʉmundʉ ikʉbʉbomba, bʉlɨ panja pa mbɨlɨ gwake,” looli ʉne ngʉtɨ, ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ ikʉlogwa, ikʉgʉbombela ʉbʉtʉlanongwa ʉmbɨlɨ gwake jʉʉjo.
Mukamanya ʉkʉtɨ ɨmibɨlɨ gyɨnu jo tempeli ɨjaa kʉtʉʉgalamo Mbepo Mwikemo, ʉjʉ Kyala aabapeele? Po ɨmibɨlɨ ɨgyo gɨkaja kyʉma kyɨnu,
paapo Kyala abʉʉlile kʉ ntengo ʉnnywamu. Po muntuufyege Kyala mmibɨlɨ gyɨnu.
Kʉlɨ ɨsi mwalɨɨsimbiile ʉkʉtɨ, “Kʉnunu ʉnnyambala ʉkʉsita kwega ʉnkiikʉlʉ.”
Looli kʉnongwa jaa kʉbwepʉka ʉbʉlogwe, kanunu kʉkʉtɨ nnyambala ajege nʉ nkasi gwake, na kʉkʉtɨ nkiikʉlʉ ajege nʉ ndʉme gwake.
Ʉnnyambala ammbombelege ʉnkasi ɨsi sikʉlondigwa kʉ beegi, joope ʉnkiikʉlʉ ammbombelege ʉndʉme ɨsi sikʉlondigwa kʉ beegi.
Ʉmbɨlɨ gwa nkiikʉlʉ gʉkaja gwake, looli gwa ndʉme. Kangɨ ʉmbɨlɨ gwa nnyambala gʉkaja gwake, looli gwa nkasi.

Mungakaananaga, looli lɨnga mwitɨkeene ʉkʉsita kʉbomba kʉkabalɨlo akanandɨ itolo, ʉkʉtɨ mukaage akabalɨlo akanunu akaa kwipuuta. Piitaasi mugomokelanilege kangɨ, ʉkʉtɨ Seetano alɨngiisa kʉbagela kʉnongwa jaa kʉtoligwa ʉkwitiima.
Ɨsi mbabʉʉlile, mbiitɨkiisye itolo, looli ndikʉbalagɨla ʉkʉbomba bo ʉlo.
Looli ʉne naaliiganile ʉkʉtɨ abandʉ boosa bajege bo ʉne.
Leelo sikaja bo ʉlo, namanga kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ Kyala ampeele ɨkɨkʉngɨlwa kyake, jʉmo ɨkɨkʉngɨlwa ɨkɨ, ʉjʉngɨ ampeele ɨkɨkʉngɨlwa ɨkɨngɨ.
Po ngʉbabʉʉla abakenja, na bakiikʉlʉ abafwɨle, ʉkʉtɨ kʉnunu ʉkʉsyala bʉbʉʉbo bo muno njɨɨliile ʉne.
Looli lɨnga bikʉtoligwa ʉkʉʉmɨɨlɨla ʉkʉja bo ʉlo, po kʉnunu ʉkwega pamo ʉkwegigwa, paapo kʉnunupo ʉkʉbomba bo ʉlo, ʉkʉkɨnda ʉkʉpya nɨ finyonyo ɨfya mbɨlɨ.
Kʉlɨ aba beegeene, ngʉbapa ʉlʉlagɨlo ʉlʉ. Lʉtikʉfuma mu nyiinogono syangʉ, looli iisyʉ ɨlɨ aajobile ʉNtwa Jesu jʉʉjo. Ʉnkiikʉlʉ alɨngalekanaga nʉ ndʉme!
Looli lɨnga alekeene nagwe, alɨngeegigwaga kʉbʉngɨ, pamo po agomokelege kʉ ndʉme. Kangɨ ʉnnyambala alɨnganndekaga ʉnkasi.
Kʉ biitɨki abangɨ, lɨkajapo ɨlɨ aajobile ʉNtwa Jesu, looli ʉne ngʉtɨ, lɨnga ʉnnyambala ʉmwitɨki eegile ʉnkiikʉlʉ ʉjʉ akaja mwitɨki, lɨnga ʉnkiikʉlʉ ʉjo ikwitɨka ʉkʉtʉʉgala nagwe, alɨnganndekaga.
Joope ʉnkiikʉlʉ ʉmwitɨki, lɨnga eegiigwe nʉ nnyambala ʉjʉ akaja mwitɨki, lɨnga ʉnnyambala ʉjo ikwitɨka ʉkʉtʉʉgala nagwe, alɨngalekanaga nagwe.

Namanga ʉndʉme ʉjʉ akaja mwitɨki, Kyala ammbɨɨkile ʉkʉja mmbandʉ baake, kʉnongwa jaa kʉja nʉ nkasi ʉmwitɨki. Nʉ nkiikʉlʉ ʉjʉ akaja mwitɨki, Kyala ammbɨɨkile ʉkʉja mmbandʉ baake, kʉnongwa jaa kʉja nʉ ndʉme ʉmwitɨki. Lɨnga sikaalɨ bo ʉlo, abaanɨɨnu ngalɨ bakaja baa Kyala, looli ngɨmba abeene baa Kyala.

Looli lɨnga ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ akaja mwitɨki ikʉlonda ʉkʉlekana nʉ mwitɨki ʉjʉ baalyegeene, nndeke abombe bo ʉlo. Apo ʉmwitɨki atikʉpinyigwa mbwegi ʉbo. Looli Kyala ababɨlɨkiile ʉkʉtɨ mutʉʉgalege nʉ lʉtengaano.
Gwe nkiikʉlʉ ʉgwe, ʉkabagɨla ʉkʉmanya! Lʉmo ʉndʉmego abagiile ʉkʉpokigwa kʉnongwa jaako. Na ʉgwe gwe nnyambala, ʉkabagɨla ʉkʉmanya! Lʉmo ʉnkasigo abagiile ʉkʉpokigwa kʉnongwa jaako.
Abandʉ boosa batʉʉgalege bo muno ʉNtwa Jesu aababɨɨkiile, kangɨ basyalege bo muno baajɨɨliile bo Kyala ikʉbabɨlɨkɨla. Po ʉlʉ lo lʉlagɨlo lwangʉ kʉ fipanga fya Kyala fyosa.
Lɨnga gwalɨ Njuuta bo Kyala ikʉkʉbɨlɨkɨla, ʉjege bʉbʉʉbo. Kangɨ lɨnga ʉkaalɨ Njuuta bo Kyala ikʉkʉbɨlɨkɨla, ʉlɨngalondaga ʉkʉja Njuuta ʉjʉ abuutiigwe kʉkyeni.
Ʉkʉbuutigwa kʉkyeni, pamo ʉkʉsita kʉbuutigwa kʉkyeni, kʉkaja nɨ fya kʉkabamo, looli ʉkʉsikola ɨndagɨlo ɨsya Kyala.
Po kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ asyalege bo muno aajɨɨliile bo Kyala ikʉmmbɨlɨkɨla.
Lɨnga gwalɨ ntʉmwa bo Kyala ikʉkʉbɨlɨkɨla, ʉlɨngapaasyaga. Lɨnga kʉjaaga ɨnjɨla ɨjaa kʉja mwabʉke, jɨbombele.
Paapo ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ aalɨ ntʉmwa bo ikʉbɨlɨkɨligwa nʉ Ntwa, ʉjo mwabʉke kʉ Ntwa. Joope ʉjʉ aalɨ mwabʉke bo ikʉbɨlɨkɨligwa, ʉjo ntʉmwa gwa Kɨlɨsiti.
Mwalyʉliigwe kʉ ntengo ʉnnywamu. Po mulɨngajaga batʉmwa baa bandʉ.
Baamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko, kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ asyalege bo muno aajɨɨliile bo ikʉbɨlɨkɨligwa na Kyala.
Po ngwamula ɨsi mulaalʉʉsiisye, ɨsya balɨndwana abakenja. Ngaja nʉ lʉlagɨlo ʉkʉfuma kʉ Ntwa. Looli nikʉbalɨngaania kʉ nyiinogono syangʉ, ʉne ne nsʉʉbɨligwa kwi ipyana lya Kyala.
Paapo kʉlɨ nɨ ngʉbɨlo amasikʉ aga, ngwinogona ʉkʉtɨ ʉmundʉ asyalege bo muno ajɨɨliile.
Bʉle, ʉkabile ʉnkiikʉlʉ? Ʉlɨngalondaga ʉkʉlekana nagwe. Ʉgwe ʉkaja mwegi? Ʉlɨngalondaga ʉkʉja mwegi.
Leelo lɨnga gwegile ʉnkiikʉlʉ, ʉkatʉla ɨnongwa. Kangɨ lɨnga ʉndɨndwana eegiigwe, akatʉla ɨnongwa. Leelo abeegi bikʉja nʉ bʉtolwe ʉbwa lʉko lwingi. Ngʉlonda ʉkʉbasoka ʉkʉtɨ ʉbʉtolwe bʉngiisa kʉbaaga.
Baamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko, ɨsi ngʉjoba syo ɨsi, akabalɨlo aka tʉlɨ nako mbʉʉmi bwɨtʉ kanandɨ itolo. Po akabalɨlo aka kasyele kʉmyɨtʉ, abeegi baleke ʉkwinogona fiijo ɨsya bʉtolwe ʉbwa bwegi bwabo.

Boope aba bikʉlɨla, batʉʉgalege ngatɨ bakaja nʉ tʉndʉ ʉtwa kʉbalɨsya. Boope aba bahobwike, batʉʉgalege ngatɨ bakaja nʉ tʉndʉ ʉtwa kʉbahobosya. Boope aba bikʉʉla ʉtʉndʉ, batʉʉgalege ngatɨ bakaja nʉ tʉndʉ ʉtwa kʉkola.
Aba bikʉbombela ʉtʉndʉ ʉtwa pakiisʉ apa, balɨngatwinogonaga fiijo ʉtʉndʉ ʉto. Paapo ʉtʉndʉ toosa ʉtwa pakiisʉ apa tukwisa kʉkɨnda.
Po ngʉlonda ʉkʉtɨ mulɨngapaasyaga ɨsya pakiisʉ apa. Ʉnnyambala ʉjʉ akaja nʉ nkiikʉlʉ, abagiile ʉkʉbomba ɨsya Ntwa kɨsita kʉja nɨ sya kwijaaja, ikwinogona muno abagiile ʉkʉnkyela ʉNtwa.
Looli ʉnnyambala ʉjʉ alɨ nʉ nkiikʉlʉ, alɨ nɨ sya kwijaaja nyingi, ikwinogona muno abagiile ʉkʉnkyela ʉnkasi,

nɨ nyiinogono syake sikʉja nɨ fibafu fibɨlɨ. Joope ʉnkiikʉlʉ ʉnkenja, abagiile ʉkʉbomba ɨsya Ntwa kɨsita kʉja nɨ sya kwijaaja, ikwinogona ɨsya kʉja ngolofu mu mbɨlɨ gwake na mu ndumbula jaake. Looli ʉnkiikʉlʉ ʉjʉ alɨ nʉ nnyambala, alɨ nɨ sya kwijaaja nyingi, ikwinogona muno abagiile ʉkʉnkyela ʉndʉme.
Amasyʉ aga ngʉbabʉʉla kʉkaja kokʉtɨ ngʉlonda ʉkʉbakʉnga, looli ngʉlonda ʉkʉbatʉʉla. Ngʉlonda mutʉʉgalege na kajɨɨlo aka kabagiisye, mummbombelege ʉNtwa kɨsita kwijaaja.

Lɨnga ʉmundʉ jʉmo ikwaga atikʉbomba kanunu kʉ mwanaake ʉndɨndwana, paapo ikʉnkaanisya ʉkwegigwa, kangɨ ɨfyɨnja fyake ɨfya kwegigwa fikʉkɨnda, ʉmundʉ ʉjo lɨnga ikwaga sikʉlondigwa eegigwe, po ammwitɨkɨsye ʉkwegigwa. Apo bo akatʉla ɨnongwa.

Lɨnga ʉnnyambala ʉjʉngɨ atumwile jʉʉjo kʉ bwigane bwake ʉkʉtɨ ʉmwanaake alɨngeegigwa, lɨnga akafimbɨlɨsigwa ʉkʉbomba bo ʉlo, kangɨ lɨnga ikʉlonda ʉkʉnndɨndɨlɨla ʉmwanaake, po alɨngammwitɨkɨsya ʉkwegigwa. Ʉnnyambala ʉjo joope ikʉbomba kanunu.
Po ʉjʉ ikʉmmwitɨkɨsya ʉmwanaake ʉkwegigwa ikʉbomba kanunu. Joope ʉjʉ atikʉmmwitɨkɨsya ikʉbomba kanunu ʉkʉkɨndapo.
Po ʉnkiikʉlʉ atʉʉgalege nʉ ndʉme akabalɨlo koosa aka alɨ kʉ bʉʉmi. Looli lɨnga ʉndʉme afwile, apo ikʉja mwabʉke ʉkwegigwa nʉ mundʉ gwesa ʉjʉ ikʉnndonda, looli ʉndʉme ʉjo ajege mwitɨki gwa Ntwa.
Leelo mu nyiinogono syangʉ paakipo ʉmfwɨle ʉjo asyale kɨsita kwegigwa. Ngwinogona ʉkʉtɨ na niine Mbepo gwa Kyala ikʉʉndongosya ʉkʉjoba ɨnongwa ɨsyo.
Mwalɨɨndaalʉʉsiisye ɨnongwa ɨsya findʉ ɨfi bikʉsoosya bo bikwipuuta kʉ fifwani.
Mmeenye mukʉjoba mukʉtɨ, “Ʉswe twesa tʉlɨ bamanyi.” Sya nalooli, leelo ʉbʉmanyi bukʉbapela abandʉ ʉkʉja na matingo. Looli ʉlʉgano lo ʉlʉ lukʉbakasya abandʉ ndwitɨko.
Lɨnga ʉmundʉ ikwibona ʉkʉtɨ asimeenye simo, ʉjo akamanya muno ikʉlondeligwa ʉkʉsyagania.
Looli ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ annganile Kyala, ʉjo jo ʉjʉ ikʉmanyigwa na Kyala jʉʉjo.

Po ɨsya kʉlya ɨnyama ɨsi bafisookiisye ɨfifwani, ʉswe twesa tʉmeenye bo ʉlʉ mukʉjoba ʉkʉtɨ, “Ʉtʉndʉ ʉtʉ tukwipuutigwa na bandʉ tʉkaja na mbombo najɨmo pakiisʉ apa.” Kangɨ tʉmeenye ʉkʉtɨ, “Aliko Kyala jʉmojwene itolo.”
Sya nalooli ʉkʉtɨ tʉliko ʉtʉndʉ ʉtʉ abandʉ bikʉtʉjoba ʉkʉja bo baakyala, kʉje ko kʉ mpaalanga, pamo pakiisʉ. Nalooli ʉtʉndʉ ʉtʉ abandʉ bikʉtɨ bo baakyala twingi, na ʉtʉ abandʉ bikʉtɨ batwa twingi,
looli kʉmyɨtʉ ʉswe,
Aliko Kyala jʉmojwene itolo, jo Taata,
jo ʉjʉ aapelile ʉtʉndʉ toosa,
jo ʉjʉ ʉswe tukʉtʉʉgala mmyake.
Aliko ʉNtwa jʉmojwene itolo, jo Jesu Kɨlɨsiti,
jo ʉjʉ ʉtʉndʉ toosa tʉpeliigwe ʉkwendela mmyake,
jo ʉjʉ ʉkwendela mmyake tʉlɨ nʉ bʉʉmi.

Looli kʉkaja kokʉtɨ abiitɨki boosa basimeenye kanunu ɨnongwa ɨsi. Balipo abandʉ aba baaliisibiile fiijo ʉlwiho ʉlwa kwipuuta kʉ fifwani. Akabalɨlo aka bo bikʉlya ɨnyama, bakaalɨ bikwinogona ʉkʉtɨ ɨnyama ɨsyo mwiko, paapo bafisookiisye ɨfifwani. Po mu ndumbula syabo ɨnyoonywa bikʉtaamigwa fiijo, bikwibona ʉkʉja banyali.
Looli ɨfindʉ fitikʉtʉbɨɨka kɨfuki na Kyala. Lɨnga tukʉfileka ʉkʉlya, tʉtikwagɨlwa nafimo. Kangɨ lɨnga tukʉlya, tʉtikongeleligwa nafimo.
Po ʉlo mwikeetege kanunu, ʉbwabʉke bwɨnu bʉlɨngajaga bwa kʉbasobesya abiitɨki abaa ndumbula ɨnyoonywa.

Paapo ʉmwitɨki ʉgwa ndumbula ɨnyoonywa, abagiile ʉkʉkʉbona ʉgwe gwe kwibona ʉkʉtɨ ʉsyageenie, ʉlɨ nnyumba ɨjaa kwipuutɨlamo kʉ fifwani, kʉlya ɨnyama. Bʉle, mu ndumbula jaake atikwinogona ʉkʉtɨ joope abagiisye ʉkʉlya ɨnyama ɨsi sisoosiigwe kʉ fifwani? Bʉle, atikwibonaga ʉkʉtɨ ikʉfiipuuta?
Kʉlɨ ɨlyo, ʉnnino ʉmoonywa, ʉjʉ Kɨlɨsiti aalɨmfwɨliile, ikʉsobesigwa, paapo kwinogona ʉkʉtɨ ʉlɨ mmanyi.
Po apa mukʉtʉla ɨnongwa kʉ baamyɨnu ndwitɨko, nʉ kʉbafulasya ɨndumbula syabo ɨnyoonywa. Ʉkʉbomba bo ʉlo, mukʉtʉla ɨnongwa kwa Kɨlɨsiti jʉʉjo.
Po lɨnga ɨfindʉ ɨfi ngʉlya, fikʉnsobesya ndwitɨko ʉmwitɨki mwinangʉ, apo ndikwisa kʉlyamo sikʉ ɨnyama, ʉkʉtɨ ʉmwinangʉ alɨngasoba.
Bʉle, ʉne ngaja mwabʉke? Bʉle, ʉne ngaja ntʉmigwa? Bʉle, ʉne ngaalɨmmbwene ʉNtwa gwɨtʉ Jesu? Bʉle, ngaja jo ʉne naalyandiisye ɨkɨpanga kyɨnu ɨkya Kyala kʉ maka agaa Ntwa Jesu?
Nalɨnga abandʉ abangɨ bikʉʉmbona ʉkʉtɨ ngaja ntʉmigwa, looli kʉmyɨnu ʉne ndɨ ntʉmigwa, paapo ɨkɨpanga kyɨnu ɨkya Kyala, kɨmanyilo ɨkɨ kikʉnangɨsya ʉkʉtɨ ʉne ndʉmiigwe nʉ Ntwa.
Po abandʉ aba bikʉʉsitaaka ʉne ʉkʉtɨ ngaja ntʉmigwa, nikʉbabʉʉla nikʉtɨ,
baatɨ, ʉswe twe batʉmigwa baa Kyala, tʉkabagɨsya ʉkʉpeeligwa ɨfya kʉlya nɨ fya kʉnwa kʉnongwa jaa mbombo ɨjɨ?
Bʉle, tʉkabagɨsya ʉkwenda ɨnjɨla na bakasi bɨɨtʉ abiitɨki, bo ʉlʉ bikwenda nabo ɨnjɨla Peeteli na batʉmigwa abangɨ, na banuguna baa Ntwa Jesu?
Baatɨ, jo ʉne na Balinaba twibeene, twe tukʉlondigwa ʉkʉbomba ɨmbombo ɨjɨngɨ ʉkʉtɨ tʉkabe ʉmfwalo?

Jo nsikali nki ʉjʉ ikʉbʉʉka kʉkʉlwa ʉbwite, ikwihomba ɨkyʉma kyake? Jo jwani ʉjʉ ikʉbyala mu ngʉnda gwake, looli atikʉsʉʉbɨla ʉkʉlya ɨfi aabyele? Kangɨ jo jwani ʉjʉ ikʉtiima ʉntiimo kɨsita kʉnwamo ʉlʉkama mu ntiimo gwake?
Ɨnyiinogono ɨsi sya bandʉ itolo. Looli nɨ ndagɨlo sya Moose sikʉlɨngaania bo lʉlʉʉlo.
Sisimbiigwe ʉmo ʉkʉtɨ, “Ʉlɨngajɨpinyaga ɨngʼombe kʉ kanwa, bo jɨlɨ pakʉpʉʉla ɨnganu.”
Nkɨfwanikɨsyo ɨkɨ, bʉle, Kyala ikʉpaasya syene ɨsya ngʼombe?
Hɨmma! Bʉle, akaajobile ɨsyo kʉmyɨtʉ? Bo silɨ! Namanga ʉjʉ ikʉlɨma ʉngʉnda, na ʉjʉ ikʉtondola mu ngʉnda gʉla, boosa bikʉsʉʉbɨla ʉkʉtɨ bikʉfyaga ɨfya kʉjabana.
Ʉswe tʉlʉmbɨliile ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu kʉmyɨnu, bo ʉlwa mundʉ ʉjʉ ikʉbyala ɨmbeju. Bʉle, ko kʉkʉlʉmba ʉkʉsʉʉbɨla ʉtʉndʉ ʉkʉfuma kʉmyɨnu, ʉtwa kʉtʉtʉʉla mu mbɨlɨ, bo ʉlwa mundʉ ʉjʉ ikʉtondola?
Lɨnga abangɨ babagiisye ʉkʉpeeligwa ʉtʉndʉ ʉkʉfuma kʉmyɨnu, bʉle, ʉswe tʉkabagɨsya ʉkʉkɨndapo ʉkʉkaba?
Looli ʉswe tʉkaamelile ɨfi tʉbagiisye ʉkʉbombeligwa na nuumwe, leelo tʉlɨnkwikasya ndɨ syosa ʉkʉtɨ tʉlɨngabasigɨla abandʉ ʉkwitɨka ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu ɨjaa Kɨlɨsiti.

Bʉle, mukamanya ʉkʉtɨ aba bikʉbomba ɨmbombo mu tempeli bikʉkaba ɨfindʉ fyabo ʉkʉfuma mwi ikemo ɨlɨ bikʉtwala mu tempeli? Kokʉtɨ mukamanya ʉkʉtɨ aba bikʉbomba ɨmbombo pa kɨgemo, bikwambɨlɨla ɨfindʉ fyabo ʉkʉfuma mwi ikemo ɨlya pa kɨgemo?
Kangɨ ʉNtwa Jesu alagiile bʉbʉʉbo ʉkʉtɨ, aba bikʉlʉmbɨlɨla ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu bikʉlyaga ʉkʉfuma mu mbombo ɨjo.

Looli ʉne ngasʉʉmamo nafimo ndɨ ɨfyo ɨfi mbagiisye ʉkʉpeeligwa. Kangɨ ndikʉbasimbɨla ʉkʉtɨ mumbepo ɨfyo. Kʉmyangʉ paakipo ʉkʉfwa, ʉkʉkɨnda ʉmundʉ ʉkʉʉsigɨla ʉkwituufya ʉkʉlʉmbɨlɨla ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu kɨsita kʉhombigwa.

Ʉne ngabagɨsya ʉkwituufya kʉnongwa jaa kʉlʉmbɨlɨla ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu, namanga ɨjo jo mbombo ɨjɨ mpaka njɨbombe, paapo Kyala aandagiile ʉkʉjɨbomba. Kangɨ ahɨɨli kʉmyangʉ, lɨnga ndikʉlʉmbɨlɨla ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu ɨjo!
Lɨnga naabombaga ɨmbombo ɨjɨ kʉ bwigane bwangʉ, ngalɨ ngʉsʉʉbɨla ɨfya kʉhombigwa. Looli lɨnga jo Kyala ʉjʉ ambeele ɨmbombo ɨjɨ kʉ bwigane bwake, bʉkaja bwigane bwangʉ,
po ɨfihombigwa fyangʉ fyo filɨkʉ? Ɨfihombigwa fyangʉ ko kʉbapa abandʉ ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu kɨsita kʉhombigwa, kɨsita kʉmela ɨfi mbagiisye ʉkʉpeeligwa, kʉnongwa jaa mbombo ɨjɨ.
Ʉne ngaja ntʉmwa gwa mundʉ, ndɨ mwabʉke, looli niibɨɨkile ʉkʉja ntʉmwa gwa bandʉ boosa, ʉkʉtɨ mbatwale abandʉ abingi kwa Kɨlɨsiti.

Kʉ Bajuuta naabombaga ʉlwa Bajuuta, ʉkʉtɨ mbatwale aBajuuta kwa Kɨlɨsiti. Kʉlɨ bala bikʉsikonga ɨndagɨlo syabo, naalɨ bo ʉlwa aba bikʉsikonga, nalɨnga ngaja ntʉmwa gwa ndagɨlo syabo, ʉkʉtɨ mbatwale aba bikʉsikonga ɨndagɨlo ɨsyo kwa Kɨlɨsiti.

Kangɨ kʉlɨ bala bakasimanya ɨndagɨlo sya Bajuuta, naalɨ bo ʉlwa mundʉ ʉjʉ akasimanya ɨndagɨlo ɨsyo, ʉkʉtɨ mbatwale kwa Kɨlɨsiti. Sitikʉnangɨsya ʉkʉtɨ ngaja nɨ ndagɨlo nkyeni mwa Kyala, looli ndɨ nasyo paapo ngʉsikonga ɨndagɨlo sya Kɨlɨsiti.
Kʉ bandʉ aboonywa, niibɨɨkile ʉkʉja moonywa, ʉkʉtɨ mbatwale kwa Kɨlɨsiti. Kʉ bandʉ boosa niipelile ʉkʉja mwinaabo, ʉkʉtɨ kʉ njɨla syosa mbapoke bamo.
Ngʉbomba ɨsi syosa kʉnongwa jaa Ndʉmi ɨNunu, ʉkʉtɨ nje ndɨɨlanisi na bangɨ ɨsajo syake.
Abandʉ bo bikʉtolana ʉkʉbopa ʉlʉbɨlo, boosa bikʉbopa. Bʉle, mukamanya ʉkʉtɨ jʉmojwene jo ʉjʉ ikʉtola? Lɨɨlɨno mubopege fiijo ʉkʉtɨ mutole.

Aba bikʉtolana mu ngino, bikwitiima fiijo nʉ kwitendekesya ɨmibɨlɨ gyabo, ʉkʉtɨ batole. Ʉjʉ ikʉtola, ikwambɨlɨla ɨngɨga ɨjɨ jikoonangɨka. Looli ʉswe tukʉbomba bo ʉlo, ʉkʉtɨ twambɨlɨle ɨngɨga ɨjɨ jɨtikoonangɨka sikʉ.
Bʉbʉʉbo na niine ndikʉbopa bo ʉlwa mundʉ ʉjʉ ikʉbopa kɨsita nyango, kangɨ ndikʉlwa bo ʉlwa mundʉ ʉjʉ ikʉkoma itolo ɨkɨbuli mu mpaalanga.
Looli ngʉgʉtaamya nʉ kʉgwisibɨsya ʉmbɨlɨ gwangʉ ʉkwitiima, ʉkʉtɨ bo mbalʉmbɨliile abandʉ abangɨ ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu, ndɨngiisa kʉkaanigwa na Kyala.
Baamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko, ngiigana ʉkʉtɨ mulɨngasyagania ɨsya biisʉkʉlʉ bɨɨtʉ bo bikwenda ndʉngalangala, ʉkʉtɨ boosa baalongosigwaga ni ibɨngo, kangɨ boosa baalyendile pakatɨ pa Nyanja ɨNgeseefu.
Ʉkʉlongosigwa ni ibɨngo, nʉ kwenda mu nyanja, kʉmyabo kwalɨ bo ʉkoosigwa, ʉkʉja baa kʉnkonga Moose.
Akabalɨlo kala, boosa baalyaga ɨfindʉ ɨfya lʉko lʉmolwene, ɨfi fyafumile kwa Kyala.
Kangɨ boosa baanwaga amɨɨsi agaa lʉko lʉmolwene, aga gaafumile kwa Kyala. Baanwaga amɨɨsi ʉkʉfuma ndwalabwe ʉlʉ lwafumile kwa Kyala.
Ʉlwalabwe ʉlo lwalongosaniaga nabo, paapo ʉlwalabwe ʉlo, aalɨ jo Kɨlɨsiti jʉʉjo.
Looli bingi ndɨ abo baalɨnkaleesye Kyala, po leelo Kyala aabapyutile, nʉ kʉgɨbalania ɨmifimba gyabo ndʉngalangala.
Ɨnongwa ɨsi sya kʉkeetelamo kʉmyɨtʉ ʉkʉtʉsoka, tʉlɨngiisa kʉnyonywa ɨmbiibi, bo abeene muno baanyonywelaga.

Mulɨngiipuutaga kʉ tʉndʉ ʉtʉ akaja jo Kyala, bo ʉlʉ bamo pakatɨ pamyabo baabombaga. Bo muno sisimbiigwe mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo ʉkʉtɨ, “Abandʉ baatʉʉgeele ʉkʉlya nʉ kʉnwa, piitaasi balɨnkʉmoga ɨmogo sya bʉlogwe.”
Kangɨ tʉlɨngalogwaga bo ʉlʉ abangɨ pakatɨ pamyabo baalogilwe, balɨnkʉgogigwa abandʉ 23,000 kwi isikʉ lɨmo.
Kangɨ tʉlɨnganngelaga Kɨlɨsiti, bo ʉlʉ bamo pakatɨ pamyabo baalɨnngelile, balɨnkʉlʉmigwa nɨ njoka, balɨnkʉfwa.
Kangɨ mulɨngiibuneesyaga bo ʉlʉ abangɨ pakatɨ pamyabo baaliibuneesiisye, balɨnkʉgogigwa nʉ gwandʉmi ʉjʉ aapyutaga.
Po syosa ɨsi syabaagile abeene, syasimbiigwe ʉkʉja sya kʉkeetelamo, ʉkʉtʉsoka ʉswe twe baa mmasikʉ aga agaa kʉmmalɨɨkɨsyo.
Po ʉjʉ ikwibona ʉkʉtɨ ɨɨmile kanunu, iikeetege alɨngiisa kʉgwa!

Ɨngelo ɨsi sibaagile, silɨ bo ɨsi bikʉgeligwa abandʉ abangɨ kʉkʉtɨ isikʉ. Kyala jo gwa bwanalooli, atikʉbaleka ʉkʉtɨ mugeligwe ʉkʉkɨnda amaka gɨɨnu. Looli bo mukʉgeligwa, ikʉbapapo ɨnjɨla ɨjaa kʉsookelamo, ʉkʉtɨ muje na maka agaa kʉʉmɨɨlɨla.
Po leelo bakʉndwe, mwepʉkege ʉkwipuuta kʉ tʉndʉ ʉtʉ akaja jo Kyala!
Ngʉjoba bo ʉlo kʉmyɨnu, mwe mulɨ na mahala, mwinogone kanunu ɨsi ngʉjoba.

Bo tukʉgwa ʉlʉpi kwa Kyala kʉ kɨkombe ɨkɨ tukʉnwela pa Findʉ ɨFiikemo, bʉle tʉtikʉja nʉ bʉlɨɨlanisi na Kɨlɨsiti mwi ilopa lyake? Kangɨ bo tukʉmenya ɨkɨsyesye nʉ kʉlya, bʉle tʉtikʉja nʉ bʉlɨɨlanisi mu mbɨlɨ gwa Kɨlɨsiti?
Kʉlɨ nɨ kɨsyesye kɨmokyene itolo. Nalɨnga ʉswe tʉlɨ bingi, looli tʉlɨ mbɨlɨ gʉmogwene, paapo tʉlɨ nʉ bʉlɨɨlanisi nkɨsyesye ɨkɨ kɨmokyene.
Namukeete ɨnyiiho ɨsya Banyaisilaɨli abaa ijolo. Aba baalyaga iikemo ɨlɨ basoosiisye pa kɨgemo, baalɨ nʉ bʉlɨɨlanisi na Kyala.
Po ngʉlonda ʉkʉjoba lɨlɨkʉ? Bʉle, ʉtʉndʉ ʉtʉ abandʉ abaa kʉmyɨnu bikʉsoosya kʉ fifwani, tʉlɨ nɨ mbombo jojoosa? Bʉle, ɨfifwani ɨfyo filɨ nʉ bʉʉmi?
Hɨmma! Ɨsi ngʉjoba syo ɨsi, ʉkʉtɨ iikemo ɨlɨ bikʉsoosya abapanja, batikʉnsookesya Kyala, looli bikʉsoosya kʉ mbepo ɨnyali. Ʉne ngiigana ʉmwe ʉkʉja nʉ bʉlɨɨlanisi nɨ mbepo ɨnyali.
Mukabagɨla ʉkʉnwa nkɨkombe ɨkya Findʉ ɨFiikemo, kangɨ ʉkʉnwa nkɨkombe ɨkya mbepo ɨnyali. Bʉbʉʉbo mukabagɨla ʉkʉlya ɨFindʉ ɨFiikemo, po kangɨ ʉkʉlya ɨfindʉ ɨfya mbepo ɨnyali.
Baatɨ, tukʉlonda ʉkʉnkalasya Kyala? Bʉle, tʉlɨ na maka ʉkʉkɨnda amaka gaake?

Bamo pakatɨ pamyɨnu bikʉtɨ, “Tʉlɨ baabʉke ʉkʉbomba syosa ɨsi tukʉlonda,” leelo ʉne ngʉtɨ, sikaja syosa ɨsi silɨ nɨ fya kʉkabamo abiitɨki biinɨɨnu. Nalɨnga bikʉtɨ, “Tʉlɨ baabʉke ʉkʉbomba syosa ɨsi tukʉlonda,” leelo ʉne ngʉtɨ, sikaja syosa ɨsi sikʉbakasya abiitɨki biinɨɨnu.
Kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ alɨngasilondaga ɨsi sikʉntʉʉla mwene, looli asipaasyege ɨsi sikʉbatʉʉla abiinaake.
Ɨnyama ɨsi bikʉʉlɨsya mu sokoni, mulyege kɨsita kʉlaalʉʉsya laalʉʉsya ʉkʉtɨ sifumile kʉʉgʉ. Ɨnyama ɨsyo silɨngabataamyaga mu ndumbula syɨnu,
paapo Kalata ʉMwikemo ikʉtɨ, “Ɨfiisʉ fyosa pamopeene nʉ tʉndʉ toosa ʉtʉ tʉlimo fya Ntwa.”

Ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ akaja mwitɨki lɨnga akʉkooliile kʉkʉlya, lɨnga kʉlonda, bʉʉkaga itolo, ʉkalyege fyosa ɨfi akʉtendekekiisye. Ʉlɨngalaalʉʉsyaga laalʉʉsyaga ʉkʉtɨ fifumile kʉʉgʉ. Ɨnyama ɨsyo silɨngakʉtaamyaga mu ndumbula jaako.
Looli lɨnga ʉmundʉ ikʉkʉbʉʉla ʉkʉtɨ, “Ɨfindʉ ɨfi basoosiisye ʉkʉja ikemo kʉ fifwani,” apo somma ʉkʉlya, ʉkʉtɨ ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ akʉbʉʉlile alɨngataamigwaga, kangɨ ʉkʉtɨ ɨndumbula jɨlɨngataamigwaga.
Ndikʉtɨ ɨndumbula jaako jɨlɨngataamigwaga, looli ɨndumbula jaake ʉmwene jɨlɨngataamigwaga.
Fiki ʉbʉlongi ʉbwa mu ndumbula jaa mundʉ ʉjʉngɨ, jɨbʉpinye ʉbwabʉke bwangʉ?
Lɨnga ʉne ngʉlya ɨfindʉ ɨfyo ngʉnngwɨla ʉlʉpi Kyala, fiki ngʉlongigwa kʉnongwa jaa findʉ ɨfi nʉnngwɨliile ʉlʉpi Kyala?
Po kokoosa aka mukʉlya pamo ʉkʉnwa, pamo akangɨ kokoosa aka mukʉbomba, mubombege ʉkʉntuufya Kyala.
Mulɨngabafulasyaga abandʉ mu ndumbula, baje Bajuuta, pamo balɨngaja Bajuuta, pamo abiitɨki biinɨɨnu.
Mujege bo ʉne. Ngwijʉʉla ndɨ syosa ɨsi ngʉbomba, ʉkʉtɨ abandʉ boosa sibahobosyege. Ndikʉbomba bo ʉlo ʉkʉtɨ ʉne ngabemo, looli bakabemo abandʉ bingi, ʉkʉtɨ bapokigwe.
Mukongege akajɨɨlo kangʉ, bo apa niine ngʉkonga akajɨɨlo akaa Kɨlɨsiti.
Ngʉbatuufya paapo mukʉngʉmbʉka kʉlɨ syosa, nʉ kʉkola ɨmanyisyo ɨsi naalyambɨliile nʉ kʉbamanyisya.
Po ngʉlonda musyaganie ʉkʉtɨ ʉntʉ
gwa nnyambala jo Kɨlɨsiti, ʉntʉ gwa nkiikʉlʉ jo nnyambala, nʉ ntʉ gwa Kɨlɨsiti jo Kyala.
Nkɨpanga kya Kyala, ʉnnyambala gwesa ʉjʉ ikwikinga kʉntʉ bo ikwipuuta pamo bo ikʉkunguluka, ʉjo ikʉnsʉʉsya Kɨlɨsiti ʉjʉ jo ntʉ gwake.
Joope ʉnkiikʉlʉ ʉjʉ atikʉfwala ɨkɨtambala kʉntʉ bo ikwipuuta pamo bo ikʉkunguluka, ʉjo ikʉnsʉʉsya ʉnnyambala, ʉjʉ jo ntʉ gwake. Afwene na ʉjʉ amwile ʉlʉpʉjʉ.
Lɨnga ʉnkiikʉlʉ atikʉfwala ɨkɨtambala kʉntʉ, fikʉtɨ amwege ɨnywili syake syosa. Paapo sya soni kʉ nkiikʉlʉ ʉkʉmwa ɨnywili syosa, po kanunu ʉkʉfwala ɨkɨtambala kʉntʉ.
Sitikʉlondigwa kʉ nnyambala ʉkʉfwala kokoosa kʉntʉ, paapo ʉmwene kɨfwanikɨsyo ɨkya Kyala, kangɨ alɨ nʉ bʉsisya bwa Kyala. Looli ʉnkiikʉlʉ afwalege, paapo alɨ nʉ bʉsisya ʉbwa nnyambala.
Namanga Kyala akaalɨmpelile ʉnnyambala jʉla Atamu ʉkʉfuma kʉ nkasi Efwa, looli aalɨmpelile ʉnkiikʉlʉ jʉla ʉkʉfuma kʉ nnyambala.
Kangɨ Kyala akaalɨmpelile ʉnnyambala jʉla Atamu kʉnongwa jaa nkasi, looli aalɨmpelile ʉnkiikʉlʉ jʉla Efwa kʉnongwa jaa nnyambala.
Kʉnongwa jaa ɨsyo syosa, na kʉnongwa jaa bandʉmi, abakiikʉlʉ bikʉlondigwa ʉkʉnangɨsya ʉkʉtɨ bʉlipo ʉbʉlagɨli pamwanya pamyabo.
Looli nkyeni mu Ntwa, ʉnkiikʉlʉ ikʉnsʉʉbɨla ʉnnyambala, joope ʉnnyambala ikʉnsʉʉbɨla ʉnkiikʉlʉ,
namanga ʉnkiikʉlʉ ʉgwa kwanda aapeliigwe ʉkʉfuma kʉ nnyambala, lʉlʉʉlo joope ʉnnyambala ikʉpaapigwa nʉ nkiikʉlʉ. Looli syosa sikʉfuma kwa Kyala.
Po namutumule jʉjʉʉmwe. Bʉle, kanunu ʉnkiikʉlʉ ʉkwipuuta kɨsita kʉfwala ɨkɨtambala kʉntʉ?
Bʉle, syope nɨ nyiiho ɨsya bandʉ sitikʉnangɨsya ʉkʉtɨ, lɨnga ʉnnyambala alɨ nɨ nywili ɨndali, sya soni kʉmyake?
Nʉ kʉtɨ ʉnkiikʉlʉ lɨnga alɨ nɨ nywili ɨndali,
bʉle, sitikʉtwala ʉbʉsisya kʉmyake? Silɨ bo ʉlo paapo apeeliigwe ɨnywili ɨndali ʉkʉja bo ʉlwa kɨtambala ɨkya kwikinga kʉntʉ.
Looli lɨnga ʉmundʉ ikʉkaanika ɨnongwa ɨsya kwikinga kʉntʉ, ʉswe nɨ fipanga ɨfya Kyala tʉkaja nʉ lwiho ʉlʉngɨ.
Po ndɨ nasyo ɨsingi ɨsya kʉbalagɨla. Ndɨ ɨsi ndikʉbatuufya, namanga ɨngomaano syɨnu, sitikʉtwala ɨfya kʉkabamo.
Akaa kwanda, mbɨliike ʉkʉtɨ bo mubʉngeene nkɨpanga kya Kyala, mukʉtapʉkana. Ɨsi mbɨliike, simo ngʉsiitɨka.
Bʉle, mukwinogona ʉkʉtɨ mpaka mutapʉkane? Bʉle, mukʉlonda bamanyigwe aba bikwibona ʉkʉtɨ babagiisye nkyeni mwa Kyala?
Keeta, bo mubʉngeene, ɨfi mukʉlya fikaja Findʉ ɨFiikemo fya Ntwa Jesu,
namanga bamo mmyɨnu bikʉlya mbɨmbɨbɨ ɨfindʉ fyabo, kɨsita kʉlya na biinaabo. Ɨlyo likʉbapela bamo ʉkʉja nɨ njala, bamo bikʉgaala.

Ɨsi sya soni! Bʉle, mukaja nɨ nyumba ɨsi mubagiile ʉkʉlɨɨlamo nʉ kʉnwa? Fiki mukʉkɨfujula ɨkɨpanga kya Kyala, nʉ kʉbakosya ɨsoni aba bakaja nafyo nafimo? Bʉle, mbabʉʉle silɨkʉ? Mbatuufye? Hɨmma! Kʉ nongwa ɨsi ndikʉbatuufya.
Ɨmanyisyo ɨsi naalyambɨliile kʉ Ntwa syo ɨsi naabamanyiisye ʉmwe. Naababʉʉlile ʉkʉtɨ, pakɨlo kɨla ɨkɨ baalɨnndɨɨliile ʉNtwa Jesu, alɨnkwega ɨkɨsyesye,
alɨnkʉgwa ʉlʉpi kwa Kyala, alɨnkʉkɨmenya, alɨnkʉtɨ, “Ʉgʉ go mbɨlɨ gwangʉ, ʉgʉ gʉningiigwe kʉnongwa jɨɨnu. Mubombege bo ʉlʉ ʉkʉngʉmbʉka ʉne.”
Kangɨ bo baliile ɨfindʉ, Jesu alɨnkwega ɨkɨkombe ɨkya finga,
alɨnkʉtɨ, “Ɨkɨkombe ɨkɨ ɨkya finga lo lwitɨkano ʉlʉpya mwi ilopa lyangʉ.
Bwila bo mukʉnwa, mubombege ʉkʉngʉmbʉka ʉne.”
Po bo mukʉlya ɨkɨsyesye ɨkyo, nʉ kʉnwa ɨkɨkombe ɨkyo, mukʉfumusya ʉkʉfwa kwa Ntwa mpaka akabalɨlo aka aikwisa.
Ʉmundʉ gwesa ʉjʉ ikʉlya ɨkɨsyesye ɨkya Ntwa nʉ kʉnwa ɨfinga ɨjo kɨsita lwɨmɨko, ikʉtʉla ɨnongwa, namanga agwileemwe ʉmbɨlɨ ni ilopa lya Ntwa.
Po leelo ʉmundʉ iijeeneesyege taasi jʉʉjo, po alyege ɨkɨsyesye ɨkyo nʉ kʉnwa ɨfinga ɨjo,
namanga ʉmundʉ lɨnga ikʉlya ɨkɨsyesye nʉ kʉnwa ɨfinga kɨsita kʉmanya ʉkʉtɨ mbɨlɨ gwa Ntwa,
ʉjo ikwibɨɨka mbʉlongi bwa Kyala.
Fyobeene balipo bingi pakatɨ pamyɨnu aba boonywa na babine, kangɨ bamo bafwile.
Lɨnga twijeeneesiisye jʉjʉʉswe taasi, bo tʉkaalɨ ʉkʉlya, ngalɨ tʉtikʉlongigwa.
Looli lɨnga tukʉlongigwa nʉ Ntwa, apo tukʉmanyisigwa ʉkʉtɨ tʉlɨngiisa kʉlongigwa, bo ʉlʉ bikʉlongigwa abandʉ aba bakammanya Kyala.
Po leelo baamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko, bo mubʉngeene pakʉlya, muguulɨlanege.
Lɨnga ʉmundʉ alɨ nɨ njala, alyege kʉkaaja kaake, ʉkʉtɨ ʉkʉbʉngaana kwɨnu kʉlɨngabapelelaga ʉkʉlongigwa. Kangɨ bo ngwisa, angʉsitendekesya kanunu ɨsi sisyele.
Po baamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko, ngiigana ʉkʉtɨ mulɨngasyagania ɨsya fikʉngɨlwa ɨfya Mbepo Mwikemo.
Mumeenye ʉkʉtɨ bo mulɨ bapanja, mwasyobigwaga nʉ kʉlongosigwa kʉkwipuuta kʉ fifwani ɨfi fitikʉjoba.

Po leelo nikʉbabʉʉla nikʉtɨ, ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ ikʉlongosigwa na Mbepo gwa Kyala, akabagɨla ʉkʉjoba ʉkʉtɨ, “Jesu agunigwe.” Kangɨ ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ atikʉlongosigwa na Mbepo Mwikemo, akabagɨla ʉkʉjoba ʉkʉtɨ, “Jesu jo Ntwa.”
Ɨfikʉngɨlwa ɨfya lʉko nʉ lʉko, looli fikʉfuma kwa Mbepo jʉmojwene.
Ʉbʉbombeli kʉ Ntwa bwa lʉko nʉ lʉko, looli ʉNtwa ʉjʉ ikʉbombeligwa alɨ jʉmojwene.
Ɨmbombo sya lʉko nʉ lʉko, looli Kyala alɨ jʉmojwene, ʉjʉ ikʉtʉpela ʉswe twesa, ʉkʉbomba ɨmbombo ɨsyo syosa.
Kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ apeeliigwe ʉkʉnangɨsya pabwelu ɨmbombo ɨsya Mbepo Mwikemo, ʉkʉtɨ abandʉ boosa bakabege.
Ʉmundʉ jʉmo apeeliigwe na Mbepo amasyʉ agaa mahala, ʉjʉngɨ apeeliigwe amasyʉ agaa bʉmanyi na Mbepo jʉjʉʉjo.
Mbepo jʉjʉʉjo jʉmojwene, ikʉmpela jʉmo ʉkʉja nʉ lwitɨko, ʉjʉngɨ ikʉmpela ʉkʉja nɨ fikʉngɨlwa ɨfya kʉbʉmbʉlʉsya ababine,
ʉjʉngɨ ʉkʉbomba ɨfiika, ʉjʉngɨ ʉbʉkunguluka, ʉjʉngɨ ʉkʉsimanya ɨmbepo ɨnyali na Mbepo gwa Kyala, ʉjʉngɨ ʉkʉjoba ɨnjobelo ɨmbya, ʉjʉngɨ ʉkʉsisanusya ɨnjobelo ɨsyo.
Ɨmbombo syosa ɨsi ikʉbomba Mbepo jʉjʉʉjo, kangɨ ikʉmpapo kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ bo muno iiganiile Mbepo.
Bo muno gʉjɨɨliile ʉmbɨlɨ gwa mundʉ, mo muno gʉjɨɨliile ʉmbɨlɨ gwa Kɨlɨsiti.
Ʉmbɨlɨ kandʉ kamokeene, looli gʉlɨ nʉ tʉmbakaasya ʉtwingi. Na paapo twingi, twa mbɨlɨ gʉmogwene.
Ʉswe twesa, tʉje Bajuuta pamo aba bakaja Bajuuta, tʉje batʉmwa pamo tʉje baabʉke, twalyosiigwe na Mbepo jʉmojwene, ʉkʉtɨ tʉje mbɨlɨ gʉmogwene. Kangɨ twapeeliigwe Mbepo jʉmojwene, Mbepo gwa Kyala.
Ʉmbɨlɨ gʉtikʉja kambakaasya kamokeene, looli tʉmbakaasya twingi.
Lɨnga ɨkɨlʉndɨ kyatɨgɨ, “Paapo ʉne ngaja kɨboko, po ngaja gwa mbɨlɨ,” bʉle, ɨkɨlʉndɨ ɨkɨ ngalɨ kɨtikʉja kya mbɨlɨ?
Lɨnga ɨmbʉlʉkʉtʉ joope jaatɨgɨ, “Paapo ʉne ngaja kɨsige, po ngaja gwa mbɨlɨ,” bʉle, ɨmbʉlʉkʉtʉ ɨjɨ ngalɨ jɨtikʉja jaa mbɨlɨ?
Lɨnga ʉmbɨlɨ goosa gwalɨ kɨsige, ʉkʉpɨlɨka ngalɨ kʉlɨ bʉleebʉle? Pamo lɨnga ʉmbɨlɨ goosa gwalɨ mbʉlʉkʉtʉ, ʉkʉnuusya ngalɨ kʉlɨ bʉleebʉle?
Looli Kyala akabaatiike kʉkʉtɨ kambakaasya akaa mbɨlɨ bo muno iiganiile ʉmwene.
Lɨnga ʉmbɨlɨ gwalɨ na kambakaasya kamokeene itolo, bʉle, ngalɨ mbɨlɨ nki?
Po ʉtʉmbakaasya twingi, leelo ʉmbɨlɨ gʉlɨ gʉmogwene.
Ɨkɨsige kɨkabagɨla ʉkʉkɨbʉʉla ɨkɨboko ʉkʉtɨ, “Ʉgwe ʉkaja nʉ bʉtʉʉli nabʉmo kʉmyangʉ.” Goope ʉntʉ gʉkabagɨla ʉkagabʉʉla amalʉndɨ ʉkʉtɨ, “Ʉmwe mukaja nʉ bʉtʉʉli nabʉmo kʉmyangʉ.”
Looli ʉtʉmbakaasya ʉtwa mu mbɨlɨ ʉtʉ tukʉboneka ʉkʉja toonywa, to ʉtʉ tʉlɨ nɨ mbombo fiijo.
Kangɨ ʉtʉmbakaasya ʉtʉ tukʉboneka ʉkʉja twa kʉkosya ɨsoni, to ʉtʉ tukʉtwɨmɨka fiijo. Toope ʉtʉmbakaasya ʉtʉ tʉtikʉlondigwa ʉkʉboneka pabwelu, ʉto to ʉtʉ tukʉtʉfisa fiijo.
Kangɨ ʉtʉmbakaasya ʉtʉ tukʉboneka ʉkʉja tʉnunu, tʉtikʉtʉfisa bo ʉtʉngɨ. Looli Kyala agʉbaatiike kanunu ʉmbɨlɨ, ʉtʉmbakaasya ʉtʉ tʉtikwɨmɨkigwa, ʉmwene ikʉtwɨmɨka fiijo,
ʉkʉtɨ kʉlɨngajapo ʉkʉtapʉkana mu mbɨlɨ, looli ʉtʉmbakaasya toosa tʉtʉʉlanege.
Akambakaasya kamo lɨnga kafuleele, toosa tukʉfulala pamopeene nako. Kangɨ lɨnga akambakaasya kamo kikwɨmɨkigwa, toosa tukʉja nʉ lʉsekelo pamopeene nako.
Bo mulɨ na nuumwe, mulɨ mbɨlɨ gwa Kɨlɨsiti. Kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ kambakaasya mu mbɨlɨ ʉgo.

Po nkɨpanga kya Kyala, ababɨɨkile ʉkʉja baa kwanda abatʉmigwa, abaa bʉbɨlɨ abakunguluka, abaa bʉtatʉ abamanyisi. Po alɨnkʉbabɨɨka abapela fiika, abaa fikʉngɨlwa ɨfya kʉbʉmbʉlʉsya ababine, abaa fikʉngɨlwa ɨfya bʉtʉʉli kʉ bangɨ, ɨfya bʉlongosi, nɨ fya kʉjobela mu njobelo ɨmbya.
Bʉle, abandʉ boosa batʉmigwa? Bʉle, abandʉ boosa bakunguluka? Bʉle, abandʉ boosa bamanyisi? Bʉle, abandʉ boosa bikʉpela ɨfiika?
Bʉle, abandʉ boosa balɨ nɨ fikʉngɨlwa ɨfya kʉbʉmbʉlʉsya ababine? Bʉle, abandʉ boosa bikʉjobela mu njobelo ɨmbya? Bʉle, kangɨ abandʉ boosa bapeeliigwe ʉkʉsanusya ɨnjobelo?
Po mwijʉʉlege ʉkʉkaba ɨfikʉngɨlwa ɨfikʉlʉmba.
Ʉne ngʉbanangɨsya ɨnjɨla ɨnunu fiijo, ʉkʉkɨnda ɨnjɨla ɨsingi syosa.
Poope nalɨnga ngʉjoba ɨnjobelo syosa,
ɨsya bandʉ nɨ sya bandʉmi,
looli lɨnga ngaja nʉ lʉgano,
ngalɨ ndɨ bo ɨkyela itolo, ɨkɨ kikʉlɨla,
nʉ njwego ʉgwa ibangala.
Kangɨ nalɨnga ndɨ nɨ kɨkʉngɨlwa ɨkya bʉkunguluka,
nʉ kʉsimanya syosa ɨsya mbʉtiitʉ, na mahala goosa,
nalɨnga ndɨ nʉ lwitɨko ʉlʉnywamu
ʉlwa kʉsaamisya ɨfyamba,
looli lɨnga ngaja nʉ lʉgano,
bo ndɨ gwa itolo.
Kangɨ nalɨnga ngʉsoosya ɨkyʉma kyangʉ kyosa,
ʉkʉbapapo abalondo,
nalɨnga ngwisoosya ʉmbɨlɨ gwangʉ,
ʉkʉtɨ gʉpye mmooto,
lɨnga ngaja nʉ lʉgano,
ndikʉkabamo nafimo.
Ʉlʉgano lukʉpela ʉkʉʉmɨɨlɨla,
ʉkʉja bape, ʉkʉsita kʉja na kabini,
ʉkʉsita kwituufya, ʉkʉsita kwijumbɨka.
Ʉlʉgano lʉtikʉpela ʉkʉbiilaamwa abangɨ,
lʉtikʉpela ʉkwinogona syene ɨsyɨtʉ,
lʉtikʉpela ʉkʉkalala mbɨbɨmbɨbɨ,
nʉ kʉkʉmbʉka ɨmbiibi ɨsya bandʉ.
Ʉlʉgano lukʉpela ʉkʉsita kʉsekelela ʉbʉbiibi,
looli ʉkʉsekelela ɨsya bwanalooli.
Ʉlʉgano lukʉpela ʉkʉʉmɨɨlɨla syosa,
ʉkʉja nʉ lwitɨko akabalɨlo koosa,
ʉkʉja nʉ lʉsʉʉbɨlo akabalɨlo koosa,
nʉ kwijʉʉla ndɨ syosa.
Ʉlʉgano lʉtikʉmalɨkamo sikʉ.
Looli ʉbʉkunguluka bukʉmalɨka,
ʉkʉjoba ɨnjobelo kukʉmalɨka,
ʉbʉmanyi bukʉkɨnda.
Namanga tʉsyageenie mbʉnandɨ,
kangɨ tukʉkunguluka mbʉnandɨ.
Looli bo kwisile ʉkʉsita kwagɨlwa,
ɨsi syagiilwe sikwisa kʉmalɨka.
Bo ndɨ nkeke naajobaga ɨsya bʉkeke, amahala gaalɨ gaa bʉkeke, niinogonaga ʉlwa bʉkeke. Looli paapo ndɨ nkʉsi, ɨsya mbʉkeke nsilekile.

Namanga akabalɨlo aka tukʉfwana tukʉkeetela nkɨkeetelo ndʉfunienie, looli akabalɨlo aka kikwisa tukwisa kʉfibona na maaso muno fijɨɨliile. Akabalɨlo aka tʉsyageenie mbʉnandɨ. Looli akabalɨlo aka kikwisa, tukwisa kʉsyagania loosa, bo muno Kyala atʉmanyiile ʉswe.
Po fitatʉ ɨfi aafitikʉmalɨka sikʉ, ʉlwitɨko, ʉlʉsʉʉbɨlo nʉ lʉgano. Looli ndɨ ɨfyo, ʉlʉgano lo lʉkʉlʉmba.
Mwijʉʉlege ʉkʉja nʉ lʉgano pakatɨ pamyɨnu, kangɨ mwijʉʉlege ʉkʉfilonda ɨfikʉngɨlwa ɨfya Mbepo Mwikemo, fiijo ɨkɨkʉngɨlwa ɨkya bʉkunguluka.
Ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ ikʉjoba ɨnjobelo ɨmbya, atikʉjoba na bandʉ, looli ikʉjoba na Kyala. Ɨsi ikʉjoba akajapo ʉjʉ ikʉsyagania. Ʉmwene ikʉjoba ɨsya mbʉtiitʉ, kʉ maka agaa Mbepo gwa Kyala.
Looli ʉjʉ ikʉjoba ɨsya bʉkunguluka, ikʉjoba ɨsya kʉbajenga abiitɨki ndwitɨko, ɨsya kʉbakasya nʉ kʉbasʉʉbɨsya.
Ʉjʉ ikʉjoba ɨnjobelo ɨmbya, ikwikasya jʉʉjo, looli ʉjʉ ikʉkunguluka ikʉkɨkasya ndwitɨko ɨkɨpanga kya Kyala.

Ʉne niiganile ʉmwe mwesa mujobege ɨnjobelo ɨmbya, looli fiijo niiganile mukungulukege. Namanga ɨkɨkʉngɨlwa ɨkya bʉkunguluka kɨkʉlʉmba ʉkʉkɨnda ɨkya kʉjoba ɨnjobelo ɨmbya, kɨsita kʉsanusya. Kanunu asanusye ʉkʉtɨ akɨkasye ɨkɨpanga kya Kyala ndwitɨko.

Baamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko, bʉle, lɨnga niisile kʉmyɨnu nʉ kʉjoba ɨnjobelo ɨmbya, mukʉkabamo ɨfiki? Mutikʉkabamo nafimo. Looli lɨnga ngʉbalɨngaania ɨsi Kyala aasetʉliile, pamo lɨnga ngʉjoba ɨsya bʉmanyi, pamo ngʉkunguluka, pamo lɨnga ngʉmanyisya, apo mukʉkabamo.
Bo silɨ na kʉ tʉndʉ ʉtʉsita bʉʉmi, ɨfi fikʉlɨla bo fikʉkʉbigwa, gaje malonge, fije fisango. Lɨnga fikʉlɨla kɨsita lʉbaatɨko, ʉmundʉ abagiile ʉkʉmanya bʉleebʉle ʉkʉtɨ lwɨmbo nki?
Kangɨ lɨnga ɨngangabwite jikʉlɨla iisyʉ ɨlɨ lɨtikʉmanyigwa na bandʉ, jo jwani ʉjʉ abagiile ʉkwitendekesya kʉ bwite?
Bo silɨ kʉmyɨnu. Lɨnga mukʉjoba ɨsi sitikʉmanyigwa, jo jwani abagiile ʉkʉsyagania ɨsi mukʉjoba? Ɨsi mukʉjoba sikʉkula nʉ mbelo!
Pakiisʉ silipo ɨnjobelo nyingi, looli jɨkajako najɨmo ɨjɨ jɨkaja nɨ mbombo.
Po lɨnga ngajɨmanya ɨnjobelo ɨjɨ ikʉjoba ʉjʉngɨ, ikʉja ngatɨ nheesya kʉmyangʉ, kangɨ ngʉja ngatɨ nheesya kʉmyake.
Silɨ bo ʉlo kʉmyɨnu. Mwiganile fiijo ʉkʉja nɨ fikʉngɨlwa ɨfya Mbepo Mwikemo, po mwijʉʉlege fiijo ʉkʉkaba ɨfikʉngɨlwa ɨfi fikʉkɨjenga ɨkɨpanga kya Kyala.
Kʉnongwa ɨjo ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ ikʉjoba ɨnjobelo ɨmbya, ansʉʉme Kyala ʉkʉtɨ antʉʉle ʉkʉsanusya.
Namanga lɨnga ngwipuuta mu njobelo ɨmbya, ɨndumbula jangʉ jo ɨjɨ jikwipuuta, looli amahala gangʉ gatikʉkaba nafimo.
Po ngʉlondigwa ʉkʉbomba ɨfiki? Ngwipuutaga mu njobelo ɨmbya mwa Mbepo Mwikemo, kangɨ ngwipuutaga na kʉ mahala gangʉ. Ngwɨmbaga mu njobelo ɨmbya mwa Mbepo Mwikemo, kangɨ ngwɨmbaga na kʉ mahala gangʉ.
Lɨnga kʉntuufya Kyala mu njobelo ɨmbya, ʉmundʉ ʉjʉngɨ ʉjʉ akaja nɨ kɨkʉngɨlwa ɨkya kʉsimanya ɨnjobelo ɨmbya, ikʉjobaga bʉleebʉle ʉkʉtɨ, “Ameni,” kʉ masyʉ aga akagaagania?
Kʉmyako kʉntuufya Kyala nalooli, looli abangɨ bala sitikʉbakasya ndwitɨko.
Ngʉgwa ʉlʉpi kwa Kyala paapo ngʉjoba mu njobelo ɨmbya ʉkʉbakɨnda ʉmwe mwesa.
Looli nkɨpanga kya Kyala niiganile fiijo ʉkʉjoba amasyʉ mahaano aga abandʉ babagiile ʉkʉsyagania, ʉkʉtɨ mbamanyisye abangɨ. Ɨlyo lyo inunu ʉkʉkɨnda ʉkʉjoba amasyʉ 10,000 mu njobelo ɨmbya.
Baamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko, mulɨngiinogonaga bo ʉlwa bakeke. Kʉ mbiibi mujege bo ʉlwa bakeke muno bajɨɨliile, looli mwinogonege bo ʉlwa bandʉ abakʉsi.
Mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo sisimbiigwe ʉkʉtɨ,
“Nalooli kʉ njɨla ɨjaa baheesya abaa mbʉtali,
aba bikʉjoba ɨnjobelo ɨheesya,
ngwisa kʉjoba na bandʉ aba,
poope batikwisa kʉmbɨlɨkɨsya,”
ikʉjoba ʉNtwa Kyala.
Po ʉkʉjoba ɨnjobelo ɨmbya, kɨmanyilo kʉlɨ aba bakaja biitɨki, komma kʉ biitɨki. Looli ɨkɨkʉngɨlwa ɨkya bʉkunguluka kɨmanyilo kʉ biitɨki, kɨkaja kya aba bakaja biitɨki.
Mu ngomaano syɨnu ɨsya nkɨpanga kya Kyala, lɨnga ʉmwe mwesa mwandile ʉkʉjoba mu njobelo ɨmbya, po bikwingɨla abaheesya pamo aba bakaja biitɨki, bʉle, batikʉtɨgɨ mulɨ nɨ mbepo?
Looli lɨnga mwesa mukʉkunguluka, po ikwisa ʉmundʉ ʉnheesya pamo ʉjʉ akaja mwitɨki, ikwimanya ʉkʉtɨ ntʉlanongwa, ikʉlongigwa na syosa ɨsi ikʉpɨlɨka.
Ɨsi silɨ mu ndumbula jaake sikʉja pabwelu, po ikʉfugama nʉ kʉntuufya Kyala, ikʉjoba ikʉtɨ, “Nalooli Kyala alɨ pamopeene na nuumwe!”

Po baamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko, tʉjobe ɨfiki? Bo mubʉngeene pakwipuuta, jʉmo alɨ nʉ lwɨmbo, ʉjʉngɨ alɨ nɨ manyisyo, jʉmo ikʉjoba ɨsi Kyala ansetʉliile, ʉjʉngɨ ikʉjoba mu njobelo ɨmbya, jʉmo ikʉsanusya ɨnjobelo. Ɨsi syosa sibombigwege kʉ nyango ɨjaa kʉkɨkasya ɨkɨpanga kya Kyala.
Lɨnga balipo aba bikʉjoba mu njobelo ɨmbya, bajobege babɨlɨ pamo batatʉ, balɨngakɨndaga apo, bajobege kʉ njɨla jaa kʉguulɨlana, kangɨ ajengepo ʉgwa kʉsanusya.
Lɨnga akajapo ʉgwa kʉsanusya, po ʉjʉ ikʉjoba ɨnjobelo ɨmbya aleke ʉkʉjoba nkɨpanga kya Kyala, looli ajobege mu ndumbula mwene, na kwa Kyala kwene.
Boope aba bikʉkunguluka, bakungulukege babɨlɨ pamo batatʉ, abangɨ basipɨmege ɨsi bikʉsijoba.
Lɨnga jʉmo ndɨ aba bikʉpɨlɨkɨsya, lɨmmwisiile iisyʉ ɨlya bʉsetʉli, ʉgwa kwanda amyeke.
Kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ ʉjʉ alɨ nʉ bʉkunguluka, ajege na kabalɨlo akaa kʉjoba, apo abandʉ boosa bikʉmanyisigwa nʉ kʉkasigwa.
Ʉjʉ ikʉkunguluka ikwijiisya kʉ bakunguluka abangɨ.
Namanga Kyala akaja jo Kyala ʉgwa ndapʉkano, looli jo Kyala ʉgwa lʉtengaano.
Silɨ bo ʉlʉ, abiitɨki bo babʉngeene mfipanga fya Kyala,
abakiikʉlʉ balɨngajobaga, paapo bakiitɨkɨsigwa ʉkʉjoba. Looli biijiisyege, bo muno ikʉjobela Kalata gwa Ndagɨlo.
Lɨnga bikʉlonda ʉkʉsimanya ɨnongwa simo, babalaalʉʉsyege abalʉme baabo kʉkaaja, paapo sya soni ʉnkiikʉlʉ ʉkʉjoba pabwelu nkɨpanga kya Kyala.
Bʉle, iisyʉ lya Kyala lyalyandiile kʉmyɨnu? Bʉle, iisyʉ lya Kyala lyafikile kʉmyɨnu kwene?
Lɨnga ʉmundʉ ikwibona ʉkʉtɨ alɨ nɨ kɨkʉngɨlwa ɨkya bʉkunguluka, pamo ɨkɨkʉngɨlwa ɨkɨngɨ ɨkya Mbepo Mwikemo, asyaganiege ʉkʉtɨ ɨsi ngʉbasimbɨla, lʉlagɨlo ʉlwa kʉfuma kʉ Ntwa Jesu.
Ʉjʉ ikʉsiilaamwa ɨsi, joope mummwilaamwege.
Po leelo baamyɨtʉ, mwijʉʉlege ʉkʉlonda ɨkɨkʉngɨlwa ɨkya bʉkunguluka, kangɨ mulɨngabasigɨlaga abandʉ ʉkʉjoba ɨnjobelo ɨmbya.
Looli syosa ɨsi sibombigwege kanunu, kangɨ kʉ lʉbaatɨko.
Po baamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko, ngʉlonda ʉkʉbakʉmbʉsya ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu ɨjɨ naalʉmbɨliile kʉmyɨnu, nuumwe mwajambɨliile. Ɨjo jo ɨjɨ jɨbapelile ʉkwɨma ndwitɨko ʉlʉ mulɨ nalo.
Nalooli ʉkwendela mu Ndʉmi ɨNunu ɨjɨ naabalʉmbɨliile, mukʉpokigwa, lɨnga mukʉjɨkola kanunu. Looli lɨnga mukajɨkola, ʉlwitɨko lwɨnu bo lwa itolo.
Ʉne naabamanyiisye ɨmanyisyo ɨngʉlʉmba ɨsi naalyambɨliile ɨsya kʉtɨ, Kɨlɨsiti aafwile ʉkʉtɨ abʉsoosyepo ʉbʉtʉlanongwa bwɨtʉ, bo muno sisimbiigwe mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo.
Nʉ kʉtɨ aasyɨliigwe, iisikʉ lya bʉtatʉ aasyʉkile, bo muno sisimbiigwe mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo.
Nʉ kʉtɨ aalɨnsetʉkiile Peeteli, po alɨnkʉbasetʉkɨla abatʉmigwa baake kalongo na babɨlɨ.
Piitaasi alɨnkʉbasetʉkɨla abiitɨki ɨmia ihaano aba baalɨ pamopeene. Bingi ndɨ abo na ʉlʉ bakaalɨ bʉʉmi, bamo bafwile.
Po alɨnkʉnsetʉkɨla Jaakobo, kangɨ alɨnkʉbasetʉkɨla abatʉmigwa boosa.
Po kʉmmalɨɨkɨsyo alɨnkʉʉsetʉkɨla ʉne, ne ndɨ bo ʉlwa mwana ʉjʉ apaapiigwe pakabalɨlo aka kakaja kookaako.
Ʉne ndɨ gwa paasi mbatʉmigwa, ngabagɨsya nʉ kʉjobigwa ʉkʉja ntʉmigwa, paapo kʉbwandɨlo naakɨfwɨmaga ɨkɨpanga kya Kyala.

Looli ɨliipyana lya Kyala lyo ɨlɨ lɨmbelile ʉne ʉkʉja ntʉmigwa. Kangɨ iipyana lyake kʉmyangʉ lɨkaalɨ lya itolo, namanga mbombile ɨmbombo ʉkʉbakɨnda abatʉmigwa abangɨ boosa. Ngabomba ɨsyo kʉ maka gangʉ, looli kwi ipyana lyake ɨlɨ lɨlɨ pamopeene na niine.
Po leelo lɨnga jo ʉne ne naabalʉmbɨliile, pamo abatʉmigwa abangɨ bala, tukʉlʉmbɨlɨla ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu jɨlajɨla, kangɨ jo ɨjɨ mujiitiike.
Po ʉswe tukʉlʉmbɨlɨla ʉkʉtɨ Kɨlɨsiti aasyʉkile ʉkʉfuma mbafwe. Silɨ bʉleebʉle bamo pakatɨ pamyɨnu bikʉtɨ kʉkajako ʉkʉsyʉka abafwe?
Lɨnga kʉkaaliko ʉkʉsyʉka abafwe, po Kɨlɨsiti joope akaasyʉkile.
Kangɨ lɨnga Kɨlɨsiti akaasyʉkile, po ʉkʉlʉmbɨlɨla kwɨtʉ ngalɨ kwa itolo, nʉ lwitɨko lwɨnu ngalɨ lwa itolo.

Ʉkongelapo palɨ ɨsyo, ʉswe ngalɨ tukʉboneka ʉkʉja bakeeti baa bʉtʉngʉlʉ baa ɨsi abombile Kyala, namanga tukʉsisimɨkɨsya ʉkʉtɨ Kyala aalɨnsyʉsiisye Kɨlɨsiti mbafwe. Lɨnga ʉkʉsyʉka kwa bafwe kʉkajako, po Kɨlɨsiti akaasyʉkile.
Lɨnga abafwe batikʉsyʉsigwa, po joope Kɨlɨsiti akaasyʉkile.
Lɨnga Kɨlɨsiti akaasyʉkile, po mukakabamo nafimo ʉkʉmmwitɨka Kɨlɨsiti, looli bo mukaalɨ musyele mbʉtʉlanongwa bwɨnu.
Na aba bafwile bo bammwitiike Kɨlɨsiti, basobile loosa.
Lɨnga ʉlʉsʉʉbɨlo lwɨtʉ kwa Kɨlɨsiti lukʉmalɨkɨla pakabalɨlo akaa kʉfwa, apo ngalɨ tʉlɨ bandʉ baa kʉpeleligwa ɨkɨsa ʉkʉkɨnda abandʉ boosa.
Looli ʉbwanalooli bo ʉbʉ, Kɨlɨsiti aasyʉkile ʉkʉfuma mbafwe, jo gwa kwanda ʉkʉsyʉka, ʉkʉtɨ aba bafwile boope bikwisa kʉsyʉka.
Bo ʉlʉ ʉbʉfwe bwaliisile kʉ njɨla jaa mundʉ jʉmo, bʉbʉʉbo koope ʉkʉsyʉka mbafwe kwaliisile kʉ njɨla jaa mundʉ ʉjʉngɨ.
Lɨnga abandʉ boosa bikʉfwa paapo baa ndʉjungu lwa Atamu, bʉbʉʉbo abandʉ boosa bikwisa kʉsyʉka kʉnongwa jaa Kɨlɨsiti.
Po kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ ikwisa kʉsyʉsigwa pakabalɨlo aka aakabɨɨkile Kyala. Kɨlɨsiti jo ʉjʉ aatalile ʉkʉsyʉka, piitaasi bikwisa kʉsyʉsigwa abandʉ baake, bo ikwisa.
Apo po gukwisa ʉmmalɨɨkɨsyo ʉgwa fyosa, po Kɨlɨsiti ikwisa kʉmpa Taata Kyala ʉbʉtwa bwake, bo Kɨlɨsiti apyutile ʉbʉlagɨli boosa nʉ bʉkʉlʉmba boosa na maka goosa.
Fikʉtɨ Kɨlɨsiti ajege Ndagɨli gwa pakiisʉ, mpaka Kyala abatole nʉ kʉbabɨɨka abalʉgʉ baake paasi, pa malʉndɨ gaake.
Ʉndʉgʉ ʉgwa kʉmmalɨɨkɨsyo ʉkʉpyutigwa, jo bʉfwe.
Namanga Kalata ʉMwikemo ikʉtɨ, “Atʉbɨɨkile ʉtʉndʉ toosa paasi pa malʉndɨ gaake.”
Kalata ʉMwikemo apa ikʉtɨ, “Ʉtʉndʉ toosa,” kʉkaja kokʉtɨ joope Kyala aikʉjamo ntʉndʉ ʉto, paapo ʉmwene jo ʉjʉ abɨɨkile toosa ʉto mbʉlagɨli ʉbwa Kɨlɨsiti.
Po ʉtʉndʉ toosa bo tʉbɨɨkiigwe mbʉlagɨli ʉbwa Mwanaake,
po joope ʉMwana ikwisa kwibɨɨka mbʉlagɨli ʉbwa Gwise, ʉjʉ abɨɨkile ʉtʉndʉ toosa mbʉlagɨli ʉbwa Mwanaake, ʉkʉtɨ Kyala ajege Ndagɨli gwa fyosa.
Po aba bikoosigwa kʉnongwa jaa bandʉ aba bafwile bikʉsʉʉbɨla ɨfiki? Lɨnga abafwe batikʉsyʉka sikʉ, fiki abandʉ abo bikoosigwa kʉnongwa jaa bafwe?
Fiki na nuuswe tukwibɨɨka mbʉtolwe kʉkʉtɨ isikʉ?
Kʉkʉtɨ isikʉ ʉne ndɨ mbʉtolwe ʉbwa kʉgogigwa. Baamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko, ʉko ko kwituufya kwangʉ kʉnongwa jɨɨnu, ʉkʉ ndɨ nako mwa Kɨlɨsiti Jesu ʉNtwa gwɨtʉ.
Lɨnga kʉkajako ʉkʉsyʉka, naakabilemo ɨfiki ʉkʉlwa na bala abaa kʉ Efesi, aba balɨ bo ʉlwa finyamaana ɨfikalɨ? Lɨnga kʉkajako ʉkʉsyʉka, po,
“Tʉlyege, tʉnwege,
kɨlaabo tukʉfwa.”
Mulɨngiisyobaga! “Abamanyaani ababiibi, bikoonanga akajɨɨlo akanunu.”
Mujege na mahala, mwinogonege kanunu! Muleke ʉkʉtʉla ɨnongwa! Bamo pakatɨ pamyɨnu bakammanya Kyala. Ngʉjoba ɨsyo ʉkʉtɨ sibakole ɨsoni.
Po ʉmundʉ abagiile ʉkʉlaalʉʉsya ʉkʉtɨ, “Abafwe bikwisa kʉsyʉsigwa bʉleebʉle? Bikwisa kʉja nɨ mibɨlɨ ɨgɨ gɨlɨ bʉleebʉle?”
Ɨsyo nyiinogono ɨsya nkonyofu! Keeta, lɨnga ʉbyele ɨmbeju, jɨkabagɨla ʉkʉmela kɨsita kʉfwa.
Ɨjɨ kʉbyala mbeju itolo, jɨje jaa nganu pamo ʉlʉko ʉlʉngɨ, ʉtikʉbyala ɨfi fimelile.
Looli Kyala ikʉjɨpapo ɨmbeju ɨjo ʉmbɨlɨ ʉgʉngɨ, ʉgʉ agʉganile ʉmwene. Kʉkʉtɨ mbeju ikʉjɨpa ʉmbɨlɨ gwake.
Ɨfipeligwa fyosa filɨ nɨ mibɨlɨ, leelo ɨmibɨlɨ ɨgyo gɨkafwana. Ɨmibɨlɨ ɨgya bandʉ gɨlɨ lwake, ɨgya finyamaana gɨlɨ lwake, ɨnjʉni gɨlɨ lwake, nɨ ɨswɨ gɨlɨ lwake.
Kangɨ gɨlipo ɨmibɨlɨ gya tʉndʉ ʉtwa kʉmwanya, nɨ mibɨlɨ gya tʉndʉ twa nkiisʉ. Ʉbʉnunu ʉbwa mibɨlɨ gya tʉndʉ ʉtwa kʉmwanya bʉlɨ lwake, nʉ bʉnunu ʉbwa mibɨlɨ gya tʉndʉ twa nkiisʉ bʉlɨ lwake.
Ʉbʉnunu ʉbwa isʉba bʉlɨ lwake, ʉbʉnunu ʉbwa mwesi nʉ bwa ndondwa bʉlɨ lwake. Syope ɨndondwa silegeene ʉbʉnunu.
Mo muno aasikʉjɨɨla bo abafwe bikʉsyʉka. Gukʉsyɨligwa ʉmbɨlɨ ʉgʉ gukʉbola bo ʉlwa kʉbyala ɨmbeju, po gukʉsyʉsigwa ʉmbɨlɨ ʉgʉ gukʉjako bwila na bwila.
Ʉmbɨlɨ bo gukʉsyɨligwa gʉkaja nʉ bʉsisya, looli bo gukʉsyʉsigwa gukʉja nʉ bʉsisya. Bo gukʉsyɨligwa gukʉja nʉ boonywa, looli bo gukʉsyʉsigwa gukʉja na maka.

Ɨmibɨlɨ ɨgɨ tʉlɨ nagyo bo tʉkaalɨ ʉkʉfwa, mibɨlɨ gya pakiisʉ, looli ɨmibɨlɨ gyɨtʉ bo gikʉsyʉsigwa, gikwisa kʉja mibɨlɨ ɨmipya ɨgɨ gikʉpeligwa na Mbepo Mwikemo. Paapo gɨlipo ɨmibɨlɨ ɨgya pakiisʉ, kangɨ gɨlipo ɨmibɨlɨ ɨmipya, ɨgɨ Mbepo Mwikemo ikʉgɨpela.
Mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo sisimbiigwe ʉkʉtɨ, “Ʉmundʉ ʉgwa kwanda Atamu, aapeliigwe, alɨnkʉja mundʉ ʉmʉʉmi.”
Looli Atamu ʉgwa bʉmalɨɨkɨsyo ʉjʉ jo Kɨlɨsiti, jo Mbepo ʉjʉ ikʉbapa abandʉ ɨmibɨlɨ ɨmipya ɨgya bwila na bwila.
Ɨmibɨlɨ ɨgɨ gikwisa kʉpeligwa na Mbepo Mwikemo, gɨkaja bo ʉlwa mibɨlɨ ɨgya kwanda. Looli gyalɨ mibɨlɨ ɨgya pakiisʉ ɨgɨ gyatalilepo kʉlɨ gɨla ɨgya Mbepo.
Ʉmundʉ ʉgwa kwanda jʉla Atamu aafumile pakiisʉ, aapeliigwe ʉkʉfuma mu mfu. Atamu ʉgwa bʉbɨlɨ alɨ nʉ mbɨlɨ ʉgwa kʉmwanya.
Muno ajɨɨliile ʉmundʉ ʉgwa mu mfu, mo muno bajɨɨliile abandʉ abaa pakiisʉ apa. Muno ajɨɨliile ʉjʉ alɨ nʉ mbɨlɨ ʉgwa kʉmwanya, mo muno bikwisa kʉjɨɨlaga abandʉ aba balɨ nɨ mibɨlɨ ɨgya kʉmwanya.
Bo muno tʉfwaniile na ʉjʉ aapeliigwe mu mfu,
tukwisa kʉfwana na ʉjʉ alɨ nʉ mbɨlɨ ʉgwa kʉmwanya.
Po baamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko, ɨsi ngʉjoba syo ɨsi, ɨmibɨlɨ gyɨtʉ ɨgya pakiisʉ gɨkabagɨla ʉkwingɨla mBʉnyafyale bwa Kyala. Aka kikʉbola kakabagɨla ʉkwisa kʉja kandʉ aka katikʉbola.
Namupɨlɨkɨsye, nikʉbabʉʉla ɨsi sifisiigwe. Ʉswe tʉtikwisa kʉfwa twesa, looli twesa tukwisa kwandʉligwa.

Ɨngangabwite ɨjaa kʉmmalɨɨkɨsyo bo jikʉlɨla, tukwisa kwandʉligwa akabalɨlo kamokeene, bo ʉlwa mundʉ ʉjʉ ikʉpiinia. Bo sijɨɨliile, abafwe bikwisa kʉsyʉsigwa nʉ kʉpeeligwa ɨmibɨlɨ ɨgɨ gɨtikʉbola sikʉ. Ʉswe twesa tukwisa kwandʉligwa,
paapo ɨfi fikʉbola mpaka fyandʉligwe ʉkʉja fisita kʉbola. Ɨfi fikʉfwa mpaka fyandʉligwe ʉkʉja fisita kʉfwa.

Akabalɨlo ako, aka fyosa ɨfi fikʉbola fikwisa kwandʉligwa ʉkʉja fisita kʉbola, na fyosa ɨfi fikʉfwa fikwisa kwandʉligwa ʉkʉja fisita kʉfwa, po apo sikwisa kʉboneka ɨsi sisimbiigwe mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo ʉkʉtɨ,
“Kyala abʉtolile ʉbʉfwe, bʉtoliigwe loosa!”
“Ʉgwe bʉfwe, ʉbʉtoli bwako bʉlɨ kʉʉgʉ?
Kalɨ kʉʉgʉ akasʉʉfi kaako, akaa kʉtwala ʉkʉbaba?”
Akasʉʉfi akaa bʉfwe bo bʉtʉlanongwa, ʉbʉtʉlanongwa bukʉkaba amaka gaake ʉkʉfuma kʉ ndagɨlo.
Looli tʉntuufyege fiijo Kyala, ʉjʉ ikʉtʉpapo ʉbʉtoli kʉ bʉtʉlanongwa, na kʉ bʉfwe, kʉ njɨla jaa Ntwa gwɨtʉ Jesu Kɨlɨsiti.

Po leelo, baamyɨtʉ bakʉndwe, mukakege, mulɨngasukaanikaga ndwitɨko. Amasikʉ goosa mukɨndɨlɨlege ʉkʉbomba ɨmbombo jaa Ntwa Jesu, paapo mumeenye ʉkʉtɨ ɨmbombo ɨjɨ mukʉbomba kʉ Ntwa Jesu, jɨkaja jaa itolo.
Po ɨsya kʉsangʉla ɨfya kʉbatʉʉla abiitɨki, mubombege bo muno naabalɨngeenie abaa nkɨpanga kya Kyala ɨkya mu Galatija.
Pi isikʉ ɨlya pa ndʉngʉ,
kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ ajabege ʉtʉndʉ nʉ kʉbɨɨka ʉkʉkongana na muno Kyala ansajiile, ʉkʉtɨ bo ngwisa kʉmyɨnu naagege mubʉngeenie.
Bo niisile, ngwisa kʉbatʉma na kalata abandʉ aba aamukʉbasala, ʉkʉtɨ batwale ɨfi musangwile kʉ Jelusalemu.
Lɨnga sikʉlondigwa ʉkʉbʉʉka niine kʉla, apo po ngwisa kʉbʉʉka pamopeene na bandʉ abo.
Bo mfumile nkiisʉ kya Maketonija, po ngwisa kʉmyɨnu kʉ Kolinti, paapo ngʉlonda taasi ʉkwendela kʉ Maketonija.
Po bo niisile kʉmyɨnu, ngwinogona ʉkwisa kʉtʉʉgala na nuumwe, pamo akabalɨlo koosa akaa mmapepo, ʉkʉtɨ mundʉʉle ʉkʉbʉʉka koosa kʉno angʉbʉʉkaga.
Ngiigana ʉkwisa kʉtʉʉgala kʉkabalɨlo akapimba bo ʉlwa mwenda njɨla. Lɨnga ʉNtwa iitiike, ngʉsʉʉbɨla ʉkʉtʉʉgala kʉmyɨnu kʉkabalɨlo akatalipo.
Ngʉsyala mu Efesi, mpaka pa kyaka kya Pentekositi.
Namanga Kyala ambeele akabalɨlo akanunu akaa kʉbomba ɨmbombo ɨnywamu nkaaja aka, looli balipo abandʉ bingi aba bikʉʉsigɨla.
Timoti lɨnga ikwisa kʉmyɨnu,
mummwambɨlɨle nʉ kʉnswɨla, ʉkʉtɨ atʉʉgale na nuumwe kanunu kɨsita kʉtiila, namanga joope ikʉbomba ɨmbombo ɨjaa Ntwa bo ʉne.
Po ʉmundʉ gwesa alɨngammwilaamwaga. Looli muntʉʉlege asookeko ʉko nʉ lʉtengaano, ʉkʉtɨ iise kʉmyangʉ, paapo ʉne ngʉnnguulɨla pamopeene na biitɨki biinɨɨtʉ.
Po ɨsya gwamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko Apolo, nʉmpyeliisye ʉkʉtɨ iise kʉmyɨnu pamopeene na biitɨki abangɨ. Looli ʉmwene akiigana ʉkwisa ʉlʉ, looli ikwisa lɨnga akaagile akabalɨlo.
Mujege maaso, mwɨmege kanunu ndwitɨko, kangɨ mujege bakifu, mwikasyege.
Mubombege syosa ndʉgano.
Mumeenye ʉkʉtɨ Sitefana
pamopeene na bandʉ abaa nnyumba jaake, bo aba baalɨ baa kwanda ʉkʉmmwitɨka Jesu Kɨlɨsiti nkiisʉ ɨkya mu Akaja, boope baaliiningile fiijo ʉkʉbatʉʉla abiitɨki! Baamyɨtʉ ngʉbapyelesya,
na nuumwe mwijiisyege kʉ bandʉ bo abo, na kʉ bangɨ boosa, aba pamopeene bikwijʉʉla ʉkʉjɨbomba ɨmbombo ɨjɨ.
Naahobwike fiijo bo biisile apa ʉkʉfuma kʉmyɨnu, baa Sitefana, Folitunati na Akaiki, paapo ʉkwisa kwabo kokʉtɨ nuumwe mwalipo.
Baasangalwisye ɨndumbula jangʉ, nɨ syɨnu syope. Po mubɨɨmɨkege fiijo abandʉ bo abo.
Abandʉ abaa mfipanga ɨfya Kyala ɨfya mu Asija, bikʉbaponia. Akwila na Pilisika, pamopeene na biitɨki aba bikʉbʉngaana mu nyumba jaabo, bikʉbaponia fiijo mu ngamu ɨjaa Ntwa.
Abaamyɨnu ndwitɨko aba balɨ apa, bikʉbaponia. Namuponaniege kʉ lʉgano lwa Kɨlɨsiti.
Ʉne Paʉli ngʉsimba ɨsya kʉbaponia ɨsi nɨ kɨboko kyangʉ jʉjʉʉne.
Ʉmundʉ gwesa ʉjʉ akanngana ʉNtwa Jesu, agunigwege.
, Ntwa gwɨtʉ isaga!
Iipyana lya Ntwa Jesu lɨjege pamopeene na nuumwe.
Ʉlʉgano lwangʉ lʉjege na nuumwe mwesa, mwa Kɨlɨsiti Jesu.
II Corinthians: Kalata ʉjʉ afumile kʉmyangʉ ʉne Paʉli, ne ntʉmigwa gwa Kɨlɨsiti Jesu, kʉ bwigane bwa Kyala. Ʉne nʉ gwamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko Timoti tukʉbasimbɨla ʉmwe mwe baa nkɨpanga kya Kyala ɨkɨ kɨlɨ mu Kolinti, pamopeene na biitɨki boosa aba balɨ nkiisʉ ɨkya mu Akaja.
Ɨliipyana nʉ lʉtengaano ʉkʉfuma kwa Taata Kyala na kʉ Ntwa Jesu Kɨlɨsiti, fijege na nuumwe.
Atuufigwege Kyala, ʉGwise gwa Ntwa gwɨtʉ Jesu Kɨlɨsiti, Taata ʉgwa kɨbabɨɨlɨsi, kangɨ jo Kyala ʉjʉ ikʉtʉsʉʉbɨsya ndɨ syosa.
Ʉmwene ikʉtʉsʉʉbɨsya mbʉtolwe bwɨtʉ boosa, ʉkʉtɨ na nuuswe tʉbasʉʉbɨsyege abangɨ aba balɨ mbʉtolwe, ʉkwendela ndʉsʉʉbɨsyo lʉla ʉlʉ atʉpeele Kyala ʉswe.
Po leelo, bo ʉlʉ Kyala ikongelapo ʉbʉlɨɨlanisi ʉbʉ tʉlɨ nabo mu ngʉbɨlo sya Kɨlɨsiti, bo lʉlʉʉlo ikongelapo ʉkʉtʉsʉʉbɨsya ʉkwendela mwa Kɨlɨsiti.

Nalɨnga tukʉkʉbɨlwa, tukʉkʉbɨlwa ʉkʉtɨ ʉmwe mukabe ʉlʉsʉʉbɨsyo nʉ bʉpoki. Kangɨ bo tukʉsʉʉbɨsigwa, tukʉsʉʉbɨsigwa ʉkʉtɨ ʉmwe mukabe ʉlʉsʉʉbɨsyo. Ʉlʉsʉʉbɨsyo ʉlo lukʉbapela ʉkʉʉmɨɨlɨla mu ngʉbɨlo silasila, ɨsi na nuuswe tukʉkʉbɨlwa.
Ʉlʉsʉʉbɨlo lwɨtʉ kʉmyɨnu lʉkʉlʉmba, paapo tʉmeenye ʉkʉtɨ mulɨ balɨɨlanisi mu ngʉbɨlo syɨtʉ, kangɨ mulɨ balɨɨlanisi ndʉsʉʉbɨsyo lwɨtʉ.
Baamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko, tukʉlonda mumanye muno twakabiile ɨngʉbɨlo ɨngalɨ, bo tʉlɨ nkiisʉ ɨkya Asija. Ɨngʉbɨlo ɨsi syatwagile syatwilɨkiile fiijo, twinogonaga ʉkʉtɨ tukʉja pakʉfwa.
Nalooli twalɨ bo ʉlwa bandʉ aba balongiigwe ʉkʉgogigwa. Leelo ɨlyo lyaboniike, ʉkʉtɨ tʉleke ʉkʉsʉʉbɨla amaka gɨɨtʉ jʉjʉʉswe, looli tʉnsʉʉbɨlege Kyala ʉjʉ ikʉbasyʉsya abafwe.
Ʉmwene jo ʉjʉ aatʉpokile bo tʉlɨ mbʉtolwe ʉbwa kʉfwa, kangɨ ikwendelelaga ʉkʉtʉpoka. Ʉswe tukʉnsʉʉbɨla ʉmwene ʉkʉtɨ ikʉbombaga bo ʉlo akabalɨlo koosa,
kʉ njɨla jɨɨnu ʉkʉtʉtʉʉla, mu nyiipuuto syɨnu kwa Kyala. Po Kyala aikʉpɨlɨka ɨnyiipuuto syɨnu, nʉ kʉtʉpa ɨsajo ɨnyingi. Po abandʉ bingi aabikʉnngwɨla ʉlʉpi.

Po tukwituufya ndɨ ɨlɨ, tukwibona mu ndumbula syɨtʉ ʉkʉtɨ pakiisʉ apa, fiijo kʉmyɨnu, twatʉʉgeele kʉ bʉgolofu, kangɨ nɨ ndumbula ɨnyeelu ʉkʉfuma kwa Kyala, kɨsita bʉsyobi. Tʉkaasʉʉbɨlaga amahala gɨɨtʉ jʉjʉʉswe, looli ipyana lya Kyala.

Ndɨ ɨlyo tʉtikʉbasimbɨla amasyʉ amakafu, looli aga mubagiile ʉkʉbala nʉ kʉgaagania kanunu. Akabalɨlo aka mutwageenie panandɨ, ngʉsʉʉbɨla ʉkʉtɨ iisikʉ lɨmo aamukwisa kʉsyagania syosa. Po iisikʉ ɨlɨ ikwisa kʉgomoka ʉNtwa Jesu, mukwisa kwituukɨfyaga mmyɨtʉ, bo ʉlʉ ʉswe tukwituukɨfya mmyɨnu.

Ndɨ ɨlyo tʉtikʉbasimbɨla amasyʉ amakafu, looli aga mubagiile ʉkʉbala nʉ kʉgaagania kanunu. Akabalɨlo aka mutwageenie panandɨ, ngʉsʉʉbɨla ʉkʉtɨ iisikʉ lɨmo aamukwisa kʉsyagania syosa. Po iisikʉ ɨlɨ ikwisa kʉgomoka ʉNtwa Jesu, mukwisa kwituukɨfyaga mmyɨtʉ, bo ʉlʉ ʉswe tukwituukɨfya mmyɨnu.
Paapo naameenye ʉkʉtɨ mukwituukɨfya mmyɨtʉ, naalondaga ʉkʉtala ʉkwisa kʉmyɨnu, ʉkʉtɨ muhoboke fiijo kʉnongwa jaa kwisa ʉne ʉlwa bʉbɨlɨ.
Naabaatiike ʉkwenda kʉmyɨnu bo ngʉbʉʉka nkiisʉ ɨkya mu Maketonija, nʉ kʉgomokelako kangɨ kʉmyɨnu, ʉkʉtɨ ʉmwe mumbepo ʉbʉtʉʉli ʉbwa njɨla jangʉ ɨjaa kʉbʉʉka nkiisʉ ɨkya Jutai.

Po bo nandwile ʉlʉbaatɨko lwangʉ ʉlwa kwisa kʉmyɨnu, bʉle, mukwinogona ʉkʉtɨ ngwandʉka andʉka? Pamo mukwinogona ʉkʉtɨ ʉne ngʉlongosigwa nʉ bwigane bwangʉ, ʉkʉtɨ ndɨgɨ, “Eena,” po kangɨ akabalɨlo kakaako ndɨgɨ, “Hɨmma!”
Looli bo ʉlʉ Kyala gwa bwanalooli, ɨsi twababʉʉlile sitikwandʉka andʉka, ʉkʉtɨ, “Eena,” po kangɨ ʉkʉtɨ, “Hɨmma.”
Namanga ʉMwana gwa Kyala,
Jesu Kɨlɨsiti, akaalɨ mundʉ gwa kongaania amasyʉ, ʉkʉtɨ atɨgɨ, “Eena,” po kangɨ atɨgɨ, “Hɨmma.” Looli ʉmwene akabalɨlo koosa jo, “Eena.” Ʉmwene jo ʉjʉ ʉne, Sila na Timoti twalɨmfumwisye kʉmyɨnu.
Ʉmwene jo, “Eena,” ʉgwa kʉnangɨsya ɨsi aafingile Kyala. Jo nongwa ɨjɨ mwa Jesu Kɨlɨsiti tukʉtɨ, “Ameni,” ʉkʉntuufya Kyala.
Kyala jo ʉjʉ ikʉtʉkasya ʉswe na nuumwe, kangɨ atʉsʉngwile ʉkʉja biitɨki baa Kɨlɨsiti,

atʉbɨɨkile ɨkɨkolekelo, kokʉtɨ abɨɨkile pamyɨtʉ ɨkɨmanyilo ɨkya kʉnangɨsya ʉkʉtɨ tʉlɨ bandʉ baake. Ɨkɨkolekelo ɨkyo jo Mbepo Mwikemo ʉjʉ Kyala ammbɨɨkile mu ndumbula syɨtʉ, ʉkʉtɨ tʉmanye kɨsita kwilaamwa, ʉkʉtɨ ɨsi afingile aasikʉboneka.
Ngaaliisile kangɨ kʉmyɨnu, ʉko kʉ Kolinti, paapo ngaalondaga ʉkʉbafulasya mu ndumbula syɨnu. Ɨsi ngʉjoba sya nalooli, Kyala nkeeti gwangʉ.
Ndikʉtɨ tʉlɨ balagɨli baa lwitɨko lwɨnu, looli tukwikasya ʉkʉja balɨɨlanisi na nuumwe, ʉkʉtɨ tʉje nʉ lʉsekelo. Namanga ʉmwe mulɨ na maka ndwitɨko.
Po naatumwile mu ndumbula jangʉ, ʉkʉtɨ ndikwisako kangɨ kʉmyɨnu, ndɨngabafulasya ɨndumbula syɨnu.
Paapo lɨnga ʉne ngʉbapela ʉmwe ʉkʉja nʉ bʉsulumanie, kokʉtɨ akajako ʉgwa kʉmbela ʉne ʉkʉja nʉ lʉsekelo, looli jʉjʉʉmwe mwe mbafuleesye mu ndumbula syɨnu!

Fyobeene naabasimbiile mwa kalata jʉla ʉjʉngɨ, paapo ngaalondaga ʉkwisa kʉmyɨnu, ʉkʉtɨ ndɨngafulasigwa mu ndumbula jangʉ na bandʉ aba baalondigwaga ʉkʉʉhobosya. Naameenye ʉkʉtɨ ʉne lɨnga ndɨ nʉ lʉsekelo, na nuumwe aamukʉja nʉ lʉsekelo.
Naabasimbiile kalata kʉ bʉsulumanie ʉbʉkʉlʉmba, ʉbʉtolwe na maasosi. Ngaabɨngɨliile ʉkʉbafulasya mu ndumbula syɨnu, looli ʉkʉtɨ mumanye muno mbaganiile fiijo.
Po leelo, ʉmundʉ pakatɨ pamyɨnu ʉjʉ aalɨɨfuleesye fiijo, akaalɨɨfuleesye niimwene, looli abafuleesye ʉmwe mwesa. Leelo ndikʉlonda ʉkʉkɨndɨlɨla ʉkʉjoba ɨsyo.
Ʉlʉfundo ʉlʉ akabile ʉkʉfuma kʉ bandʉ bingi, lʉmfwene.
Po kʉnunu ʉkʉnhobokela nʉ kʉnkasya ʉmundʉ ʉjo, ʉkʉtɨ alɨngasulumania fiijo nʉ koonyoka amaka.
Ngʉbapyelesya mujobe pabwelu ʉkʉtɨ mukaalɨ munnganile.
Fyobeene naabasimbiile kalata jʉla ʉkʉbapɨma, ʉkʉtɨ mmanye lɨnga mukʉmbɨlɨka ndɨ syosa.
Lɨnga mukʉnhobokela ʉmundʉ ʉjo, na niine ngʉnhobokelaga. Lɨnga silipo ɨsya kʉnhobokela, nʉnhobokiile nkyeni mwa Kɨlɨsiti kʉnongwa jɨɨnu,
ʉkʉtɨ Seetano alɨngatʉtola, paapo tʉbʉmeenye fiijo ʉbʉkomu bwake.
Po bo mfikile nkaaja akanywamu akaa mu Tiloja, kʉkʉlʉmbɨlɨla ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu ɨjaa Kɨlɨsiti, naalyagile ɨkɨfigo kiigwike, ʉkʉtɨ mbombe ɨmbombo jaa Ntwa kʉla.
Leelo ngaalɨ nʉ lʉtengaano mu ndumbula, paapo ʉgwamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko Tiiti, akaalɨ ʉkʉfika nɨ nongwa simo ɨnunu ʉkʉfuma kʉmyɨnu. Po ndɨnkʉbalaga abandʉ baa kʉla, ndɨnkʉbʉʉka kʉla kʉkiisʉ ɨkya Maketonija.

Looli tʉnngwɨlege ʉlʉpi Kyala! Mwa Kɨlɨsiti ikʉtʉlongosya akabalɨlo koosa, bo ʉlwa ntoli ʉjʉ ikʉbalongosya abandʉ aba abakolile mbwite. Kangɨ bo ʉlwa lʉʉma ʉlʉnunu ʉlʉ lukʉbalanila koosa, ikʉtʉpela ʉswe ʉkʉbalania ʉbʉmanyi bwa Kɨlɨsiti mbʉjo boosa.
Namanga kwa Kyala tʉfwene nʉ lʉʉma ʉlʉnunu ʉlʉ lukʉmfikɨsya Kɨlɨsiti kʉ bandʉ boosa, kʉlɨ aba bikʉpokigwa, kangɨ kʉlɨ aba bikʉsoba.
Kʉlɨ aba bikʉpokigwa, ʉlʉʉma ʉlo lʉnunu, lukʉbapa ʉbʉʉmi. Looli kʉlɨ bala bikʉsoba, ʉlʉʉma ʉlo lʉbiibi, lukʉbapa ʉbʉfwe. Bʉle, alipo ʉmundʉ gwesa ʉjʉ abagiile ʉkʉbomba ɨmbombo ɨjo?
Baliko abandʉ bingi abasyobi, aba balɨbɨɨkile iisyʉ lya Kyala ngatɨ kandʉ kaa kʉʉlɨsya. Ʉswe tʉlegeene nabo. Looli mwa Kɨlɨsiti tʉtʉmiigwe na Kyala, tukʉfumusya iisyʉ lya Kyala kʉ bwanalooli.

Kalɨ mukwinogona ʉkʉtɨ twandile kangɨ ʉkwituufya? Hɨmma, ʉswe tʉkaja bo abandʉ abangɨ, aba bikʉtwala kʉmyɨnu baakalata, ʉkwilɨngaania muno bajɨɨliile, pamo ʉkʉsʉʉma kʉmyɨnu baakalata, abaa kʉtʉlɨngaania muno tʉjɨɨliile kʉ bandʉ abangɨ.
Ʉmwe jo kalata ʉjʉ ikʉlɨngaania muno tʉjɨɨliile, ʉjʉ asimbiigwe mu ndumbula syɨtʉ, ʉjʉ abandʉ boosa babagiile ʉkʉbala nʉ kʉsimanya ɨsi tukʉbomba.

Mukʉnangɨsya ʉkʉtɨ ʉmwe jo kalata ʉkʉfuma kwa Kɨlɨsiti. Kalata ʉjʉ ikʉnangɨsya ɨmbombo ɨsi tʉbombile kʉmyɨnu. Akafwana na kalata ʉjʉ asimbiigwe nɨ simbɨlo, looli asimbiigwe na Mbepo gwa Kyala ʉMʉʉmi. Kangɨ mukaja bo kalata ʉjʉ asimbiigwe pa mabwe, looli ʉjʉ asimbiigwe mu ndumbula sya bandʉ.
Po tʉtikwilaamwa na panandɨ nkyeni mwa Kyala ndɨ ɨsyo, kʉnongwa jaa ɨsi atʉbombiile Kɨlɨsiti.
