Tʉtikwinogona ʉkʉtɨ tʉbombile simo kʉ maka gɨɨtʉ, looli amaka aga gikʉfuma kwa Kyala gabombile syosa.
Ʉmwene jo ʉjʉ atʉpeele amaka agaa kʉja babombeli abaa lwitɨkano ʉlʉpya,
ʉlʉ lʉtikʉfuma mu ndagɨlo ɨsi silimo mmasimbo, looli lukʉfuma kwa Mbepo Mwikemo. Namanga amasimbo gaa ndagɨlo gikʉtwala ʉbʉfwe, looli Mbepo Mwikemo ikʉtwala ʉbʉʉmi.

Ɨndagɨlo sya Moose ɨsi syasimbiigwe pa mabwe, syatwele ʉbʉfwe. Syaliisile nʉ bʉsisya nʉ kʉlangala, mpaka aBanyaisilaɨli baatoliigwe ʉkʉnkeeta Moose kʉmaaso, paapo kwalangalaga fiijo, na paapo kaalɨ kabalɨlo kapimba itolo.
Po lɨnga ɨmbombo jaa lʉko ʉlo jaaliisile nʉ bʉsisya,
bʉle, ɨmbombo jaa Mbepo Mwikemo jɨtikʉkɨndɨlɨla ʉkʉja nʉ bʉsisya?

Lɨnga ɨmbombo jɨla ɨjaa ndagɨlo, ɨjɨ jaapelile abandʉ ʉkʉlongigwa jɨlɨ nʉ bʉsisya, po ɨmbombo jaa Mbepo Mwikemo, ɨjɨ jikʉpela abandʉ ʉkʉja bagolofu nkyeni mwa Kyala, bʉle jɨtikʉkɨndɨlɨla ʉkʉja nʉ bʉsisya?
Ʉlwitɨkano lʉla ʉlwa kwanda lʉkaalɨ nʉ bʉsisya kangɨ, ʉkʉbʉfwanikɨsya nʉ bʉsisya ʉbʉkʉlʉmba fiijo ʉbwa lwitɨkano ʉlʉpya, ʉbʉ bʉkɨndile ʉbʉsisya boosa.
Lɨnga aka kaakʉʉlʉpaga kaalɨ nʉ bʉsisya bwake, po ʉbʉsisya bwa aka kikʉjako bwila na bwila kikʉkɨndɨlɨla ʉkʉja nʉ bʉsisya.
Paapo ʉlo lo lʉsʉʉbɨlo lwɨtʉ, tukʉbomba ɨmbombo kɨsita kʉtiila.
Kangɨ tʉtikʉbomba bo ʉlwa Moose, ʉjʉ aaliikingile kʉmaaso nɨ kɨtambala, ʉkʉtɨ aBanyaisilaɨli balɨngankeetaga bo ʉkʉlangala kukʉlogotela.

Looli amahala gaabo gaaliigaliigwe. Mpaka ʉlʉ, bo bikʉbala baakalata abaa ndagɨlo sya Moose, amahala gaabo gakingiigwe nɨ kɨtambala, bikʉtoligwa ʉkʉsyagania. Ɨkɨtambala kyabo kɨkaalɨ ʉkʉsoosigwa, paapo Kɨlɨsiti mwene jo abagiile ʉkʉkɨsoosyapo ɨkɨtambala ɨkyo.
Nalooli mpaka ʉlʉ, bo bikʉbala baakalata abaa ndagɨlo sya Moose, ɨndumbula syabo sikupɨkɨliigwe, bikʉtoligwa ʉkʉsyagania.
Looli ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ ikʉsanukɨla kʉ Ntwa, ʉNtwa ikʉnsookesyapo ɨkɨtambala kyake.
Iisyʉ ɨlyo, “Ntwa,” kokʉtɨ, “Mbepo.” Apa alipo Mbepo gwa Ntwa palɨ nʉ bwabʉke.

Po twesa, twe tukʉlangala ʉbʉsisya bwa Ntwa, paapo atʉsoosiisyepo ɨkɨtambala kʉmaaso, tukwandʉligwa ʉkʉtɨ tʉfwane nagwe. Tukwandʉka ʉkʉfuma mbʉsisya, ʉkʉtɨ tʉjege mbʉsisya ʉbʉkʉlʉmba ʉbʉ bʉkɨndɨliile, ʉbʉfuma kʉ Ntwa, ʉjʉ jo Mbepo.
Po Kyala kʉ kɨbabɨɨlɨsi kyake atʉpeele ɨmbombo ɨjɨ, tʉtikoonyoka amaka.

Tʉkaanile loosa ʉkʉbomba kʉbʉtiitʉ ɨngosya soni, ʉkʉbasyoba abandʉ nʉ kongaania iisyʉ lya Kyala nɨ sya bʉtʉngʉlʉ. Looli tukʉjoba ʉbwanalooli pabwelu, ʉkʉtɨ abandʉ boosa bamanye mu ndumbula syabo ʉkʉtɨ tʉkaja basyobi nkyeni mwa Kyala.
Looli lɨnga ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu ɨjɨ tukʉfumusya jɨfisiigwe, jɨfisiigwe kwene kʉlɨ aba basobile.

Seetano, ʉjʉ jo lyakyala lya pakiisʉ apa, abapʉʉpeesye ɨnyiinogono syabo abandʉ aba batikʉmmwitɨka Jesu, ʉkʉtɨ batoligwe ʉkʉlʉbona ʉlʉmuli lwa Ndʉmi ɨNunu ɨjaa bʉsisya bwa Kɨlɨsiti, ʉjʉ jo kɨfwanikɨsyo ɨkya Kyala.
Namanga ʉswe tʉtikʉfumusya ɨnongwa syɨtʉ, looli tukʉfumusya ɨnongwa ɨsya Jesu Kɨlɨsiti, ʉkʉtɨ jo Ntwa, nʉ kʉtɨ ʉswe tʉlɨ babombeli bɨɨnu kʉ njɨla jaa kʉmmbombela Jesu.
Tukʉbomba bo ʉlo paapo Kyala, ʉjʉ aatile, “Ʉlʉmuli lʉmulɨke mu ngiisi,”
jo ʉjʉ ikʉmulɨka ɨndumbula syɨtʉ, ʉkʉtɨ tʉbʉmanye ʉbʉsisya bwake ʉbʉ bukʉlangala kʉmaaso kwa Jesu Kɨlɨsiti.

Pamopeene na ɨsyo, amahala ago amakʉlʉmba gafwene bo ɨkyʉma ɨkɨ kɨbɨɨkiigwe mu ngumbe ɨsya mfu. Po abandʉ bikʉmanya ʉkʉtɨ amaka gɨɨtʉ agaa kʉbomba ɨmbombo ɨjo, gatikʉfuma kʉmyɨtʉ, looli gikʉfuma kwa Kyala.
Tʉlɨ mbʉtolwe kʉno na kʉno, looli tʉtikʉtoligwa. Tukwilaamwa, looli tʉtikoonyoka amaka.
Abandʉ bikʉtʉkaga, looli Kyala atikʉtʉleka twibeene. Tukʉbigigwa, looli tʉtikʉgogigwa.
Amasikʉ goosa ɨmibɨlɨ gyɨtʉ gɨlɨ mbʉtolwe ʉbwa kʉgogigwa, bo ʉlʉ aagogiigwe Jesu, ʉkʉtɨ ʉbʉʉmi bwa Jesu bʉboneke mmibɨlɨ gyɨtʉ.
Namanga ʉswe twe bʉʉmi, akabalɨlo koosa tʉlɨ mbʉtolwe ʉbwa kʉfwa, kʉnongwa jaa kʉbomba ɨmbombo jaa Jesu, ʉkʉtɨ abandʉ babʉbone ʉbʉʉmi bwa Jesu mmibɨlɨ gyɨtʉ, nalɨnga ɨmibɨlɨ gyɨtʉ aagikʉfwa.
Po ʉswe tʉlɨ mbʉtolwe ʉbwa kʉfwa, looli ʉmwe mukʉkaba ʉbʉʉmi.
Ʉswe nuuswe tʉmmwitiike Kyala, bo ʉlwa mundʉ jʉla ʉjʉ aajobile mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo, aatile, “Naalɨmmwitiike Kyala, fyobeene naajobile.”
Bo lʉlʉʉlo, ʉswe tʉmmwitiike. Fyobeene tukʉjoba.

Po tukʉjoba pabwelu, paapo tʉmeenye ʉkʉtɨ Kyala ʉjʉ aalɨnsyʉsiisye ʉNtwa Jesu, ikwisa kʉtʉsyʉsya ʉswe, ʉkʉtɨ na nuuswe tʉjege pamopeene nagwe. Kangɨ ikwisa kʉtʉbɨɨka pamopeene na nuumwe nkyeni mmyake.
Ɨngʉbɨlo ɨsi syosa ɨsi tukwambɨlɨla sikʉbapa ʉkʉkabamo, ʉkʉtɨ iipyana lya Kyala lɨbafikɨle abandʉ abingi. Po bikʉnngwɨlaga ʉlʉpi fiijo Kyala, nʉ kʉkɨndɨlɨla ʉkʉmmwɨmɨka.
Po tʉtikoonyoka amaka, nalɨnga ɨmibɨlɨ gyɨtʉ gikʉkʉʉlʉpa, looli nkatɨ mmyɨtʉ Kyala ikʉtʉpela ʉkʉja bapya kʉkʉtɨ isikʉ.
Namanga ʉbʉtolwe bwɨtʉ bʉpepe, kangɨ bwa kabalɨlo akapimba itolo. Ʉbʉtolwe ʉbo, bukʉtʉtendekekesya ʉbʉsisya ʉbwa bwila na bwila, ʉbʉkʉlʉmba fiijo ʉkʉkɨnda ʉbʉtolwe bʉla.
Po tukʉfilʉʉlalɨla ɨfi fitikʉboneka, fyomma ɨfi fikʉboneka, paapo ɨfi fikʉboneka fya kabalɨlo akapimba itolo, looli ɨfi fitikʉboneka fya bwila na bwila.

Tʉmeenye ʉkʉtɨ ɨmibɨlɨ gyɨtʉ kɨtembe kya kabalɨlo akapimba nkiisʉ muno. Looli bo kiisile kʉpangʉka, Kyala ikwisa kʉtʉpa ɨmibɨlɨ ɨmipya kʉmwanya, bo ʉlwa nyumba ɨjaa bwila na bwila, ɨjɨ jɨkajengigwa na bandʉ.
Namanga mbʉʉmi ʉbʉ, ɨndumbula syɨtʉ sikʉtaamigwa. Ndɨ ɨlyo tukʉnyonywa fiijo ʉkʉfwɨkigwa ɨmibɨlɨ ɨmipya kʉmwanya, ɨgɨ syo nyumba syɨtʉ ɨmbya.
Kyala bo atʉfwɨkile, tʉtikwisa kʉjaga kɨsita mibɨlɨ.

Bo tʉkaalɨ tʉlɨ nkɨtembe ɨkɨ ɨkya kabalɨlo akapimba, tukʉtaamigwa mu ndumbula syɨtʉ, tukʉtwɨkigwa ɨfitwalo ɨfisito. Tʉtikʉtɨ tukʉlonda kwene ʉkʉfuula ʉmbɨlɨ ʉgʉ gukʉfwa, looli tukʉlonda ʉkʉfwɨkigwa ʉmbɨlɨ ʉgʉ gʉtikʉfwa, ʉkʉtɨ ʉmbɨlɨ ʉgʉ gukʉfwa gʉmiligwe na ʉgʉ gʉtikʉfwa.
Kyala jo ʉjʉ atʉtendekekiisye ɨsyo, atʉpeele Mbepo gwake, ʉkʉtɨ tʉmanye kɨsita kwilaamwa ʉkʉtɨ ɨsyo sikwisa kʉboneka.
Po akabalɨlo koosa, tʉtikwilaamwa. Kangɨ tʉmeenye ʉkʉtɨ, akabalɨlo aka tʉlɨ nɨ mibɨlɨ ɨgɨ pakiisʉ apa, tʉlɨ kʉbʉtali nʉ Ntwa.
Tukwendela ndwitɨko, somma ndɨ ɨfi fikʉboneka.
Po tʉtikwilaamwa, kangɨ tukwaga kwalɨ kʉnunu ʉkʉgʉleka ʉmbɨlɨ ʉgʉ, tʉkatʉʉgalege nʉ Ntwa.
Po leelo, tʉje mbʉjo ʉbʉ, pamo tʉlɨngaja mbʉjo ʉbʉ, ɨnyango jɨɨtʉ ko kʉnkyela ʉNtwa.
Namanga ʉswe twesa tukwisa kwɨma nkyeni mwa Kɨlɨsiti, nʉ kʉlongigwa nagwe, ʉkʉtɨ kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ iise ambɨlɨle ʉmfwalo ʉkʉkongana na ɨsi abombile pakiisʉ apa, sije nunu pamo sije mbiibi.
Paapo tʉmeenye ʉkʉntiila ʉNtwa, po tukwikasya ʉkʉbapyelesya abandʉ ʉkʉtɨ bammwitɨkege. Kyala atʉmeenye fiijo muno tʉjɨɨliile, na niine ngʉsʉʉbɨla ʉkʉtɨ nuumwe mutʉmeenye fiijo.

Tʉtikʉlonda ʉkwituufya kangɨ kʉmyɨnu, looli tukʉlonda ʉkʉbabʉʉla ɨsyo, ʉkʉtɨ mwituukɨfye ɨsi tukʉbabombela. Po mujege na masyʉ agaa kʉbaamula aba bikwituukɨfya ɨsi babombile nkyeni mmbandʉ, somma muno bajɨɨliile mu ndumbula.
Lɨnga abandʉ bikʉtɨ ʉswe tʉlɨ nɨ kɨgɨlɨ, tʉlɨ nakyo mwene nkyeni mwa Kyala. Lɨnga tʉlɨ na mahala, tʉlɨ nago kʉmyɨnu.

Ʉlʉgano lwa Kɨlɨsiti lukʉtʉlongosya na maka, namanga tʉmeenye ʉkʉtɨ, ʉmundʉ jʉmo aabafwɨliile abandʉ boosa ʉkʉtɨ bahobokeligwe ʉbʉtʉlanongwa bwabo. Kʉnongwa ɨjo ʉbʉndʉ bwabo ʉbwa ijolo bʉfwile pamopeene nagwe.
Aabafwɨliile abandʉ boosa, ʉkʉtɨ baleke ʉkwendela mbwigane bwabo, looli mbwigane bwa ʉjʉ aabafwɨliile nʉ kʉsyʉka.
Po ʉkʉfuma akabalɨlo aka, tʉtikʉmmbona ʉmundʉ najʉmo bo muno abandʉ abaa nkiisʉ bikʉmmbonela. Akabalɨlo kamo twankeetaga Kɨlɨsiti bo ʉlo, looli akabalɨlo aka tʉtikʉbomba bo ʉlo.
Ʉmundʉ gwesa ʉjʉ alʉngeene na Kɨlɨsiti, ikʉja kɨpeligwa kɨpya. Ɨsya ijolo sikɨndile. Keeta, siisile ɨmbya!
Looli syosa ɨsyo sikʉfuma kwa Kyala, ʉjʉ atʉfwenie ʉswe nʉ mwene, ʉkwendela mwa Kɨlɨsiti. Ʉswe atʉpeele ɨmbombo ɨjaa kʉbanangɨsya abandʉ ɨnjɨla jaa kʉbafwania nʉ mwene.
Kokʉtɨ Kyala, ʉkwendela mwa Kɨlɨsiti, aabafwenie abandʉ nʉ mwene, kɨsita kʉbala ʉbʉtʉlanongwa bwabo. Kangɨ Kyala atʉpeele ʉswe ɨmbombo jaa kʉbafumukɨsya abandʉ ɨsya kʉfwania ʉko.
Po ʉswe tʉlɨ nɨ Ndʉmi jaa Kɨlɨsiti. Kokʉtɨ, ʉkwendela mmyɨtʉ, Kyala ikʉbasisimɨkɨsya ʉkʉfwana nagwe. Fyobeene tukʉbasʉʉma fiijo kʉ bʉlagɨli bwa Kɨlɨsiti ʉkʉtɨ, mufwane na Kyala.
Kɨlɨsiti akaalɨ nʉ bʉtʉlanongwa, looli Kyala aalɨmmbɨɨkile ngatɨ ntʉlanongwa, ʉkʉtɨ kʉ njɨla jaa kʉlʉngana na Kɨlɨsiti, tʉjege mbʉlɨɨlanisi na Kyala mbʉgolofu bwake.
Paapo tukʉbomba pamopeene na Kyala, tukʉbapyelesya ʉkʉtɨ iipyana lyake ɨlɨ mwambɨliile, mulɨngalɨsobesya.
Namanga Kyala ikʉtɨ,
“Pakabalɨlo akanunu naakʉpɨliike,
pi isikʉ lya bʉpoki naakʉtʉʉlile.”
Po nikʉbabʉʉla ʉmwe nikʉtɨ, akabalɨlo akanunu ko aka, ɨliisikʉ lya bʉpoki lyo ɨlɨ!
Tʉtikʉbomba nakamo, aka kikʉfulasya mu ndumbula sya bandʉ, ʉkʉtɨ ʉbʉbombeli bwɨtʉ bʉlɨngajobigwaga kabiibi.
Looli ndɨ syosa tukwinangɨsya ʉkʉtɨ tʉlɨ babombeli baa Kyala. Tukwikasya fiijo mu ngʉbɨlo na mbʉtolwe ʉbwingi.
Akabalɨlo kamo tukʉkomigwa, tukʉpinyigwa mu nnyololo, tukoobeligwa, tukʉbomba ɨmbombo ɨngafu, tukʉgona maaso, tukʉlɨnda nɨ njala.
Leelo tukʉbomba syosa ɨsyo kʉ bʉgolofu, mbʉmanyi, mbʉtengamojo, mbooloolo, nkʉlongosigwa na Mbepo Mwikemo, ndʉgano ʉlʉsita bʉsyobi,
kangɨ kʉ njɨla jaa kʉlʉmbɨlɨla ɨndʉmi jaa nalooli, kʉ maka agaa Kyala. Ʉbʉgolofu kyo kɨlwɨlo kyɨtʉ, ɨkɨ tukʉkola mmaboko gɨɨtʉ kʉ kiilɨɨlo na kʉ kiimama.
Ʉswe tukwikasya fiijo, abandʉ batwɨmɨke pamo batʉfujule, batʉtuufye pamo batʉjobe kabiibi. Tukʉjobigwa ʉkʉja batʉngʉlʉ, looli tukʉjoba ɨsya bwanalooli.
Tukʉfwana tʉkaja bafumuke, looli tʉlɨ bafumuke fiijo. Tukʉfwana tʉfwile, looli tʉlɨ bʉʉmi. Tʉkomiigwe fiijo, looli tʉtikʉgogigwa.
Kangɨ tʉlɨ nʉ bʉsulumanie, looli akabalɨlo koosa tʉlɨ nʉ lʉsekelo. Tʉlɨ balondo, looli bingi tʉbapeele ʉbʉkabi. Tʉkaja nafyo nafimo, looli tʉlɨ nʉ tʉndʉ toosa.
Mwe Bakolinti ʉmwe, tʉjobile na nuumwe kɨsita kʉfinda nakamo, kangɨ tʉjobile kʉ lʉgano ʉlʉkʉlʉmba.
Ʉswe tʉkaleka ʉkʉbagana ʉmwe, looli ʉmwe mulekile ʉkʉtʉgana ʉswe.
Po ngʉjoba na nuumwe ngatɨ ngʉjoba na baanangʉ, muje nʉ lʉgano fiijo bo muno tʉjɨɨliile ʉswe.
Mulɨngajaga balɨɨlanisi na bandʉ aba bakaja biitɨki. Bʉle, ʉbʉgolofu nʉ bʉtʉlanongwa fibagiile ʉkʉlɨɨlanila? Bʉle, ʉlʉmuli nɨ ngiisi fifwene itolo?
Bʉle, Kɨlɨsiti abagiile ʉkwitɨkana na Seetano? Bʉle, ʉmwitɨki abagiile ʉkʉja ndɨɨlanisi na ʉjʉ akaja mwitɨki?
Bʉle, ɨtempeli ɨnyiikemo ɨjaa Kyala, jɨbagiile ʉkʉja nʉ tʉndʉ ʉtʉ tʉkaja twa Kyala? Namanga jo ʉswe twe tʉlɨ tempeli jaa Kyala ʉMʉʉmi! Bo ʉlʉ Kyala aajobile ʉkʉtɨ,
“Ngʉtʉʉgalaga mmyabo,
nʉ kwenda pamopeene nabo.
Ngʉjaga ne Kyala gwabo,
boope bikʉjaga bandʉ bangʉ.”
Kʉnongwa ɨjo, ʉNtwa Kyala aatile,
“Musookepo pakatɨ pamyabo,
mwipaagʉle!
Mulɨngakolaga akandʉ akanyali!
Po na niine angʉbambɨlɨla.”
Kangɨ ʉNtwa Kyala ʉMwene maka goosa aatile,
“Ngʉjaga Gwiseemwe,
ʉmwe mukʉjaga baanangʉ abanyambala,
na baanangʉ abakiikʉlʉ.”
Bakʉndwe, paapo Kyala aafingile ɨsyo syosa, twijeelʉsye, tʉlɨngaja nako nakamo aka kabagiile ʉkʉtʉnyasya ʉmbɨlɨ nɨ ndumbula, ʉkʉtɨ tʉje biikemo fiijo kʉ njɨla jaa kʉntiila Kyala.
Mutwambɨlɨle mu ndumbula syɨnu! Tʉkatʉla ɨnongwa kʉ mundʉ najʉmo. Tʉkamfulasya ʉmundʉ najʉmo. Tʉkansyoba ʉmundʉ najʉmo.
Ndikʉjoba amasyʉ aga ʉkʉbalonga. Bo ʉlʉ njobile kʉbwandɨlo, ʉmwe mulɨ mu ndumbula syɨtʉ, tʉje pamopeene bo tʉlɨ kʉ bʉʉmi pamo tʉfwe pamopeene.
Bo ngʉjoba na nuumwe ngaja nʉ lʉtende. Kangɨ ngwituukɨfya ʉmwe. Muusʉʉbiisye fiijo. Na paapo tukʉfundigwa nɨ ngʉbɨlo ɨnyingi, mumbelile ʉkʉja nʉ lʉsekelo ʉlʉnywamu.
Bo tʉfikile kʉla kʉ Maketonija twatoliigwe ʉkʉtʉʉsya, paapo twalɨ nɨ ngʉbɨlo koosakoosa. Panja kwalɨ nʉ bwite, nkatɨ mu ndumbula syɨtʉ mwalɨ nʉ lʉtende.
Looli Kyala ʉjʉ ikʉbasʉʉbɨsya aba boonywike amaka mu ndumbula syabo, aatʉsʉʉbiisye kʉ njɨla ɨjaa kwisa kwa Tiiti.

Kʉkaja kokʉtɨ twasʉʉbɨsiigwe na Tiiti mwene, looli loope nʉ lʉsʉʉbɨsyo ʉlʉ aasʉʉbɨsiigwe na nuumwe. Aatʉpangiile muno musyʉkilwe ʉkʉʉmbona, nɨ sya bʉsulumanie bwɨnu, nʉ kwijʉʉla kwɨnu kʉnongwa jangʉ. Ɨsyo simbeliile ʉkʉsekela fiijo.
Nalɨnga naabapeliile ʉbʉsulumanie na kalata ʉjʉ naabasimbiile, sitikʉʉmbaba. Nalɨnga syalɨɨmbabile panandɨ kʉbwandɨlo, kalata ʉjo aabapeliile ʉbʉsulumanie kʉkabalɨlo akanandɨ itolo.

Looli lɨɨlɨno ndɨ nʉ lʉsekelo. Bʉle, paapo mbatwaliile ʉbʉsulumanie? Hɨmma! Looli paapo ʉbʉsulumanie bwɨnu bʉbapelile ʉkʉpɨndʉka ʉkʉfuma mbʉtʉlanongwa bwɨnu. Ʉbʉsulumanie bwɨnu bwalɨ mbwigane bwa Kyala, ʉswe tʉkaabafuleesyepo kʉ njɨla jojoosa.
Lɨnga Kyala ikʉtʉpela ʉkʉja nʉ bʉsulumanie, bukʉtʉpela ʉkʉpɨndʉka nʉ kʉpokigwa. Ʉbʉpokigwa ʉbo bʉtikʉtʉtwalɨla ʉbʉsulumanie. Looli ʉbʉsulumanie ʉbʉ bukʉfuma pakiisʉ apa bukʉtwala ʉbʉfwe.

Keeta! Ʉbʉsulumanie ʉbo ʉbwa kʉfuma kwa Kyala, bʉbatwaliile ʉkʉkabamo fiijo. Po mukʉnyonywa fiijo ʉkwinosya, ʉkʉbʉkalalɨla ʉbʉbiibi, ʉkʉmmwɨmɨka Kyala, ʉkʉʉsyʉkwa, ʉkwijʉʉla ʉkʉbomba ɨsya bʉgolofu, nʉ kʉtɨ ʉjʉ asobile apeeligwege ʉlʉfundo ʉlʉ lukʉlondigwa. Kʉnongwa ɨjɨ munangiisye ʉkʉtɨ mukaja na kababye nakamo.

Po nalɨnga naabasimbiile kalata jʉla, ngaasimbile kʉnongwa jaa mundʉ ʉjʉ antʉliile ɨnongwa ʉjʉngɨ, pamo ʉjʉ abombeliigwe ʉbʉbiibi. Looli naalondaga musibone nkyeni mwa Kyala ɨsi mukwijʉʉla ʉkʉtʉbombela kanunu.
Kʉlɨ ɨsyo mutʉsʉʉbiisye. Pamopeene na ɨsi, Tiiti aatʉhobwisye nʉ lʉsekelo, ʉlʉ aalɨ nalo ʉkʉkongana na muno mwalɨnsʉʉbɨkiisye.
Ʉne naabatuufiifye fiijo nkyeni mmyake, na nuumwe mukangosya ɨsoni. Syosa ɨsi twababʉʉlaga syalɨ sya nalooli. Bo silɨ, na ɨsi twabatuufiifye ʉmwe kwa Tiiti, syosa sinangiisye ʉkʉja sya nalooli.
Ʉlʉgano lwa Tiiti kʉmyɨnu lukʉkɨndɨlɨla ʉkongelela, bo ikʉkʉmbʉka ʉkwitɨka kwɨnu mwesa, na muno mwalɨmmwambɨliile nʉ lwɨmɨko, kangɨ nʉ lʉtende.
Nikʉsekela fiijo, namanga ngʉbasʉʉbɨla loosa, mu mbombo syosa.
Po baamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko, tukʉlonda ʉkʉbabʉʉla ɨsya ipyana lya Kyala ɨlɨ bapeeliigwe abaa mfipanga fya Kyala ɨfya mu Maketonija.
Abiitɨki abo baalɨ mu ngʉbɨlo ɨngalɨ na mbʉlondo, looli baalɨ nʉ lʉsekelo fiijo, ʉlʉ lwabapelile ʉkʉja bape fiijo ʉkʉsoosya ʉtʉndʉ twabo.
Nikʉbabʉʉla nikʉtɨ, baasoosiisye ʉtʉndʉ twingi, ʉkʉkɨnda amaka gaabo. Kangɨ baasoosiisye kʉ bwigane bwabo,
nʉ kʉtʉpyelesya ʉkʉtɨ, boope bajemo mu mbombo ɨjaa kʉbatʉʉla abiitɨki abalondo abaa kʉ Jelusalemu.
Baatalile taasi ʉkwininga kʉ Ntwa, po balɨnkwininga na kʉmyɨtʉ, ʉkʉkongana nʉ bwigane ʉbwa Kyala. Tʉkaasʉʉbɨlaga bo ʉlo na panandɨ!
Tiiti aalyandile ɨmbombo jaa kʉbʉngaania ɨfi mwasangʉlaga bo iisile kʉmyɨnu. Po twalɨmpyeliisye ʉkʉtɨ iise abatʉʉle ʉkʉjɨmalɨɨsya ɨmbombo ɨjo.

Ʉmwe mulɨ bakabi ndɨ syosa, ndwitɨko, nkɨkʉngɨlwa ɨkya kʉlʉmbɨlɨla, mmahala, ʉkwijʉʉla mu mbombo ɨnunu syosa, pamopeene nʉ lʉgano lwɨnu kʉmyɨtʉ. Po mujege bakabi, na mu mbombo ɨjɨ ɨjaa kʉbatʉʉla abangɨ.
Apa ngʉjoba ɨsi, kʉkaja kokʉtɨ ngʉbafimbɨlɨsya, looli ngʉlonda ʉkʉlʉbona ʉlʉgano lwɨnu lɨnga lwa nalooli, kʉ njɨla jaa kʉbafwanikɨsya na bangɨ.
Namanga ʉmwe mumeenye muno ʉNtwa gwɨtʉ Jesu Kɨlɨsiti aabapeele iipyana. Na paapo aalɨ nkabi, aaliipelile ʉkʉja ndondo kʉnongwa jɨɨnu, ʉkʉtɨ mbʉlondo bwake, muje bakabi.
Ɨkyɨnja ɨkɨ kɨkɨndile, ʉmwe mwalɨ baa kwanda ʉkʉnangɨsya ɨnyango jaa kʉsangʉla, nʉ kwanda ʉkʉbomba bo ʉlo. Po ʉne ngʉtɨ kanunu,
ʉkʉmalɨɨsya ɨmbombo ɨjɨ mwalyandile. Bo ʉlʉ mwanyonywaga ʉkwanda ɨmbombo ɨjo, po ʉlʉ munyonywege ʉkʉmalɨɨsya, ʉkʉkongana na maka gɨɨnu.
Po lɨnga ʉmundʉ ikʉsoosya kʉ bwigane bwake, Kyala aikwambɨlɨla kʉkʉtɨ kandʉ aka ʉmundʉ ʉjo abagiile ʉkʉsoosya. Atikʉmela ʉkʉtɨ ongelepo.
Ɨnyango jɨɨtʉ, kʉkaja kokʉtɨ ʉmwe mukʉbɨlwegwe nɨ kɨtwalo ɨkya kʉbatʉʉla abangɨ, ʉkʉtɨ abeene kɨjege kɨpepe, looli ngʉlonda mufwanege itolo.
Akabalɨlo aka bo mulɨ nʉ tʉndʉ ʉtwingi, mubatʉʉlege aba bakaja nato, ʉkʉtɨ boope akabalɨlo aka bikwisa kʉja nato twingi, bikwisa kʉbatʉʉlaga ʉmwe. Kʉlɨ ɨsyo mukʉfwanaga,
bo muno sisimbiigwe mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo ʉkʉtɨ, “Ʉjʉ aabʉngeenie twingi, akaalɨ nato ʉtwa kʉkɨndapo, ʉjʉ aabʉngeenie tʉnandɨ akaalyagiilwe.”
Ngʉntuufya Kyala ʉjʉ ampeele Tiiti ɨndumbula ɨjɨ ndɨ najo ʉne, ɨjaa kʉbatʉʉla ʉmwe.
Namanga bo tʉnsʉʉmile ʉkʉtɨ iise kʉmyɨnu, aaliitiike. Kʉkaja kokʉtɨ aaliitiike itolo, looli ʉmwene ikʉnyonywa fiijo ʉkwisa kʉ bwigane bwake jʉʉjo.
Pamopeene nagwe, tukʉntʉma nʉ gwamyɨtʉ ʉjʉngɨ, ʉjʉ ɨfipanga fyosa ɨfya Kyala fikʉmpa ʉlwɨmɨko mu mbombo ɨjaa kʉfumusya ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu.

Kangɨ ɨfipanga ɨfya Kyala finsalile ʉgwamyɨtʉ ʉjo, ʉkʉtɨ aje pamopeene na nuuswe bo tukʉtwala kʉ Jelusalemu ɨfya kʉbatʉʉla abandʉ. Ɨmbombo ɨjo, jikwisa kʉntuufya Kyala, kangɨ jikwisa kʉnangɨsya ʉkʉnyonywa kwɨtʉ ʉkʉbatʉʉla abangɨ.
Tukwenda ɨnjɨla pamopeene paapo tʉkiigana ʉkʉjobigwa ʉbʉbiibi nʉ mundʉ, kʉnongwa jaa kwɨmɨlɨla ʉkʉtwala ʉtʉndʉ, ʉtʉ abandʉ basoosiisye kʉ booloolo bwabo.
Ɨnyango jɨɨtʉ, tukʉlonda ʉkʉbomba kanunu nkyeni mwa Kyala na nkyeni mmbandʉ.
Po pamopeene na baa Tiiti, tukʉntʉma ʉgwamyɨtʉ ʉjʉngɨ. Ʉjo tʉmmbwene kaa kingi, ʉkʉtɨ ikʉnyonywa ʉkʉtʉʉla. Kangɨ akabalɨlo aka ikʉnyonywa fiijo ʉkʉbatʉʉla, paapo ikʉbasʉʉbɨla fiijo ʉmwe.

Po lɨnga ʉmundʉ ikʉlonda ʉkʉsyagania ɨsya Tiiti, ʉmwene mbombeli mwinɨɨtʉ nkʉbabombela ʉmwe. Kangɨ lɨnga ikʉlonda ʉkʉsyagania ɨsya baamyɨtʉ bala abangɨ, abeene batʉmiigwe nɨ fipanga fya Kyala, boope bikʉmpa ʉbʉsisya Kɨlɨsiti.
Po leelo, mubanangɨsye abandʉ abo ʉlʉgano lwɨnu, ʉkʉtɨ abiitɨki abaa mfipanga fyosa ɨfya Kyala basyaganie, ʉkʉtɨ mubagiisye ʉkʉtuufigwa na nuuswe.
Po ndikʉlondigwa ʉkʉbasimbɨla ɨsya bʉtʉʉli bwɨnu ʉbo kʉ biitɨki abaa kʉ Jelusalemu.

Namanga njɨmeenye ɨndumbula jɨɨnu ɨjaa kʉbatʉʉla abangɨ. Na niine nikwituukɨfya ʉmwe kʉ biitɨki abaa mu Maketonija ʉkʉtɨ, ʉmwe mwe baa nkɨpanga kya Kyala ɨkya mu Akaja mwaliitendekiisye ʉkʉsoosya, ʉkʉfuma nkyɨnja ɨkɨ kɨkɨndile. Kʉ ndumbula jɨɨnu ɨjaa kʉsoosya, mubapelile abandʉ bingi pakatɨ pamyabo ʉkʉnyonywa ʉkʉsoosya.
Po ngʉbatʉma abaamyɨtʉ aba, baa Tiiti. Ngʉbalonda mwitendekesye, bo muno naababʉʉliile abiitɨki abaa mu Maketonija, ʉkʉtɨ ɨsi twabatuufyaga ʉmwe, silɨngaboneka ʉkʉtɨ twabatuufyaga itolo.
Looli lɨnga niisile ʉko pamopeene na Bamaketonija bamo, nʉ kwaga mukiitendekesya, apo bo mungosiisye ɨsoni, kʉnongwa jaa lʉsʉʉbɨlo lwɨtʉ kʉmyɨnu. Kangɨ na nuumwe aamukʉsʉʉka fiijo.
Jo nongwa ɨjɨ naagile kanunu ʉkʉbasʉʉma abaamyɨtʉ aba, batalepo ʉko, ʉkʉtɨ batendekesye ʉtʉndʉ ʉtʉ mwafingile ʉkʉsoosya. Apo bo musoosiisye nɨ ndumbula ɨnyeelu, kɨsita kʉfimbɨlɨsigwa.
Mukʉmbʉkege ʉkʉtɨ, “Ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ ikʉsopa finandɨ, ikʉtondola finandɨ, kangɨ ʉjʉ ikʉsopa fingi, ikʉtondola fingi.”
Ʉmundʉ gwesa asoosyege ɨfi atumwile mu ndumbula jaake. Aleke ʉkʉsoosya kʉ bʉsulumanie nʉ kʉfimbɨlɨsigwa, paapo Kyala annganile ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ ikʉsoosya nɨ ndumbula ɨnyeelu.
Po Kyala abagiile ʉkʉbiisʉsya iipyana lyake kʉ bwingi fiijo, ʉkʉtɨ akabalɨlo koosa mujege nʉ tʉndʉ toosa ʉtʉ mukʉlonda mbʉʉmi bwɨnu, kangɨ ʉkʉtɨ mujege na maka mingi agaa kʉbomba ɨmbombo ɨnunu.
Bo muno sisimbiigwe mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo ʉkʉtɨ,
“Asoosiisye nɨ ndumbula joosa, ʉkʉbapa abalondo,
ʉbʉgolofu bwake bwa bwila na bwila.”
Kyala jo ʉjʉ ikʉmpa ʉmundʉ ɨmbeju ɨsya kʉbyala, nɨ kɨsyesye ɨkya kʉlya, aikongelapo ʉkʉbapa ɨmbeju ɨsya kʉbyala nʉ kʉsibaasya mu ngʉnda. Kokʉtɨ aikʉbapa nʉ kʉbongelapo ɨndumbula ɨjaa booloolo.
Ikʉbapaga ʉbʉkabi ndɨ syosa, ʉkʉtɨ mujege booloolo akabalɨlo koosa. Kʉlɨ ɨsyo abandʉ bikʉntuufyaga Kyala kʉnongwa jaa tʉndʉ ʉtʉ mukʉsoosya ʉkwendela kʉmyɨtʉ.
Ɨmbombo ɨjɨ mukʉbomba, jɨtikʉbatʉʉlaga beene itolo abiitɨki aba baagiilwe, looli jikʉbapelaga abandʉ bingi ʉkʉnngwɨla ʉlʉpi fiijo Kyala.

Ɨmbombo ɨjo jikʉnangɨsyaga ʉbʉpe bwɨnu, kangɨ abandʉ bikʉntuufyaga Kyala paapo ʉmwe mukʉjiitɨka ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu ɨjaa Kɨlɨsiti nʉ kʉkonga ɨmanyisyo syake. Kangɨ bikʉntuufyaga Kyala kʉnongwa jaa booloolo bwɨnu ʉbwa bʉlɨɨlanisi nabo, na bangɨ boosa.
Po bikʉbasʉʉmɨlaga kwa Kyala nɨ ndumbula joosa, kʉnongwa jaa ipyana ɨlɨ abapeele ʉmwe kʉ bwingi.
Kyala atuufigwege fiijo kʉ kɨkʉngɨlwa kyake ɨkɨkʉlʉmba, ɨkɨ kɨsikɨndile ɨnduufyo syosa!
Po ʉne Paʉli, ne mukʉtɨ ndɨ mooloolo bo ndɨ pamopeene na nuumwe, looli ndɨ nkalɨ bo ndɨ pabʉtali na nuumwe, ngʉbapyelesya kʉ lwijiisyo na kʉ booloolo bwa Kɨlɨsiti, mumbɨlɨkɨsyege!
Bamo pakatɨ pamyɨnu bikʉtɨ ʉswe tukʉkonga ɨsya pakiisʉ apa. Bo niisile kʉmyɨnu, angʉja nkalɨ fiijo kʉ bandʉ bala, looli muleke ʉkʉʉmbɨɨka ʉkʉja nkalɨ kʉmyɨnu koope.
Nalɨnga tukʉtʉʉgala pakiisʉ apa, tʉtikʉlwa ʉbwite bo ʉlwa bandʉ abaa pakiisʉ.
Ɨfilwɨlo ɨfi tukʉlwɨla ʉbwite ʉbo fikaja fya pakiisʉ, looli filɨ na maka agaa kʉfuma kwa Kyala, fikoonanga amalinga goosa agaa ndʉgʉ.
Tukoonanga amasyʉ goosa agaa matingo aga gikʉbasigɨla abandʉ ʉkʉmmanya Kyala. Kangɨ tukʉsikola ɨnyiinogono syosa ʉkʉtɨ sintiilege Kɨlɨsiti.
Bo munangiisye pabwelu ʉkʉtɨ mukʉbwɨmɨka ʉbʉlongosi bwɨtʉ, aatukwitendekesya ʉkʉbalonga aba bikwendelela ʉkʉkaana.
Namukeete ɨfi filɨ nkyeni mmyɨnu.
Ʉmundʉ gwesa ʉjʉ ikwibona ʉkʉtɨ ʉmwene gwa Kɨlɨsiti, asyaganiege ʉkʉtɨ na nuuswe tʉlɨ bandʉ baa Kɨlɨsiti bo ʉmwene.
Pamo ngɨɨsiisyepo panandɨ ʉkwituufya ɨsya bʉlagɨli ʉbʉ ʉNtwa Jesu atʉpeele, poope ndikʉja nɨ soni, namanga aatʉpeele ʉbʉlagɨli ʉbo ʉkʉtɨ tʉbakasye, somma ʉkʉboonanga.
Ngabɨngɨlɨla ʉkʉbatiilɨsya na baakalata aba ngʉbasimbɨla.
Paapo bamo bikʉtɨ, “Baakalata baa Paʉli balɨ na masyʉ amakalɨ, kangɨ masito. Looli bo alɨ na nuuswe atikʉja na maka, kangɨ amasyʉ gaake gaa itolo.”
Po ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ ikʉjoba bo ʉlo, asyaganiege ʉkʉtɨ ɨsi tukʉbasimbɨla bo tʉlɨ kʉbʉtali, syo ɨsi aatukʉsibombaga bo tʉlɨ na nuumwe.
Tʉtikwinogona ʉkwibɨɨka pamo ʉkwifwanikɨsya na bandʉ bala aba bikwituufya. Bakonyofu bala! Bikwifwanikɨsya nʉ kwipɨma nɨ fipɨmɨlo fyabo abeene.
Aatʉtikwituufya kʉ mbombo ɨsi babombile abandʉ abangɨ, looli tʉbagiisye ʉkwituufya kʉ mbombo ɨsi atʉpeele Kyala ʉkʉsibomba. Ɨmbombo ɨjɨ jɨfikile na kʉmyɨnu.
Nalooli, twalɨ jo ʉswe twe twalɨ baa kwanda ʉkʉbatwalɨla ʉmwe ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu ɨjaa Kɨlɨsiti. Lɨnga sikaalɨ bo ʉlo, amasyʉ gɨɨtʉ aga, ngalɨ gaa kwituufya fiijo.
Kangɨ tʉtikwituufya kʉ mbombo ɨsya bandʉ abangɨ, ɨsi ʉswe tʉkaasibombile. Looli tukʉsʉʉbɨla ʉkʉtɨ bo ʉlwitɨko lwɨnu lukongelela ʉkʉkʉla, po ɨmbombo jɨɨtʉ pakatɨ pamyɨnu jikongelelaga fiijo.
Apo po aatukʉfumusyaga ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu mfiisʉ ɨfingi, kʉno ɨndʉmi ɨjo jɨkafumusigwa. Namanga tʉkiigana ʉkwituufya kʉ mbombo ɨjɨ jɨbombiigwe kʉno apeeliigwe ʉmundʉ ʉjʉngɨ.
Kalata ʉMwikemo ikʉtɨ,
“Ʉmundʉ gwesa ʉjʉ ikwituufya,
iituukɨfyege mu Ntwa.”
Ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ ʉNtwa Jesu ikʉmmwitɨkɨsya, akaja jo jʉla ikwituufya, looli ʉjʉ ikʉtuufigwa nʉ Ntwa.
Ngʉbasʉʉma mufise ɨlyojo, nalɨnga ngʉjoba ngatɨ ndɨ nkonyofu. Ngʉbasʉʉma mufise ɨlyojo!
Ʉne mbaganile fiijo, bo ʉlʉ Kyala abaganile, namanga mulɨ bo ʉlwa ndɨndwana ʉjʉ akammanyamo sikʉ ʉnnyambala, ʉjʉ naalɨmmwitɨkiisye ʉkwegigwa nʉ nnyambala jʉmojwene, ʉjʉ jo Kɨlɨsiti.
Looli lɨɨlɨno ngʉtiila ʉkʉtɨ, bo ʉlwa Efwa muno aasyobiigwe nɨ njoka jɨla ɨngomu, na nuumwe mulɨngiisa kʉsyobigwa, ʉkʉbʉleka ʉbʉgolofu nʉ lʉgano lwɨnu ʉlwa nalooli kwa Kɨlɨsiti.

Ngʉjoba bo ʉlo paapo ʉmwe mulɨ bengo ʉkʉmmwambɨlɨla ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ ikwisa kʉkʉmfumusya Jesu ʉjʉngɨ, ʉjʉ ʉswe tʉkaalɨmfumwisye. Kangɨ mulɨ bengo ʉkʉmmwambɨlɨla mbepo ʉjʉngɨ, pamo ɨndʉmi ɨjɨngɨ, ɨfi mukaalyambɨliile ʉkʉfuma kʉmyɨtʉ.
Ʉne kʉkaja kokʉtɨ ndɨ nnandɨ ʉkʉbakɨnda aba bikwibona ʉkʉja, “Batʉmigwa bakʉlʉmba.”
Nalɨnga sya nalooli ʉkʉtɨ ʉne ngamanya ʉkʉlʉmbɨlɨla kanunu nkyeni nkɨlʉndɨlo ɨkya bandʉ, poope ngaagɨlwa ʉbʉmanyi. Nnangiisye ɨsyo kʉmyɨnu akabalɨlo koosa kʉ njɨla syosa.
Naaliijiisiisye ʉkʉfumusya kʉmyɨnu ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu ɨjaa Kyala, kɨsita kʉhombigwa, ʉkʉtɨ ʉmwe mwinʉligwe. Bʉle, naabombile kabiibi ʉkwijiisya?
Bo ngʉbomba ɨmbombo kʉmyɨnu, nambɨlɨlaga ɨfya bʉtʉʉli ʉkʉfuma kʉ fipanga ɨfya Kyala ɨfingi. Naafwene ngatɨ ngʉpoka ʉtʉndʉ twabo, ʉkʉtɨ mbatʉʉle ʉmwe.

Akabalɨlo ako lɨnga naagiilwe fimo, ngaabataamiisyepo, paapo abiitɨki biinɨɨtʉ abaa mu Maketonija baalɨmbeele ɨfi ngʉlonda. Niitiimaga ʉkʉtɨ ndɨngabatwalɨla ʉmwe ʉbʉtolwe na panandɨ. Ndikwisa kʉbatwalɨlamo ʉbʉtolwe sikʉ!
Ʉbwanalooli bwa Kɨlɨsiti bo ʉlʉ bʉjɨɨliile nkatɨ mmyangʉ, akajako ʉmundʉ najʉmo ntwaja toosa ʉtwa mu Akaja, ʉjʉ abagiile ʉkʉʉsigɨla ʉkwituufya kʉlɨ ɨsi.
Bʉle, ngabagana? Kyala ameenye ʉkʉtɨ mbaganile.
Ngwendelelaga ʉkʉbomba bo ʉlʉ ngʉbomba lɨɨlɨno, ʉkʉtɨ abatʉmigwa abo aba bikwibona bakʉlʉmba, batoligwe ɨfya kwituukɨfya ʉkʉtɨ bikʉbomba ɨmbombo bo ɨjɨɨtʉ.
Abandʉ bo abo, batʉmigwa baa bʉtʉngʉlʉ, bo babombeli abasyobi, bikwibɨɨka ʉkʉja ngatɨ batʉmigwa baa Kɨlɨsiti.
Ndɨ ɨsyo tʉtikʉswiga, paapo joope Seetano ikwibɨɨka ngatɨ gwandʉmi gwa lʉmuli.
Po leelo tʉtikʉswiga apa boope ababombeli baake bikwibɨɨka ʉkʉja ngatɨ babombeli bagolofu. Ʉmmalɨɨkɨsyo gwabo aabikwambɨlɨla ɨsi sifwene nɨ mbombo jaabo.
Ngʉjoba kangɨ, ʉmundʉ alɨngiinogonaga ʉkʉtɨ ʉne ndɨ nkonyofu! Looli nalɨnga mukʉʉnjoba ʉkʉtɨ ndɨ nkonyofu, muundeke nje nkonyofu, mumbɨlɨkɨsye, ʉkʉtɨ na niine niituufyepo panandɨ.
Amasyʉ aga ndɨ pakʉjoba ʉlʉ, gakaja go aga aalɨɨndagiile ʉNtwa Jesu, looli ʉkwituufya ʉkʉ ngʉjoba bo ʉlwa mundʉ ʉnkonyofu itolo.
Paapo bingi bikwituufya kʉ mbombo sya pakiisʉ apa, na niine ngwituufya.
Ʉmwe mukwibona mulɨ na mahala! Looli mutikʉpaasya, mukʉbiitɨkɨla abandʉ abakonyofu!
Nalooli, mukʉʉmɨɨlɨla nʉ kʉmmwitɨka nʉ mundʉ ʉjʉ ikʉbabɨɨka mbʉtʉmwa! Pamo ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ ikʉbiibɨla nʉ kʉpoka ʉtʉndʉ twɨnu! Pamo ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ ikʉkabɨlamo kʉmyɨnu, pamo ikʉbatʉka nʉ kʉbakoma kʉmaaso!
Sikʉngola ɨsoni ʉkʉjoba, po ʉswe twalɨ boonywa ʉkʉbomba ɨsyo!
Lɨnga aliko ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ abagiisye ʉkwituufya ndɨ simo, na niine mbagiisye ʉkwituufya, looli ndɨ pakʉjoba bo ʉlwa mundʉ ʉnkonyofu muno ikʉjobela!

Bʉle, abeene bikwituufya ʉkʉtɨ Bahibʉli? Na niine ndɨ Nhibʉli. Bʉle, bikwituufya ʉkʉtɨ Banyaisilaɨli? Na niine ndɨ Mwisilaɨli. Bʉle, bikwituufya ʉkʉtɨ baa ndʉjungu lwa Abulahamu? Na niine ndɨ gwa ndʉjungu lwa Abulahamu.

Bʉle, abeene bikwituufya ʉkʉtɨ babombeli baa Kɨlɨsiti? Ʉne ndɨ mbombeli gwa Kɨlɨsiti ʉkʉbakɨnda abeene! Ʉne niijʉʉlile ʉkʉbomba ɨmbombo ʉkʉkɨndapo. Mbinyiigwemo mu nnyololo kaa kingi ʉkʉkɨndapo. Ngomiigwemo fiijo, kangɨ ndɨ mbʉtolwe ʉbwa kʉfwa kaa kingi, ʉkʉbakɨnda abeene. Ʉlʉ ndɨ pakʉjoba bo ʉlwa mundʉ ʉgwa kɨgɨlɨ.
Kahaano ngomiigwe ɨfingoti 39 na Bajuuta.
Katatʉ ngomiigwe ɨngili sya Balooma, kamo nduunyiigwe na mabwe, katatʉ ɨsitima jɨɨnyoonangɨkiile, kangɨ iisikʉ lɨmo naakupwike, naalɨ mu nyanja pakɨlo na pamuusi.

Ɨnjɨla nyingi ɨsi nendaga, naalɨ mbʉtolwe ʉbwa kʉloboka ɨnyɨɨsi ɨsi siiswile, mbʉtolwe ʉbwa kʉkoligwa nɨ minyambuta, mbʉtolwe ʉbwa kʉkomigwa na Bajuuta biinangʉ, nʉ kʉkomigwa na bapanja. Naalɨ mbʉtolwe ntwaja na mmatengele, mbʉtolwe ʉbwa kwenda mu nyanja, na mbʉtolwe ʉbwa ngʉbɨlo ɨsya bandʉ aba bikwibɨɨka ʉkʉja biitɨki biinɨɨtʉ.
Mbombile ɨmbombo ɨngafu nʉ kʉtaamigwa, kingi ngonile maaso, ndaamiigwe nɨ njala nɨ kyʉmɨlwa, kaa kingi ngalyamo ɨfindʉ, nʉ kʉtʉʉgala mu mbepo kɨsita myenda.
Pamopeene na ɨsyo syosa, kʉkʉtɨ isikʉ ndɨ nɨ kɨtwalo ɨkya kwɨmɨlɨla ɨfipanga fya Kyala fyosa.
Lɨnga ʉmundʉ gwesa moonywa, niine ngwipɨlɨka ʉboonywa. Lɨnga jʉmo bampelile ʉkʉgwɨla mbʉtʉlanongwa, ʉne ngʉsulumania.
Lɨnga ngʉlondigwa ʉkwituufya, ngwituufya kʉ boonywa bwangʉ.
Kyala, ʉGwise gwa Ntwa Jesu, ʉjʉ ikʉlondigwa ʉkʉtuufigwa bwila na bwila, ameenye ʉkʉtɨ ndikʉjoba ɨsya bʉtʉngʉlʉ.
Akabalɨlo aka naalɨ mu Ndamasika, ʉndongosi ʉjʉ aasaliigwe nʉ malafyale Aleta, aabɨɨkile abalɨndɨlɨli mfipata fya kaaja, ʉkʉtɨ bangole.
Leelo abandʉ bamo baalɨɨsulwisye nkiibo pi itʉʉlo lya imato, naaponile ʉkʉkoligwa.
Ngʉlondigwa ʉkwituufya, nalɨnga ndikʉkaba nafimo. Po ʉlʉ mpaka njobe ɨsya fisetʉka
na ɨsi aasetʉliile ʉNtwa Jesu.
Nʉmmeenye ʉmundʉ jʉmo, ʉNkɨlɨsiti,
ʉjʉ ɨfyɨnja kalongo na fina fikɨndile, aafyʉsiigwe mpaka kʉmwanya fiijo.
Ngamanya ʉkʉtɨ aalɨ mu mbɨlɨ, pamo akaalɨ mu mbɨlɨ bo ikʉfyʉsigwa, looli Kyala jo ʉjʉ ameenye.

Mmeenye ʉkʉtɨ ʉmundʉ ʉjo aafyʉsiigwe mpaka ʉkʉfika kʉla kʉmwanya, looli ngamanya ʉkʉtɨ pamo aafyʉsiigwe bo aalɨ mu mbɨlɨ, pamo akaalɨ mu mbɨlɨ, looli Kyala jo ʉjʉ ameenye. Ʉko alɨnkʉpɨlɨka amasyʉ agaa kʉswigɨsya fiijo, aga ʉmundʉ akiitɨkɨsigwa ʉkʉgajoba.

Mmeenye ʉkʉtɨ ʉmundʉ ʉjo aafyʉsiigwe mpaka ʉkʉfika kʉla kʉmwanya, looli ngamanya ʉkʉtɨ pamo aafyʉsiigwe bo aalɨ mu mbɨlɨ, pamo akaalɨ mu mbɨlɨ, looli Kyala jo ʉjʉ ameenye. Ʉko alɨnkʉpɨlɨka amasyʉ agaa kʉswigɨsya fiijo, aga ʉmundʉ akiitɨkɨsigwa ʉkʉgajoba.
Po ʉlʉ angwituufya kʉ mundʉ ʉjo, leelo ndikwituufya muno njɨɨliile ʉne, looli ngwituufya kʉ boonywa bwangʉ.
Poope nalɨnga naalondaga ʉkwituufya, ngaajaga nkonyofu, paapo ngalɨ ngʉjoba ɨsya bwanalooli. Looli ngwisigɨla ʉkwituufya, ʉkʉtɨ ʉmundʉ angaanyiinogonelaga ʉkʉkɨnda ɨsi ngʉbomba na ɨsi ngʉjoba.

Leelo ʉkʉtɨ ndɨngiituufyaga fiijo kʉnongwa jaa ɨsi ʉNtwa Jesu aasetʉliile, naapeeliigwe ɨngʉbɨlo ɨngalɨ mu mbɨlɨ gwangʉ, bo ʉlwa mwifwa. Gʉfwene bo ʉlwa gwandʉmi gwa Seetano ʉjʉ atʉmiigwe, ʉkʉtɨ angʉfyege nʉ kʉʉsigɨla ʉkʉkɨndɨlɨla ʉkwituufya.
Katatʉ naapyeliisye kʉ Ntwa, ʉkʉtɨ amboke mu ngʉbɨlo ɨsyo.

Looli ʉmwene aalɨɨmbʉʉlile aatile, “Iipyana lyangʉ likʉfwene, namanga mboonywa mo muno amaka gangʉ gikʉboneka.” Ndɨ ɨlyo, ngwituufyaga nʉ kʉbʉsekela fiijo ʉboonywa bwangʉ, ʉkʉtɨ amaka gaa Kɨlɨsiti gaboneke mmyangʉ.
Po ndɨ nʉ lʉsekelo mboonywa bwangʉ, nkʉtʉkigwa, mbʉtolwe, mu ngʉbɨlo nʉ kʉtaamigwa, kʉnongwa jaa Kɨlɨsiti. Namanga apa ngʉja moonywa, po apa ngʉja na maka.

Ngʉjoba ngatɨ ndɨ nkonyofu, looli ʉmwe muufimbɨliisye ʉkʉbomba bo ʉlo. Jo ʉmwe mwalondigwaga ʉkʉnduufya ʉne, paapo nalɨnga ngʉboneka ʉkʉsita kʉbagɨsya, ʉne ngaja ntʉmigwa ʉnnandɨ ʉkʉbakɨnda bala, aba mukʉtɨ bo, “Batʉmigwa abakʉlʉmba.”
Bo ndɨ kʉmyɨnu, naalyʉmɨɨliile ʉkʉbomba ɨfiika nɨ fimanyilo ɨfi fikʉnangɨsya ʉkʉtɨ ʉne ndɨ ntʉmigwa gwa bwanalooli.
Namanga fyo filɨkʉ ɨfi mwalyagiilwe ʉkʉkɨnda ɨfipanga fya Kyala ɨfingi? Kaaliko akandʉ kamokeene itolo aka mwalyagiilwe, akaa kʉʉhomba ʉmfwalo gwangʉ! Ndaga fiijo kʉ bʉtolwe ʉbʉ! Muuswege!

Ʉlʉ ngwitendekesya ʉkwisa kʉmyɨnu ʉlwa bʉtatʉ, ndikwisa kʉbatimbɨkɨlaga. Ndikʉlonda ɨfyɨnu, looli ngʉbalonda ʉmwe. Abaana batikʉlondigwa ʉkʉbabɨɨkɨla ʉtʉndʉ abapaapi baabo, looli abapaapi bikʉlondigwa ʉkʉbabɨɨkɨla ɨkyʉma abaanaabo.
Ʉne ndɨ nʉ lʉsekelo ʉkʉsoosya ʉtʉndʉ twangʉ toosa, kangɨ ʉkwininga, ʉkʉbatʉʉla ʉmwe. Lɨnga ngʉkɨɨsya ʉkʉbagana bo ʉlʉ, kalɨ, ʉlʉgano lwɨnu lukʉnaganikaga?
Nalɨnga mwitiike ʉkʉtɨ ngaabatimbɨkiile, leelo bamo pakatɨ pamyɨnu bikʉtɨ, “Paʉli nkomu, abaagile kʉ bʉsyobi.”
Bʉle, naalɨntʉmilepo ʉmundʉ kʉmyɨnu ʉjʉ aabasyobile nʉ kwega ʉtʉndʉ twɨnu? Akajako najʉmo!

Naalɨnkaseenie Tiiti ʉkwisa kʉmyɨnu, pamopeene nʉ gwamyɨtʉ ʉjʉngɨ jʉla. Bʉle, Tiiti aalyegilepo kamo kʉmyɨnu? Keeta ʉne nʉ mwene tʉlɨ ndumbula jɨmojeene mu mbombo, kangɨ akajɨɨlo kɨɨtʉ kalɨ kamokeene!
Pamo mukwinogona ʉkʉtɨ akabalɨlo koosa aka, tukwinosya. Hɨmma! Tukʉjoba nkyeni mwa Kyala, twe bandʉ baa Kɨlɨsiti. Bakʉndwe, syosa ɨsi tukʉbomba sya kʉbatʉʉla ʉmwe.

Ngʉpaasya bo mfikile kʉmyɨnu, ʉkʉbaaga na kajɨɨlo aka ngakagana ʉne. Kangɨ akajɨɨlo kangʉ katikwisa kʉbahobosya ʉmwe. Ngʉpaasya ʉkʉbaaga nʉ bwite, ʉbʉʉfi, ɨlyojo nʉ kʉsita kʉpaasya abangɨ. Aakukʉja nʉ kʉtʉngʉlʉpɨlanila, ʉkʉheehana, amatingo nʉ kʉtapʉkana.

Kangɨ ngʉpaasya ʉkʉtɨ bo mfikile kʉmyɨnu, Kyala gwangʉ aikʉʉsʉʉsya nkyeni mmyɨnu. Ngwisa kʉsulumania ʉkʉbaaga abandʉ bingi pakatɨ pamyɨnu aba baabombile ʉbʉtʉlanongwa kʉbwandɨlo, bakasʉʉma ʉlʉhobokelo. Bakaalɨ balɨ na kajɨɨlo akabiibi akaa bʉlogwe nɨ finyonyo ɨfibiibi ɨfi baabombaga.
Ʉlʉ lukʉjaga lwa bʉtatʉ ʉkwisako kʉmyɨnu. Kalata ʉMwikemo ikʉtɨ, “Bajepo abakeeti babɨlɨ pamo batatʉ abaa kʉsisimɨkɨsya kʉkʉtɨ kandʉ.”

Po bo ndɨ kʉmyɨnu ʉlwa bʉbɨlɨ, naabasokile mwesa, ʉkʉtɨ mubʉleke ʉbʉtʉlanongwa bwɨnu, fiijo aba bendelelaga na kajɨɨlo kaabo akabiibi. Ʉlʉ bo ndɨ kʉbʉtali, ngʉbasoka kangɨ. Bo mfikile kʉmyɨnu, ndikwisa kʉbapaakɨsya abandʉ bala.
Mukʉlonda ɨkɨmanyilo ɨkya Kɨlɨsiti ʉkʉjoba ʉkwendela mmyangʉ. Po ɨsi mbombile kikʉja kɨmanyilo. Kɨlɨsiti akaja moonywa kʉmyɨnu, looli alɨ na maka fiijo pakatɨ pamyɨnu.

Kɨlɨsiti aalɨ moonywa bo ikʉkomeleligwa pa kɨkohekano, looli akabalɨlo aka mʉʉmi mmaka gaa Kyala. Bʉbʉʉbo na nuuswe tʉlɨ boonywa mwa Kɨlɨsiti, looli mmaka gaa Kyala tukʉjaga bʉʉmi pamopeene na Kɨlɨsiti, ʉkʉtɨ tʉbabombelege.
Po amwijeeneesye jʉjʉʉmwe, ʉkʉtɨ mumanye lɨnga ʉlwitɨko lwɨnu lwa nalooli. Mwijeeneesye kanunu. Bʉle, mukamanya ʉkʉtɨ Jesu Kɨlɨsiti alimo nkatɨ mmyɨnu? Lɨnga akaja nkatɨ mmyɨnu, po mutoliigwe.
Looli ngʉsʉʉbɨla ʉkʉtɨ ʉmwe aamukʉsyagania ʉkʉtɨ ʉswe tʉkatoligwa.

Tukʉnsʉʉma Kyala ʉkʉtɨ mulɨngabombapo ʉbʉtʉlanongwa nabʉmo. Kʉkaja kokʉtɨ tukʉlonda ʉkʉboneka ʉkʉja bandʉ baa kwɨmɨkigwa, looli tukʉlonda ʉmwe mubombege syene ɨnunu, nalɨnga abandʉ abangɨ bikwinogona ʉkʉtɨ tʉtoliigwe.
Namanga tʉkaja na maka agaa kʉbʉsigɨla ʉbwanalooli, looli ʉkʉbʉlwɨla.
Tukʉhoboka bo mulɨ na maka, nalɨnga ʉswe tʉlɨ boonywa. Tukʉnsʉʉma Kyala abatʉʉle, mukake ndwitɨko.
Ngʉbasimbɨla amasyʉ aga akabalɨlo aka, bo ngaalɨ ʉkwisa, ʉkʉtɨ bo mfikile kʉmyɨnu, ndɨngasyaga ɨsya kʉmbela ʉkʉja nkalɨ. ɄNtwa Jesu ambeele ʉbʉlagɨli ʉbʉ, ʉkʉbajenga ndwitɨko, somma ʉkʉbagwɨsya.
Po baamyɨtʉ, musekelege. Mwɨme kanunu, amasyʉ gangʉ gabakasyege, mujege kandʉ kamokeene, mujege nʉ lʉtengaano. Po Kyala ʉgwa lʉgano nʉ lʉtengaano ikʉjaga pamopeene na nuumwe.
Namuponaniege kʉ lʉgano lwa Kɨlɨsiti.
Abiitɨki boosa aba balɨ pamopeene na nuuswe, bikʉbaponia.
Ɨliipyana lya Ntwa Jesu Kɨlɨsiti nʉ lʉgano lwa Kyala, nʉ bʉlɨɨlanisi bwa Mbepo Mwikemo, fijege pamopeene na nuumwe mwesa.
Galatians: Kalata ʉjʉ afumile kʉmyangʉ Paʉli ne ntʉmigwa. Ʉne ngaatʉmiigwe na bandʉ pamo ʉkʉlagɨligwa nʉ mundʉ jʉmo. Looli naatʉmiigwe na Jesu Kɨlɨsiti jʉʉjo, na Taata Kyala ʉjʉ aalɨnsyʉsiisye Jesu ʉkʉfuma mbafwe.
Ʉne na biitɨki biinɨɨtʉ boosa aba balɨ pamopeene na niine tukʉbaponia ʉmwe, mwe baa mfipanga ɨfya Kyala ɨfya nkiisʉ ɨkya mu Galatija.
Ɨliipyana nʉ lʉtengaano ʉkʉfuma kwa Taata Kyala na kʉ Ntwa Jesu Kɨlɨsiti, fijege na nuumwe.
Kɨlɨsiti aabʉningile ʉbʉʉmi bwake, kʉnongwa jaa kʉbʉsoosyamo ʉbʉtʉlanongwa bwɨtʉ, ʉkʉtɨ atʉpoke ʉkʉfuma mu mbiibi syosa ɨsya pakiisʉ ɨkya kabalɨlo aka, ʉkʉkongana nʉ bwigane ʉbwa Kyala ʉjʉ jo Taata.
Kʉmyake Kyala bʉjengeko ʉbʉsisya bwila na bwila. Ameni.
Nswigile fiijo, akabalɨlo akapimba itolo kakɨndile, ʉmwe munsambʉkiile Kyala ʉjʉ aabakooliile ni ipyana lya Kɨlɨsiti. Kangɨ mukʉlʉkonga ʉlʉlagɨlo ʉlʉngɨ ʉlʉ bamo bikʉtɨ jo Ndʉmi ɨNunu,
nalɨnga jɨkaja Ndʉmi Nunu na panandɨ. Looli nalooli baliko abandʉ aba bikʉbasofania ʉmwe, kangɨ aba bikʉlonda ʉkwandʉla ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu ɨjaa Kɨlɨsiti.
Lɨnga ʉmundʉ gwesa jʉla iisaga nʉ kʉbalʉmbɨlɨla ɨndʉmi ɨjɨ jɨlɨ pasima na ɨjɨ naabalʉmbɨliile ʉne, ʉmundʉ ʉjo alɨ nɨ kɨgune! Nalɨnga afumile nkɨbugutɨla kyangʉ! Nalɨnga gwandʉmi afumile kʉmwanya!
Ngʉbabʉʉla ʉmwe kangɨ bo ʉlʉ naababʉʉlile akabalɨlo kala ʉkʉtɨ, lɨnga ʉmundʉ jʉmo ikʉbalʉmbɨlɨla ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu ɨjaa lʉko ʉlʉngɨ, ɨjɨ jɨlɨ pasima na ɨjɨ mwalyambɨliile, ʉjo alɨ nɨ kɨgune!
Bʉle, lɨɨlɨno mukwinogona ʉkʉtɨ ʉne ngʉlonda ʉkʉbakyela abandʉ? Mma, ngʉlonda ʉkʉnkyela Kyala mwene! Lɨnga naalondaga ʉkʉbakyela abandʉ, ʉne ngalɨ ngaja mbombeli gwa Jesu Kɨlɨsiti nakamo.
Baamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko, ngʉlonda mumanye ʉkʉtɨ, ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu ɨjɨ naabatwaliile ʉne jɨkaafumile kʉ bandʉ.
Ngaalyambɨliile ʉkʉfuma kʉ bandʉ, kangɨ akaalɨɨmanyiisye ʉmundʉ najʉmo. Looli Jesu Kɨlɨsiti jʉʉjo jo ʉjʉ aalɨɨsetʉliile.
Kɨsita kwilaamwa mupɨliike muno naajɨɨliile bo ndɨ ndwitɨko ʉlwa Bajuuta, na muno naabataamikɨsyaga fiijo abandʉ abaa nkɨpanga kya Kyala, nʉ kʉlonda ʉkʉkɨgoga loosa.
Nalooli naabatolile abiinangʉ bingi abaa ngʉlɨlo jangʉ ʉkʉlʉlwɨla ʉlwitɨko ʉlwa Bajuuta. Niijʉʉlaga fiijo ʉkʉsikola ɨmanyisyo ɨsya biisʉkʉlʉ bɨɨtʉ.
Looli Kyala, kwi ipyana lyake, aalɨɨsʉngwile bo ngaalɨ ʉkʉpaapigwa, aalɨngooliile ʉkʉmmbombela.
Aalyagile kanunu ʉkʉʉsetʉlɨla ʉMwanaake
muno ajɨɨliile, ʉkʉtɨ mfumusyege ɨndʉmi jaake kʉ bandʉ aba bakaja Bajuuta. Akabalɨlo kala ngaabalondile abandʉ abaa kʉʉmbʉʉla mbʉbombelo,
pamo ʉkʉbʉʉka taasi kʉ Jelusalemu kʉlɨ bala baalɨndaliilepo ʉne ʉkʉja batʉmigwa.
Nakalɨnga naabʉʉkile nkiisʉ ɨkya Alabija, po ndɨnkʉgomokelako kʉ Ndamasika.
Ɨfyɨnja fitatʉ bo fikɨndile, po ndɨnkʉbʉʉka kʉ Jelusalemu kʉkwaganila na Peeteli, naatʉʉgeele kʉmyake amasikʉ kalongo na mahaano.
Leelo ngaababwene abatʉmigwa abangɨ, looli Jaakobo ʉgwamyabo gwa Ntwa Jesu.
Ɨsi ngʉbasimbɨla, Kyala ameenye ʉkʉtɨ ndikʉjoba ɨsya bʉtʉngʉlʉ.
Po pakabalɨlo akangɨ naabʉʉkile mu Silija na mu Kilikija.
Akabalɨlo ako abiitɨki abaa mfipanga fya Kyala ɨfya mu Jutai, bakaalɨɨmeenye ʉne.
Baasimeenye syene ɨnongwa ɨsi baasipɨliike ʉkʉtɨ, “Ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ aatʉtaamyaga kʉbwandɨlo, akabalɨlo aka ikʉlʉmbɨlɨla ɨsya lwitɨko lʉlalʉla ʉlʉ aagelile ʉkʉlʉgoga.”
Po balɨnkʉntuufya Kyala kʉnongwa jaa ɨsi naabombaga.
Ɨfyɨnja kalongo na fina bo fikɨndile, naabʉʉkile kangɨ kʉ Jelusalemu pamopeene na Balinaba, naalɨmmwegile joope Tiiti ʉkʉbʉʉka nagwe.

Naabʉʉkile akabalɨlo kala paapo Kyala aalɨɨsetʉliile ʉkʉtɨ mbʉʉke. Bo twijeekiile na balongosi bala, naabalɨngeenie ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu ɨjɨ naabalʉmbɨlɨlaga abandʉ aba bakaja Bajuuta. Naabombile bo ʉlo ʉkʉtɨ ɨmbombo jangʉ ɨjɨ ndɨ pakʉjɨbomba jɨlɨngaja jaa itolo.
Looli nʉ mwinangʉ Tiiti ʉjʉ akaja Njuuta, akaafimbɨlɨsiigwe ʉkʉsikonga ɨndagɨlo sya Moose, kʉ njɨla jaa kʉbuutigwa kʉkyeni,

na paalema baalipo abiitɨki bamo abaa bʉtʉngʉlʉ aba baalondaga ʉkʉtɨ abuutigwe kʉkyeni. Abandʉ abo baaliijingiisye kʉ bʉkomu ʉkʉtendeela ʉbwabʉke bwɨtʉ ʉbʉ twapeeliigwe na Kɨlɨsiti Jesu, ʉkʉtɨ batʉbɨɨke mbʉtʉmwa.
Tʉkaaliitɨkeene nabo na panandɨ, ʉkʉtɨ balɨngabwandʉla ʉbwanalooli ʉbwa Ndʉmi ɨNunu, kʉmyɨnu.
Leelo abandʉ abo, aba bikʉjobigwa ʉkʉja balongosi, bakaalɨ nɨ mbya ɨsya kʉʉmbʉʉla. Nalooli kʉmyangʉ ndikʉpaasya ʉkʉtɨ baalɨ bakʉlʉmba pamo bakaalɨ bakʉlʉmba, paapo Kyala atikʉpaasya ɨsya panja.
Leelo baasyageenie ʉkʉtɨ Kyala aalɨndʉmile ʉkʉbatwalɨla ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu ɨjaa Jesu, abandʉ aba bakaja Bajuuta, bo ʉlʉ aalɨntʉmile Peeteli ʉkʉbatwalɨla aBajuuta.
Twesa Kyala ikʉbomba ɨmbombo nkatɨ mmyɨtʉ, Peeteli kʉ Bajuuta, ʉne kʉ bandʉ aba bakaja Bajuuta.

Po Jaakobo, Peeteli na Johani aba bikʉboneka ʉkʉja balongosi bakʉlʉmba, baasyageenie ʉkʉtɨ Kyala kwi ipyana lyake, aalɨmbeele ɨmbombo ɨjɨ. Po balɨnkʉtʉkola amaboko ʉne na Balinaba, kɨje kɨmanyilo ɨkya bʉlɨɨlanisi. Twaliitɨkeene ʉkʉtɨ ʉswe tukʉlondigwa ʉkʉbomba ɨmbombo pa bandʉ aba bakaja Bajuuta, abeene pa Bajuuta.
Baatʉsʉʉmile akandʉ kamo, ko kʉbakʉmbʉka abalondo, akandʉ aka ngwijʉʉla ʉkʉkabomba.
Po piitaasi, Peeteli aaliisile kʉ Antyokija kʉkʉtʉjaatɨla, naalɨmpɨngile pabwelu paapo aasobile.

Abandʉ bamo bo bakaalɨ ʉkwisa ʉkʉfuma kwa Jaakobo, Peeteli aalyaga na bandʉ aba bakaja Bajuuta. Leelo abandʉ bala bo bafikile, alɨnkwanda ʉkʉgomokela kʉnyuma, alɨnkwikwaba, paapo aabatiilile abandʉ aba baasisimɨkɨsyaga abiitɨki boosa ʉkʉbuutigwa kʉkyeni.
Po na Bajuuta abangɨ balɨnkwanda ʉkʉbomba bo ʉlʉ aabombaga Peeteli, na paapo baameenye ʉkʉtɨ bikʉbomba ɨsya bʉsyobi. Joope Balinaba baalɨnsongile, aabombaga ɨsya bʉsyobi.

Po bo naagile batikʉbomba ʉkʉkongana nʉ bwanalooli bwa Ndʉmi ɨNunu, ndɨnkʉmmbʉʉla Peeteli nkyeni mmbandʉ boosa ndɨnkʉtɨ, “Na paapo ʉgwe ʉlɨ Njuuta, kʉbomba ʉlwa mundʉ ʉjʉ akaja Njuuta! Po fiki kʉbafimbɨlɨsya abandʉ aba bakaja Bajuuta ʉkʉkonga ɨnyiiho ɨsya Bajuuta?”
Nalooli ʉswe tʉlɨ baana baa Bajuuta, tʉkaja batʉlanongwa bo ʉlwa bandʉ abaa mfikolo ɨfingi.

Ʉswe tʉmeenye nalooli, ʉkʉtɨ Kyala ikʉbabala abandʉ ʉbʉgolofu, kwene kʉ njɨla jaa kʉmmwitɨka Jesu Kɨlɨsiti, somma ʉkʉsikonga ɨndagɨlo sya Moose. Na nuuswe tʉmmwitiike Kɨlɨsiti Jesu ʉkʉtɨ tʉbaligwe ʉbʉgolofu kʉnongwa jaa ɨsi aabombile Jesu, somma kʉ njɨla jaa kʉsikonga ɨndagɨlo sya Moose. Nalooli, kʉ njɨla jaa kʉsikonga ɨndagɨlo sya Moose, akajako ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ ikʉbaligwa ʉbʉgolofu.
Bo tukʉlonda ʉkʉbaligwa ʉbʉgolofu kʉ njɨla jaa Kɨlɨsiti, lɨnga tukʉboneka ʉkʉja batʉlanongwa, bʉle, ɨsi sikʉnangɨsya ʉkʉtɨ Kɨlɨsiti ikʉtʉpela ʉkʉja batʉlanongwa? Hɨmma na panandɨ!
Looli lɨnga ngʉjenga kangɨ ʉlʉlagɨlo ʉlʉ naaloomwile, po sikʉnangɨsya ʉkʉtɨ ʉne kʉbwandɨlo naasobile.
Namanga naasikongaga ɨndagɨlo ɨsyo ɨsya Moose, leelo ʉbʉʉmi bwangʉ ʉbwa mu ndagɨlo bʉmaliike, ʉkʉtɨ ʉbʉʉmi bwangʉ bʉje mwa Kyala.

Ʉne ngogiigwe pamopeene na Kɨlɨsiti pa kɨkohekano, looli ndɨ mʉʉmi akabalɨlo aka, leelo ngaja mʉʉmi ʉne, looli Kɨlɨsiti mʉʉmi nkatɨ mmyangʉ. Ʉbʉʉmi ʉbʉ ndɨ nabo akabalɨlo aka, ndɨ nabo kʉ lwitɨko, ʉlwitɨko kʉ Mwana gwa Kyala ʉjʉ aalɨɨnganile, aabʉningile ʉbʉʉmi bwake ʉkʉmboka.
Nemma ʉkʉlɨkaana iipyana lya Kyala. Lɨnga ʉmundʉ abagiile ʉkʉbaligwa ʉbʉgolofu kʉ njɨla jaa kʉsikonga ɨndagɨlo sya Moose, po Kɨlɨsiti aafwile ɨsya itolo!
Mwe Bagalatija, mulɨ bakonyofu nalooli! Jwani abalogile? Naabalɨngeenie bo mukʉkeeta ɨnongwa sila ɨsya Jesu Kɨlɨsiti, muno baalɨnkomeliile pa kɨkohekano.
Ɨsi ngʉlonda ʉkʉsimanya ʉkʉfuma kʉmyɨnu syo ɨsi. Bʉle, aabiisiile Mbepo Mwikemo kʉ njɨla jaa kʉkonga muno sikʉlondela ɨndagɨlo, pamo kʉ njɨla jaa kʉpɨlɨkɨsya ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu ɨjaa Jesu nʉ kʉjiitɨka?
Bʉle, ʉmwe mulɨ bakonyofu bo ʉlo? Ʉmwe mwalyandile syosa kʉ maka agaa Mbepo Mwikemo, looli akabalɨlo aka mukʉlonda ʉkʉmalɨɨsya kʉ maka agaa mbɨlɨ.
Bʉle, ɨngʉbɨlo sila syosa ɨsi syabaagile ʉmwe, sya itolo? Ndikwitɨka ʉkʉtɨ sya itolo!
Bʉle, Kyala abapeele Mbepo Mwikemo nʉ kʉbomba ɨfiika pakatɨ pamyɨnu kʉ njɨla jaa ʉmwe ʉkʉkonga ɨndagɨlo, pamo kʉ njɨla jaa kʉpɨlɨkɨsya ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu ɨjaa Jesu nʉ kʉjiitɨka?
Namwinogone ɨnongwa ɨsya Abulahamu.
Kalata ʉMwikemo ikʉnnjoba ikʉtɨ, “Ʉmwene aalɨmmwitiike Kyala, po Kyala alɨnkʉmmbala ʉbʉgolofu.”
Po mumanye ʉkʉtɨ, abandʉ aba bikʉmmwitɨka Kyala bo baana baa Abulahamu abaa bwanalooli!

Kalata ʉMwikemo aakungulwike ʉkʉtɨ kʉ njɨla jaa lwitɨko lwabo, Kyala ikʉbabala ʉbʉgolofu aba bakaja Bajuuta. Po Kalata ʉMwikemo aatalile ʉkʉmfumukɨsya Abulahamu ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu ʉkʉtɨ, “Mmyako ɨfikolo fyosa aafikʉsajigwaga.”
Po bala bammwitiike Kyala bikʉsajigwa, bo ʉlwa Abulahamu ʉjʉ aasajiigwe paapo aalɨmmwitiike.

Looli boosa aba bikʉsʉʉbɨla kwene ʉkʉsibomba ɨsi sikʉlondigwa nɨ ndagɨlo, balɨ nkɨgune. Paapo Kalata ʉMwikemo ikʉtɨ, “Gwesa ʉjʉ atikʉsikola nʉ kʉsibomba syosa ɨsi sisimbiigwe mwa kalata ʉgwa ndagɨlo, aguniigwe.”
Nalooli akajako ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ ikʉbaligwa ʉbʉgolofu nkyeni mwa Kyala kʉ njɨla jaa kʉsikonga ɨndagɨlo, paapo Kalata ʉMwikemo ikʉtɨ, “Ʉmundʉ ʉngolofu ikʉtʉʉgalaga kʉ njɨla jaa lwitɨko lwake.”
Nalooli ɨndagɨlo sya Moose sitikʉsʉʉbɨla ʉlwitɨko, looli ɨmbombo, bo ʉlʉ Kalata ʉMwikemo ikʉtɨ, “Ʉmundʉ gwesa ʉjʉ ikʉsikonga ɨndagɨlo syosa, ikʉjaga nʉ bʉʉmi kʉ njɨla jaa kʉsikonga ɨndagɨlo.”
Kɨlɨsiti aatwabwile ʉkʉfuma nkɨgune ɨkya ndagɨlo kʉ njɨla jaa kwega ɨkɨgune ɨkyo ʉmwene, paapo sisimbiigwe mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo ʉkʉtɨ, “Kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ ʉjʉ ikʉkomeleligwa pamwanya pa mpiki, aguniigwe.”

Ɨsi syabombiigwe ʉkʉtɨ ʉlʉsajo ʉlʉ aapeeliigwe Abulahamu, lʉbafikɨle abandʉ abaa mfikolo fyosa ɨfya pakiisʉ, kʉ njɨla jaa Kɨlɨsiti Jesu. Po tʉbagiile ʉkʉmmwambɨlɨla Mbepo Mwikemo, ʉjʉ Kyala aafingile ʉkʉtʉpapo ndwitɨko kwa Jesu Kɨlɨsiti.

Baamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko, leka njobele nkɨfwanikɨsyo ɨkya kʉfuma mbʉʉmi bwɨtʉ. Mwinogone ɨsya lwitɨkano ʉlwa bandʉ babɨlɨ. Lɨnga ʉlwitɨkano lʉbombiigwe nʉ kʉbɨɨkigwa ɨsaini, akajapo ʉgwa kʉlʉkaana pamo ʉkongelapo simo.
Po Kyala aafingile kwa Abulahamu ʉmwisʉkʉlʉ gwɨtʉ, ʉmwene pamopeene nʉ lʉjungu lwake. Kalata ʉMwikemo atikʉtɨ, “Nɨ nyungu syake,” kokʉtɨ ɨnyingi, looli ikʉtɨ, “Nʉ lʉjungu lwake,”
kokʉtɨ lʉmolwene, ʉlo jo Kɨlɨsiti.

Ɨsi ngʉlonda ʉkʉjoba syo ɨsi: Kyala aabɨɨkile ʉlwitɨkano lwake, ɨfyɨnja 430 bo sikaalɨ ʉkʉjako ɨndagɨlo sya Moose. Po ɨndagɨlo ɨsyo sikabagɨla ʉkʉloomola ʉlwitɨkano ʉlo, pamo ʉkʉlwandʉla ʉlʉfingo ʉlo.
Lɨnga Kyala aatʉpeele ɨkɨlɨngo kyake kʉ njɨla jaa kʉkonga ɨndagɨlo, po ɨkɨlɨngo kɨkabagɨla ʉkʉsʉʉbɨla kangɨ ʉlʉfingo lwa Kyala. Looli kwi ipyana lyake, Kyala aafingile ʉkʉmpapo Abulahamu.

Po ɨndagɨlo sya fiki? Syalyongeleligwepo pa lʉfingo bo kakɨndilepo akabalɨlo, ʉkʉbanangɨsya abandʉ ʉkʉtɨ balɨ mbʉtʉlanongwa, mpaka bo ikwisa jʉla ʉjʉ lo lʉjungu lwa Abulahamu, ʉlʉ Kyala aafingile. Kyala aalɨmpeele ɨndagɨlo Moose ʉkwendela kʉ bandʉmi. Moose alɨnkʉja pakatɨ ʉkʉbafwania abandʉ na Kyala.
Leelo lɨnga lʉlipo ʉlʉbafu lʉmolwene itolo, ʉjʉ ikʉfwania atikʉlondigwa, na Kyala alɨ jʉmojwene.
Bʉle, ɨndagɨlo sikʉpɨngana na ɨsi afingile Kyala? Hɨmma na panandɨ! Paapo lɨnga syalipo ɨndagɨlo ɨsi syabagiile ʉkʉbapa abandʉ ʉbʉʉmi, po twabagiile ʉkʉbaligwa ʉbʉgolofu kʉ njɨla jaa ndagɨlo.
Leelo sikaja bo ʉlo. Kalata ʉMwikemo ikʉtɨ ɨkiisʉ kyosa kɨlɨ paasi pa bʉlagɨli ʉbwa bʉtʉlanongwa, ʉkʉtɨ abandʉ aba bikʉmmwitɨka Jesu Kɨlɨsiti bambɨlɨle ɨsi aafingile Kyala.
Ʉlwitɨko bo lʉkaalɨ ʉkwisa, ɨndagɨlo syatʉpelile ʉkʉja batʉmwa. Twaguulɨlaga ʉkʉsetʉligwa ʉlwitɨko ʉlo.
Po ɨndagɨlo ɨsyo syatʉlongosyaga bo ʉlwa nswɨli gwɨtʉ, mpaka Kɨlɨsiti bo iisile, ʉkʉtɨ kʉ njɨla jaa lwitɨko tʉbaligwe ʉbʉgolofu.
Leelo paapo ʉlwitɨko lʉla lʉfikile, ʉswe tʉkaja kangɨ paasi pa nswɨli.
Kʉ njɨla jaa lwitɨko, mwesa ʉmwe mulɨ baana baa Kyala, paapo mulʉngeene na Kɨlɨsiti Jesu.
Ʉmwe mwesa mwe moosiigwe, mulʉngeene na Kɨlɨsiti, mufwene ngatɨ mumfwele Kɨlɨsiti.
Po ʉNjuuta na ʉjʉ akaja Njuuta bakalegana, ʉntʉmwa nʉ mwabʉke, ʉnnyambala nʉ nkiikʉlʉ. Twesa tʉlɨ kandʉ kamokeene, paapo tʉlʉngeene na Kɨlɨsiti Jesu.
Lɨnga ʉmwe mulɨ baa Kɨlɨsiti, po mulɨ baa ndʉjungu ʉlwa Abulahamu, aamukwambɨlɨla ɨfi aafingile Kyala.
Po ngʉjoba ʉkʉtɨ, ʉgwa kɨlɨngo lɨnga nkeke, atikʉlegana nʉ ntʉmwa
kʉ ndagɨlo, na paapo ɨkyʉma kyosa kyake.
Akabalɨlo ako koosa ʉgwa kɨlɨngo alɨ paasi pa baswɨli na bɨɨmɨlɨli mpaka akabalɨlo aka kaabaatɨkiigwe nʉ gwise.
Na nuuswe bo lʉlʉʉlo, bo akaalɨ ʉkwisa Kɨlɨsiti, twalɨ batʉmwa baa nyiiho ɨsi sikʉlongosya pakiisʉ.
Leelo akabalɨlo aka kaabaatɨkiigwe bo kafikile, Kyala aalɨntʉmile pakiisʉ ʉMwanaake ʉjʉ aalɨ mundʉ bo ʉswe, alɨnkʉja paasi pa ndagɨlo.
Aatʉmiigwe ʉkʉtɨ atwabʉle ʉswe twe twalɨ batʉmwa baa ndagɨlo sya Moose, atʉpele ʉkʉja baana baa Kyala.
Paapo ʉmwe mulɨ baanaake, Kyala antʉmile Mbepo gwa Mwanaake mu ndumbula syɨtʉ, Mbepo ʉjʉ ikʉtʉpela ʉkʉnkoolela Kyala ʉkʉtɨ, “Abba,” kokʉtɨ, “Taata.”
Po ʉgwe ʉkaja ntʉmwa kangɨ, looli ʉlɨ mwana. Lɨnga ʉlɨ mwana, po ʉgwe kwambɨlɨla fyosa ɨfya kɨlɨngo ɨfi Kyala aababɨɨkiile abaanaake.
Ijolo mukaalɨmmeenye Kyala, mwalɨ batʉmwa baa tʉndʉ ʉtʉ akaja jo Kyala.
Looli akabalɨlo aka, mummeenye Kyala, kokʉtɨ joope abameenye ʉmwe. Po mubagiile bʉleebʉle ʉkʉgomokelako kʉ mbaatɨko ɨsya ijolo ɨsi sikabagɨla ʉkʉtʉpoka? Bʉle, mukʉlonda ʉkʉja batʉmwa kangɨ?
Mukaalɨ mukʉgakola amasikʉ gamo, ɨmyesi gɨmo nɨ fyɨnja fimo ʉkʉja fyaka fya kʉmmwɨmɨka Kyala!
Nikʉbapaakɨsya ʉkʉtɨ ɨmbombo ɨjɨ naabiijʉʉliile jɨlɨngafuba!
Baamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko, ngʉbasʉʉma mujege bo ʉne, paapo ʉne naalɨ bo ʉmwe. Mukaalɨɨmbombiile ʉbʉbiibi nabʉmo.
Mumeenye ʉkʉtɨ ʉbʉbine ʉbʉ naalɨ nabo, bo ʉbʉ bwalɨmbeele akabalɨlo akaa kʉbalʉmbɨlɨla ʉmwe kʉbwandɨlo.

Poope akabalɨlo kala mukaalɨɨnyiilile pamo ʉkʉngaana kʉnongwa jaa boonywa bwangʉ, na paapo lwalɨ lʉgelo kʉmyɨnu. Looli mwalɨɨnyambɨliile ʉkʉfwana nʉ kʉmmwambɨlɨla ʉgwandʉmi gwa Kyala, pamo ʉkʉfwana mukʉmmwambɨlɨla Kɨlɨsiti Jesu jʉʉjo.
Mwalɨ nʉ lʉsekelo, po lɨɨlɨno siboniike sya fiki? Ngʉjoba nalooli, akabalɨlo kala mwabagiile ʉkʉgafyʉla amaaso gɨɨnu nʉ kʉmbapo ʉne.
Bʉle, lɨɨlɨno ndɨ ndʉgʉ gwɨnu kʉnongwa jaa kʉbabʉʉla ʉbwanalooli?
Abandʉ abangɨ abo bikwijʉʉla ʉkʉtɨ babakabe ʉmwe, looli ɨsi babɨngɨliile sikaja nunu. Bikʉlonda ʉkʉbapaagʉla ʉmwe kʉmyangʉ, ʉkʉtɨ mubiijʉʉlɨlege abeene.
Silɨ kanunu bwila ʉkwijʉʉla ʉkʉbomba ɨnunu, kʉlɨngajaga kwene lɨnga ndipo pamopeene na nuumwe.

Baanangʉ, bo ʉlwa nkiikʉlʉ ʉgwa kɨfuba, muno ikʉtaamigwa pakabalɨlo akaa kʉpaapa ʉmwana, bʉbʉʉbo ʉne ngʉtaamigwa ʉlwa bʉbɨlɨ kʉnongwa jɨɨnu, mpaka apa akajɨɨlo kaa Kɨlɨsiti kikʉbonekaga nkajɨɨlo kɨɨnu.
Ngʉnyonywa ʉkʉja pamopeene na nuumwe akabalɨlo aka, ʉkʉtɨ nje mooloolo kʉmyɨnu! Ngʉbapaasya fiijo!
Namuumbʉʉle ʉne, ʉmwe mwe mwiganile ʉkʉlagɨligwa nɨ ndagɨlo sya Moose, bʉle, mukʉpɨlɨka muno sikʉjobela ɨndagɨlo?
Sisimbiigwe mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo ʉkʉtɨ, Abulahamu aalɨ na baana babɨlɨ, jʉmo kʉ nkiikʉlʉ ʉntʉmwa,
ʉgwa bʉbɨlɨ kʉ nkiikʉlʉ ʉmwabʉke.
Ʉmwana gwa nkiikʉlʉ ʉntʉmwa jʉla, aapaapiigwe kʉ lʉbaatɨko lwa bandʉ. Looli ʉmwana gwa nkiikʉlʉ ʉmwabʉke, aapaapiigwe kʉnongwa jaa lʉfingo lwa Kyala.
Ɨnongwa ɨsyo kɨfwanikɨsyo. Abakiikʉlʉ babɨlɨ bafwene bo ʉlwitɨkano ʉlʉkʉʉlʉ nʉ lwitɨkano ʉlʉpya.
Ʉlʉkʉʉlʉ lo lʉla lwabombiigwe pa kyamba Sinai, lʉfwene na Hagali, abaanaake bikʉpaapigwa mbʉtʉmwa.
Hagali afwene bo ʉlwa kyamba Sinai ɨkya kʉ Alabija, kangɨ afwene bo ʉlwa kaaja akaa Jelusalemu akaa lɨɨlɨno, paapo abaanaake balɨ mbʉtʉmwa ʉbwa ndagɨlo ɨsi baapeeliigwe kʉ kyamba Sinai.
Looli akaaja akaa Jelusalemu akaa kʉmwanya, ko kaaja akaabʉke, ako jo jʉʉba.
Namanga sisimbiigwe mwa Kalata ʉMwikemo ʉkʉtɨ,
“Ʉsekelege ʉgwe, gwe nngʉmba, gwe ʉkapaapa,
laataga ʉgwe gwe ʉkakabamo ʉmwana,
paapo abaana baa jʉla, ʉjʉ alɨ mwene,
bingi ʉkʉkɨnda abaa jʉla ʉmwegi.”
Po lɨɨlɨno baamyɨtʉ, ʉmwe mulɨ baana baa Kyala kʉnongwa jaa lʉfingo lwake, bo ʉlwa Isaka.
Looli mmasikʉ gala, ʉmwana jʉla aapaapiigwe nʉ nkiikʉlʉ ʉntʉmwa, aalɨntwaliile ʉbʉtolwe ʉmwana ʉjʉ aapaapiigwe kʉ maka agaa Mbepo Mwikemo. Silɨ bo lʉlalʉla na mmasikʉ aga.
Leelo Kalata ʉMwikemo ikʉtɨ fiki? Ikʉtɨ, “Ʉnkage ʉnkiikʉlʉ ʉntʉmwa pamopeene nʉ mwanaake, paapo ʉmwana gwa ntʉmwa atikʉkaba ɨfya kɨlɨngo pamopeene nʉ mwana gwa nkiikʉlʉ ʉmwabʉke.”
Po ʉlo baamyɨtʉ, ʉswe tʉkaja baana baa ntʉmwa, looli baa jʉʉba ʉmwabʉke.
Kɨlɨsiti atwabwile ʉkʉtɨ tʉjege baabʉke. Po mwɨmege na maka, mulɨngiitɨkaga ʉkʉja batʉmwa baa ndagɨlo kangɨ.
Namupɨlɨkɨsye! Jo ʉne Paʉli ngʉbabʉʉla ɨsi! Lɨnga mwitiike ʉkʉbuutigwa kʉkyeni, po Kɨlɨsiti akaja na mbombo najɨmo kʉmyɨnu.
Ngʉbasoka kangɨ pabwelu, gwesa ʉjʉ ikwitɨka ʉkʉbuutigwa kʉkyeni, ikʉlondigwa ʉkʉsikola ɨndagɨlo syosa ɨsya Moose.
Lɨnga mukʉsʉʉbɨla ʉkʉbaligwa ʉbʉgolofu kʉ njɨla jaa kʉsikonga ɨndagɨlo, po mwipaagwile kwa Kɨlɨsiti, mulɨ panja pi ipyana lya Kyala.
Looli ʉswe, tukʉsʉʉbɨla na maka agaa Mbepo gwa Kyala, ʉkʉbaligwa ʉbʉgolofu kʉ njɨla jaa kʉmmwitɨka Jesu.
Po lɨnga tʉlʉngeene na Kɨlɨsiti Jesu, ʉkʉbuutigwa kʉkyeni pamo ʉkʉsita kʉbuutigwa kʉkaja na mbombo najɨmo, akakʉlʉmba lo lwitɨko ʉlʉ lukʉbomba ɨmbombo kʉ lʉgano.
Kʉbwandɨlo mwalɨ kanunu! Po jo jwani ʉjʉ abasigiile ʉkʉkonga ʉbwanalooli?
Ʉjʉ abombile ɨsyo akaja jo Kyala ʉjʉ ababɨlɨkiile ʉmwe.
Bo ʉlʉ abandʉ bikʉtɨ, “Ʉnkese ʉnnandɨ itolo gukʉtupɨsya ɨkɨkando kyosa!”

Kʉnongwa jaa kʉtɨ ʉmwe mulɨ baa Ntwa Jesu, mmeenye kɨsita kwilaamwa, aamutikʉkonga amasyʉ gaa bandʉ abangɨ, looli mukʉkongaga amasyʉ gangʉ. Kangɨ gwesa ʉjʉ ikʉbasofania ʉmwe, nalooli aikwisa kʉlongigwa, nalɨnga aje jo jwani.

Baamyɨtʉ, bamo bikʉtɨ ʉne ngaalɨ ngʉlʉmbɨlɨla ʉkʉtɨ boosa bikʉlondigwa ʉkʉbuutigwa kʉkyeni. Lɨnga naajobaga bo ʉlo, fiki bikʉndaamya? Lɨnga naajobaga bo ʉlo, ʉkʉlʉmbɨlɨla kwangʉ ɨsya kɨkohekano kya Jesu, ngalɨ sikabakalasya.
Ngʉnyonywa ʉkʉtɨ abandʉ aba bikʉbasofania ʉmwe kʉnongwa ɨsya kʉbuutigwa kʉkyeni, bongelepo nalɨnga bikwifula abeene!
Baamyɨtʉ, Kyala aababɨlɨkiile ʉkʉtɨ mujege mbwabʉke. Leelo mulɨngabʉbombelaga ʉbwabʉke bwɨnu ʉkʉbomba ɨfinyonyo ɨfya mbɨlɨ, looli mutʉʉlanege nʉ kʉganana.
Ɨndagɨlo syosa ɨsya Moose silimo ndʉlagɨlo lʉmolwene ʉlʉ lukʉtɨ, “Ʉbaganege abanino bo ʉlʉ gwijiiganile ʉgwe.”
Looli lɨnga mukʉlʉmana nʉ kʉlyana bo ʉlwa finyamaana, mwikeetege ʉkʉtɨ mulɨngamalana.
Po nikʉbabʉʉla nikʉtɨ, ʉlwendo lwɨnu lʉlongosigwege na Mbepo Mwikemo, po aamutikʉfikongaga kangɨ ɨfinyonyo fya mbɨlɨ.

Paapo ɨfi gukʉnyonywa ʉmbɨlɨ gwa mundʉ, fikaja fyo ɨfi ikʉlonda Mbepo Mwikemo. Kangɨ ɨfi ikʉlonda Mbepo Mwikemo, fikaja fyo finyonyo fya mbɨlɨ gwa mundʉ. Mbepo Mwikemo nʉ mbɨlɨ gwa mundʉ bikʉpɨngana, kʉnongwa ɨjo mukabagɨla ʉkʉbomba ɨnunu ɨsi mukʉlonda ʉmwe.
Looli lɨnga mukʉlongosigwa na Mbepo, po mukaja batʉmwa baa ndagɨlo.
Po tʉmeenye ɨsi bikʉsibomba abandʉ ʉkʉfikonga ɨfinyonyo ɨfya mbɨlɨ: Ʉbʉlogwe, ʉbʉnyali, ʉkʉbomba ɨngosya soni,
ʉkwipuuta kʉ tʉndʉ ʉtʉ akaja jo Kyala, ʉbʉlosi, ʉkʉlʉgʉkana, ʉkʉlwa, ʉbʉʉfi, ɨlyojo, ʉbʉpafu, ʉlʉkaani, ʉkʉsambʉkana,
akabini, ʉbʉgaala bwalwa, ʉkʉja nʉ bʉla, nɨ singi ɨsi sifwene bo ɨsyo. Ngʉbabʉʉla kangɨ bo ʉlʉ naatalile ʉkʉbabʉʉla, abandʉ aba bikʉbomba ɨsyo, aabatikʉkaba ɨfya kɨlɨngo, ɨfi bo Bʉnyafyale bwa Kyala.
Looli lɨnga tukʉlongosigwa na Mbepo Mwikemo, aatukʉja nɨ seke ɨsi: Ʉlʉgano, ʉlʉsekelo, ʉlʉtengaano, ʉkʉʉmɨɨlɨla, ʉbʉnunu, ʉbʉpe, ʉbwanalooli,
ʉbooloolo nʉ kwitiima. Lʉkajako ʉlʉlagɨlo ʉlʉ lukʉkaanisya ɨsyo.
Abandʉ lɨnga balʉngeene na Kɨlɨsiti Jesu, bafikomeliile pa kɨkohekano ɨfinyonyo fyabo ɨfibiibi ɨfya bʉndʉ bwabo ʉbwa ijolo.
Mbepo atʉpeele ʉbʉʉmi ʉbʉpya, po tʉbʉkongege ʉbʉlongosi bwake.
Tʉngiituufyaga, tʉngafukanaga, pamo ʉkʉbɨɨkɨlana ʉbʉʉfi.

Baamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko, ʉmundʉ lɨnga agwɨliile mbʉtʉlanongwa, mwe mukʉlongosigwa na Mbepo Mwikemo munsokege, looli munsokege kʉ booloolo ʉbʉ bukʉfuma kwa Mbepo. Mwikeetege, ʉkʉtɨ nuumwe mulɨngageligwaga ʉkʉkonga akajɨɨlo kaake.
Mupokelanilege ɨfitwalo fyɨnu, ko kʉkonga ɨndagɨlo sya Kɨlɨsiti.
Po gwesa ʉjʉ ikwibona ʉkʉtɨ jo nongi ndɨbe, looli akaja bo ʉlo, ʉjo ikwisyoba.
Looli kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ akapɨmege akajɨɨlo kaake. Lɨnga kʉbomba ɨnunu, po ʉbagiile ʉkwituukɨfya ndɨ ɨfi ʉbombile, kɨsita kʉfwanikɨsya na ɨfi abombile ʉjʉngɨ.
Namanga kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ ikʉlondigwa ʉkʉpɨmba ɨkɨtwalo kyake.
Ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ ikʉmanyisigwa ɨliisyʉ lya Kyala, annjabɨlengepo ʉmmanyisi gwake ɨfinunu ɨfi akabile.
Mungiisyobaga, Kyala atikʉkɨnɨligwamo. Ʉmundʉ ɨfi abyele, fyo ɨfi aikʉtondolaga.
Po ʉjʉ ikʉfikonga ɨfinyonyo fya mbɨlɨ, jo ikʉtondolaga ʉbʉfwe. Looli ʉjʉ ikʉnkonga Mbepo Mwikemo, jo ikʉtondolaga ʉbʉʉmi bwa bwila na bwila.
Po tʉngakatalaga ʉkʉbomba ɨnunu, paapo lɨnga tukʉʉmɨɨlɨla, aatukʉtondola ɨnunu, bo akabalɨlo kafikile.
Po akabalɨlo koosa twijʉʉlege ʉkʉbabombela ɨnunu abandʉ boosa, fiijo abiitɨki biinɨɨtʉ.
Namukeete amasimbo gangʉ muno nsimbiile, manywamu. Nsimbile nɨ kɨboko kyangʉ jʉjʉʉne.

Aba bikʉbafimbɨlɨsya ʉmwe ʉkʉbuutigwa kʉkyeni, bikʉbomba bo ʉlo paapo bikʉlonda ʉkwɨmɨkigwa na Bajuuta, kʉlɨ ɨsi mubombile mmibɨlɨ gyɨnu. Bikʉbomba bo ʉlo ʉkʉtɨ balɨngakaba ɨngʉbɨlo, ɨsi sikʉbaaga lɨnga balʉmbɨliile ʉbwanalooli ʉbwa kɨkohekano kya Kɨlɨsiti.
Aba bikʉlonda ʉkʉtɨ abiitɨki boosa babuutigwe kʉkyeni, boope batikʉsikonga ɨndagɨlo syosa. Bikʉlonda ʉmwe mubuutigwe ʉkʉtɨ biituukɨfyege ɨmibɨlɨ gyɨnu.

Looli ʉne ndɨngajaga nako nakamo, akaa kwituukɨfyamo, nituukɨfyege kyene ɨkɨkohekano ɨkya Ntwa gwɨtʉ Jesu Kɨlɨsiti. Ʉkwendela pa kɨkohekano ɨkyo, ɨmbombo ɨsi bikʉsisʉʉbɨla abandʉ abaa nkiisʉ, sikaja na mbombo najɨmo kʉmyangʉ, ngaja nɨ fya kʉsibombela.
Ʉkʉbuutigwa kʉkyeni pamo ʉkʉsita kʉbuutigwa kʉkaja na mbombo najɨmo, akapala ko kʉpeligwa ʉbʉpya na Kyala.
Aba bikʉlʉkonga ʉlʉlagɨlo ʉlʉ, ʉlʉtengaano nɨ kɨbabɨɨlɨsi kya Kyala fijege nabo. Abeene bo bandʉ baa Kyala nalooli.
Po najʉmo angandaamyaga kangɨ, paapo amakoko agaa kʉtuunyigwa na mabwe nʉ kʉkomigwa nɨ fingoti, ndɨ nago mu mbɨlɨ gwangʉ, bo ʉlʉ aalɨ nago Jesu.
Baamyɨtʉ, ɨliipyana lya Ntwa gwɨtʉ Jesu Kɨlɨsiti lɨjege na nuumwe. Ameni.
Ephesians: Kalata ʉjʉ afumile kʉmyangʉ ʉne Paʉli, ne ntʉmigwa
gwa Kɨlɨsiti Jesu, kʉ bwigane bwa Kyala.
Ngʉbasimbɨla ʉmwe mwe biikemo
mwe mukʉtʉʉgala nkaaja akaa mu Efesi,
mwe biitɨki abagolofu abaa Kɨlɨsiti Jesu.
Ɨliipyana nʉ lʉtengaano ʉkʉfuma kwa Taata Kyala na kʉ Ntwa Jesu Kɨlɨsiti, fijege na nuumwe.
Atuufigwege Kyala, ʉGwise ʉgwa Ntwa gwɨtʉ Jesu Kɨlɨsiti, ʉjʉ atʉsajile nɨ sajo syosa ʉkwendela kwa Mbepo Mwikemo. Kʉ njɨla jaa kʉlʉngana na Kɨlɨsiti, tukʉsyambɨlɨla ɨsajo ɨsyo.
Kyala bo akaalɨ ʉkʉkɨpela ɨkiisʉ, aatʉsʉngwile ʉkʉtɨ tʉjege bandʉ baake, kʉ njɨla jaa kʉlʉngana kwɨtʉ na Kɨlɨsiti. Aabombile bo ʉlo ʉkʉtɨ tʉjege biikemo, kangɨ beelu nkyeni mmyake. Kʉ lʉgano lwake,
Kyala aatumwile liijolo, ʉkʉtʉsʉngʉla ʉkʉja baanaake, ʉkwendela mwa Jesu Kɨlɨsiti. Aabombile bo ʉlo, ʉkʉkongana nʉ lʉbaatɨko nʉ bwigane bwake.
Po tʉntuufyege Kyala kwi ipyana lyake iisisya ɨlɨ aatʉpeele ʉkwendela kʉ Mwanaake ʉNkʉndwe.
Kʉ njɨla jaa iilopa lya Mwanaake ɨlɨ lyalyoniike pa kɨkohekano, ʉswe twabʉliigwe, kokʉtɨ tʉhobokeliigwe ʉbʉtʉlanongwa bwɨtʉ, ʉkʉkongana nʉ bʉkʉlʉmba ʉbwa ipyana lyake.
Kyala aatʉpeele iipyana ɨlyo kʉ mahala goosa nʉ kʉsyagania.
Aatʉbʉʉlile ɨsya ndʉbaatɨko lwake ʉlwa mbʉtiitʉ, ʉkʉkongana nʉ bwigane bwake, ʉlʉ aatumwile ʉkʉbomba ʉkwendela mwa Kɨlɨsiti.

Ʉlʉbaatɨko lwa Kyala lo ʉlʉ, akabalɨlo aka aakasalile bo kafikile, ikwisa kʉfibʉngaania pamopeene ɨfipeligwa fyosa, ɨfi filiko kʉmwanya na ɨfi filipo pakiisʉ. Po Kɨlɨsiti jo ikwisa kʉjaga nkʉlʉmba gwa fipeligwa ɨfyo.
Kyala aatʉsʉngwile nuuswe ʉkʉja baanaake mwa Kɨlɨsiti. Ʉkʉfuma liijolo aatalile ʉkʉbaatɨka bo ʉlʉ, ʉjʉ ikʉbomba syosa ʉkʉkongana nʉ bwigane bwake,
ʉkʉtɨ ʉswe twe Bajuuta twe tʉtalilepo ʉkʉnsʉʉbɨla Kɨlɨsiti, tʉntuufyege Kyala kʉ bʉsisya bwake.

Na nuumwe mwe mukaja Bajuuta, mwapɨliike iisyʉ ɨlya nalooli, kokʉtɨ ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu ɨjaa bʉpoki, mulɨnkʉmmwitɨka Kɨlɨsiti. Joope Kyala alɨnkʉbakolekela na Mbepo Mwikemo, ʉjʉ aafingile ʉkʉbapa, ʉkʉnangɨsya ʉkʉtɨ ʉmwe mulɨ bandʉ baake.
Mbepo Mwikemo jo gwa kʉtwɨmɨla ɨkɨlɨngo kyɨtʉ, ɨsi sikʉtʉsisimɨkɨsya ʉkʉtɨ Kyala ikwisa kʉtwabʉla loosa, ʉkʉtɨ tʉjege bandʉ baake. Tʉntuufyege Kyala kʉ bʉsisya bwake!
Po leelo, nsipɨliike ɨsya lwitɨko lwɨnu kʉ Ntwa Jesu, nʉ kʉtɨ mubaganile abiitɨki boosa abaa mfipanga fyosa ɨfya Kyala. Kʉnongwa jaa ɨsyo,
ngaleka ʉkʉnngwɨla ʉlʉpi Kyala kʉnongwa jɨɨnu nʉ kʉbasʉʉmɨla.
Ngʉsʉʉma ʉkʉtɨ, Kyala ʉgwa Ntwa gwɨtʉ Jesu Kɨlɨsiti, ʉjʉ jo Taata ʉNsisya, abape Mbepo Mwikemo, ʉgwa kʉbapa amahala nʉ kʉbamanyisya muno ajɨɨliile, ʉkʉtɨ mummanye kanunu fiijo.
Kangɨ ngʉsʉʉma abiigʉle amaaso agaa mu ndumbula syɨnu, ʉkʉtɨ mufimanye kanunu ɨfi mukʉsʉʉbɨla na ɨfi aababɨlɨkiile. Ɨfyo kyo kɨlɨngo ɨkɨsisya fiijo, ɨkɨ aafingile ʉkʉbapa abandʉ baake.
Mugamanye amaka gaake amakʉlʉmba fiijo, aga gikʉbomba ɨmbombo kʉmyɨtʉ twe tʉmmwitiike Jesu. Galɨ bo ʉlwa maka gala amakʉlʉmba,
aga Kyala aalɨnsyʉkiisye Kɨlɨsiti ʉkʉfuma mbafwe, nʉ kʉmmbɨɨka kʉ kɨboko kyake ɨkiilɨɨlo, pabʉjo ʉbʉsisya fiijo, kʉmwanya.
Ʉko Jesu jo nkʉlʉmba gwa bʉlagɨli boosa, ʉbʉkʉlʉmba boosa na maka goosa, ʉkʉfikɨnda ɨfipeligwa fyosa ɨfi filɨ nʉ bʉlagɨli, ʉkwandɨla akabalɨlo aka, na aka kikwisa.
Kyala aalɨmpeele Jesu amaka gaa kʉfilagɨla fyosa. Aalɨmmbɨɨkile ʉkʉja Ndongosi gwa kɨpanga kyake, bo ʉlwa ntʉ mu mbɨlɨ.
Ɨkɨpanga kya Kyala go mbɨlɨ gwa Kɨlɨsiti. Kɨkaagɨlwa kʉnongwa jaake, ʉjʉ ikʉfipela fyosa ʉkʉsita kwagɨlwa.
Ijolo, ʉmwe mwalɨ bafwe, kʉnongwa jaa mbiibi nʉ bʉtʉlanongwa bwɨnu.

Akabalɨlo kala mwakongaga akajɨɨlo akabiibi akaa bandʉ abaa pakiisʉ apa, kangɨ mwammwɨmɨkaga ʉntwa ʉmbiibi Seetano, ʉjʉ jo nkʉlʉmba gwa mbepo ɨnyali mu mpaalanga. Ʉntwa ʉjo akabalɨlo aka ikʉbalongosya abandʉ aba batikʉntiila Kyala.

Nalooli ʉswe twesa akabalɨlo kala twalɨ bo abeene. Twakongaga ɨfinyonyo ɨfya mbɨlɨ. Twabombaga syosa ɨsi ɨndumbula syɨtʉ ɨmbiibi syalondaga. Twapaapiigwe nɨ ndumbula ɨsi silɨ nʉ bʉtʉlanongwa. Bo ʉlwa bandʉ boosa, na nuuswe twabagiisye ʉkʉpeeligwa ʉlʉfundo na Kyala.
Looli Kyala gwa kɨbabɨɨlɨsi fiijo. Atʉganile nʉ lʉgano ʉlʉkɨndɨlɨsi.
Na paapo twafwile kʉnongwa jaa bʉtʉlanongwa bwɨtʉ, poope Kyala aatʉsyʉsiisye pamopeene na Kɨlɨsiti. Nalooli kwi ipyana lya Kyala lyene, mupokiigwe.
Aatʉsyʉsiisye pamopeene na Kɨlɨsiti, ʉkʉtɨ tʉkajege pamopeene nagwe kʉmwanya. Aabombile ɨsi ʉkwendela kwa Kɨlɨsiti Jesu,
ʉkʉtɨ akabalɨlo aka kikwisa atʉnangɨsye ɨliipyana lyake ɨliikʉlʉmba. Atʉnangiisye ʉbʉkabi ʉbʉkʉlʉmba bwa ipyana lyake ɨlingi fiijo, ɨlɨ atʉpeele ʉswe twe tʉlʉngeene na Kɨlɨsiti Jesu.
Kyala abapokile kwi ipyana lyake, kʉ njɨla jaa kʉmmwitɨka Kɨlɨsiti Jesu. Nalooli, ʉbʉpoki mukwambɨlɨla, komma kʉnongwa jaa mbombo syɨnu ɨnunu, looli ʉbʉpoki fyabʉpe fya Kyala.
Mupeeliigwe itolo ʉbʉpoki na Kyala, komma kʉnongwa jaa mbombo syɨnu, ʉkʉtɨ najʉmo angiituufyaga.
Ʉswe tʉlɨ fipeligwa fya Kyala, aatʉbʉmbile ʉbʉpya kʉ njɨla jaa kʉlʉngana na Kɨlɨsiti Jesu, ʉkʉtɨ tʉbombege ɨmbombo ɨnunu. Kyala aasibaatiike ɨmbombo ɨsyo liijolo, ʉkʉtɨ ʉswe tʉsibombege.
Po ʉlʉ, ʉmwe mwe mukaja Bajuuta, mukʉmbʉke ʉkʉtɨ, aBajuuta aba bikwijoba ʉkʉtɨ, “Babuutigwa,” bikʉtɨ ʉmwe mulɨ, “Bapanja,” paapo ʉmwe mukabuutigwa kʉkyeni.
Looli ʉkʉbuutigwa ʉko mbombo itolo ɨjɨ jikʉbombigwa na bandʉ.
Mukʉmbʉke ʉkʉtɨ, akabalɨlo kala mukaalɨ pamopeene na Kɨlɨsiti. Mwalɨ bo ʉlwa baheesya, paapo mukaalɨ benekaaja pamopeene na Banyaisilaɨli. Ʉmwe mukaalɨ balɨɨlanisi ndʉfingo ʉlwa lwitɨkano na Kyala.
Kangɨ mwatʉʉgalaga nkiisʉ kɨsita lʉsʉʉbɨlo nʉ kʉmmanya Kyala.
Ʉmwe mwe mulʉngeene na Kɨlɨsiti, ijolo mwalɨ pabʉtali na Kyala, looli akabalɨlo aka abasegeliisye ʉkwendela mwi ilopa lya Kɨlɨsiti Jesu.

Namanga Jesu jʉʉjo, jo ʉjʉ atʉfwenie. Atʉbʉngeenie ʉswe twe Bajuuta na nuumwe mwe mukaja Bajuuta ʉkʉja kandʉ kamokeene. Ʉkwendela mbʉfwe bwake, aalɨsoosiisyepo iimato ɨlya bʉlʉgʉ, ɨlɨ lyatʉtapwile kʉbwandɨlo.
Aasisoosiisye ɨngomeelesyo nɨ ndagɨlo ɨsi Kyala aabapeele aBajuuta, ʉkʉtɨ twesa tʉjege kandʉ kamokeene akapya mwa Kɨlɨsiti. Mo muno aabombiile ʉkʉtʉpa ʉlʉtengaano.
Aatʉfwenie nʉ kʉtʉbɨɨka ʉkʉja kandʉ kamokeene nkyeni mwa Kyala. Kʉ njɨla jaa kʉfwa pa kɨkohekano, aabʉsoosiisyepo ʉbʉlʉgʉ ʉbwa Bajuuta na aba bakaja Bajuuta.
Kɨlɨsiti aaliisile kʉkʉbalʉmbɨlɨla ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu ɨjaa lʉtengaano, ʉmwe mwe mukaja Bajuuta, mwe mwalɨ pabʉtali na Kyala, nʉ kʉtʉlʉmbɨlɨla ʉswe twe Bajuuta, twe twalɨ kɨfuki nagwe.
Namanga ʉswe twesa twe Bajuuta, na nuumwe mwe mukaja Bajuuta, tʉbagiile ʉkʉsegelela kwa Taata kʉ njɨla jaa Mbepo jʉmojwene.
Po ʉlʉ, ʉmwe mwe mukaja Bajuuta, mukaja baheesya kangɨ. Looli mulɨ baana baa Kyala, kangɨ mulɨ benekaaja pamopeene na biikemo baake, kangɨ mulɨ bandʉ baa mu nyumba jaake.
Ɨnyumba ɨjɨ jɨjengiigwe pa lwalo ʉlwa batʉmigwa na bakunguluka, joope Kɨlɨsiti Jesu lyo ibwe iikʉlʉmba ɨlya pa lwalo pa nguto.
Pa lwalo ʉlo, gikʉjengigwapo amapamba goosa, ʉkʉtɨ jɨje nyumba jaa maka, nʉ kʉja tempeli nyiikemo kʉ Ntwa Kyala.
Akabalɨlo aka, nuumwe mukʉlʉngɨsigwa pamopeene, pa lwalo lwa Jesu, ʉkʉtɨ muje nyumba jaa Kyala, muno ikʉtʉʉgala kʉ njɨla jaa Mbepo gwake.
Po ʉkʉkongana na ɨsyo, ngʉbasʉʉmɨla ʉmwe, ʉne Paʉli ne mpinyigwa kʉnongwa jaa mbombo ɨjɨ Kɨlɨsiti Jesu aalɨmbeele, ʉkʉbabombela ʉmwe mwe mukaja Bajuuta.
Nalooli mupɨliike ʉkʉtɨ Kyala, kwi ipyana lyake, aalɨmbeele ɨmbombo ɨjɨ ngʉjɨbomba kʉnongwa jɨɨnu.
Kyala aalɨɨnangiisye ɨsya ndʉbaatɨko lwake ʉlwa mbʉtiitʉ, kʉ njɨla jaa bʉsetʉli, bo muno mbasimbiile kʉ bʉpimba.
Bo mukʉbala ɨsi mbasimbiile, mubagiile ʉkʉmanya ʉkʉtɨ, ndwageenie ʉlʉbaatɨko ʉlwa Kyala ʉlwa mbʉtiitʉ, ʉlwa nongwa sya Kɨlɨsiti.
Ijolo Kyala akaababʉʉlile abandʉ ʉlʉbaatɨko ʉlo ʉlwa mbʉtiitʉ. Looli akabalɨlo aka abasetʉliile abatʉmigwa na bakunguluka baake abiikemo, kʉ njɨla jaa Mbepo Mwikemo.

Ʉlʉbaatɨko ʉlwa mbʉtiitʉ ʉlo lo ʉlʉ. Kʉ njɨla jaa kʉjiitɨka ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu, boosa aba bakaja Bajuuta, pamopeene na Bajuuta, bikʉkaba ɨkɨjabo ɨkya nkɨlɨngo kya Kyala. Bikʉja pamopeene bo ʉlwa tʉmbakaasya ʉtwa mbɨlɨ. Kangɨ ʉkwendela mwa Kɨlɨsiti Jesu, bikwambɨlɨla pamopeene ɨfi Kyala aafingile ʉkʉbasaja aBajuuta.
Kyala kwi ipyana lyake, aalɨmbeele ɨmbombo jaa kʉfumusya ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu ɨjɨ, ʉkʉkongana na maka gaake amakʉlʉmba.
Na paapo ʉne ndɨ nnandɨ kʉ biikemo boosa, poope naapeeliigwe ɨliipyana ɨlɨ, ʉkʉtɨ mbalʉmbɨlɨle abandʉ aba bakaja Bajuuta ɨsya sajo ʉkʉfuma kwa Kɨlɨsiti, ɨsi sitikʉpɨmɨka.
Kangɨ aalɨɨsalile ʉkʉtɨ mbasetʉlɨle abandʉ boosa, ʉlʉbaatɨko lwake ʉlwa mbʉtiitʉ muno lʉjɨɨliile. Ʉlʉbaatɨko ʉlo, Kyala ʉjʉ jo Mpeli gwa tʉndʉ toosa, aalʉfisile akabalɨlo koosa akaa ijolo.
Kʉ njɨla ɨjɨ aabaatiike ʉkʉbombela ɨkɨpanga kyake, ʉkʉnangɨsya muno gajɨɨliile amahala gaake ʉbwingi, kʉ fipeligwa fyosa ɨfi fikʉlagɨla na ɨfi filɨ na maka mu mpaalanga.
Ʉlo lo lʉbaatɨko lwa Kyala ʉlwa bwila na bwila, ʉlʉ aalʉbombile kʉ njɨla jaa Kɨlɨsiti Jesu ʉNtwa gwɨtʉ.
Ʉkwendela mwa Jesu Kɨlɨsiti na kʉ njɨla jaa kʉmmwitɨka, tʉlɨ nʉ bwabʉke nʉ bʉkifu ʉbwa kʉsegelela nkyeni mwa Kyala.
Po ngʉbasʉʉma ʉkʉtɨ mulɨngoonyokaga amaka. Kʉ ngʉbɨlo ɨsi ngʉkʉbɨlwa kʉnongwa jɨɨnu, ɨsyo bo bʉsisya bwɨnu.
Po kʉnongwa ɨjo, ngʉmfugamila Taata,
ʉjʉ jo bʉfumɨlo ʉbwa fipeligwa fyosa ɨfya mu mpaalanga nɨ fya pakiisʉ.
Ngʉnsʉʉma Kyala ʉkʉtɨ, ʉkʉkongana nɨ sajo syake ɨnyingi, abakasye fiijo mu ndumbula syɨnu, ʉkwendela mwa Mbepo gwake.
Ngʉsʉʉma kangɨ ʉkʉtɨ, Kɨlɨsiti atʉʉgalege mu ndumbula syɨnu paapo mummwitiike. Kangɨ ngʉsʉʉma ʉkʉtɨ mwitotekege pa lwalo ʉlwa lʉgano,
ʉkʉtɨ pamopeene na biikemo boosa, mujege na maka agaa kʉlwagania ʉlʉgano lwa Kɨlɨsiti muno lʉjɨɨliile, ʉbweleefu, ʉbʉtali, ʉbwinʉfu nʉ bʉsolofu.
Kangɨ nʉ kʉlʉmanya ʉlʉgano lwa Kɨlɨsiti ʉlʉ lʉkɨndile amahala goosa, mwisʉle fiijo ʉbʉsita kwagɨlwa bwa Kyala.
Kʉnongwa ɨjo Kyala atuufigwege! Kʉ maka gaake ikʉbomba ɨmbombo nkatɨ mmyɨtʉ. Kangɨ ʉmwene abagiile ʉkʉbomba ɨmbombo ɨngʉlʉmba fiijo ʉkʉkɨnda ɨsi tʉbagiile ʉkʉsʉʉma nʉ kwinogona.
Nalooli Kyala atuufigwege nkɨpanga kyake, na mwa Kɨlɨsiti Jesu akabalɨlo koosa, bwila na bwila! Ameni.
Po leelo ʉne ne mpinyigwa kʉnongwa jaa kʉmmbombela ʉNtwa Jesu, ngʉbapyelesya ʉkʉtɨ mujege nkajɨɨlo aka kafwene na muno Kyala aababɨlɨkiile.
Mujege nʉ lwijiisyo fiijo, kangɨ mujege booloolo ndɨ syosa. Amupaakɨsaniege kʉ lʉgano.
Mwijʉʉlege ʉkʉbʉlɨndɨlɨla ʉbʉlɨɨlanisi bwɨnu, ʉbʉ mupeeliigwe na Mbepo Mwikemo, kʉ njɨla jaa lʉtengaano ʉlʉ lʉbalʉngeenie.
Gʉliko ʉmbɨlɨ gʉmogwene, na Mbepo jʉmojwene, bo ʉlwa lʉsʉʉbɨlo ʉlʉ tʉbɨlɨkɨliigwe na Kyala lʉlɨ lʉmolwene.
Aliko ʉNtwa jʉmojwene, ʉlwitɨko lʉmolwene, ʉloosyo lʉmolwene.
Kangɨ aliko Kyala jʉmojwene, ʉjʉ jo Taata gwa boosa, alɨ pamwanya palɨ boosa, ikʉbomba ndɨ boosa, alɨ nkatɨ ndɨ boosa.
Looli kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ akabile ɨliipyana, ʉkʉkongana nɨ kɨpɨmɨlo kya kɨkʉngɨlwa, ɨkɨ atʉpeele Kɨlɨsiti.
Po apa Kalata ʉMwikemo ikʉtɨ,
“Bo ikʉfyʉka kʉmwanya fiijo,
aafyʉkile nabo abapinyigwa bingi,
aabapeele abandʉ ɨfikʉngɨlwa fyake.”
Po ʉlʉ iisyʉ likʉtɨ, “Aafyʉkile kʉmwanya,” kokʉtɨ fiki? Kokʉtɨ, kʉbwandɨlo aasulwike paasi fiijo pakiisʉ.
Po ʉjʉ aasulwike pakiisʉ apa, jo ʉjʉ aafyʉkile ʉkʉkɨnda kʉmwanya koosa, ʉkʉtɨ ajege pabʉjo boosa.
Ʉmwene jo ʉjʉ aababɨɨkile bamo ʉkʉja batʉmigwa, bamo ʉkʉja bakunguluka, bamo ʉkʉja balʉmbɨlɨli, abangɨ ʉkʉja batiimi, na bangɨ ʉkʉja bamanyisi.
Aabombile bo ʉlo ʉkʉbatendekesya abiikemo ʉkʉbomba ɨmbombo jaa Kɨlɨsiti, ʉkʉtɨ ɨkɨpanga kya Kyala, ʉgʉ go mbɨlɨ gwa Kɨlɨsiti, kɨjengigwe.
Kikʉjengigwaga mpaka ʉswe twesa tʉbʉfikɨle ʉbʉlɨɨlanisi ʉbwa lwitɨko, nʉ kʉmmanya fiijo ʉMwana gwa Kyala, kangɨ tʉjege bandʉ aba bakomile, nʉ kʉbʉfikɨla ʉbʉsita kwagɨlwa ʉbwa Kɨlɨsiti.
Po tʉlɨngajaga bo ʉlwa baana abafyele, aba bikʉgutigwa nʉ mbelo ʉgwa lʉko nʉ lʉko, ʉgwa manyisyo ɨsi abandʉ bikwagʉla, ʉkʉtɨ babasofye abandʉ kʉ bʉkomu.
Looli tʉbʉʉlanege ʉbwanalooli ndʉgano, ʉkʉtɨ tʉkʉle nʉ kʉmfikɨla Kɨlɨsiti ndɨ syosa, ʉjʉ jo ntʉ.
Mmyake, ʉtʉmbakaasya toosa ʉtwa mu mbɨlɨ tʉtʉʉleene nʉ kʉlʉngana pamopeene. Lɨnga kʉkʉtɨ kambakaasya kikʉbomba ɨmbombo jaake, po ʉmbɨlɨ goosa gukʉkʉla nʉ kwijenga ndʉgano.
Po mu ngamu ɨjaa Ntwa, ngʉbasoka nʉ kʉbasisimɨkɨsya, ʉkwandɨla akabalɨlo aka, akajɨɨlo kɨɨnu kalɨngajaga bo ʉlwa bandʉ aba bakammanya Kyala, abeene ɨnyiinogono syabo sya mwalo.
Amahala gaabo galɨ mu ngiisi. Bakakaba ʉbʉʉmi ʉbʉ bukʉfuma kwa Kyala, kʉnongwa jaa bʉkonyofu bwabo, nʉ bʉkafu ʉbwa ndumbula syabo.
Basobile, kangɨ bakaja nɨ soni, biibɨɨkile mbʉnyali ʉbwa lʉko loosa, bikʉnyonywa ʉkʉkɨndapo ʉkʉbomba ɨsyo.
Leelo ʉmwe mukaamanyiile bo ʉlo ɨsya Kɨlɨsiti.
Nalooli mwapɨliike kanunu ɨndʉmi nɨ manyisyo syake, ʉkʉkongana nʉ bwanalooli ʉbʉ bʉlimo mmyake.
Mwamanyisiigwe ʉkʉbʉleka ʉbʉndʉ bwɨnu ʉbwa ijolo, aka ko kajɨɨlo kɨɨnu akabiibi. Akabalɨlo kala moonangɨkaga kʉnongwa jaa finyonyo fyɨnu ɨfi fikʉbasyoba.
Mwamanyisiigwe ʉkwandʉla ɨnyiinogono syɨnu,
nʉ kʉfwala ʉbʉndʉ ʉbʉpya, bo ʉlʉ Kyala aabapelile ʉkʉfwana nagwe, mbʉgolofu na mbwikemo ʉbwa nalooli.
Po namuleke ʉbʉtʉngʉlʉ! Kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ ajobege ʉbwanalooli kʉ nnine,
paapo kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ kambakaasya akaa mbɨlɨ gʉmogwene.
“Lɨnga mukaleele, mulɨngabombaga ʉbʉtʉlanongwa.”
Ɨliisʉba lɨlɨngajongaga bo mukaalɨ mulɨ nɨ ngalalɨsi.
Mulɨngampaga Seetano ʉbʉjo.
Ʉnhɨɨji aleke ʉkʉhɨɨja, abombege ɨmbombo jaa bwanalooli na maboko gaake, ʉkʉtɨ akabege ʉtʉndʉ ʉtwa kʉbajabɨlapo abangɨ aba balɨ nʉ bʉtolwe.
Mulɨngajobaga amasyʉ agaa loonangɨko, mujobege amasyʉ agaa kʉbajenga nʉ kʉbatʉʉla abiinɨɨnu, ʉkʉtɨ bakabɨlengemo aba bikʉgapɨlɨkɨsya.
Mulɨngampelelaga ʉbʉsulumanie Mbepo Mwikemo, paapo Mbepo ʉjo kɨmanyilo kya Kyala kʉmyɨnu ʉkʉtɨ mulɨ bandʉ baake, nʉ kʉtɨ lɨliko iisikʉ ɨlɨ Kyala aikwisa kʉbapoka.
Po namuleke ʉkʉbabenga abandʉ, ɨngimbʉko, ɨngalalɨsi, ʉnjwego na maheelu, pamopeene nʉ bʉbiibi ʉbwa lʉko loosa.
Looli mujege nɨ kɨbabɨɨlɨsi, mubombelanilege ɨnunu. Kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ anhobokelege ʉnnine, bo ʉlʉ Kyala aabahobokiile ʉkwendela mwa Kɨlɨsiti.
Po leelo mukongege akajɨɨlo akaa Kyala, paapo ʉmwe mulɨ baanaake abakʉndwe.
Mugananege akabalɨlo koosa, bo ʉlwa Kɨlɨsiti ʉjʉ atʉganile, aaliiningile ʉkʉja ikemo lya kʉbooligwa ɨlya lʉʉma ʉlʉnunu, ɨlɨ likʉnkyela Kyala.
Looli mulɨngalogwaga sikʉ, pamo ʉkʉja nɨ finyonyo ɨfibiibi ɨfya tʉndʉ, paapo ɨsyo sikabagɨsya kʉ biikemo.
Amasyʉ gɨɨnu galɨngajaga gaa kʉbasʉʉsya abiinɨɨnu, pamo agaa bʉkonyofu, pamo agaa sʉnga, looli gajege masyʉ agaa kʉgwa ʉlʉpi kwa Kyala.
Iisyʉ ɨlɨ mulɨmanye nalooli, ʉkʉtɨ akajako ʉndogwe, pamo ʉnnyali, pamo ʉnnyonywa toosa, ʉjʉ abagiile ʉkwingɨla mBʉnyafyale bwa Kɨlɨsiti na Kyala.
Ʉjo afwene nʉ mundʉ ʉjʉ ikwipuuta kʉ tʉndʉ ʉtʉ akaja jo Kyala.
Ʉmundʉ gwesa alɨngabasyobaga na masyʉ agaa bʉtʉngʉlʉ, paapo kʉnongwa jaa bʉtʉlanongwa ʉbo, ɨngalalɨsi sya Kyala sikʉbiisɨla boosa aba batikʉntiila.
Po mulɨngajaga nʉ bʉlɨɨlanisi na bandʉ aba bikʉbomba ɨsyo.
Ijolo ʉmwe mwalɨ mu ngiisi, looli akabalɨlo aka mulɨ ndʉmuli, kʉnongwa jaa kʉmmwitɨka ʉNtwa Jesu. Mwendege bo abandʉ aba balɨ ndʉmuli.
Namanga abandʉ aba balɨ ndʉmuli bikʉbomba ɨnunu, ɨsya bʉgolofu nɨ sya bwanalooli, akabalɨlo koosa.
Kangɨ musilondege ɨsi sikʉnkyela ʉNtwa.
Mulɨngajaga nʉ bʉlɨɨlanisi na bandʉ aba bikʉbomba ɨmbombo ɨsya mu ngiisi, looli musisetʉlege.
Namanga sya soni nʉ kʉsijoba ɨsi abandʉ abo bikʉsibomba mbʉtiitʉ.
Looli lɨnga silɨ ndʉmuli, sikʉbonekaga pabwelu, paapo ʉlʉmuli lukʉsimulɨka.
Lɨnga ʉlʉmuli lukʉkamulɨka akandʉ aka kalɨ mu ngiisi, katikʉsyala lʉlalʉla, koope kikʉja nʉ lʉmuli. Jo nongwa ɨjɨ baatɨgɨ,
“Lembʉka ʉgwe, gwe ʉgonile ʉtʉlo!
Ʉsyʉke ʉkʉfuma mbafwe.
Kɨlɨsiti ikʉkʉmulɨkɨlaga.”
Po amwikeetege nkajɨɨlo kɨɨnu. Mulɨngajaga bo ʉlwa bakonyofu, looli bo ʉlwa baa mahala.
Mukabombelege kanunu akabalɨlo koosa aka mulɨ nako, paapo amasikʉ aga gaa bʉbiibi.
Po leelo mulɨngajaga bakonyofu, looli mubwaganiege muno bʉjɨɨliile ʉbwigane bwa Kyala.
Mulɨngagaalaga ɨfinga,
paapo ʉmo bʉlimo ʉbʉsobi, looli mwisʉlege Mbepo Mwikemo.
Mujobesaniege kʉ nyɨmbo ɨsya kʉntuufya, ɨsya mwa kalata gwa Ɨsabʉli, kangɨ ɨsi ikʉtʉpapo Mbepo Mwikemo. Mummwɨmbɨlege nʉ kʉntuufya ʉNtwa mu ndumbula syɨnu.
Munngwɨlege ʉlʉpi Taata Kyala amasikʉ goosa kʉlɨ syosa, mu ngamu jaa Ntwa gwɨtʉ Jesu Kɨlɨsiti.
Kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ iijiisyege kʉ nnine kʉnongwa jaa lwɨmɨko ʉlʉ mulɨ nalo kwa Kɨlɨsiti.
Ʉmwe mwe bakiikʉlʉ mwe beegi, mwijiisyege kʉ balʉme bɨɨnu, bo ʉlwa kwijiisya kʉ Ntwa Jesu.
Ʉnnyambala ntʉ gwa nkasi, bo ʉlwa Kɨlɨsiti, joope ntʉ gwa kɨpanga kya Kyala, jo Mpoki gwa kɨpanga ɨkyo, ɨkɨ go mbɨlɨ gwake.
Mwe bakiikʉlʉ mwe beegi, mwijiisyege kʉ balʉme bɨɨnu ndɨ syosa, bo ʉlwa kɨpanga kya Kyala kikwijiisya kwa Kɨlɨsiti.
Mwe banyambala mwe beegi, mubaganege abakasi bɨɨnu, bo ʉlwa Kɨlɨsiti ʉjʉ akɨganile ɨkɨpanga kya Kyala, alɨnkwininga ʉkʉkɨfwɨla.
Aaliiningile ʉkʉfwa ʉkʉtɨ akyelʉsye ɨkɨpanga kya Kyala, nʉ kʉkɨsuka na mɨɨsi ni isyʉ lyake, kɨje kiikemo.
Aabombile bo ʉlo ʉkʉtɨ iitwalɨle ɨkɨpanga kya Kyala ɨkɨsisya, ɨkɨsita kababye, ɨkɨsita nginya, ɨkɨsita kwagɨlwa kamo. Looli ʉkʉtɨ kɨjege kiikemo kangɨ kyelu.
Bʉbʉʉbo abanyambala abeegi, boope bikʉlondigwa ʉkʉbagana abakasi baabo, bo ʉlʉ bagɨganile ɨmibɨlɨ gyabo. Ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ annganile ʉnkasi, agʉganile ʉmbɨlɨ gwake.
Namanga akajako ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ ikʉgʉbenga ʉmbɨlɨ gwake, looli ikʉgʉswɨla nʉ kʉgʉtiima, bo ʉlwa Kɨlɨsiti ʉjʉ ikʉkɨbombela ɨkɨpanga kya Kyala,
paapo ʉswe tʉlɨ tʉmbakaasya ʉtwa mbɨlɨ gwake.
“Kʉnongwa ɨjo ʉnnyambala ikʉnndeka ʉgwise nʉ nna, ikʉmmʉʉmɨɨlɨlaga ʉnkasi, bobabɨɨlɨ bikʉjaga mbɨlɨ gʉmogwene.”
Amasyʉ aga mapalapala fiijo, leelo ʉne ngʉjoba ɨsya Kɨlɨsiti, nɨ kɨpanga kya Kyala.
Looli kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ annganege ʉnkasi bo ʉlʉ agʉganile ʉmbɨlɨ gwake, joope ʉnkiikʉlʉ ʉmwegi ammwɨmɨkege ʉndʉme.
Mwe baana, mubɨɨmɨkege abapaapi bɨɨnu bo muno sikʉlondeligwa mu Ntwa, paapo ʉbo bo bʉgolofu.
Ʉlʉlagɨlo ʉlwa kwanda ʉlʉ lʉlɨ nʉ lʉfingo lukʉtɨ, “Ʉmmwɨmɨkege ʉgʉʉso nʉ nyoko,
ʉkʉtɨ ʉkabe ɨsajo nʉ kʉgona amasikʉ mingi pakiisʉ.”
Nuumwe mwe biisabo, mulɨngabakalasyaga abaanɨɨnu, looli mubakʉsyege nʉ kʉbafunda nɨ manyisyo ɨsya Ntwa.
Mwe batʉmwa,
mubɨɨmɨkege abatwa bɨɨnu abaa pakiisʉ, kʉ lʉtende nʉ kʉtetema. Mubombege bo ʉlo nɨ ndumbula ɨnyeelu, bo ʉlʉ mukʉmmbombela Kɨlɨsiti.

Mubombege bo ʉlo akabalɨlo koosa, komma ʉkʉbomba bo bikʉbakeeta kwene, ʉkʉtɨ babatuufye. Looli mubombege muno bikʉlondeligwa ʉkʉbomba abatʉmwa baa Kɨlɨsiti. Mubombege nɨ ndumbula joosa, bo muno Kyala ikʉlondela.
Mubabombelege abatwa bɨɨnu nɨ ndumbula joosa, bo muno mukʉmmbombela ʉNtwa Jesu, somma ngatɨ mukʉbabombela abandʉ.
Namanga musyaganiege ʉkʉtɨ, ʉNtwa Jesu aikʉmpa ɨfya kʉsekeesya ʉmundʉ ʉjʉ ikʉbomba ɨnunu, aje ntʉmwa pamo mwabʉke.

Na nuumwe mwe batwa, mubabombelege bo lʉlʉʉlo abatʉmwa bɨɨnu. Namuleke ʉkʉbatiilɨsya, namanga mumeenye ʉkʉtɨ ʉNtwa gwabo nʉ gwɨnu jo jʉlajʉla, alɨ kʉmwanya. Kyala ikʉbombela ɨkɨpɨmɨlo kɨlakɨla kʉ bandʉ boosa.
Po ɨnongwa ɨsya kʉmalɨɨkɨsya nikʉtɨ, mukakɨlege mu Ntwa, na mmaka gaake amakʉlʉmba.
Namufwalege ɨmyenda gyosa ɨgya kʉlwɨla ʉbwite, ɨgɨ abapeele Kyala, ʉkʉbʉpɨnga ʉbʉkomu bwa Seetano.
Paapo ʉbwite bwɨtʉ tʉtikʉlwa na bandʉ, looli tukʉlwa nɨ mbepo ɨnyali, ɨsi sikʉlongosya nʉ kʉlagɨla pakiisʉ apa, kangɨ na maka agaa mu ngiisi, po na maka agaa mbepo ɨsya mu mpaalanga.
Kʉnongwa ɨjo, namufwalege ɨmyenda gyosa ɨgya kʉlwɨla ʉbwite, ɨgɨ abapeele Kyala, ʉkʉtɨ iisikʉ lya bʉtolwe bo lɨfikile, mwise munsigɨle ʉndʉgʉ. Bo mumalile ʉkʉlwa, mukwɨmaga na maka.
Po leelo mwɨmege na maka, mwipinyege ʉbwanalooli mu nsana, mufwalege ɨkyela ɨkya bʉgolofu pa kɨpambaga,
mufwalege ɨfilato ʉkwitendekesya ʉkwenda ɨnjɨla ɨjaa kʉlʉmbɨlɨla ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu ɨjaa lʉtengaano.
Pamopeene na syosa ɨsyo, mujege nɨ ngʉlʉ ɨjaa lwitɨko ɨjaa kʉbatʉʉla ʉkʉgɨsimɨsya ɨmitipʉlo ɨgya mooto ɨgya Seetano.
Namufwalege ɨkɨtili ɨkya kyela ɨkya bʉpokigwa, kangɨ mujege nʉ lʉʉbo lwa Mbepo Mwikemo, ʉlʉ lyo isyʉ lya Kyala.
Mwipuutege bwila ɨnyiipuuto sya lʉko loosa, kʉ bʉtʉʉli ʉbwa Mbepo Mwikemo. Mujege maaso kɨsita kʉkatala, ʉkʉbiipuutɨla abiitɨki boosa.
Muunyiipuutɨlege na niine, ʉkʉtɨ Kyala ambege bwila ɨsya kʉjoba, bo ngʉlʉmbɨlɨla pabwelu. Kangɨ mfumusyege nʉ bʉkifu ɨsya ndʉbaatɨko ʉlwa mbʉtiitʉ ɨsi silɨ mu Ndʉmi ɨNunu.
Ʉne ndɨ mwɨmɨlɨli gwa Ndʉmi ɨNunu mu nnyololo. Muunyiipuutɨlege, ʉkʉtɨ njege nkifu ʉkʉjoba ɨsi ngʉlondigwa ʉkʉsijoba.
Ʉgwamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko ʉnkʉndwe Tikiko, ʉmbombeli ʉnsʉʉbɨligwa gwa Ntwa Jesu, ʉjo jo ikʉbabʉʉla ɨnongwa syangʉ syosa, ʉkʉtɨ mumanye muno njɨɨliile ʉne, na ɨsi ngʉbomba akabalɨlo aka.
Nʉntʉmile ʉjo kʉmyɨnu, ʉkʉtɨ abapangɨle ɨnongwa syɨtʉ nʉ kʉbakasya mu ndumbula syɨnu.
Ʉlʉtengaano lʉjege kʉmyɨnu, mwesa mwe baamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko, nʉ lʉgano pamopeene nʉ lwitɨko, ʉkʉfuma kwa Taata Kyala na kʉ Ntwa Jesu Kɨlɨsiti.
Ɨliipyana nʉ lʉgano ʉlʉ lʉtikʉmalɨka, fijege na bandʉ boosa aba bannganile ʉNtwa gwɨtʉ Jesu Kɨlɨsiti.
Philippians: Kalata ʉjʉ afumile kʉmyangʉ ʉne Paʉli na Timoti, twe babombeli baa Kɨlɨsiti Jesu. Tukʉbasimbɨla mwe biikemo
mwesa mwe mulɨ bandʉ baake Kɨlɨsiti Jesu,
pamopeene na mwe bɨɨmɨlɨli na batʉʉli, mwe mulimo mu Filipi.
Ɨliipyana nʉ lʉtengaano ʉkʉfuma kwa Taata Kyala na kʉ Ntwa Jesu Kɨlɨsiti, fijege na nuumwe.
Kʉkʉtɨ kabalɨlo aka ngʉbakʉmbʉka ʉmwe, ngʉgwa ʉlʉpi kwa Kyala gwangʉ kʉnongwa jɨɨnu.
Bwila bo ngʉbiipuutɨla ʉmwe mwesa, ngwipuuta nʉ lʉsekelo,
paapo mulɨ pamopeene na niine nkʉfumusya ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu, ʉkʉfuma iisikʉ lya kwanda bo mfikile kʉmyɨnu, mpaka lɨɨlɨno.
Ndikwilaamwa na panandɨ, ʉkʉtɨ Kyala ʉjʉ aalyandile ɨmbombo ɨnunu pakatɨ pamyɨnu, ikwisa kʉjɨmalɨɨsya pi isikʉ ɨlɨ Jesu Kɨlɨsiti ikwisa kangɨ.

Ʉkʉbiinogona ʉmwe mwesa bo ʉlo, kanunu kʉmyangʉ paapo mbaganile fiijo. Na paapo ngʉjɨlwɨla ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu nʉ kʉjɨfumusya bo ndɨ mu nnyololo, poope ʉmwe mwesa mukwendelela ʉkʉja nʉ bʉlɨɨlanisi na niine mu mbombo ɨjo.
Kyala nkeeti gwangʉ, muno mbasyʉkile mwesa, nʉ lʉgano ʉkʉfuma kwa Kɨlɨsiti Jesu.
Ʉlwipuuto lwangʉ lo ʉlʉ, ʉlʉgano lwɨnu longelengepo ʉkʉja lwingi fiijo ʉkʉtɨ amahala nʉ kʉsyagania syosa kongelepo koope,
ʉkʉtɨ musyaganiege ɨnunu. Po mukʉjaga nɨ ndumbula ɨnyeelu, kɨsita nongwa, mpaka pi isikʉ lya kwisa kangɨ Kɨlɨsiti.
Ngʉnsʉʉma Jesu Kɨlɨsiti abiisʉsye ɨseke sya bʉgolofu, ɨsya kʉntuufya Kyala nʉ kʉnangɨsya ʉbʉsisya bwake.
Po mwe baamyɨtʉ ndwitɨko, ngʉlonda mumanye ʉkʉtɨ syosa ɨsi siinyaagile, sitʉʉlile fiijo ʉkʉfumusya ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu.
Abalɨndɨlɨli boosa aba bikʉlɨndɨlɨla ɨkɨtangaalala, na bangɨ boosa bameenye ʉkʉtɨ mbinyiigwe kʉnongwa jaa kʉlʉmbɨlɨla ɨnongwa sya Kɨlɨsiti.
Ʉkʉpinyigwa kwangʉ, kʉpelile abiitɨki biinɨɨtʉ ʉkʉkɨndɨlɨla ʉkʉnsʉʉbɨla ʉNtwa, ʉkʉlʉmbɨlɨla iisyʉ lya Kyala kɨsita lʉtende.
Bamo ndɨ abo bikʉnndʉmbɨlɨla Kɨlɨsiti kʉ bʉʉfi na kʉ lʉkaani, bamo bikʉnndʉmbɨlɨla Kɨlɨsiti kʉ ndumbula ɨnunu.
Aba bikʉnndʉmbɨlɨla kʉ lʉgano, bameenye ʉkʉtɨ mbɨɨkiigwe na Kyala ʉkʉjɨlwɨla ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu.
Looli abangɨ abo bikʉnndʉmbɨlɨla Kɨlɨsiti ʉkʉtɨ bɨɨmɨkigwege abeene, batikʉnndʉmbɨlɨla nɨ ndumbula ɨnunu. Bikwinogona ʉkʉtɨ bikongelelapo ʉbʉtolwe bwangʉ mu nnyololo.
Sikoonangɨkapo nasimo, paapo ɨnongwa sya Kɨlɨsiti sikʉfumusigwa kʉ njɨla nyingi, kʉje kʉ ndumbula ɨnunu pamo ɨmbiibi. Kʉnongwa ɨjo ʉne nhobwike. Ngwendelelaga ʉkʉhoboka,
paapo mmeenye ʉkʉtɨ, kʉnongwa jaa lwipuuto lwɨnu, nʉ bʉtʉʉli bwa Mbepo Mwikemo ʉjʉ aatʉmiigwe na Jesu Kɨlɨsiti, ɨsi sikʉʉsanukɨla ʉne ʉkʉja bʉpoki bwangʉ.

Ngʉsʉʉbɨla fiijo ʉkʉtɨ, sikajako nasimo ɨsya kʉmbela ʉkʉja nɨ soni, looli bo ʉlʉ syalɨ amasikʉ goosa, ngwendelelaga ʉkwikasya mu ndumbula ʉkʉtɨ Kɨlɨsiti atuufigwege kʉlɨ ɨsi sikʉboneka kʉmyangʉ, kʉjege ko kʉsyala kʉ bʉʉmi pamo ʉkʉfwa.
Po kʉmyangʉ ʉne, ʉkʉjako kʉ bʉʉmi jo Kɨlɨsiti, nʉ kʉfwa ko kʉkaba.
Lɨnga ngʉjako kʉ bʉʉmi, ngwendelelaga ʉkwijʉʉla ʉkʉbomba ɨmbombo jaa Kɨlɨsiti. Kalɨ niisalɨle ɨfiki ʉbʉʉmi nʉ bʉfwe?
Niikoleenie pakatɨ pa njɨla ibɨlɨ ɨsyo. Ngʉnyonywa ʉkʉbʉʉka, ngajege pamopeene na Kɨlɨsiti, ɨjo jo njɨla nunu fiijo.
Looli kʉnongwa jɨɨnu, ʉkʉjako kʉ bʉʉmi ʉne, kukʉlondigwa fiijo.
Ɨsyo syo ndɨ nʉ bwanalooli nasyo, mmeenye ʉkʉtɨ ngwendelelaga ʉkʉtʉʉgala pamopeene na nuumwe mwesa, ʉkʉtɨ mukʉlege nʉ kʉja nʉ lʉsekelo ndwitɨko.
Po mukʉkɨndɨlɨlaga ʉkʉja nʉ lʉsekelo mwa Kɨlɨsiti Jesu, kʉnongwa jaa kʉjapo kangɨ ʉne pamopeene na nuumwe.

Looli ʉlwendo lwɨnu lʉjɨɨlege bo muno ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu ɨjaa Kɨlɨsiti jikʉlondela. Lɨnga niisile kʉkʉbakeeta ʉmwe, pamo lɨnga ngajapo, mbɨlɨkege ɨnongwa syɨnu, ʉkʉtɨ mwɨmile kanunu pamopeene, kangɨ mulɨ nɨ nyango jɨmojeene, kʉnongwa jaa kʉjɨlwɨla ɨNdʉmi ɨNunu.
Mulɨngabatiilaga na panandɨ aba bikʉbapɨnga ndɨ syosa sila, looli mujege bakifu akabalɨlo koosa. Ʉkʉbomba bo ʉlo kukʉnangɨsyaga kʉmyabo ʉkʉtɨ bikʉpyutigwa, looli ʉkʉtɨ ʉmwe mukʉpokigwa na Kyala.
Kokʉtɨ mupeeliigwe ipyana, kʉkaja kwene ʉkʉmmwitɨka itolo, looli nʉ kʉkʉbɨlwa kʉnongwa jaa Kɨlɨsiti.
Lɨɨlɨno mukʉlwa ʉbwite ʉbo, ʉbʉ mwambonaga ngʉlwa kʉbwandɨlo, bo ʉbʉ na ʉlʉ mukʉpɨlɨka ngaalɨ ndɨ pakʉlwa.
Bʉle, ʉbʉʉmi bwɨtʉ mwa Kɨlɨsiti bukʉtʉpa amaka? Bʉle, ʉlʉgano lwake lukʉtʉkasya? Bʉle, twambɨliile Mbepo Mwikemo twesa, ʉkʉkeetana kʉ booloolo nʉ kʉpaakɨsania?
Po muunyiisʉsye ʉlʉsekelo, kʉ njɨla jaa kʉja nɨ nyiinogono simosyene, ʉlʉgano lʉmolwene, ɨndumbula jɨmojeene, nɨ nyango jɨmojeene.
Mulɨngabombaga syosyosa nɨ ndumbula jaa kʉlonda ʉkʉntola ʉjʉngɨ pamo kʉ matingo, looli mujege nʉ lwijiisyo. Kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ ammbonege ʉnnine ʉkʉja gwa kwɨmɨkigwa ʉkʉnkɨnda ʉmwene.
Kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ alɨngalondaga kwene ʉkʉkaba ʉmwene, looli kʉkʉtɨ mundʉ akeetege nɨ sya bangɨ.
Mwinogonege bo muno iinogonelaga Kɨlɨsiti Jesu,
ʉjʉ alɨ bo muno ajɨɨliile Kyala,
looli akaakʉbɨɨkilepo ʉkʉja bo Kyala ʉkʉja kandʉ kaa kʉkʉʉmɨɨlɨla.
Aafilekile fyosa, aalɨ bo muno ajɨɨliile ʉntʉmwa,
aapaapiigwe bo ʉlwa bandʉ.
Aaboniike bo ʉlwa bandʉ,
kangɨ aaliijiisiisye nʉ kʉnkonga Kyala mpaka mbʉfwe,
ʉbʉfwe bwa kʉgogigwa pa kɨkohekano.
Kʉnongwa ɨjo Kyala alɨnkʉmmwɨmɨka fiijo.
Alɨnkʉmpapo ɨngamu ɨjɨ jɨsikɨndile ɨngamu syosa,
ʉkʉtɨ mu ngamu jaa Jesu fifugamege,
ɨfipeligwa ɨfya kʉmwanya, ɨfya pakiisʉ nɨ fya kʉ bʉsyʉka,
nʉ kʉtɨ kʉkʉtɨ lʉlɨmi lʉjobe ʉkʉtɨ Jesu Kɨlɨsiti jo Ntwa,
kʉ bʉsisya bwa Taata Kyala.

Po bakʉndwe, mwendelelege ʉkʉbomba kʉ maka ɨmbombo ɨsi sikʉnangɨsya ʉbʉpoki bwɨnu. Muntiilege Kyala nʉ kʉntetema, kalɨngaja keene akabalɨlo aka ndipo, looli mukɨndɨlɨlege akabalɨlo aka ngajapo, bo ʉlʉ mwambɨlɨkaga ɨsi naababʉʉlaga amasikʉ goosa.
Mubombege bo ʉlo paapo jo Kyala ikʉbombaga ɨmbombo pakatɨ pamyɨnu, nʉ kʉbapapo amaka agaa kʉlonda nʉ kʉbomba ʉbwigane bwake.
Mubombege syosa kɨsita kwibuneesya pamo ʉkʉkaanika,

ʉkʉtɨ muje beelu kɨsita nongwa, bandʉ baa Kyala abagolofu na basita kʉja na kababye nakamo, pakatɨ pa bandʉ abasyobi na baniongafu abaa nkabalɨlo aka. Pakatɨ pamyabo mukʉmulɨka bo ʉlwa mulɨ ɨsi sikʉlangala fiijo mu mpaalanga,
bo mulɨkolile iisyʉ ɨlɨ likʉtwala ʉbʉʉmi. Kʉnongwa ɨjo ngwisa kwituukɨfyaga ʉmwe pi isikʉ lya kwisa Kɨlɨsiti, sikwisa kʉnangɨsya ʉkʉtɨ ʉkwijʉʉla kwangʉ, ngaataagile itolo amaka.

Ʉlwitɨko lwɨnu kwa Kyala nʉ kʉmmbombela kwɨnu fifwene ni ikemo, kandʉ kɨɨnu akaa ntengo aka mukʉlonda ʉkʉnsookesya. Lɨnga bikʉʉngoga, ʉbʉfwe bwangʉ bukʉjaga bo ikemo ɨlɨngɨ, ɨlɨ lyongiilepo pi ikemo lyɨnu. Ʉkeetege ngʉsekela fiijo pamopeene na nuumwe mwesa.
Na nuumwe muhobokege nʉ kʉsekela pamopeene na niine.
Ngʉsʉʉbɨla mu Ntwa Jesu, ʉkʉntʉma nakalɨnga Timoti kʉmyɨnu, nhoboke ʉkʉpɨlɨka ɨnongwa syɨnu.
Ngʉntʉma ʉmwene paapo ngaja nʉ mundʉ ʉjʉngɨ ʉjʉ ikʉbapaasya ʉmwe nɨ ndumbula jaake joosa bo ʉlwa Timoti.
